40001001	Ŋuur-aŋ siŋ ku tamba ta Iisa Masi, roŋ ka Dawuud kaak roŋ ka Ibraayim.
40001002	Ibraayim weetu Isaaka, Isaaka weetu Yakuub, Yakuub weetu Zuuda iŋ siŋtay
40001003	ho Zuuda weetu Perees iŋ Zaara, ŋuur-aŋ yaaco siŋti Tamaar. Perees gay weetu Esroom, Esroom weetu Araam,
40001004	Araam weetu Aminadaab, Aminadaab weetu Nasoon ho Nasoon weetu Salmoon.
40001005	Salmoon weetu Booz, yaaco gay siŋti Raab. Booz gay weetu Obeed, roŋti ka Ruut. Obeed weetu Jeese,
40001006	Jeese weetu sultan Dawuud. Dawuud gay weetu Selemaan, atan̰ Selemaan awalle, ta daaciy ta gem rakki ŋu kolaag Uuri.
40001007	Selemaan weetu Robowaam, Robowaam weetu Abiya, Abiya weetu Aza,
40001008	Aza weetu Jozapaat, Jozapaat weetu Joraam ho Joraam weetu Oziyaas.
40001009	Oziyaas gay weetu Jowataam, Jowataam weetu Akaaz ho Akaaz weetu Ezekiyaas.
40001010	Ezekiyaas gay weetu Manaase, Manaase weetu Amoon ho Amoon weetu Zoziyaas.
40001011	Zoziyaas gay weetu Jekoniyaas iŋ siŋtay ɗo wiktin taar-at ko gee ku Babiloon nosiriico ɗo gee ku Israyeel ho ŋu iyiig ɗo kiɗco.
40001012	Min ŋu iyiig Babiloon-ak, Jekoniyaas weeyiig Salatiyeel, Salatiyeel gay weetu Zorobabeel,
40001013	Zorobabeel weetu Abiyuud, Abiyuud weetu Eliyakiim, Eliyakiim weetu Azoor,
40001014	Azoor weetu Sadok, Sadok weetu Akiim ho Akiim weetu Eliyuud.
40001015	Eliyuud gay weetu Eliyazaar, Eliyazaar weetu Mataan, Mataan weetu Yakuub
40001016	ho Yakuub weetu Yuusup. Yuusup ko obit mic taat ŋu koliy Mariyam taat weeyig Iisa kaak ŋu koliy Masi.
40001017	Tamba okintit ko anta : min Ibraayim nam sultan Dawuud gin orok iŋ pooɗ tamba. Min sultan Dawuud nam wiktin taat ŋu iyiig gee ku Israyeel Babiloon gin orok iŋ pooɗ tamba, ho min wiktin taar-ata nam wiktin taat ŋu weeyig Masi gin orok iŋ pooɗ tamba.
40001018	Taloŋ maman ŋu weeyiig Iisa Masi. Yaaco Mariyam, taar kaawco mat ko iŋ Yuusup a ŋuu obe. Kar gay, min ŋa bal weƴe misa iŋ taar di, ta ictu adi iŋ gudurre ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
40001019	Yuusup ɗubilti, ŋaar gem sellen̰ ho ŋa rakaaɗo imilin oorinti kara. Paa ko, ŋa ictu niyine a ŋaa totirinti iŋ bugumiy.
40001020	Min ŋa pakira misan di, ɗubil ka Rabbin Buŋ bayniiji ɗo sooniikar ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Yuusup, roŋ ka Dawuud, dak ginenno kolaw. Icit Mariyam ɗo gerin̰ ar daaciŋ, asaan adti ŋaar asa min gudurre ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
40001021	Ta asa wee mico, ya ta wee kiiji diye siŋ Iisa asaan ŋa asa jilin̰ geen̰ji min ɗo zunuubinnico. »
40001022	Maanna-ak kuuniytu ar taat Rabbin Buŋ kaawtu awalle iŋ bi ka nabiin̰cey aman :
40001023	« Cokiyoŋ ! Gemso taat bal aawe mitko asa ice adi ho taa wee mico. Ya ta wee, mic-ak, ŋuu kolin̰ ‟ Emanuweel ”. » Siŋ-ak ɗiya aman : « Buŋ goy iŋ ginte. »
40001024	Min Yuusup niintu, ŋa iciit Mariyam ar daaciy uudin taat ɗubil ka Rabbin Buŋ kaawiiji.
40001025	Kar gay, ŋa bal weƴe iŋ taara nam ta weeyig roŋti. Hiyya, mic-ak, Yuusup diyiiji siŋ Iisa.
40002001	Ŋu weeyig Iisa ɗo hellin ta Beteleyem ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude ɗo wiktin taat sultan kaak ŋu koliy Herood tiya misa meennuwiy. Min ŋu weeyiiga, gay ibine kaalnal uctu min coke ka pati ho ŋu ɓaawtu Zeruzaleem.
40002002	Kar ŋu inditu aman : « Moo mic kaak ŋu weetu daaɓiney ho asa gine sultan ka Yuudinnar-aka ? Ni talig kaaloy bayin min coke ka pati ho ni as abdiyin̰ji. »
40002003	Min sultan Herood doriit kabarre-at, ŋa barjiltu yoo gee okin̰co ku Zeruzaleem oki.
40002004	Ŋa n̰umiig agindaw ku gay satkiner okin̰co iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi ho ŋa indiigu aman : « Momoŋ ga wer kaak ŋuu ween̰ji Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu ? »
40002005	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋuu ween̰ji ɗo hellin ta Beteleyem ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude, asaan nabiin̰ce siirit awalle ɗo Kitamner aman :
40002006	‟ Kaŋke Beteleyem, ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude, ka seener, min ɗo hellinnan ku Zuude-aŋ, ka kapakɗo tak-tak, asaan min kaŋken di asa amile tatkaw kaak asa tale kaaco ɗo gee ku Israyeel. ” »
40002007	Hiyya, min Herood doriit kaaw-at, ŋa koliig iŋ cigile gay ibine kaalnal-aku ho ŋa indiigu a ŋuuji gaare wiktin taat kaal-ak bayintu.
40002008	Min ŋu gaariiji, ŋa n̰aamiig Beteleyem ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ, indoŋ samaane ɗo bi ka mic-aka. Ya ku gas weriy di, ku asiidu kaawe. Paa kat, nun meendu sa yaa ɓaa abdiyin̰ji. »
40002009	Min sultan kaawiico pa-ak, ŋu ictu botilco. Ɗo ɗeetin̰co, ŋu talig kaal kaak awalle ŋu taltu min coke ka pat-aka. Ŋaar gay sin̰ja sin̰jen di iŋ uŋji nam ŋa daktu pey ɗo wer kaak mic goyiyo.
40002010	Min ŋu taliig kaal pey ɗo wer-aka, aditco miintu iŋ galal.
40002011	Hiyya, ŋu un̰jitu geero ho ŋu gasiig mic-ak iŋ yaaco Mariyam. Ŋu dersitu ɗo uŋji ho ŋu abdiyiiga. Kar ŋu piliig gaminco ho ŋu beriiji gamin kuuk kaalne : daabne, dokkanne ho iŋ itir kaak ŋu koliy miir.
40002012	Min ŋaar-ak, Buŋ miniig gee-ak ɗo sooniikar a ŋu ɓaanno pey wer ka Herood. Hiyya, ŋu yeeptu ɗo darrico iŋ botol ta pey.
40002013	Min gay ibine kaalnal-ak yeeptu ɗo darrico, ɗubil ka Rabbin Buŋ bayniiji ɗo Yuusup ɗo sooniikar ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ucu, icig mico iŋ yaaco ho gaɗoŋ ɗo kiɗ ka Meser. Goyoŋ annere nam ƴiriy taat naan̰ kaawe ja kat kii yeepe. Yampa, Herood yaa bariyin̰ mico ŋaa deen̰ji. »
40002014	Hiyya, iŋ aando-at di, Yuusup uctu, ŋa iciig mic-aka iŋ yaaco ho ŋu gaɗtu kaƴco Meser.
40002015	Ŋu goytu anner kee nam sultan Herood mattu. Ta kuuniytu ampa-ak asaan kaaw taat Rabbin kaawtu iŋ bi ka nabiin̰cey yaa ase ɗo werti. Kaaw-at aman : « Nu kolig roŋdu a ŋaa amile min Meser. »
40002016	Min Herood ibintu kadar gay ibine kaalnal caaciyga-ak, ŋa dapin̰tu aale. Paa ko, ŋa kaawiico ɗo askirnay a ŋu ɓaa ɗo hellin ta Beteleyem yoo hellinnan kuuk moota, ŋuu deen̰ koogin kuuk miday kuuk elginco bal nece seera. Elgin-ak, Herood girsico min menaw kuuk gay ibine kaalnal kaawiiji.
40002017	Ansii ko, kaaw taat nabi Zeremi kaawtu awalle ɗo Kitamner astu ɗo werti aman :
40002018	« Ŋu dora koriya ɗo geeger ka Raama, ale dakina ho iŋ morke oki. Ta Raseel kat ala kooginti. Ta rakaaɗo a ŋuu dooɗinti asaan ŋu mate. »
40002019	Wiktin taat Herood mattu, Yuusup gay goy misa Meser. Hiyya, ɗubil ka Rabbin Buŋ bayniiji ɗo sooniikar
40002020	ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ucu ! Icig mico iŋ yaaco ho yeepoŋ ɗo kiɗ ka Israyeel, asaan ŋuur kuuk raka deen̰ mic-ak mat ko. »
40002021	Ɗo wer-ak, Yuusup uctu, ŋa iciig mico iŋ yaaco ho ŋu yeeptu Israyeel.
40002022	Kar ŋa dortu kadar Arkelawuus roŋji ka Herood icit Meennaw ta tacco ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude. Ɗo wer-ak, kolaw obiiga ho ŋa rakaaɗo goye ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude-aka. Kar ɗubil ka Buŋdi miniig pey ɗo sooniikar. Paa ko, ŋa ɗeettu ɗo kiɗ ka Galile.
40002023	Ŋa ɓaawtu goye ɗo hellin rakki ŋu kolaat Nazareet. Ta kuuniytu ampa-ak, asaan kaaw taat nabiinna kaawtu awalle as ɗo werti aman : « Ŋu asa kolin̰ a ŋa Nazareyen̰ce. »
40003001	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Yaaya-Batist astu ɗo kalaan ka Zuude ho ŋa teestu gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi aman :
40003002	« Ibinoŋ nigiŋko, rasoŋ goye kaak awalle asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi askoŋ ko moota ! »
40003003	Ŋaar ko Yaaya kaak nabi Ezaayi kaawtu biy awalle aman : « Gaaƴ toŋgo kaawa ɗo kalaaner aman : ‟ Siyon botol ta Rabbiner. Siyon̰jiig botilay-ak ɗalaŋ. ” »
40003004	Kesuuney ta Yaaya, ŋu siyit iŋ law ku lokumi ho ŋa ɗuunit maasoy iŋ karrabin̰ ka zaami. Teen̰ji gay, ŋa eeyma bagi iŋ ƴiime.
40003005	Gee dakina asiiji min Zeruzaleem, min kiɗ ka Zuude okin̰ji ho min kiɗin kuuk moota iŋ barre kaak ŋu koliy Zurdan.
40003006	Min ŋu asiiji, ŋu gaariig zunuubinnico ɗo uŋco ka geemir ho Yaaya batiziyiig ɗo barre ka Zurdan-aka.
40003007	Min Yaaya taltu kadar gee kuuk ŋu koliy Pariziyenna iŋ Sadusiyenna asiiji dakina a ŋaa batiziyin̰co, ŋa kaawiico aman : « Taloŋ ja, kuŋ gee kuuk ar aalin-aŋku ! Ku pakira a kuu pake min dapin̰ko ta Buŋdi taat asaw walla ? Ku gasit kaaw-an min momo ?
40003008	Hadi, ginoŋ gamin ku samaane kuuk gaara a ku rasig goyiŋko kaak awalle.
40003009	Dakoŋ osenno ɗo aditko aman : ‟ Gi koogin ku tatte Ibraayim ko, ” asaan ka seener, Buŋ nec soke min ɗo dambay-aŋ di ŋaa raɓilin̰ roŋ ku Ibraayim.
40003010	Diŋ gay jekin, ŋaar goy ko ka doliye atiydi min ɗo caarco. Ay et kaak waaɗo roŋ kuuk samaane, ŋuu doliyin̰ji ho ŋuu accin̰ ɗo aki.
40003011	Nun batiziyaako iŋ amay. Pa-ak gaara kadar ku rasig goyiŋko kaak awalle. Kar gay, gin gem kaak pakginu kat asaw. Nun sa da necɗo kaak naa sorin̰ n̰ugiray. Gem ŋaar-ak yaako batiziyiŋko iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi ho iŋ ako.
40003012	Ŋa ob garta ɗo pisin̰ji, ŋaa ƴiile geme ka putiri ho ŋaa leen̰ ɗo urdey. Kar bun̰ gay, ŋaa orin ɗo ak taat matɗo tak-tak. »
40003013	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa uctu min kiɗ ka Galile. Ŋa dakiig gas Yaaya ɗo barre ka Zurdan a ŋaa batiziyin̰ji.
40003014	Kar ŋaar gay zer raka pooce. Ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Kiŋke kat yaan batiziyindu ga, ki kaawiy a nun kat yaan̰ batiziye ! »
40003015	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Paaɗo, diŋ ginteŋ maanna-aŋ ampaa di, asaan gii necin taat Buŋ rakiyo. » Hiyya, Yaaya ooytu, ŋa batiziyiig Iisa.
40003016	Min ŋa batiziyga, Iisa amiltu min ɗo amiydi ho ta bite-aŋ di, samaan piltu waakilak. Kar ŋa taliit Ruwwin ta Buŋdi paayiiji ar ammaama ho ta goyiiji.
40003017	Kar ŋa dora gaaƴ kaawa min kuwa ka samaaner aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ Roŋdu, nu elgig dakina ho adir miin iŋ galal ɗo bi kan̰ji. »
40004001	Min ŋaar-ak, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi n̰aamiig Iisa ɗo goosiner a Seetanne yaa gecin̰ji.
40004002	Ɗo wer-ak, menaw orok pooɗ, ƴiriyo aando, ŋa bal okume yoo maanna. Min menaw-ak gaastu, mey diyaaga.
40004003	Seetanne, gay gecindi, sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ya kiŋ kat Roŋ ka Buŋdi-ak, kaawco ɗo dambay-aŋ a ŋuu raɓile tee. »
40004004	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Gem ke goyaaɗo ɗo bi ka teendi di, illa gay iŋ ay kaaw taat amila min ɗo Buŋdi oki. ” »
40004005	Min ŋaar-ak, Seetanne iyiig Iisa Zeruzaleem, geeger kaak Buŋ doɓtu. Ŋa diyiig kuwa ɗo kaay ka ger ka Buŋdi
40004006	ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ya kiŋ kat Roŋ ka Buŋdi-ak, beer keɗer, asaan ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Buŋ yaaco kaawe ɗo ɗubilji ɗo bi kan̰ji. Ɗubal-ak yaan̰ acume ɗo pisin̰co. Paa kat, asin̰ji ɗooyiyɗo iŋ dambay. ” »
40004007	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Ki gecaagɗo Rabbin Buŋjiŋ. ” »
40004008	Kar Seetanne iyiig pey ɗo kaat ka damba taat bolok. Ŋa gaariijig kiɗin ku sultinniidi okin̰co kuuk ɗo duniiner iŋ samaanuwco.
40004009	Ŋa kaawiiji aman : « As kii derse uŋtu kiin abdiyindu, kar naan̰ berin̰ gamin-aŋ okin̰co. »
40004010	Kar Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Yalla ɓaa annere Seetanne ! Ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Kii abdiye Rabbin Buŋjiŋ keeji di ho ŋaar di kii derse uŋci. ” »
40004011	Min ŋaar-ak, Seetanne rasiiga, kar ɗubal ku Buŋdi asiiji ho ŋu taltu kaaci.
40004012	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, ŋu obig Yaaya daŋaayne. Min Iisa dortu pa-ak, ŋa ɗeettu ɗo kiɗ ka Galile, ŋaa teese riyoy.
40004013	Kar gay, ŋa bal goye ɗo geeger ka Nazareet, ŋa da goy ɗo geeger ka Kapernayuum. Geeger ŋaar-ak goy ɗo bi ka barrer ka Galile, ɗo kiɗ ka Zabiloon iŋ ka Neptali.
40004014	Ta kuuniytu ampa-ak, asaan kaaw taat nabi Ezaayi kaawtu awalle as ɗo werti aman :
40004015	« Kiŋ kiɗ ka Zabiloon iŋ ka Neptali, Kiŋ kaak aaniy iŋ barre, Kiŋ goy aar barre ka Zurdan, Galile, kiŋ kiɗ kaak Yuudinnaɗo oki goyiyo !
40004016	Ŋuur kuuk goy ɗo gondikor yaa tale portikaw dakin aale. Ŋuur kuuk goy ɗo kiɗ ka kellam ku muuti, portikaw asaaco bayne. »
40004017	Min wiktin taar-at di, Iisa teestu gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi aman : « Ibinoŋ nigiŋko, rasoŋ goye kaak awalle, asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi askoŋ ko moota ! »
40004018	Ƴiriy rakki Iisa jaawa ɗo bi ka barre ka Galile. Ŋa gastu siŋta seer, gay cabe boosir : Simon kaak ŋu koliy oki Piyer iŋ siŋji Andre. Ŋu caba boosi wiktin taat ŋa gasiigu.
40004019	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Asoŋ aaɗonnu ho naako giniŋko gay cabe geemir. »
40004020	Koɗok di, ŋu rasiig ribbinco ho ŋu aaɗiiga.
40004021	Iisa sin̰jitu pey uŋda sooɗ ho ŋa gastu siŋta seer ku pey, ŋuur kun̰ Zaak iŋ siŋji Yaaya, roŋji ku Zebede. Ŋu goy siya ribbinco iŋ tacco ka markabar. Min Iisa gasiigu, ŋa koliigu
40004022	ho koɗok di, ŋu rasiig markabco iŋ tacco ho ŋu aaɗiiga.
40004023	Iisa jaawiig kiɗ ka Galile okin̰ji. Ŋa ɓildiy gee ɗo geray ku salaaner ku Yuudinnar, ŋa gaariy Kabarre ta Gala ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi ho ŋa cooliig gee kuuk gin ay raɗuwa ho ay gem kaak ziy galjiɗo.
40004024	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa, siŋji altu ɗo kiɗ ka Siri okin̰ji ho ŋu iyiijig gee kuuk raɗuwco keetiti keetiti : kuuk aariɗ obgu, kuuk gin punpun ho kuuk ruŋgiye. Okin̰co, ŋa cooliigu.
40004025	Gee dakina astu min Galile, min darre ta Geegirnay ku Orok, min Zeruzaleem, min kiɗ ka Zuude ho min kiɗ kaak aar barrer ka Zurdan. Okin̰co, ŋu aaɗiig Iisa.
40005001	Min Iisa taltu dakinaw ta geemir-ak, ŋa coktu ka dambar ho ŋa goytu. Maajirnay asiiji moota ho
40005002	ŋa teestu garkiyin̰co.
40005003	Ɗo garaaney-at, ŋa kaawa aman : « Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk ibina kadar gelbinco aaƴe ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar loco.
40005004	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk alaw, asaan Buŋ asa dooɗin̰co.
40005005	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk dalullay, asaan Buŋ asaaco rasin̰ kiɗ loco.
40005006	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk bariya goye kaak Buŋ rakiyo ar gem kaak mey diyaaga bariya tee ho see, asaan Buŋ asaaco berin̰ maan kaak ŋu bariyiyo.
40005007	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk tala amindaw ta een̰co, asaan Buŋ asa tale aminduwco.
40005008	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk gelbinco cawar, asaan ŋu asa talin̰ Buŋ.
40005009	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk amra gee ɗo werinco, asaan Buŋ asa kolin̰ a ŋu kooginay.
40005010	Galal ɗo ŋuur kuuk ŋu taaɓiyaagu ɗo goyin̰co kaak Buŋ rakiyo, asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi, taar loco.
40005011	Galal loko ya gee waraako, ya ŋu taaɓiyaako ho ya ŋu diyaako kaawin maalan di, asaan ku aamin lotu.
40005012	Aaciyoŋ ho goyoŋ ɗo galal asaan haginko taat Buŋ yaako bere ka samaaner-at, taar dakina. Ansi-ak, ku kuuniy ar nabiinna kuuk awalle. Ŋuur oki, ŋu taaɓiyig ar kuŋko.
40005013	« Ŋa kuŋkoŋ kat ar maral ku duniiner. Ya maral-ak kat cille, gii ginin̰ pey maman ŋuu aawe ? Illa ŋuu orin̰ kara, gee yaaco jaawe.
40005014	« Ŋa kuŋkoŋ kat ar portikaw ta duniiner. Geeger kaak ŋu pinig kuwa ka dambar, ŋaar cigallo.
40005015	Ginno oki gem kaak biƴ lampa ho ŋa zuɓkiit iŋ bardila. Kar gay, ya gem biƴ lampa-ak, ŋa diyiit ɗo wer ka jaɗaŋ. Paa kat, gee kuuk un̰ja ɗo ger-ak yaa talin portikuwti.
40005016	Ansii ko, portikuwko, ta ceeru ɗo uŋco ka geemir a gee yaa tale riy taat samaan ku giniyo ho ŋu ozilin̰ Takko Buŋ ka kuwa ka samaaner.
40005017	« Dakoŋ pakirenno a nu as deen̰ gaanuun kaak Muusa siirtu wala kaawin kuuk nabiinna kaawtu. Nu bal ase deen̰co, nu as a gamin-aŋ yaa ase ɗo werco.
40005018	Cokiyoŋ, naako kaawe seene, min kiɗa ho samaane bal bire misa, Kaawin kuuk Buŋ kaawtu-aŋku, yoo rakki oki amilaaɗo min ɗo gaanuundi. Ŋuu goye kee nam gamin okin̰co yaa kuuniye.
40005019	Paa ko, min gaanuun okin̰ji, ŋaar kaak karmiygigɗo kaak kapak tak-tak ho ŋa jagaag een̰ji ŋuu gine ar ŋaara, ŋa asa gine kapak tak-tak ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi. Kar gay, ŋaar kaak karmiyaaga ho gaaraag ɗo een̰ji ŋuu gine ar ŋaara, ŋa asa gine tatko ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
40005020	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya kuŋ kat bal gine taat Buŋ rakiyo pakgig agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ Pariziyenna, ku un̰jaaɗo ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
40005021	« Ku dor ŋu kaawco ɗo aginiyte aman : ‟ Dak deenno gemo. Ay gem kaak dee gemo, ŋuuji ɗukume seriine. ”
40005022	Hadi nun gay kaawaako aman : Ay gem kaak dapin̰a iŋ siŋji, nec ŋuu sakkiyin̰ ɗo wer ka gay seriiner. Ay gem kaak wara siŋji a ŋa ibanno maanna, nec ŋuu sakkiyin̰ ɗo wer ka gay seriiner kaak tatiko. Ay gem kaak wara siŋji a ŋaa oliyo, nec ŋuu accin̰ ɗo ak ta ba oole.
40005023	Ya ki ɓaa ɗo ger ka Buŋdi a kiiji bere satkine, kar ɗo wer-ak, ki pakirtu kadar siŋjiŋ gin kaaw iŋ kiŋke,
40005024	rasit satkinen̰ eɗe ho ɗuw ɓaa amroŋ ja, kar kat kii yeepe berin satkinen̰-ata.
40005025	« Ya waan sakkiyin̰ciŋ, daan kaawko koɗok di botildi. Yampa, adinen̰ yaan̰ iye ɗo gay ɗukume seriiner. Kar gay ɗukume seriiner-ak yaan̰ bere ɗo pise ka askirnar, ho ŋuur gay yaan̰ un̰je daŋaayne.
40005026	Nu kaawaajiŋ, ki gediraaɗo kii imile kaan̰ min ɗo daŋaayner-ata, illa ya ki gaasit ja tak-tak hokumne taat ŋu diyiijiŋ.
40005027	« Ku dor ŋu kaaw aman : ‟ Waan ɓaaƴaaɗo mun̰jam. ”
40005028	Kar nun gay kaawaako aman : Ay gem kaak tala daaciy ta gemor ho ta deeji, ŋaar-ak ar ŋa weƴ ko iŋ taara ɗo gelbiney.
40005029	Ya odon̰ ta meeda kat iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar-ak, ɗimta. Guna ya maannan̰ rakki nige, min ak taat matɗo yaa teen̰ zin̰ okin̰ji.
40005030	Ya pisin̰jiŋ ka meeda kat iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar-ak, ɗukumga ho accig kara. Guna ya maannan̰ rakki nige, min ak taat matɗo yaa teen̰ zin̰ okin̰ji.
40005031	« Ku dor ŋu kaaw pey aman : ‟ Ya waan totirit daaciy, ŋaati bere katkat ta totiriikar. ”
40005032	Kar nun gay kaawaako aman : Gem ginno botol ŋaa totirin daaciy, illa ya ta kokina miday kara. Ya gem totirit daaciy, ŋa n̰aamit ɗo zunuubinnar ya ta ob mitik ka pey. Ho gem kaak ob daatik taat ŋu totirta, ŋaar oki un̰je ziy ɗo zunuubinnar.
40005033	« Ku dor oki ŋu kaawco ɗo aginiyte aman : ‟ Ya ki togil ɗo uŋji ka Rabbiner, necit kaawon̰. Dak yeepenno pey aaro. ”
40005034	Kar nun gay kaawaako aman : Dakoŋ togilenno tak-tak : wala iŋ samaane, asaan ŋa wer kaak Buŋ goyiyo,
40005035	wala iŋ kiɗa, asaan ŋa wer kaak ŋa leeyiy asin̰ji, wala iŋ Zeruzaleem, asaan ŋa geeger ka Sultan kaak tatiko,
40005036	wala iŋ kaan̰ ka meen̰ji, asaan ki gediraaɗo raɓilin durwen̰ rakki portiko wal pondiko.
40005037	Ya ki ooy sa, ooyu ho ya ki pooc sa, poocu. Yampa kaaw taat ŋu gaayiy gaaye, taar asa min ɗo Seetanner.
40005038	« Ku dor ŋu kaaw aman : ‟ Ya gem ɗimit odon̰, kiŋ sa ɗimjiit tan̰ji ho ya ŋa sik saaŋon̰, kiŋ sa sikijig kan̰ji. ”
40005039	Kar nun gay kaawaako aman : Ya gem ginaako maan kaak samaanno, dakoŋ kapiyenno. Ya waan baasin̰ciŋ ɗo gargumon̰ ta meeda, newsiijit taat rakki oki.
40005040	Ya waan sakkiyin̰ciŋ ɗo bi ka parlaman̰, rasjita ho berjit pey batkon̰ min kaatiya.
40005041	Ya waan kusbiyin̰ciŋ a kii iyiin goroy kilomeetir rakki, iyiit kilomeetir seera.
40005042	Beriy ɗo ay waan kaak indaaciŋ maanna ho dak newsenno kop ɗo waan kaak telka maannan̰.
40005043	« Ku dor ŋu kaaw pey aman : ‟ Kii elin̰ gijiŋ ho kii ƴilin̰ adinen̰. ”
40005044	Kar nun gay kaawaako aman : Elguwoŋ adinko ho salkiyguwon̰co ɗo ŋuur kuuk taaɓiyaako.
40005045	Ansii kat, kuu gine koogin ku Takko kaak kuwa. Pa-ak asaan ŋaar sa cokaat patoy ɗo gee kuuk jookumo ho iŋ kuuk sellen̰. Ŋa n̰okaag amiyji ɗo ŋuur kuuk goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji ho ɗo ŋuur kuuk goyin̰co iŋ botiliiɗo oki.
40005046	Kar ya kuŋ kat el gee kuuk elgiikon di, maa haginir taat Buŋ yaako bere ? Gay oba miirir oki elgig ŋuur kuuk elgig di !
40005047	Kar ya ku ooya ɗo siŋtikon di, maa biidir kaak ajbay ku giniyo ? Ŋuur kuuk ibanno Buŋ oki gina pa !
40005048	Ŋaar-ak, kuuniyoŋ cawar ar Takko Buŋ ka kuwa. »
40006001	Iisa kaaw pey aman : « Pakiroŋ, ya ku gina riy taat Buŋ rakiyo, dakoŋ gaarenno ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Yampa Takko kaak kuwa yaako toɗin hagin ta riyko-ata.
40006002	Ya ki raka bere maan ɗo pokirin̰cer, dak delenno darin̰ ɗo odin ku geemir ar gee kuuk abdiya Buŋ iŋ biŋkico di. Gee-ak, ŋu el gaare ziŋkico ɗo berindi ɗo geray ku salaaner ho ɗo botilniidi a gee yaa ozilin̰co. Ka seener nu kaawaako : gee ŋuur-ak gasit ko haginco.
40006003	Kar kiŋ gay, ya ki gina oyaw iŋ pisin̰ji ka meeda, ka n̰ugila ibinaaɗo maan kaak ki beriyo.
40006004	Ansii ko, maan kaak ki bertu yaa goye iŋ cigile. Paa kat, Takko Buŋ kaak talaag ay maan kaak ki giniy iŋ cigile yaan̰ berin haginen̰.
40006005	« Ya ku salkiyaw, dakoŋ salkiyenno ar gee kuuk abdiya Buŋ iŋ biŋkico di. Ŋuur el salkiye iŋ peyin̰co ɗo geray ku salaaner ho ɗo botilniidi a paa kat, gee yaa talin̰co. Ka seener nu kaawaako : gee ŋuur-ak gasit ko haginco.
40006006	Kar kiŋ gay, ya ki salkiyaw, un̰ju zugar ho ɗibirga. Indig Takko Buŋ kaak goy ɗo wer kaak ki cigiltu-aka. Paa kat, ŋaar kaak talaag ay maan kaak ki giniy iŋ cigile yaan̰ berin haginen̰.
40006007	« Ya ku salkiyaw, dakoŋ ɗeelenno taar di kuu goye ar gee kuuk ibanno Buŋ. Gee ŋuur-ak, ɗo tan̰co a wal iŋ ɗeele ka kaawin̰co-ak kat Buŋ ya cokiyin̰co.
40006008	Dakoŋ icenno tan̰co, asaan Takko Buŋ ibingig maan kaak arumko min ku bal indin̰ji.
40006009	Cokiyoŋ maman kuu salkiye : Baaba, Buŋ kaak goy kuwa ka samaaner, gee okin̰co yaa ibine kadar siŋji kun̰jiŋ ŋuur keeco.
40006010	Meennuwin̰ yaa ase ɗo duniiner. Gee okin̰co, ŋu ginguwoŋ taat ki rakiyo keɗer ar ŋu gingiy kuwa ka samaaner.
40006011	Berni tee kaak yaani nece ƴiriyta.
40006012	Saamiyniŋgu zunuubinni ar nin oki saamiygiy ɗo gee kuuk niginti.
40006013	Dakni rasenno Seetanne yaani gece, kar gay gooƴni minniney. [Asaan lociŋ di Meennaw, gudurre ho iŋ darjine elgin iŋ elgina. Aamin.]
40006014	« Ya kuŋ kat saamiyaaco ɗo eeŋko, Takko kaak kuwa yaako saamiye loko oki.
40006015	Kar ya ku saamayɗo ɗo eeŋkoŋ gay, Takko Buŋ saamiyaakonno tak-tak zunuubinniko.
40006016	« Ya ku ic sayamne, dakoŋ ritin̰enno ar gee kuuk abdiya Buŋ iŋ biŋkico di. Ŋuur ƴiimiit wijeenco, paa kat, gee yaa talin̰ a ŋu ic sayamne. Ka seener nu kaawaako, gee ŋuur-ak gasit ko haginco.
40006017	Kar kiŋ gay, ya ki ic sayamne, acit wijeenen̰ ho kockac itir.
40006018	Paa kat, gee ibiniyɗo kadar ki ic sayamne, illa Takko kat talaag maan kaak gee giniy iŋ cigile. Ŋaar kaak talaag maan kaak ki giniy-ak yaan̰ berin haginen̰.
40006019	« Dakoŋ atkenno malle ɗo duniiner, yampa gujin yaa cokin̰ji, nadaane yaa obin̰ji ho kokinay asa ɗimin̰ gero, ŋuu kokinin̰ji.
40006020	Kar gay, bariyoŋ malle kaak ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, asaan anner-ak, gujin ginno, wala nadaane wala kokinaw.
40006021	Nu kaawiy pa-ak, asaan wer kaak ki dummiyiy mallen̰-ak, gelbinen̰ sa goy eɗen di.
40006022	« Odina, ŋuur ko lampa ta ziŋkar. Ya odinan̰ tala samaane, zin̰ okin̰ji goy ɗo portikaw.
40006023	Kar ya odinan̰ tallo samaane gay, ŋaar-ak zin̰ okin̰ji goy ɗo gondikor. Ansii ko, ya portikaw taat Buŋ diyiijiŋ ɗo gelbinen̰ kat gondiko, gondikaw-at yaa gine dulum !
40006024	« Ginno waan kaak yaa gine riy ɗo agindaw seera. Ya ŋa gina pa, ka rakki, ŋaa elin̰ji ho ka rakki gay, ŋaa poocin̰ji. Kar pey, ka rakki, ŋaa ice kaawoy ho ka rakki gay, ŋa icaatɗo. Ku gediraaɗo abdiye Buŋ ho kuu abdiye pey gurus.
40006025	« Ɗo saan taar-an, nu kaawaako aman : Dakoŋ moyenno ɗo bi ka teendi wala ka isindi. Goyiŋko, ŋaar pakgig tee kaak ku tiyo, ho ziŋkiko, ŋuur pakgit kesuun taat ku isiyo wal maman ?
40006026	Taloŋ ɗiiɗi, ŋu luwɗo ho ŋu seɗɗo, wala ŋu liya gamin ɗo urder. Illa Takko Buŋ ka kuwa-aŋ di beraaco tee. Kar kuŋ gay pakgigɗo ɗiiɗ serek walla ?
40006027	Waa minninko, iŋ pikirre ta meen̰ji di gedirgiy gaaye ƴiriy rakki ɗo menuwiy ?
40006028	Kar maa di ku moyiy ɗo bi ka isindi ? Taloŋ maman booyaw amiliy ɗo kalaaner, wala ŋu wasaw, wala ŋu azaw.
40006029	Kar nu kaawaako, sultan Selemaan, iŋ darjiney okintiti sa, bal gine kesuun taat yaa nece iŋ rakki min ɗo booyaw-aku.
40006030	Gan̰ kaak ƴiriyta goy ɗo kalaaner ho kaak kawtan di ŋuu orin̰ji ɗo ak din sa, Buŋ imilaaji booyaw. Kar kuŋ ƴelel-aŋ kat ŋa isiikonno maman ? Taloŋ gee kuuk imaanco sooɗ-aŋku !
40006031	Dakoŋ moyenno aman : ‟ Gii tee maa ? Gii see maa ? Gii ise maa ? ”
40006032	Gamin ŋuur-ak, illa gee kuuk ibanno Buŋ kat diya kaƴco. Kar kuŋ gay, Takko Buŋ kaak goy ka samaaner ibingig gamin kuuk yaako nece.
40006033	Bariyoŋ ja Meennaw ta Buŋdi ho goye kaak Buŋ rakiyo. Kar gamin kuuk ɗak gay, Buŋ yaako berin̰co oki.
40006034	Dakoŋ moyenno ta neginda, asaan neginda taar goy iŋ tanti. Taaɓin ta ƴiriy rakki nec ko ɗo ƴiriy taar-at di. »
40007001	Iisa kaaw pey aman : « Dakoŋ talenno ziŋkiko ar gay ɗukume seriiner, paa kat Buŋ ɗukumiikonno seriin loko.
40007002	Asaan Buŋ yaako ɗukume seriine ar kuŋ ɗukumiy ɗo eeŋko. Ŋaako yeepin̰ maan kaak kuŋ giniy ɗo geemir.
40007003	Maman ki taliy gan̰ kaak kapak kaak goy ɗo od ta siŋjiŋ, kar et kaak goy ɗo odon̰ tan̰jiŋ gay, ki talgigɗo ?
40007004	Kiŋ kaak gin et tatik ɗo odon̰, kar maman ki kaawiy ɗo siŋjiŋ aman : ‟ Gem kol siŋji, rasin ja naa icin̰ gan̰ kaak goy ɗo odon̰-aŋka ? ”
40007005	Tal ja gem kaak kaawa iŋ biy di-aŋka ! Gedar ja ɗo od tan̰jiŋ, kii tale karaŋ, kar kii imilin̰ gan̰ kaak goy ɗo od ta siŋjiŋ.
40007006	Dakoŋ berenno gamin ku Buŋdi ɗo kan̰ir, yampa, ŋuu newse ŋuuko umiŋko. Dakoŋ orenno ɗuurko ɗo uŋco ka kinziirnar, yampa, ŋuuco jaawe kaaco.
40007007	« Indoŋ ho Buŋ yaako berin̰ kaak ku indiyo, bariyoŋ ho Buŋ yaako berin̰ kaak ku bariyiyo, kokoŋ ho Buŋ yaako pilin̰ ɗibiro.
40007008	Asaan ŋaar kaak indaw ho bariyaw-ak, Buŋ yaaji bere, ho ŋaar kaak kokaw oki, Buŋ yaaji pile.
40007009	Minninko-aŋ goy gem kaak ya roŋji kat indaag mappa, ŋaaji bere dambi walla ?
40007010	Ho ya ŋa indaag booso, ŋaaji bere aalo walla ?
40007011	Kuŋ kuuk gina jookum din sa iban bere gamin kuuk samaane ɗo kooginko, kar maa di, Takko kaak goy ka samaaner beriicoɗo gamin kuuk samaane ɗo ŋuur kuuk indaaga !
40007012	Ginon̰co ɗo geemir gamin okin̰co ar taat kuŋ rakiy a ŋuuko gine loko. An ko taat ŋu siirtu ɗo gaanuun ka Muusa ho iŋ makaatamna ku nabiinnar.
40007013	« Un̰joŋ min botol ta n̰elel ! Asaan botol taat berel, taar iya gee ɗo aki. Ɗibirti tatko ho gee dakina un̰ja melen̰ min eɗe.
40007014	Kar taat iya gee ɗo janni gay, taar n̰elel ho ɗibirti sa kapak di. Gee sooɗ di kuuk gasaata.
40007015	« Yaman pakron̰co ɗo gee kuuk gina ziŋkico ar nabiinna. Ya ŋu as ɗo werko, ŋu gina ziŋkico dalullay ar tamgi, kar ɗo aditco gay, ŋu motilay ar pulkina.
40007016	Ku ibingig gee-ak min ɗo riyco ar taat ku ibingig atay min ɗo roŋco. Gee cimɗo sin̰a min et kaak gin jamay. Ho gee okaɗɗo gapra min ɗo gurkuɗu.
40007017	Ay et kaak samaane wiya roŋ kuuk samaane, kar ay et kaak samaanno wiya roŋ kuuk samaanno.
40007018	Et kaak samaan-ak waaɗo roŋ kuuk samaanno ho et kaak samaanno-ak waaɗo roŋ kuuk samaane.
40007019	Ay et kaak waaɗo roŋ kuuk samaan-ak, ŋuu doliyin̰ji ho ŋuu erin̰ji.
40007020	Ar gi ibiniig et-ak min ɗo roŋji, kuu ibinin̰ gee iŋ riy ta ŋu giniyo.
40007021	« Gee kuuk kolaan a ‟ Rabbine, Rabbine ”, wala okin̰co yaa un̰je ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi ? Ha’a, illa ŋuur kuuk gina riy taat Tanni ka kuwa rakiyo.
40007022	Ɗo ƴiriy ta seriiner, gee dakina asaadu kaaw aman : ‟ Rabbine, Rabbine, iŋ siŋ kun̰jiŋ ko, ni gaartu kaawin ar nabiinna. Ni atiktu aariɗna ho ni gintu gamin dakin kuuk ajbay iŋ siŋ kun̰jiŋ ! Maman ki ibingiyɗo ? ”
40007023	Hiyya, naaco kaawe ɗo gee ŋuur-ak aman : ‟ Nu ibingikonno bat. Yalla ɓaaŋ annere, kuŋ gee kuuk gina jookumo ! ”
40007024	« Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ay gem kaak cokiyaat kaawor ho aaɗaat iŋ botilti, ŋaar-ak ar gem kaak gin ilim ho pinig geriy ka maari.
40007025	Amay n̰oktu, balal miintu, ŋu tambiltu ho us abirtu wuu-wuu. Okin̰co, ŋu duksiyiig ger-aka. Kar iŋ taar-at oki, ger-ak bal eeze asaan ŋu pinig ka maari.
40007026	Kar ay gem kaak cokiyit kaawor-anta ho rawit biti gay, ŋaar-ak ar gem kaak oliyo kaak pinig geriy ɗo ƴiror.
40007027	Amay n̰oktu, balal miintu, ŋu tambiltu ho us abirtu wuu-wuu. Okin̰co, ŋu duksiyiig ger-aka ho ŋa eeztu dizic. »
40007028	Min Iisa gaasiit kaawoy, gee okin̰co ajbiytu ɗo ɓildin̰ji-aka,
40007029	asaan ɓildin̰ji arro ka agindaw ku gaanuundi. Kar ŋaar gay ɓildaag iŋ izinne.
40008001	Min Iisa paaytu min ka dambar, gee dakina amiltu aaɗin̰ji.
40008002	Min ŋaar-ak, gem kaak gin burɗum ɓaawtu, ŋa dersitu ɗo uŋji ka Iisa ho ŋa indiig aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, kii gedire kiin calindu ya ki ooye. »
40008003	Iisa n̰aamtu pisin̰ji, ŋa diiriiga ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Hii, nu ooye, diŋ calu ! » Ek di ŋa caltu cawar min ɗo burɗumji.
40008004	Kar Iisa kaawiiji ɗo gem-ak aman : « Yaman dak kaawenno bat ɗo waanna. Kar gay, ɓaa gaar zin̰ ɗo gay satkiner ho ber satkin uudin taat gaanuun ka Muusa kaawtu. Paa kat, ŋuu ibine kadar ki cale. »
40008005	Wiktin taat Iisa un̰jitu ɗo hellin taat ŋu koliy Kapernayuum, tatkaw rakki ka askirnar kaak gin askirin miya ɗo aaroy ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋa indiig a ŋaa gaayin̰ji. Ŋa kaawiiji aman :
40008006	« Gem kol Rabbiney, nu gin gay riyor rakki weƴa kar geero. Ŋa ruŋgiye ho taaɓin patiy kaay. »
40008007	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Yalla nu ɓaa coolin̰ji. »
40008008	Kar tatkaw-ak gay telkiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, nun bal nece kii un̰je ɗo gerir. Kar gay baan̰u, kaaw kaawen di, gay riyor-aŋ yaa coole.
40008009	Nun meendu oki aaɗa ta aginduwir ho nu gin askirin ɗo aaror. Ya nun kat kaaw ɗo rakki minninco a ‟ Ɓaa ! ” Ek di ŋa ɓaayo. Ya nu kol rakki ka pey a ‟ Asu ! ” Ek di ŋa asiyo. Kar ya nu gaarji ɗo gay riyor a ‟ Ginit riy-anta ! ” Ek di ŋa giniita. »
40008010	Min Iisa doriit kaaw-at, ŋa ajbiyiiji ɗo tatkaw-aka. Kar ŋa kaawiico ɗo gee kuuk aaɗaaga-ak aman : « Nu kaawaako ka seener, min gee ku Israyeel okin̰co, nu bal tale gem kaak gin imaan ar ŋaar-aŋka.
40008011	Nu kaawaako pey, gee dakina yaa ase min coke ka pati wala min gale ka pati, ŋuu goye keɗer ɗo tee ka iidin ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi iŋ Ibraayim, Isaaka ho iŋ Yakuub.
40008012	Kar ŋuur kuuk pakira a zer Meennaw ta Buŋdi ɗo pisin̰co gay, ŋuu atkin̰ kara ɗo gondikor. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋuu eeyme saaŋco ho zulin̰co yaa min̰e dakina. »
40008013	Hiyya Iisa kaawiiji ɗo tatkaw-ak aman : « Yeep ko geero, taat ki inditu iŋ imaanjiŋ, Buŋ yaan̰ berinti. » Ɗo wiktin-at di, gay riyor ka tatkaw ka askirnar-ak cooltu.
40008014	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa ɓaawtu wer kan̰ Piyer. Min ŋa un̰jitu geero, ŋa gasit kogoy weƴaw, ziti kobire.
40008015	Ŋa obiig pisinti ek di ziti ooltu. Min ŋaar-ak, ta uctu ho ta taltu kaaci.
40008016	Min pat gale, ŋu iyiiji ɗo Iisa gee dakina kuuk aariɗna obgu. Ŋa kaawa kaawen di aariɗna amiliyo ho ŋa cooliig okin̰co kuuk raɗaw oki.
40008017	Ampaa ko, kaaw taat nabi Ezaayi kaawtu awalle astu ɗo werti aman : « Ŋa sokig gamin kuuk taaɓiyaate ho ŋa icit raɗuwte ɗo kaay. »
40008018	Min Iisa taliit dakinaw ta gee kuuk leyga, ŋa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay a ŋuu aale aar barrer.
40008019	Kar rakki min agindaw ku gaanuundi ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Tacco, ay wer kaak ki ɓaayiy di naan̰ aaɗe. »
40008020	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Bolli, ŋuur gin biddinco ho ɗiiɗ sa gin geriyco, kar nun Roŋ gemor gay, nu bal gine wer kaak naa un̰je kaar. »
40008021	Kar rakki min maajirnay ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, beror ja botol taat nu ɓaay tiisin̰ tanni. »
40008022	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Rasig gee ku mate yaa tiisin̰ momtinco ho kiŋ gay aaɗnu. »
40008023	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa n̰eptu markaba ho maajirnay gay aaɗiiga.
40008024	Tala kar us teestu abire gidi-gidi-gidi ɗo barrer ho amay paka puk-puk nam ŋu gaay miinin̰ markaba. Kar ɗo wiktin taar-at, Iisa gay weƴaw.
40008025	Paa ko, maajirna ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa ho ŋu niiniig aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, uc kiite jilinte ! Amay tiyaate ! »
40008026	Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Maa di ku giniy kolaw ? Sando, imaanko sooɗ ampa ! » Hiyya, ŋa uctu, ŋa leesiiji ɗo usi ho ɗo amiydi. Ek di wer bugumtu dil.
40008027	Okin̰co, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ kat maa gemir kaak nam usu ho amay din sa karmiyaaga ? »
40008028	Min wer bugume, Iisa aaltu iŋ markaba ɗo kiɗ ka gee kuuk ŋu koliy Gadariyenna. Ɗo wer-ak, gin gee seer kuuk aariɗna obgu amiltu min ɗo maggindi ho ŋu ɓaawiiji. Gee-ak motilay aale nam waan gedarro aaɗe min ɗo botol-ata.
40008029	Gee-ak teestu koole aman : « Ki rakaani gine maman, Iisa, Roŋ ka Buŋdi ? Ki asintiŋ ko taaɓiye walla ? Wiktin taat Buŋ diytu bal nece misa. »
40008030	Serek sooɗ min ɗo wer-aka, gin kinziirna dakina kuuk gooƴaw.
40008031	Aariɗna-ak marmiliiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Ya ki rakaani atke sa, atkini ni ɓaay un̰je ɗo kinziirna aŋkure. »
40008032	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Yalla amiloŋ min ɗo gee-aŋku ! » Hiyya, aariɗna-ak amiltu ho ŋu un̰jitu ɗo kinziirnar. Koɗok di, min ka dambar, kinziirna-ak eeztu tem iŋ gaɗco, ŋu sollitu ɗo barrer ho amay teeyiigu.
40008033	Gee kuuk gooƴa kinziirna-ak gaɗtu min ɗo wer-aka ho ŋu ɗeettu ɗo geegirdi. Ŋu iyiicot kabarre okintit ta gee kuuk seer aariɗ obtu-aku.
40008034	Kar gee ku geeger-ak amiltu okin̰co ŋaamin̰ Iisa. Min ŋu ŋaamiiga, ŋu kaawiiji a ŋaa baan̰e, ŋaa rasin̰ kiɗco.
40009001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa n̰eptu markaba, ŋa aaltu barre ho ŋa birtu ɗo geegirji.
40009002	Min ŋa ottu, gee daarin̰ iyiiji gem ruŋgiye ka dariŋgildi. Min Iisa taliit imaanco ta gee-aku, ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo ruŋgiiner-ak aman : « Gem kol roŋji, um bin̰ zunuubinnan̰, ŋu saamiyjiŋgu. »
40009003	Ɗo wer-ak, min agindaw ku gaanuundi, daarin̰ kaawiy ɗo aditco aman : « Gem ŋaar-aŋ niga biy iŋ Buŋ ! »
40009004	Iisa gay ibiniit pikirrico ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Maa di aditko osiy gallo ampa ?
40009005	Ya nu kaaw aman : ‟ Zunuubinnan̰, ŋu saamiyjiŋgu ” wala ‟ Ucu ho jaawu ”, taat moo melen̰ ?
40009006	Kar gay, nu raka kuu ibine kadar nun Roŋ gemor gin gudurre ta saamiye zunuubinnar ɗo duniiner. » Kar pey ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo ruŋgiiner-ak aman : « Nu kaawiijiŋ-aŋ, ucu, icig dariŋgiljiŋ ho ɗeet geero. »
40009007	Hiyya, gem-ak uctu ho ŋa ɗeettu.
40009008	Min gee taltu pa-ak, kolaw un̰jiico ho ŋu teestu ozile Buŋ kaak ber gudurre ar taar-an ɗo geemir.
40009009	Iisa uctu min ɗo wer-aka ho ŋa ɗeettu. Ɗo botildi, ŋa taltu gay obe miirir, siŋji Matiye, kaak goy ɗo riyoy. Kar ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Uc aaɗnu. » Hiyya, Matiye uctu ho ŋa aaɗiiga.
40009010	Iisa ɓaawtu iŋ maajirnay ɗo ger ka Matiye ho ŋu goytu tee. Ɗo wer-ak, gay obe miirir iŋ gee kuuk goyin̰co arro astu dakina tee iŋ ŋuura.
40009011	Min Pariziyenna taltu pa-ak, ŋu indiig maajirnay aman : « Maa di tatkuwko tiy iŋ gay obe miirir ho iŋ gee ku pey kuuk gina jookum-aŋku ? »
40009012	Kar Iisa dorit kaawco ho ŋa telkiico aman : « Gee kuuk cewey barayɗo daptoor, illa ŋuur kuuk raɗaw.
40009013	Paa ko, nun oki bal ase ɗo gee kuuk tala ziŋkico a ŋu sellen̰. Nu as ɗo ŋuur kuuk ibina kadar ŋu gina jookumo. Kar kuŋ gay, ɓaaŋ bariyoŋ baati ta kaaw taat Buŋ kaawtu awalle aman : ‟ Nu rakaaɗo satkine, nu raka illa kuu gine selliŋkaw ɗo geemir. ” »
40009014	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirnay ku Yaaya-Batist ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa ho ŋu indiig aman : « Nini iŋ Pariziyenna icgiy sayamne, kar maajirnan̰ kun̰jiŋ gay, maa di ŋu icgiyɗo ? »
40009015	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Gee kuuk ŋu kolig ɗo iidin ta obindi, ya ŋu goy misa iŋ ŋaar kaak obe, wala ŋuu gonde ? Ha’a, ŋu gondaaɗo ! Kar gay, wiktin yaa ase taat ŋuu icin̰ ŋaar kaak obe min ɗo ɗatikco. Ƴiriy taar-at kat, ŋu asiy ice sayamne. »
40009016	Ŋa kaawiico pey aman : « Waan naallo kesuun taat zooɗe iŋ giteen kaak marbinto. Yampa giteen-ak obaat miriŋ ta ɓokiyo ho mutti gaayiy pey tatiko.
40009017	Waan laaɗo maam kuuk eelaw ɗo etirsinna kuuk taay ko. Yampa, maam-ak yaa pikin̰ etirsinna-aku, ŋuu n̰aale keɗer ho etirsinna-ak sa yaa nige. Kar gay, gee liya maam kuuk eelaw illa ɗo etirsinna kuuk marbinto. Ampaa kat, seerco, ŋu nigiyɗo. »
40009018	Min Iisa kaawaaco misan di, tatkaw ka Yuudinnar rakki astu dersa ɗo uŋji ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Romor mat diŋka-aŋ di. As kiiti diye pisin̰ji ɗo kaati taa nooye. »
40009019	Hiyya, ŋa uctu iŋ maajirnay ho ŋu aaɗiig tatkaw-aka.
40009020	Ɗo wer-ak, gin daatik rakki baarti taaɓiyaata. Elgin orok iŋ seer, ŋu min̰a min̰en di. Ta sin̰jitu moota ɗo aaroy ta Iisa, kar ta diirit biti ka kesuuney.
40009021	Ta giniy pa-ak asaan ɗo adti ta kaawa aman : « Ya nu gedir diirin bit ka kesuuney-an di, naa coole. »
40009022	Min ta diiriita, Iisa kolsitu ho ŋa taliita. Ŋa ɗiyiitit aman : « Gem kol romoy, um bike, imaanke cooliŋke. » Ta bite-aŋ di, daatko-at cooltu.
40009023	Wiktin taat Iisa ottu ɗo ger ka tatkaw-ak, ŋa gastu gee dakina iŋ palindina alaata.
40009024	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Yalla amiloŋ min anne, mic sa weƴa di, ta bal mate. » Kar gee-ak gay ajimiyaag Iisa.
40009025	Min ŋu amiltu kara, Iisa un̰jitu zugar, ŋa obiig pisinti ka mic-ata ho ta uctu.
40009026	Hiyya, kabarre-at totirtu ɗo adti ka darrer okintiti.
40009027	Wiktin taat Iisa amiltu min ɗo wer-aka, noolna seer aaɗiig iŋ kolin̰co aman : « Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwni ! »
40009028	Min ŋa ottu geer, noolna-ak ɓaawtu ɗo uŋji. Iisa gay indiigu aman : « Ku amniya kadar nu nec pilin̰ odinko walla ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Hii, gem kol Rabbiney, ni amniyaw. »
40009029	Hiyya, Iisa diiriig odinco ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Iŋ imaanko-anta, Buŋ yaako bere ar taat ku rakiyo. »
40009030	Ek di odinco piltu ho Iisa karmiig aman : « Ha’, yaman dakoŋ kaawenno tak-tak ɗo waanna. »
40009031	Kar ŋuur gay, min ŋu amiltu di, ŋu teestu ko kaawe ɗo bi ka Iisa ɗo darre-at okintiti.
40009032	Wiktin taat noolna-ak amiliyo, ŋu iyiiji pey gem kaak aariɗ sokumig biy.
40009033	Iisa atkiig aariɗ-aka ho min ŋaar-ak di, gem-ak biy piltu. Hiyya, gee okin̰co ajbiytu tak-tak ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Maan ar ŋaar-aŋ, gi bal talin̰ ƴiriy rakki ɗo kiɗ ka Israyeel ! »
40009034	Kar Pariziyenna gay kaawtu aman : « Gem-aŋ atkaag aariɗna iŋ gudurre ta tatkaw ka aariɗnar ! »
40009035	Iisa birtu ɗo geegirniidi ho ɗo hellinniidi okin̰co. Ŋa garkiyiigu ɗo geray ku salaaner ku Yuudinnar, ŋa gaariy Kabarre ta Gala ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi, ŋa cooliy ay raɗuwa ho ay gem kaak ziy galjiɗo.
40009036	Iisa tal amindaw ta gee kuuk dakin-aku asaan ziŋkico oolgu ho ŋu rawte, ŋu jaawa ar tamgi kuuk ginno gay gooƴin̰co.
40009037	Min pa-ak, ŋa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Riy ta seɗindi goy dakina, kar gay riyor gay sooɗa.
40009038	Indoŋ meen̰ji gay morgor a ŋaa n̰aame gay riyor ɗo seɗin̰ji. »
40010001	Min pa-ak, Iisa koliig maajirnay kuuk orok iŋ seera. Ŋa beriico izinne taat ŋuu atke aariɗna iŋ gudurre taat ŋuu coole ay raɗuwa ho ay gem kaak ziy galjiɗo.
40010002	Aŋ ko siŋco ku paliinna kuuk orok iŋ seera : Simon ja kaak Iisa koliig oki Piyer iŋ siŋji Andre, Zaak roŋ ka Zebede iŋ siŋji Yaaya,
40010003	Pilip iŋ Bartelemi, Tooma iŋ Matiye kaak ica miiri, Taade iŋ Zaak roŋji ka Alpe,
40010004	Simon kaak mala ɗo darrey, ho Zuudas Iskariyoot kaak asaaji isine ɗo Iisa.
40010005	Wiktin taat Iisa n̰aamiig paliinnay kuuk orok iŋ seer ɗo riyor-ak, ŋa taaƴiigu aman : « Dakoŋ ɓaanno ɗo gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo ho dakoŋ un̰jenno yoo ɗo geeger rakki ka kiɗ ka Samari.
40010006	Kar gay, ɓaan̰co ɗo tamgi kuuk rawte min gee ku Israyeel.
40010007	Ya ku ɗeeta ɗo botildi, gaaron Kabarre ta Gala aman : ‟ Meennaw ta Buŋdi askoŋ ko moota ! ”
40010008	Cooloŋ gee kuuk raɗaw, nooyoŋ gee kuuk mate, caloŋ burɗumna ho atkoŋ aariɗna. Buŋ berko maalan di, beroŋ oki maalan di.
40010009	Ya ku ɓaawaw, dakoŋ icenno gurus, wala daabne, wala tammin ku poddiner.
40010010	Dakoŋ icenno mokolle, wala batik seer, wala n̰ugir ku pey, wala doŋkilo. Ya taɓ gay, gay riyor nec gase teen̰ji.
40010011	« Ɗo ay geeger wala ɗo ay hellin taat ku paaytu, bariyoŋ ja gem kaak nec yaako obiŋko samaane ho goyoŋ ɗo wer-ak di nam kuu ɗeete.
40010012	Ya ku un̰ja ɗo gerdi, kaawon̰co aman : ‟ Aapiy ta goy iŋ kuŋko. ”
40010013	Ya gee ku gerdi kat obiŋko samaane, aapiy yaaco goye. Kar ya ŋu pooc obiŋkoŋ gay, aapiy-at yaako yeepe ɗo maaniiko.
40010014	Kar wer kaak gee pooc obiŋko ho ŋu pooc cokiye kaawinko, kokoŋ burintal kuuk ɗo asiŋko ho amiloŋ min ɗo ger-aka wala min ɗo geeger-aka.
40010015	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ƴiriy taat Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriin ɗo geemir, gee ku geeger ŋaar-ak yaaco gine raɗ pak geeger ka Sodom iŋ ka Gomoor. »
40010016	Iisa kaawtu pey awalle aman : « Cokiyoŋ, nu n̰aamaako ar roŋ ku tamgir ɗo ɗatik ta pulkinar. Goyoŋ neenduway ar aalna ho dalullay ar ammaamna.
40010017	Gooƴoŋ ziŋkiko min ɗo gee ku duniiner, asaan ɗo menaw ku asaw, ŋuuko sakkiyiŋko ho ŋuuko koociŋko iŋ korɗiŋgo ɗo geriyco ku salaaner.
40010018	Ɗo bi kanto, ŋuuko iyiŋko ɗo uŋco ka guberneernar ho ɗo sultinniidi. Paa kat, kuuco kaawin seenko loco ho ɗo gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo oki.
40010019	Ya ŋu obiŋko ho ŋu sakkiyiŋko, dakoŋ moyenno ɗo kaaw taat kuu kaawe, wala maman kuu ose biŋkiko. Kaawin ŋuur-ak, Buŋ yaako gaarin̰co ɗo wiktin-at di.
40010020	Kaawin kuuk kuu kaawe-ak, ŋuur asɗo min loko, ŋu asa min Ruwwin ta Takko Buŋ.
40010021	Gee asa bere siŋta ku maaniico, ŋuu deen̰co ho aginay sa yaa gine pa ɗo kooginco. Koogin asa gine adin ku aginiyco ho ŋu asa bariye muutco.
40010022	Ɗo bi kanto, gee dakina asaako poociŋko. Kar gem kaak obit imaanji bombo nam ɗo muutuy gay yaa gase jile.
40010023	Ya ŋu taaɓiyaako ɗo geeger rakki, gaɗoŋ ɗo ka pey. Nu kaawaako ka seener, ku necaagɗo geegirnay ku Israyeel okin̰co di, nun Roŋ gemor yaa ase.
40010024	« Ku iban kadar maajirin̰ce, ŋaar pakgigɗo tatkuwiy kaak ɓildiga ho gay riyoy oki pakgigɗo gemoy.
40010025	Nec di maajirin̰ce yaa gine ar gem kaak ɓildiga ho gay riyor oki yaa gine ar gemoy. Ya gee niga biŋkico iŋ mee gerdi a ŋa Belzebuul, ɗo geen̰ji ku geer gay, ŋuu nige biŋkico paka !
40010026	« Dakoŋ ginenno kolaw ɗo geemir asaan gamin okin̰co kuuk cigile, ŋuu imilin̰co kara, ho kuuk ŋu rakaaɗo a gee yaa ibinin̰co sa, ŋuuco gaarin̰co ŋuu ibinin̰co.
40010027	Kaawin kuuk nu kaawiiko iŋ aando, kaawoŋgu iŋ ƴiriyo. Kar kuuk ku dortu iŋ semsume, peyoŋ ɗo wer kaak jaɗaŋ ho gaaroŋgu.
40010028	Dakoŋ ginenno kolaw ɗo ŋuur kuuk ida zi ka gemor ho gedarro idin kelmoy. Illa ginoŋ kolaw ɗo Buŋ kaak nec ide zi ka gemor iŋ kelmoy ɗo aki.
40010029	Gee gidayɗo ga ɗiiɗ seer iŋ tamma rakki di ? Yampa ya rakki minninco gal keɗer oki, Takko Buŋ iban.
40010030	Kar kuŋ gay, duruwko okintiti, Buŋ osta.
40010031	Ŋaar-ak, dakoŋ ginenno kolaw. Ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, kuŋko kat kaalin pakgig ɗiiɗ okin̰co !
40010032	« Ay gem kaak kaawa ɗo uŋco ka geemir a ŋa maajirin̰cer, nun oki yaa kaawe ɗo uŋji ka Tanni ka kuwa a ŋa kanto.
40010033	Kar ay gem kaak poocaan ɗo uŋco ka geemir gay, nun sa yaa poocin̰ji ɗo uŋji ka Tanni ka kuwa. »
40010034	« Dakoŋ pakirenno kadar nu as iye aapiye ɗo adiy ka kiɗar. Nu bal ase iye aapiye, illa taasin̰ka.
40010035	Ka seener gay, nu as eerin̰ gemo iŋ roŋji, mica iŋ yaaco, geema iŋ kogti.
40010036	Paa ko, ɗo adiy ka gerco, ŋuu goye adine.
40010037	« Gem kaak elgig tacco wal yaaco pak nunu, turro kanto. Ho gem kaak elgig roŋji wal romoy pak nunu, turro oki kanto.
40010038	Gem kaak icgigɗo etoy ka taaɓiner a ŋaan aaɗindu, ŋaar-ak oki turro kanto.
40010039	Gem kaak raka jile goyin̰ji, ŋaa rawtin̰ji. Kar waan kaak rawtaag goyin̰ji ɗo bi kanto gay, ŋaa gase goye kaak taɓ.
40010040	« Ŋaar kaak obiŋko samaane, ar ŋa obin nun meendu. Ho ŋaar kaak obin nunu, ar ŋa obig ŋaar kaak n̰aamintu.
40010041	Gem kaak oba nabiin̰ce ɗo geriy ɗo saan taat ŋa nabiin̰ce, Buŋ yaaji bere haginey ar taat ŋa beriy ɗo nabiin̰cer. Ho ŋaar kaak oba gem kaak goy goye iŋ botiliy ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ɗo saan ta goyin̰ji-ak, Buŋ yaaji bere haginey ar taat ŋa beriy ɗo gem-aka.
40010042	Gem kaak gaaya rakki min maajirnar ɗo saan taat ŋa maajirin̰cer, Buŋ yaaji berin haginey. Ka seener nu kaawaako, yoo ŋa bera amay sooɗ ku maala pondik-aŋ di ɗo maajirnar kuuk siŋco allo misa, ŋaa gasin haginey. »
40011001	Min Iisa taaƴig ko maajirnay kuuk orok iŋ seera, ŋa birtu ɓilde gee ho gaare Kabarre ta Gala ɗo geegirnay kuuk ɗo kiɗ-aka.
40011002	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Yaaya-Batist goy daŋaayne. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa dor gee kaawa ɗo bi ka gamin kuuk Masi giniyo. Paa ko, ŋa n̰aamtu daarin̰ min maajirnay a ŋu ɓaa indin̰ Iisa aman :
40011003	« Kiŋ ko Masi kaak yaa ase wala ni ere ka pey ? »
40011004	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ kaawon̰ji ɗo Yaaya ɗo taat ku dortu ho ku taltu :
40011005	noolin talaw, mersin jaawa tal-tal, burɗumin calaw, duŋguyuuyin doraw, gee ku mate nooyaw ho kuuk pokirna gasit Kabarre ta Gala.
40011006	Galal ɗo ŋaar kaak talintu ho rasgitɗo imaanji ɗo bi kanto. »
40011007	Min maajirna ku Yaaya yeeptu, Iisa teestu kaawe ɗo bi ka Yaaya ɗo gee dakina kuuk goy eɗe-ak aman : « Ku ɓaaw tale maa ɗo kalaaner ? Coor taat us awkaata walla ? Ha’a !
40011008	Yampa, ku ɓaaw tale maa ? Gem kaak is kesuun taat samaane walla ? Ha’a ! Ŋuur kuuk is kesuun taat samaan-at, ŋuur goy ɗo geray ku sultinniidi.
40011009	Yampa, ku ɓaaw tale waa ? Nabiin̰ce ga ? Hii, ka seener, nu kaawaako, kuŋ tal gem kaak pakgig nabiin̰ce.
40011010	Yaaya-Batist, ŋaar ko kaak Buŋ kaawtu ɗo Kitamner a ŋaa n̰aame awalle min Iisa Masi. Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Nun naa n̰aame gay tabiriikar uŋci a ŋaan̰ siyin botilin̰. ”
40011011	Nu kaawaako, min gee kuuk ŋu weeyig ween di-aŋ, ginno kaak tatik pakgig Yaaya-Batist. Kar sando, ŋaar kaak kapak ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi-ak gay, ŋaar tatik pakgig Yaaya.
40011012	Min wiktin taat Yaaya-Batist gaariy kaaw ta Buŋdi yoo diŋka, gee raka a Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaa ase iŋ guwaane ho ŋuur kuuk gin gudurre gay raka gaaminti.
40011013	Gaanuun kaak Muusa siirtu kaaw ɗo bi ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi-ata. Nabiinna okin̰co oki kaawe nam ɗo wiktin ta Yaaya.
40011014	Ya ku gin niyine, ooyon kaaw-anta : Yaaya, ŋaar ko Eli kaak zer yaa ase.
40011015	Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane, kuu cokiye ! »
40011016	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Gee ku diŋka-aŋ, ŋuur ar maa geenda ? Gee ŋuur-ak ar koogin kuuk goy ba beger ho kuuk koola ɗo koolin̰co aman :
40011017	‟ Ni paanko perinna a kuu waare, kar ku bal waare. Ni riyko riyin ku muuti, kar ku bal ale. ”
40011018	Di taloŋ, wiktin taat Yaaya astu, ŋa taaɗo ho ŋa saaɗo ɗo bi ka abaadiner. Iŋ taar-an oki, ŋu ɗiya aman : ‟ Aariɗ obga. ”
40011019	Kar wiktin taat nun Roŋ gemor astu, nu tiyaw ho nu siyaw ho ŋu kaawa aman : ‟ Taloŋ ja, maan gemir kaak adiy begirji-aŋka ! Ŋa taa ho ŋa saa ! Ŋa royco ka gay obe miirir iŋ gee kuuk gina jookumo. ” Gee kuuk ooya ilim ta Buŋdi gay, ŋu ibiniit tak kadar taar sellen̰. »
40011020	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa teestu leese ɗo gee ku geegirnay kuuk ŋa gintu gamin dakina kuuk ajbay, asaan ŋu bal ibinin̰ nigin̰co. Ŋa ɗiyiico aman :
40011021	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ gee ku geeger ka Koraziin ! Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ gee ku geeger ka Betsayda ! Ŋa lokoŋ ko Buŋ gintu gamin kuuk ajbay. Ya ŋa ginig gamin-aŋ ɗo geeger ka Tiir iŋ ka Sidon, ta-aŋ ŋu ibinig nigin̰co min awalle, iŋ ɗuune ka zamimdi ho iŋ kokire ka buti ɗo kaƴco.
40011022	Ɗo saan taar-an ko, nu kaawiiko, ɗo ƴiriy ta Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriin ɗo geemir, geegirnay ku Tiir iŋ Sidon tan̰co ginaaɗo raɗ aale ar taŋko.
40011023	Kuŋ gee ku geeger ka Kapernayuum, ya ɗo taŋko a Buŋ yaako cooniŋko kuwa ka samaaner walla ? Ha’a, illa ŋaako oriŋko ba oole. Ya Buŋ ginig gamin kuuk ajbay-aŋ ɗo geeger ka Sodom, geeger-ak yaa goye yoo diŋka.
40011024	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, nu kaawaako, ƴiriy taat Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriine, taaɓinko yaa gine raɗ aale pakgit ta gee ku Sodom. »
40011025	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Iisa ictu kaawo aman : « Baaba, kiŋ di Rabbin ka samaaner ho ka kiɗar, nu ozilaaciŋ ɗo bi kaak ki cigilig maanna-ak ɗo gee kuuk iban kaawna ho ɗo gee kuuk gin ilim, kar ki bayincog ɗo ŋuur kuuk gina ziŋkico n̰aaɗa.
40011026	Ka seener, kiŋ kat raka a taa kuuniye ansi. »
40011027	Iisa kaawtu pey ɗo geemir aman : « Tanni berduug gamin okin̰co ɗo pisindu. Waan ibingigɗo Roŋ kat waa, illa Tati. Waan ibingigɗo Tati, illa Roŋo ho ŋuur kuuk Roŋ-ak raka a ŋuu ibinin̰ji.
40011028	« Asondu okiŋko kuŋ kuuk rawe min gorko ta ooma ho naako jammiyiŋko.
40011029	Icon gor taat nu beriiko ho ɓilde kaak nu ɓildiŋko asaan nun dalulle ho gelbiner oola. Paa kat, kuu gase jamiine taat taɓ.
40011030	Ka seener, ɓilde kaak nu ɓildiŋko, ŋaar raɗɗo ho gor taat naako bere, taar oomno. »
40012001	Ƴiriy rakki ta sabitdi, Iisa ɗukuma ɗatik morginar. Maajirnay gay mey diyaagu ho ŋu teestu ƴiime ganduulinna, ŋu eeymiyo.
40012002	Min Pariziyenna taliigu, ŋu ɗiyiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Talig ja maajirnan̰ gina maan kaak gaanuunte toɗiite iŋ eele ka geeror ! »
40012003	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ku bal garkiyin̰ ga maan kaak Dawuud iŋ een̰ji gintu ƴiriy rakki taat mey diyiigu ?
40012004	Ŋa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi iŋ een̰ji ho ŋu teetu mappa kaak ŋu bertu satkin ɗo Buŋdi. Zer tee ŋaar-ak, ŋu bal gine botol taat ŋu teen̰ji, gaanuunte ber botol illa ɗo gay satkiner di.
40012005	Ɗo gaanuun-ak, ku iban tam kadar ya gay satkiner gina riyco ɗo ger ka Buŋdi iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi oki, ŋu nigaaɗo maanna.
40012006	Kar nun gay kaawaako, maan goy anne kaak tatik pak ger ka Buŋdi !
40012007	Buŋ kaaw ɗo Kitamney aman : ‟ Nu rakaaɗo satkine, nu raka illa kuu gine selliŋkaw ɗo geemir. ” Ya ku iban baat ta kaaw-anta, ku diyaaɗo kaaw ɗo eeŋko maalan di.
40012008	Asaan nun Roŋ gemor di mee sabitdi. »
40012009	Min eɗe-ak, Iisa uctu ho ŋa daktu un̰ja ɗo ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar.
40012010	Ɗo wer-ak, gin gem rakki pisin̰ji mate. Pariziyenna kuuk goy eɗe-ak rakaaji diye kaaw ɗo Iisa. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋu indiig aman : « Gaanuunte ber botol ta coole gemor iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi walla kawwi ? »
40012011	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Waa minninko, iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, ya ŋa gin tamga rakki di ho ŋa gal ɗo beendi, ŋa ɓaayiɗo imilin̰ji ?
40012012	Hadi, gem gay, ŋaar pakgig tamig serek wal maman ? Paa ko, gaanuun bertu botol gii gine selliŋkaw ɗo gemor iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi. »
40012013	Hiyya, Iisa kaawiiji ɗo gem kaak pisin̰ji mat-ak aman : « Paan̰ig pisin̰jiŋ. » Ek di ŋa paan̰iiga ho pisin̰ji cooltu ar giji.
40012014	Min ŋaar-ak, Pariziyenna amiltu ho ŋu n̰umtu dee kaawco maman ŋuu deen̰ Iisa.
40012015	Iisa ibinit pikirrico, paa ko, ŋa ɗeettu min ɗo wer-aka. Wiktin taat Iisa ɗeetiy-ak, gee dakina aaɗaaga ho ŋa cooliig kuuk raɗaw okin̰co.
40012016	Kar ŋa karmiig tak a ŋuu gaarin̰jiɗo.
40012017	Ampaa ko, kaaw taat Buŋ kaawtu awalle iŋ biy ka nabi Ezaayi as ɗo werti aman :
40012018	« Aŋ ko gay riyor kaak nu doɓtu. Nu elgiga ho galilil okintit goy iŋ ŋaara. Naaji bere Ruwwiner. Ŋaar yaa gaare botol taat samaane ɗo darrinay okin̰co.
40012019	Ŋa giɗaaɗo iŋ gemo. Ŋa koolaaɗo. Gee doraaɗo gaaƴay ɗo botilay ku helliner.
40012020	Ŋa ƴiimaatɗo coor taat kooŋ ko. Ŋa diyaatɗo lampa taat gaay ko mate. Ŋaa gine paa nam ŋaa tale nosirraw ta selliŋkaw ta Buŋdi.
40012021	Ho gee kuuk min darrinay okin̰co yaa diye gelbinco iŋ ŋaara. »
40012022	Ƴiriy rakki, gee iyiiji gem kaak aariɗ sokumig biy ho ŋa noolo oki. Iisa cooliiga. Gem-ak teestu kaawe ho odinay sa piltu.
40012023	Gee okin̰co kuuk n̰um-ak ajbiytu tak-tak ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ ginaaɗo roŋ ka sultan Dawuud walla ? »
40012024	Kar min Pariziyenna doriit kaaw-at gay, ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Gem-aŋ atkaag aariɗna illa iŋ gudurre ta Belzebuul, tatkaw ka aariɗnar ! »
40012025	Iisa gay ibingit pikirrico ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ay meennaw taat geenti taasin̰a benannico, taar asa gale. Ho ay geeger kaak geen̰ji kaawco ɓagɗo, ŋaar asa totire. Ho ay gee kuuk adiy ka gerco rakki, ya kaawco ɓagɗo, ŋu asa eere.
40012026	Ya Seetanne kat atka giji seetanne, ŋa taasin̰a ziy ka meen̰ji di. Pa-ak gay, maman meennuwiy yaa taaye ?
40012027	Nu indaako pey, ya iŋ gudurre ta Belzebuul kat nu atkiy aariɗna, kar maajirinkoŋ gay, ŋu atkiy aariɗna-ak iŋ gudurre ta waa ? Maajirin ku maaniikoŋ di yaako ɗukume seriine.
40012028	Kar ya nu atka aariɗna iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi, ŋaar-ak gaara kadar Meennaw ta Buŋdi askoŋ ko loko.
40012029	« Ku iban di, waan gediraaɗo un̰je ɗo ger ka gem kaak bombo, ŋaa soke gamnay, illa ya ŋa ɗuunig ja. Kar ya ŋa ɗuunig gay, ŋaa gedire sokin̰ gamnay bal kaawo.
40012030	Waan kaak iŋ nunno-ak, ŋaar adiner. Waan kaak n̰umno gee iŋ nunu, ŋaar-ak totiraagu totire.
40012031	Ɗo bi ŋaar-aŋ, nu kaawaako a Buŋ yaa saamiye ay zunuubinna ku geemir yoo ŋuur kuuk biŋkico amila gallo iŋ ŋaara oki. Kar gem kaak niga biy iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gay, Buŋ saamiyaajiɗo.
40012032	Ya gem kaak nig biy iŋ nun Roŋ gemor, Buŋ yaaji saamiye. Kar gem kaak waraat Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gay, ŋa saamiyaajiɗo ɗo duniin-anta yoo taat asa neginda. »
40012033	« Cokiyoŋ, ya et kaak samaane, roŋji sa yaa gine samaane. Kar ya et kaak samaanno gay, roŋji sa yaa gine samaanno. Asaan gi ibiniig et-ak min ɗo roŋji.
40012034	Taloŋ kate, kuŋ gee kuuk ar aalin-aŋku ! Kuŋ aditko pondiko, kar maman kaaw taat yaa amile min biŋkiko yaa gine samaane ? Ka seener, kaaw taat goy ɗo adir-at, taar ko amila kara.
40012035	Gem kaak sellen̰, amila minniney kaawin kuuk goy ɗo adiy kaak portiko. Kar gem kaak jookum gay, amila minniney kaawin kuuk goy ɗo adiy kaak pondiko.
40012036	Nu kaawaako, ɗo ƴiriy ta Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriine, gee yaa ose biŋkico ɗo ay kaaw taat ŋu kaawtu bal baati.
40012037	Asaan iŋ kaawnan̰-ak ko, Buŋ yaan̰ ɗukume seriine ho ŋaa ibine kadar bin̰ gala wala gallo. »
40012038	Min ŋaar-ak, Pariziyenna daarin̰ iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol Rabbine, ni raka kii gine ɗo uŋni maan kaak ajbay kaak gaara kadar Buŋ kat tabirin̰ciŋ. »
40012039	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Gee ku diŋka-aŋ ŋuur jookumo ho ŋu newsiji kop ɗo Buŋdi. Ŋu raka a naaco gaare maan kaak ajbay. Kar gay, illa ŋuu tale maan ka ajbay kaak nabi Yuunus gaartu-ak di.
40012040	Yuunus gay, awalle, gumba siɗga, ƴiriyo aando ŋa goy ɗo atti nam mena subba. Ampaa ko, nun Roŋ gemor oki yaa gine mena subba ɗo maginer.
40012041	Min gee ku Niniib cokiyit kaaw ta nabi Yuunus-ak, ŋu ibinig nigin̰co. Sando, anne-aŋ gay, gin gem kaak pakgig Yuunus ! Ɗo saan taar-at ko, ƴiriy taat Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriine, gee ku Niniib-ak yaa uce ɗo uŋco ka gee ku diŋka ho ŋuuco diye kaawo.
40012042	Sultin̰ca taat asa min watiine oki yaaco diye kaawo, asaan ta as min kiɗin kuuk serek aale a taa cokiyin̰ sultan Selemaan kaak iban kaawna. Sando, anne-aŋ gay, gin gem kaak pakgig sultan Selemaan serek ! »
40012043	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ya aariɗ amil min ɗo gemor, ŋa ɓaayiy ɗo kalaaner ho ŋa bariyiy wer kaak ŋaa goye. Kar ya ŋa bal gaseŋ gay,
40012044	ŋa osiig adiy aman : ‟ Nun naa yeepe ɗo gerir kaak awalle nu amiltu minniney. ” Ek di ŋa yeepiyo. Ŋa gasiig ger-ak goy maala. Ŋu sooyiig sakaan̰ ho siy samaane.
40012045	Paa ko, aariɗ-ak ɓaayiy bariye een̰ji peesira kuuk jookum pakgiga. Ŋu asiy sawa, ŋu un̰jiy ɗo ger-aka ho ŋu goyiyo. Hiyya, gem-ak, raɗuway gaayiy dakin pak ta awalle. Ansii ko, taaco kuuniye ɗo gee ku diŋka kuuk jookum-aŋku. »
40012046	Wiktin taat Iisa kaawa misa ɗo gee kuuk n̰um dakin-ak, yaaco iŋ siŋtay gay pey kara. Ŋu bariya botol taat ŋuuji kaawe.
40012047	[Gem rakki asiiji kaaw ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, yaako iŋ siŋtan̰ goy kara, ŋu indaaciŋ. »]
40012048	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Yaani kat waa ho siŋtar gay kun̰ waa ? »
40012049	Kar ŋa gaariig maajirnay ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Taloŋ, aŋ ko yaani ho siŋtar.
40012050	Ka seener, ay gem kaak gina taat Tanni ka kuwa rakiyo, ŋaar di siŋdu, boor ho yaani. »
40013001	Ƴiriy taar-at di, Iisa amiltu min ɗo ger-aka ho ŋa birtu bi ka barrer. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa goytu, ŋa garkiyiy gee.
40013002	Gee dakina n̰umiiji nam ŋa coktu ka markaba, kar ŋa goytu. Geeŋ gay goy ɗo goŋgumor.
40013003	Ŋa gaarco kaawin dakina iŋ dele ka daŋlal. Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Cokiyoŋ ! Gin gem rakki ɓaa luwo ɗo morgoy.
40013004	Wiktin taat ŋa luwiy-ak, busumji daarin̰ sollitu ɗo botildi ho ɗiiɗ teeyiig okin̰co.
40013005	Busumji daarin̰ sollitu ɗo wer kaak gin karŋiƴo ho kiɗay perew di. Koɗok di busam-ak amiltu asaan kiɗco sooɗ di.
40013006	Wiktin taat pat korsitu, ta aaƴiig kuuk amil-aku asaan ŋu bal paaye caari.
40013007	Daarin̰ gay sollitu ɗo wer kaak gin pompal kuuk gin jamay. Ŋu maaɗiy sawa nam pompal-ak gootiigu.
40013008	Kar daarin̰ gay sollitu ɗo kiɗ kaak samaane, ŋu amiltu nam ŋu neetu. Ganduulin daarin̰ wee roŋ miya, daarin̰ orok bijigiƴ ho daarin̰ gay orok subba ! »
40013009	Iisa gaaytu pey aman : « Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane, kuu cokiye ! »
40013010	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirnay ɓaawiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋu indiig aman : « Maa di, ki deliico daŋla ? »
40013011	Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Buŋ gaarkoŋ loko gamin kuuk cigile kuuk kaawa ɗo bi ka Meennuwiy. Yampa, ɗo gee ku pey gay, ŋa toɗcogu.
40013012	Gem kaak gine, Buŋ yaaji gaaye dakina min kuwa. Kar ŋaar kaak bal gineŋ gay, ka sooɗ kaak ŋa gintu oki, Buŋ yaaji imilin̰ji.
40013013	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, nu deliico daŋla, asaan ya ŋu tala sa, ar ŋu tallo ho ya ŋu cokiya sa, ar ŋu cokayɗo ho kaƴco icɗo maanna.
40013014	Ampaa ko, taat nabi Ezaayi kaawtu awalle astu ɗo werti aman : ‟ Kuu cokiye paa, kar ku ibinaaɗo baati. Kuu tale paa, kar ku talaaɗo maanna.
40013015	Asaan kaƴco ku geemir-aŋ bombo, ɗeŋginco amil lawa, odinco, ŋu timingu, pa ŋuu tale iŋ odinco, pa ŋuu dore iŋ ɗeŋginco, pa ŋuu diye ɗo gelbinco. Ŋu pooc jipte goyin̰co iŋ nunu, paa kat nu baltu gedire coolin̰co. ”
40013016	Kuŋ gay, galal loko asaan odinko talaw ho ɗeŋginko doraw !
40013017	Taat nu kaawiiko-an, ka seener, nabiinna dakina iŋ gee kuuk awalle kuuk goyin̰co sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi rak tale maan kaak ku taliyo, kar ŋu bal talin̰ji. Ŋu raka dorin̰ maan kaak ku doriyo, kar ŋu bal dorin̰ji. »
40013018	« Cokiyoŋ, naako gaare baat ta daŋil ta gem ka luwaw.
40013019	Gee kuuk dorit kaaw taat ŋu gaariico ɗo bi ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi ho ŋu ibanno baati, ŋuur-ak ar botol taat busam solliititi. Seetanne gay asiy imiliit kaaw-at min ɗo aditco.
40013020	Daarin̰ gay ar kiɗ kaak gin karŋiƴo kaak busam solliiji. Gee ŋuur-ak cokiyaat kaaw ta Buŋdi ho koɗok di ŋu ooyiit iŋ galal.
40013021	Kar kaaw-at gay, ŋu rasgitɗo taa paaye caari, ŋu obiit ɗo menuwir di. Ya taaɓin ase wal gee waraagu ɗo bi ka imaanco, ek di ŋu rasiita.
40013022	Kar daarin̰ gay ar kiɗ kaak gin pompal kuuk busam sollico. Ŋuur-ak dorit kaaw ta Buŋdi, kar ŋu pakira dakina ɗo gamin ku duniiner ho malle oki ɗaan̰iigu. Ampaa ko, kaaw-at wadirgiyɗo, ta uciy maala.
40013023	Gee daarin̰ gay ar kiɗ kaak samaane. Ŋuur-ak cokiyiit kaaw ta Buŋdi ho gas baati samaane nam kaaw-at wadirtu. Gee ŋuur-ak ar ganduulin kuuk wiyaw. Daarin̰ wee roŋ miya, daarin̰ orok bijigiƴ ho daarin̰ gay orok subba. »
40013024	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa deliico daŋil ta pey aman : « Cokiyoŋ, naako gaare Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar maa. Taar ar gem kaak luw busam kuuk samaane ɗo morgoy.
40013025	Iŋ aando, wiktin taat gee weƴaw, adiney astu, ŋa luwtu busam kuuk samaanno ɗo morgo-aka, kar ŋa ɗeettu.
40013026	Wiktin taat busam kuuk samaane maaɗtu ho ŋu imiltu ganduulinna, kuuk samaanno-ak oki imiltu kun̰co.
40013027	Hiyya, gay riyoy dakiiji kaaw ɗo mee morgor aman : ‟ Gem kol Tacco, ki luw busam kuuk samaane ɗo morgon̰, kar kuuk samaanno-aŋ gay min momo ? ”
40013028	Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : ‟ Ŋa adin kat iyduugu. ” Gay riyoy indiig pey aman : ‟ Ki raka nii rotin̰co walla ? ”
40013029	Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : ‟ Ha’a, rasoŋgu. Ya ku rotaagu, geme oki yaa rote. ”
40013030	Rasoŋ ŋuu maaɗe sawa di nam wiktin ta seɗindi yaa nece. Ɗo wiktin taar-at kat, naaco kaawe ɗo gay seɗindi a ŋuu doɓe ja ŋuur kuuk samaanno, ŋuu ɗuunin̰co kaa kaa ho ŋuuco diye ako. Kar kat, ŋuu sokin̰ geme ŋuu leen̰ ɗo urder. »
40013031	Iisa deliico pey daŋil rakki aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar busum ka mutaard kaak gem luwtu ɗo morgoy.
40013032	Min roŋ okin̰co, ŋaar di kapak tak-tak. Kar ya ŋa amile ho ŋa maaɗe, ŋa ɗeetiy tatik pak gamin okin̰co kuuk amila ɗo jineendi nam ŋa giniy ar et kaak ɗiiɗ sa saaƴiy geriyco ɗo leeginay. »
40013033	Iisa deliico daŋil ta pey aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar gele taat sooɗ di daatik liyiy ɗo kurgal kuuk dakina, ta eɗiigu, ho ŋu uciy gusus. »
40013034	Iisa kaawig kaawin-aŋ okin̰co iŋ dele ka daŋlal ho ŋa kaawiicog illa iŋ dele ka daŋlal di.
40013035	Ansii ko, ta kuuniytu iŋ kaaw taat nabiin̰ce kaawtu awalle aman : « Naa pile bir iŋ dele ka daŋlal. Naa imile baaco ta gamin kuuk goy cigile min kilgiye ka duniiner. »
40013036	Hiyya, Iisa rasiig gee ho ŋa birtu geero. Maajirnay dakiig gasa ho ŋu indiig aman : « Baan̰ ja, gaarni baat ta daŋil ta busam kuuk samaanno ɗo morgor-aŋka ? »
40013037	Iisa telkiico aman : « Ŋaar kaak luw busam kuuk samaan-ak, ŋa nun Roŋ gemor.
40013038	Morgo-ak, taar ko duniine. Busam kuuk samaane, ŋuur gee kuuk ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi. Kar busam kuuk samaanno-ak gay, ŋuur gee kuuk ic kaaw ta Seetanner.
40013039	Adin kaak luw busam kuuk samaanno-ak, ŋaar ko Seetanne. Seɗe, ŋaar ko gaase ka duniiner ho gay seɗindi gay, ŋuur ɗubal ku Buŋdi.
40013040	Uudin taat gay seɗindi rotiy gan̰ kaak samaanno ho ŋu oriig ɗo aki, ampaa ko, ɗubal ku Buŋdi asiy gine ɗo gaase ka duniiner.
40013041	Nun Roŋ gemor yaa tabire ɗubildu, ŋuu atkin̰ min ɗo Meennuwir gee okin̰co kuuk jookumo iŋ ŋuur kuuk isiniig een̰co a ŋuu rasin imaanco.
40013042	Kar ŋuu orin̰co ɗo ak ta matɗo. Ɗo wer-ak, gee yaa ale ho ŋuu eeyme saaŋco.
40013043	Kar ŋuur kuuk goy sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi gay, ŋuu irn̰e ar pato ɗo Meennaw ta Tacco Buŋ. Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane, kuu cokiye ! »
40013044	« Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar malle kaak cigil ɗo morgor. Gem rakki gaasiiga ho ŋa cigiliig pey ɗo wer-ak di. Gem-ak adiy giniiji gal aale nam ŋa ɓaayiy gidiyin̰ gamnay okin̰co ho ŋa asiy gidiyin̰ morgo-aka. »
40013045	« Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar pey taajirin̰ce kaak bariya ɗuur kuuk samaan aale.
40013046	Ya ŋa gas taat kaalin aale, ŋaa gidiyin̰ gamnay okin̰co ho ŋa asiy gidiyin ɗuur-ata. »
40013047	« Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar pey ribin ta yaarko taat gee cabiy ay biyaw ku boosir ɗo barrer.
40013048	Ya ta miine, gay cabindi ɗaan̰iit ɗo bi ka amiydi. Kar ŋu goyiy keɗer, ŋu doɓiig boos kuuk samaane samaane ŋu leeyiig ɗo gombirkor ho kuuk samaanno gay, ŋu oriigu.
40013049	Ansii ko, ɗo gaase ka duniiner, ɗubal ku Buŋdi asiy eerin̰ gee kuuk sellen̰ min kuuk jookumo.
40013050	Ŋuur kuuk jookum-ak gay, ŋu orin̰co ɗo ak ta matɗo. Ɗo wer-ak ko, gee dakina yaa ale ho ŋuu eeyme saaŋco. »
40013051	Iisa indiig maajirnay aman : « Has diŋ ku iban baaco ta kaawin-aŋ okin̰co walla ? » Ŋuur gay aman : « Hii, ni iban. »
40013052	Ŋaar gay yeepiico pey aman : « Di ya pa-ak, ay gem kaak iban gaanuun ka Buŋdi ho ŋu garkiyig ɗo bi ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi, ŋa ar mee gerdi kaak soka min malley gamin kuuk marbinto iŋ kuuk taay ko. »
40013053	Min Iisa gaastu iŋ dele ka daŋlay-at, ŋa ɗeettu min ɗo wer-aka.
40013054	Ŋa birtu ɗo geeger ka Nazareet ɗo wer kaak ŋa maaɗtu. Ŋa teestu garkiye gee ɗo gerco ka salaaner. Gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak, okin̰co ajbiytu tak-tak. Ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : « Ilimji-an, ŋa gasit min momo ? Gudurre taat ŋa giniy gamin kuuk ajbay-aŋ, ŋa gasit min momo ?
40013055	Ni iban kadar ŋa roŋ ka gay gerkiɗe atiydi. Yaaco-at wal siŋti Mariyam ɗoo ? Siŋtay wal ŋu kun̰ Zaak, Yuusup, Simon iŋ Zuud ɗoo ?
40013056	Siŋtay kuuk daaɗ sa goy iŋ ginte. Kar gamnay-aŋ gay, ŋa gasig min momo ? »
40013057	Hiyya, pikirrico-at toɗiico ŋu baltu aamine ɗo Iisa. Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ay wero, nabiin̰ce, ŋu karmiyaag di. Illa ɗo wer kaak ŋu weeyiiga ho ɗo adiy ka gerco di, ŋu karmiygigɗo. »
40013058	Ɗo bi ka imaanco taat sooɗ-at ko, Iisa baltu gine gamin dakina kuuk ajbay ɗo wer-aka.
40014001	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, sultan Herood, guberneer ka Galile, dortu gee kaawa bi ka Iisa.
40014002	Kar ŋa kaawiico ɗo gay riyoy aman : « Gem-aŋ ŋaar Yaaya-Batist ! Ŋaar nooy min ɗo muuti. Paa ko, ŋa gintu gudurre taat ŋa giniy gamin kuuk ajbay. »
40014003	-
40014004	Ɗo wiktin taat Yaaya goyiy misa iŋ odinay, Herood gay obit Herodiyaad, daaciy ta siŋji Pilip. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Yaaya kaawiiji ɗo Herood aman : « Gaanuun baljiŋ bere botol taat kii obin Herodiyaad. » Min Herood dortu pa-ak, ŋa bertu izinne ŋu obiig Yaaya, ŋu ɗuuniig iŋ jinzirre ho ŋu un̰jiig daŋaayne.
40014005	Ŋa raka deen̰ji, kar gay ŋa gina kolaw ɗo Yuudinnar asaan gee okin̰co talaag ar ŋa nabiin̰ce.
40014006	Ba aaro, ƴiriy rakki, ŋu iidiya alguw ta Herood. Ɗo wer-ak, romti ta Herodiyaad un̰jitu waare ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Min Herood taliita-ak, ta ajbiyga
40014007	nam ŋa togiltu a ŋaati bere ay maan kaak ta inditu di.
40014008	Yaaco gay n̰aamiit a taa indin̰ Herood aman : « Nu raka kiidu berin̰ kaay ka Yaaya-Batist annen di ɗo gartar ! »
40014009	Ɗo wer-ak, sultan Herood adiy nigtu. Kar min ŋa togil ɗo uŋco ka geemir gay, ŋa bertu izinne a ŋuuti berin̰ maan kaak ta inditu.
40014010	Paa ko, ŋa n̰aamtu gemo ɗo daŋaayner, ŋuu ɗukumin̰ kaay ka Yaaya-Batist.
40014011	Min ŋu ɗukumga, ŋa iyiig ɗo gartar ho ŋa beriitig ɗo gemso-ata. Taar gay iciiga ho ta iyiitig ɗo yaaco.
40014012	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirnay ku Yaaya asiig ic momtey ho ŋu tiisiiga. Kar ŋu ɓaawtu minin̰ Iisa ɗo maan kaak kuuniye.
40014013	Min kabarre-at galiiji ɗo Iisa, ŋa n̰eptu markaba ho ŋa ɗeettu serek min gee. Kar min gee kuuk dakin-ak dortu a ŋa amile, ŋu amiltu min ɗo helliniico iŋ asin̰co, ŋuu jarbiy ɗo bi ka barrer ho ŋu aaɗiiga.
40014014	Min Iisa paaytu min ka markaba, ŋa gasiig gee kuuk dakin-aku. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa taltu aminduwco ho ŋa teestu coolin̰ ŋuur kuuk raɗaw.
40014015	Wiktin taat pat gale, maajirnay sin̰jiiji moota ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, pat-an ɗeete ho wer sa serek. Kaawco ɗo gee-aŋku a ŋuu totire ɗo hellinniidi, ŋu ɓaayiy gidiye tee. »
40014016	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ha’a, kuuniyaaɗo ta ŋuu ɗeete, kuŋ maaniikon di beron̰co tee ! »
40014017	Kar ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ni gin mappa beeƴi iŋ boos seer di ! »
40014018	Ŋaar gay kaawiico aman : « Iyonduug anne. »
40014019	Min pa-ak, ŋa ɗiyiico ɗo geemir a ŋuu goye ka gan̰ ka balan̰. Min ŋu goye, ŋa sokiig mappa kaak beeƴi iŋ boos kuuk seer-aku, ŋa jaaltu kaay ka samaaner ho ŋa deltu barkin ɗo Buŋdi. Kar ŋa pirsiig mappa ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnar a ŋuu ɗeeɗin̰ ɗo gee-aku.
40014020	Okin̰co ŋu teetu, ŋu aaytu. Kar tee kaak ɗak-ak gay, ŋu n̰umiiga nam ŋa miin girdin orok iŋ seera.
40014021	Miday kuuk goy eɗe-ak yaa nece ar alip beeƴ pa, daaɗi iŋ koogin gay, ŋu bal osin̰co.
40014022	Min ŋaar-ak, koɗok di, Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay a ŋuu n̰epe ka markabar ŋuuji ogire ar barrer. Ŋaar gay ɗaktu a ŋaa n̰aamin̰co ja gee-aku.
40014023	Min ŋa n̰aamiigu, ŋa coktu ka dambar a ŋaa inde Buŋ. Wiktin taat pat gale oki, ŋa goy keeji di ka dambar.
40014024	Markab gay ot ko ɗatik barrer. Us teestu abire dakina ho amay kuuk uca gulɓan̰-gulɓan̰-ak sa taŋkilaaga. Us ŋaamiiga nam markabco sin̰jaaɗo.
40014025	Iŋ ɗatik kawtira, Iisa jaawa ka amiydi, ŋa ica botol ta maajirnay.
40014026	Wiktin taat maajirna-ak taliig Iisa jaawa ka amiydi-ak, kolaw un̰jiico. Ŋu kaawtu aman : « Hey yaman kelmo ! » ho iŋ koluwco, ŋu teestu koole.
40014027	Kar koɗok di Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Oboŋ aditko. Ŋa nunun di, dakoŋ ginenno kolaw ! »
40014028	Piyer ictu kaawo ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbine, ya ka seener ŋa kiŋke-ak, beror botol naa jaawe ka amiydi naan̰ gase. »
40014029	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, asu ! » Ek di Piyer paaytu min ka markabar, ŋa aaniyiig Iisa ho ŋa teestu jaawe ka amiydi.
40014030	Min Piyer aawiig us abira raɗ-ak, kolaw un̰jiiji ho ŋa teestu nooriye ɗo amiydi. Ŋa kooltu raɗa aman : « Rabbine jorkinu ! »
40014031	Koɗok di, Iisa n̰aamiiji pise, ŋa obiiga ho ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Imaanji goy misa sooɗa ! Maa di adin̰ gintu seera ? »
40014032	Min pa-ak, seerco, ŋu coktu ka markabar ho us sa peytu min abirin̰ji.
40014033	Kar maajirna kuuk goy ka markabar dersitu ɗo uŋji ka Iisa ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Way, kiŋke-aŋ Roŋ ka Buŋdi ka seener ! »
40014034	Min Iisa iŋ maajirnay aaliig barre-ak, ŋu ottu ɗo kiɗ ka Zenezareet.
40014035	Min gee taliigu, ŋu ibiniig Iisa ho ŋu totiriit kabarrey ɗo kiɗ okin̰ji. Ampaa ko, ŋu iyiijig geen̰co okin̰co kuuk raɗaw.
40014036	Ŋu marmiliiji a ŋaa rasin̰co ŋuu diire kin bit ka kesuuney-at di. Paa ko, okin̰co kuuk diirta-at cooltu.
40015001	Ba aaro, daarin̰ min Pariziyenna iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi uctu min Zeruzaleem ho ŋu ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa. Ŋu indiig aman :
40015002	« Maa di maajirnan̰ karmiygigɗo aadanna ku aginiydi ? Ya ŋu raka tee, maa di ŋu acgiyɗo pisin̰co ar kaak aginiyte ɗiyiite ? »
40015003	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Kar kuŋ gay, maa di ku aaɗiy aadanna ku aginiyko ku maaniikon di ho ku karmiygigɗo ka Buŋdi-aka ?
40015004	Buŋ gay ɗiy aman : ‟ Ber horoomin ɗo yaako iŋ takko. ” Pey ŋa kaaw aman : ‟ Waan kaak niga biy iŋ tacco wala iŋ yaaco, tan̰ji-at illa muutu. ”
40015005	Kar kuŋ gay garkiya gee a ŋuu kaawe ɗo aginiyco aman : ‟ Maan kaak zer naako bere ka gaayor, taar-at satkin taat waaliya Buŋ. ”
40015006	Ho ku kaawa kadar ŋaar kaak kaawa ampa-ak, necig ko ŋa gediraaɗo pey ŋaaco bere horoomine iŋ gaayoy-ata. Paa ko, ku poociit kaaw ta Buŋdi ho ku makiit iŋ ta aginiyko ku maaniiko.
40015007	Taloŋ gee kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkico di ho ta aditco gay keetiti-aŋku ! Kaaw taat Buŋ ɗiytu ɗo bi kaŋko, taar ka seener. Ŋa kaaw awalle iŋ bi ka nabi Ezaayi aman :
40015008	‟ Gee ŋuur-aŋ beraadu horoomin iŋ biŋkico di, kar aditco gay serek min nunu.
40015009	Abaadin taat ŋu abdiyin-an, taar uca maalan di, asaan garaan taat ŋu garkiyiy gee sa, geen di imilit min ɗo kaƴco. ” »
40015010	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa koliig gee okin̰co ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane kuu ibinin baat ta kaaw-anta :
40015011	maan kaak gem tiyo, ŋaar nigigɗo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Kaak nigaaga-ak, illa kaaw taat amila min ɗo biy. »
40015012	Kar maajirnay ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋu indiig aman : « Ki iban kadar kaawnan̰-aŋ nigig aditco ku Pariziyennar walla ? »
40015013	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ay et kaak Tanni ka kuwa bal taatin̰ji, ŋu asa rotin̰ji.
40015014	Rasoŋ oola Pariziyenna-aŋku ! Ŋuur noolna kuuk ɗaan̰a noolna ! Ya nool kat ɗaan̰a giji noolo, seerco, ŋuu solle ɗo beendi. »
40015015	Piyer ictu kaawo aman : « Gaarnin̰ ja baat ta daŋlan̰-anta. »
40015016	Iisa newsiico loco aman : « Kuŋ oki kaƴko ɗibir ga ?
40015017	Ku ibanno ga maan kaak gem tiy-ak un̰ja ɗo adiy ho ba aar gem-ak ɓaay dooye ?
40015018	Kar kaaw taat amila min ɗo bi ka gemor, taar min ɗo gelbiney ho taar ko taat niga gemo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
40015019	Asaan min ɗo gelbiney-ak ko amiliy pikirre taat samaanno ta n̰aamiig ɗo dee ka geemir, ɗo kokine ka miday wal daaɗ kara, ɗo ɓaaƴe kaak mun̰jam, ɗo kokinaw, diye ka kaawor kaak bal botol ho ŋa nigiy biy iŋ gee.
40015020	Gamin ŋuur-aŋ ko kuuk niga gemo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ! Kar gay, tee kaak bal ace ka pisindi ar ka aadinco, ŋaar nigɗo gemo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. »
40015021	Min Iisa gaasiit kaawoy, ŋa uctu min ɗo wer-aka ho ŋa ɗeettu ɗo kiɗ ka Tiir iŋ ka Sidon.
40015022	Tala kar daatik rakki taat Yuudin̰caɗo ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa. Caarti min gee ku Kana kuuk ɗo kiɗ-aka. Ta astu marmile ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwir ! Romor, aariɗ obta ho ŋa taaɓiyaat ko taaɓiye ! »
40015023	Kar Iisa gay da pillo biy. Maajirnay ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Kaawti ɗo daatko-an a taa ɗeete, yampa ta aaɗiite iŋ koolinti kon di-aŋ gay maman ! »
40015024	Ŋaar gay telkitu aman : « Nun, ŋu n̰aamintu ɗo gee kuuk ar tamgi kuuk rawte ɗo kiɗ ka Israyeel. »
40015025	Kar daatko-at astu dersa ɗo uŋji ho ta ɗiytu aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, baan̰u jorkinu ! »
40015026	Iisa gay telkiitit aman : « Kuuniyaaɗo ŋuu icin̰ji tee ka kooginar ho ŋuu orin̰ ɗo kan̰ir. »
40015027	Daatko-at kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, kaawon̰-an ka seener. Kar kan̰ sa, ŋuur tiya meerin kuuk gaama min ɗo pise ka gemco di. »
40015028	Kar Iisa telkiitit aman : « Way ! Kaŋke-an imaanke-an dakina ! Taa kuuniye ar taat ka rakiyo. » Hiyya, ɗo wiktin-at di, romti cooltu.
40015029	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa birtu ɗo bi ka barre ka Galile. Ŋa coktu ka kooti ho ŋa goytu.
40015030	Gee dakina ɓaawiiji, ŋu iyiiji gee kuuk raɗaw : mersina, noolna, gee kuuk ziŋkico galcoɗo, duŋguyuuyna, iŋ kuuk gin raɗuwnay ku pey. Okin̰co, ŋu iyiig ɗo uŋji ka Iisa ho ŋa cooliigu.
40015031	Min gee-ak taliig duŋguyuuyin doraw, kuuk ziŋkico galcoɗo coolaw, mersin jaawa tal-tal ho noolin talaw-ak, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu teestu ozilin̰ Buŋ ka Israyeel.
40015032	Min pa-ak, Iisa koliig maajirnay ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Gee-aŋ, nu tala aminduwco, asaan mena subba ŋu goy iŋ nun di ho ŋu ginno maan ka teendi. Nu rakaaɗo n̰aamin̰ aditco aaƴe, yampa, gudurrico yaa arme botildi. »
40015033	Maajirnay indiig aman : « Kalaan ta-aŋka, kar gi aaniye momo, gii gase tee kaak yaa necin̰ gee kuuk dakin ta aŋku ? »
40015034	Ŋaar gay indiig aman : « Ku gin mappa minaw ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ni gin mappa peesira iŋ teŋilna minaw-minaw pa. »
40015035	Kar Iisa kaawiico ɗo gee-ak a ŋuu goye keɗer.
40015036	Hiyya, ŋa sokiig mappa kaak peesir-aka iŋ teŋilna-aku. Ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi, ŋa pirsiigu ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnay. Ŋuur gay ɗeeɗiig ɗo gee-aku.
40015037	Okin̰co, ŋu teetu, ŋu aaytu. Maajirna sokiig tee kaak ɗake nam ŋa miin girdin peesira.
40015038	Miday kuuk tee gay, ŋuur alip pooɗ. Daaɗi iŋ koogin gay, ŋu bal osin̰co.
40015039	Min ŋu tee, Iisa n̰aamiig kat gee-aku. Kar ŋa n̰eptu markaba ho ŋa birtu ɗo kiɗ ka Magadaan.
40016001	Min ŋaar-ak, Pariziyenna iŋ Sadusiyenna sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa. Ŋu rakiiji ɗibe. Ŋu indiig a ŋaaco gaare maan kaak ajbay kaak asa min ɗo Buŋdi.
40016002	Kar ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Ya pat gala zil-zil-zil, ku kaawgiy a wer yaa gine gala asaan pat ta guddin̰ir ginig samaan dindiko.
40016003	Iŋ wer dugus-dugus sabaan cokaw, ku kaawgiy a ƴiriyta-aŋ amay yaa ase asaan buŋ derɗe. Ku iban gaare baaco ta gamin kuuk ka samaaner, kar gamin ku gaarindi kuuk kuuniya diŋka gay, ku ibanno baaco.
40016004	Gee ku diŋka-aŋ, ŋuur jookumo ho ŋu newsiji kop ɗo Buŋdi. Ŋu raka a naaco gaare maan kaak ajbay. Kar gay, illa ŋuu tale maan ka ajbay kaak nabi Yuunus gaartu-ak di. » Kar ŋa rasiigu ho ŋa ɗeettu.
40016005	Wiktin taat maajirna aaltu aar barrer, ŋu rawte ice mappa.
40016006	Kar Iisa kaawiico aman : « Yaman pakiroŋ ! Goyoŋ goɗom min gel ta Pariziyennar iŋ ta Sadusiyennar. »
40016007	Min pa-ak, maajirna kaawiy benannico aman : « Ŋa kaawiite ampa-aŋ asaan gi bal ice mappa kar di walla ? »
40016008	Iisa ibinit pikirrico ho ŋa indiig aman : « Taloŋ gee kuuk imaanco sooɗ-aŋku ! Maa di, ku kaawiy benanniko a gi bal ice mappa ?
40016009	Yoo diŋ oki kaƴko ɗibir di misa walla ? Ku rawtig ko mappa kaak beeƴ ku ɗeeɗtu ɗo gee kuuk alip beeƴ-aku ho iŋ girdin minaw kuuk ku soktu-aku ?
40016010	Ku rawtig ko pey mappa ka peesira ku ɗeeɗtu ɗo gee kuuk alip pooɗ ho iŋ girdin minaw ku soktu-aku ?
40016011	Kar maa di, ku ibingiyɗo kadar nu kaawgikonno ɗo bi ka mappa wiktin taat nu kaawiiko a kuu goye goɗom min ɗo gel ta Pariziyennar iŋ ta Sadusiyennar ! »
40016012	Min maajirnay dortu pa-ak, ŋu ibintu kadar ŋa bal kaawe a ŋuu goye goɗom min gel ta ŋu giniy mappa, illa ŋuu goye goɗom min garaan ta Pariziyennar iŋ ta Sadusiyennar.
40016013	Min pa-ak, Iisa ɓaawtu ɗo kiɗ ka Sezare ka Pilip. Ŋa indiig maajirnay aman : « Ɗo bi ka nun Roŋ gemor-aŋ, gee kaawa a nu waa ? »
40016014	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Daarin̰ kaawa a ki Yaaya-Batist, daarin̰ a ki Eli ho daarin̰ gay a ki Zeremi wal nabiin̰ce ka pey min awalle. »
40016015	Iisa gay indiigu aman : « Kar kuŋ gay kaawa a nu waa ? »
40016016	Simon kaak ŋu koliy oki Piyer telkiiji aman : « Kiŋke Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu, Roŋ ka Buŋdi, Buŋ kaak goy mento. »
40016017	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Galjiŋ Simon, roŋji ka Yaaya. Ŋa Tanni ka kuwa kat gaarjin seen-anta, yampa ŋa gemno.
40016018	Nun gay kaawaajiŋ aman : ‟ Kiŋ Piyer ho ɗo dambi-aŋ ko, naa pinin̰ Eglizdu ho muut sa gediraajiɗo ɗo Egliz-aka.
40016019	Naan̰ berin̰ kerilna ku Meennaw ta Buŋdi. Maan kaak kii poocin̰ keɗer, kuwaŋ sa ŋuu poocin̰ji, ho maan kaak kii ooyin̰ keɗer, kuwaŋ sa ŋuu ooyin̰ji. ” »
40016020	Hiyya, Iisa karmiig maajirnay a ŋuu kaawenno tak-tak ɗo waanna a ŋaar ko Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu.
40016021	Min ƴiriy taar-at di, Iisa teestu kaawe waraŋ ɗo maajirnay aman : « Nun ɓaa Zeruzaleem. Aginay, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi, ŋuun taaɓiyin dakina. Ŋuu asiin deendu ho ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. »
40016022	Min pa-ak, Piyer imiliig serpiya ho ŋa leesiiji aman : « Rabbine, Buŋ yaan̰ gooƴe ! Maan sa asaajinno tak-tak ! »
40016023	Kar Iisa kolsiig Piyer ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ɓaa annere, Seetan-aŋka ! Ki toɗaadu botol. Pikirren̰ taar arro ta Buŋdi, taar ar ta geemir di. »
40016024	Kar Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Ya waan kaak rakaan aaɗindu, ŋaa pooce pey bariye galal ta meen̰ji, ŋaa icin̰ etoy ka taaɓiner ho ŋaan aaɗindu.
40016025	Asaan waan kaak raka jile goyin̰ji ka meen̰ji, ŋaa rawtin̰ji. Kar waan kaak rawtaag goyin̰ji ɗo bi kanto gay, ŋaa gase goye kaak taɓ.
40016026	Yampa, ya gem kaak obit duniin okintit ɗo pisin̰ji ho ŋa rawtig goyin̰ji, ŋaar-ak galilti gay maa ? Ŋaa bere maa ŋaa gidiye goye ka gaasɗo ?
40016027	Ka seener gay, nun Roŋ gemor naa ase iŋ darjin ta Tanni ho iŋ ɗubilji. Ɗo wer ŋaar-ak, naa kappiye ɗo ay gemo ɗo riy taat ŋa gintu.
40016028	Ka seener nu kaawaako, min gee kuuk goy anne-aŋ, daarin̰co mataaɗo di, ŋuun talin nun Roŋ gemor asa ar Sultan. »
40017001	Gin mena bijigiƴ, Iisa koliig Piyer, Zaak iŋ siŋji Yaaya ho ŋa iyiig keeco kuwa ka damba ta bolok.
40017002	Tala kar Iisa, ziy newse. Wijeeney irn̰a pit-pit ar pato ho kesuuney newis portik kar ar n̰irn̰e.
40017003	Ta bite-aŋ di, nabiinna seer bayintu. Nabiinna-ak, ŋuur Muusa iŋ Eli kat kaawa iŋ Iisa.
40017004	Hiyya Piyer kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, gala ni goyiy anne-aŋka. Ya ki rakaw niiko siye tarram subba, rakki locin, rakki ɗo Muusa ho rakki gay ɗo Eli. »
40017005	Min Piyer kaawa misan di, uce irn̰aw gootiigu ho min ɗo uc-at amila gaaƴa taat kaawa aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ Roŋdu, nu elgig dakina ho adir miin iŋ galal ɗo bi kan̰ji. Cokiyon kaawoy ! »
40017006	Min maajirna doriit kaaw-at, kolaw obiigu nam ŋu zuɓik keɗer.
40017007	Iisa sin̰jiico moota, ŋa keɗkiɗiigu ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ucoŋ, dakoŋ ginenno kolaw ! »
40017008	Ŋu jaaltu kaƴco, kar ŋu bal tale pey waanna, illa Iisa keeji di.
40017009	Wiktin taat ŋu paayiy min ka dambar, Iisa karmiig maajirnay aman : « Yaman, dakoŋ kaawenno ɗo waanna ɗo maan kaak ku taltu-aŋka nam nun Roŋ gemor naa nooyen̰ ja min ɗo muuti. »
40017010	Kar maajirnay indiig aman : « Maa di agindaw ku gaanuundi kaawiy a Eli yaa asen̰ ja ? »
40017011	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Hii, Eli yaa ase, ŋaa leen̰ gamin-aŋ ɗo botilco.
40017012	Kar gay, nu kaawaako, Eli ŋaar as ko, kar gee gay bal ibinin̰ji. Ŋu taaɓiyig ar taat ŋu raktu. Ansii ko, nun Roŋ gemor oki, ŋu asiin taaɓiyindu. »
40017013	Paa kat, maajirna ibintu kadar ŋa kaawaaco ɗo bi ka Yaaya-Batist.
40017014	Wiktin taat Iisa iŋ maajirnay yeepco ɗo gee kuuk dakin-ak, gem rakki sin̰jiiji moota ho ŋa dersitu ɗo uŋji.
40017015	Kar ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, tal amindaw ta roŋdu. Ŋa gin punpun. Ya punpunji ucji aale, ŋa galgiy ɗo aki wal ɗo amiydi.
40017016	Nu iycog ɗo maajirnan̰, kar ŋu bal gedire coolin̰ji. »
40017017	Iisa kaawtu aman : « Kuŋ gee ku diŋka-aŋ, ku geenno ho imaanko sa sooɗa. Ɗakdu mena mina naa goye iŋ kuŋko ho naako sosiŋko pey ? Iyiig roŋjiŋ-aŋ anne. »
40017018	Min ŋu iyjiiga, ŋa leesiiji ɗo aariɗ kaak iyiiji punpun-aka. Hiyya, ŋa amiltu. Ek di mic-ak cooltu.
40017019	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirna amiltu keeco ho ŋu indiig Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, maa di ni baltu gedire atkin̰ aariɗ-aŋka ? »
40017020	Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Ku baltu gedire-ak asaan imaankon di sooɗa. Nu kaawaako ka seener, ya ku gin imaan kapak ar busum ka mutaard, nec kuuti kaawe ɗo damba-an aman : ‟ Jaŋku annere. ” Ek di taa jaŋke, maan begiraakonno.
40017021	[Kar gay, aariɗ ŋaar-aŋ, kuu gedire imilin̰ji-ak, illa iŋ inde ka Buŋdi ho iŋ ice ka sayamner ja.] »
40017022	Ƴiriy rakki, maajirna n̰umtu okin̰co ɗo kiɗ ka Galile. Iisa kaawiico aman : « Nun Roŋ gemor, ŋu asaan berindu ɗo pise ka midir.
40017023	Ŋuun deendu ho ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. » Min ŋu doriit kaaw-at, ŋu goytu aminda tak-tak.
40017024	Wiktin taat Iisa iŋ maajirnay ottu ɗo geeger ka Kapernayuum, gay obe miirir ka ger ka Buŋdi ɓaawiiji ɗo Piyer ho ŋu indiig aman : « Tatkuwko kappayɗo miiri ka ger ka Buŋdi walla ? »
40017025	Piyer gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋa kappay. » Kar wiktin taat Piyer un̰jiy geero, Iisa ictu kaaw awalle ho ŋa indiig aman : « Simon, kiŋ gay pakira maa ɗo kaaw-anta ? Sultinnay kuuk ɗo duniiner ica miiri ho patanti min ɗo waa ? Min ɗo geen̰co ku geero wala min ɗo gee ku kara ? »
40017026	Piyer telkiiji aman : « Min ɗo gee ku kara. » Iisa gay kaawiiji aman : « Di ya pa-ak, koogin ku sultinniidi maan isgigɗo.
40017027	Di iŋ taar-an oki, gi rakaaɗo nige aditco ku gay obe miirir-aŋku. Ɗo saan taar-an ko, kii icin̰ jambaatjiŋ, ki ɓaa ɗo barrer, kii cabe boosi. Boos kaak kii ice awalle-ak di, pilig biy kii gase tamma rakki. Icga, ŋaar necteŋ ko kiite kappiye miirte seerte. »
40018001	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, maajirna sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋu indiig aman : « Ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, waa tatik paka ? »
40018002	Iisa koltu mico, ŋa iyiig ɗo ɗatikco
40018003	ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya ku bal jipte goyiŋko ho ku bal gine ziŋkiko n̰aaɗa ar koogina, ku un̰jaaɗo tak-tak ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
40018004	Gem kaak gina ziy kapak ar mic-aŋka, ŋaar-ak di kaak tatik paka ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
40018005	Gem kaak obig samaane mic ar ŋaar-aŋka ɗo bi kanto, ar ŋa obintu nun meendu. »
40018006	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Gem kaak un̰ja rakki min een̰ji kuuk imaanco sooɗa ɗo zunuubinnar, guna ŋuuji ɗuune tolo ɗo gaaƴay ho ŋuu accin̰ ɗo barrer.
40018007	Way duniine ! Gamin dakina goy ɗo duniiner kuuk iya gee ɗo zunuubinnar ! Ka seener gay, gamin ŋuur-ak yaa goyen di doo. Kar ŋaar kaak iya een̰ji ɗo zunuubinnar gay, taaɓin yaa gale ɗo kaay !
40018008	Ya pisin̰jiŋ wal asin̰jiŋ kat iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar, ɗukumga ho acig kara. Gunjiŋ kii un̰je ɗo goye ka gaasɗo iŋ pise rakki wal merso, min kii un̰je iŋ pisin̰jiŋ wal iŋ asin̰jiŋ seer ɗo ak taat matɗo.
40018009	Ya odon̰ di iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar, ɗimta. Guna kii un̰je iŋ odon̰ rakki di ɗo goye ka gaasɗo, min kii un̰je iŋ odinan̰ seerco ɗo aki. »
40018010	« Yaman, min koogin-aŋ, dakoŋ aan̰enno rakki minninco. Asaan nu kaawaako, ɗubal ku Buŋdi kuuk gooƴaag koogin-aŋ goy doo ɗo uŋji ka Tanni ka kuwa.
40018011	[Kar nun Roŋ gemor as jile ŋuur kuuk rawte.]
40018012	« Ku pakira maa ? Ya gem kat gin tamgi miya ho rakki minninco rawte, ŋaa gine maman ? Ŋaa rasin̰ kuuk dakina ka dambar iŋ gemo, kar ŋa ɓaayiy bariyin ta rawte-ata wal maman ?
