40018013	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya ŋa gasta, ŋaa aaciye. Ho aaciyin̰ji-ak yaa pake aaciye ka ŋuur kuuk dakin bal rawte.
40018014	Ansii ko, Takko kaak goy ka samaaner rakiyɗo yoo rakki min koogin-aŋ yaa rawte. »
40018015	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ya siŋjiŋ kat nigjiŋ, ɓaa gasig keejiŋ di ho gaarjiig maan kaak ŋa nigiiji. Ya ŋa cokiyin̰ciŋ, ŋaar-ak ki amir iŋ siŋjiŋ.
40018016	Kar ya ŋa pooce gay, kol gem rakki wala gee seera. Paa kat, kaaw yaa mate iŋ saadinna seer wala subba ar kaak Kitamne kaawiyo.
40018017	Ya ŋa pooc cokiyin̰ saadinna-aku, kaawco ɗo gee ku Eglizdi. Kar ya ŋa pooc cokiyin̰ gee ku Eglizdi-ak gay, talig ar ŋa gem kaak ibanno Buŋ wal gay obe miirir.
40018018	« Ka seener nu kaawaako, maan kaak ku poocig keɗer, kuwaŋ sa, ŋuu poocin̰ji, ho maan kaak ku ooyig keɗer, kuwaŋ sa, ŋuu ooyin̰ji.
40018019	« Nu kaawaako pey, ya seer minninko dee kaawco keɗer a ŋuu inde maanna min ɗo Tanni ka kuwa, maanna-ak, ŋaaco berin̰ji.
40018020	Ka seener gay, ay wer kaak gee seer wal subba n̰um iŋ siŋ kunto, nun gay ɗatikco. »
40018021	Hiyya, Piyer sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋa indiig aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, ya siŋdu kat nigdu, naaji saamiye dees minaw ? Dees peesira walla ? »
40018022	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Ha’a, dees peesirro. Illa orok peesira kat peesira !
40018023	Naako gaare Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar maa. Taar ar Sultan kaak raka ose gurus iŋ gay riyoy.
40018024	Min ŋa tees ose, ŋu iyiiji gay riyor rakki kaak yaaji kappiye tammin ŋon̰oŋon̰o.
40018025	Kar gay riyor-ak gay bal gedire kappiye ɗaanay. Hiyya Sultan-ak bertu izinne a ŋuu gidiyin̰co ar ɓerrina : ŋaara, daaciy, kooginay iŋ gamnay okin̰co. Ŋa kaawtu pa-ak a ŋaaji kappiyin ɗaanay-ata.
40018026	Min pa-ak, gem-ak dersitu ɗo uŋji ho ŋa marmiliiji aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, ic subirraw di, naan̰ kappiyinti okintiti ! ”
40018027	Hiyya, tatkuwiy-ak taltu aminduwiy, ŋa saamiyiijit ɗaanay ho ŋa rasiig ŋa ɗeettu.
40018028	Ɗo ɗeetin̰ji, ŋa ŋaamtu iŋ rakki min een̰ji kuuk ŋu giniy riy sawa. Gem-ak, ŋa aaɗaag ɗaan sooɗ pa. Ŋa gaɓguɓiiga ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : ‟ Yalla kappiyorduut ɗaanar ! ”
40018029	Giji-ak dersitu ɗo uŋji ho ŋa marmiliiji aman : ‟ Gem kol royay, ic subirraw di, naan̰ kappiyinti ! ”
40018030	Kar ka boodaaga-ak gay pooce. Ŋa sakkiyiiga ho ŋu obiig daŋaayne, illa ya ŋa kappiyit ja ɗaanay.
40018031	Min gay riyor taliig maan kaak asji ɗo royco-ak, aditco nigtu tak-tak ho ŋu dakiiji os okintiti ɗo tatkuwco.
40018032	Min ŋu osiiji, tatkuwco kaawiico a ŋuuji iyin̰ gay riyor-aka. Kar min ŋu iyiiga, ŋa leesiiji aman : ‟ Taloŋ gay riyor kaak gelbiney samaanno-aŋka ! Nun kat saamiyjin ɗaanan̰ okintiti asaan ki marmildu.
40018033	Nun tal aminduwin̰. Zer kiŋ sa yaa tale amindaw ta siŋjiŋ ɗoo ? ”
40018034	Hiyya, tatkaw-ak dapin̰tu aale ho ŋa n̰aamiig gem-ak a ŋuu asirin̰ ɗo riyor nam ŋaa kappiyin ɗaanay okintiti. »
40018035	Kar Iisa kaawtu aman : « Ampaa ko, Tanni kaak goy ka samaaner yaako gine, ya rakki minninko saamayɗo ɗo siŋji iŋ gelbin rakki. »
40019001	Min Iisa gaastu iŋ garaaney, ŋa uctu min kiɗ ka Galile ho ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude, aar barre ka Zurdan.
40019002	Gee dakina aaɗiiga ho ŋa cooliig geen̰co kuuk raɗaw.
40019003	Kar Pariziyenna daarin̰ ɓaawiiji moota, ŋu rakiy gaase baay. Paa ko, ŋu indiig aman : « Gaanuunte bera botol taat gem yaa totirin daaciy ɗo ay maan kaak ta nigtu walla ? »
40019004	-
40019005	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Ɗo teesindi, Buŋ kilgiyiig mitko iŋ daatko. ” » Kar ŋa kaawtu pey aman : « Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, mitko yaa rasin̰ tacco iŋ yaaco, ŋa ɓaayiy n̰ume iŋ daaciy, ho seerco, ŋuu gine ar gem rakki di ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ku garkiyit ɗoo-at kaaw-anta ?
40019006	Ampa-ak, ŋu seerro pey, ŋu n̰um ko ar gem rakki di. Maan kaak Buŋ ɗuunga-ak, gem ipiraagɗo ! »
40019007	Pariziyenna indiig aman : « Hadi, maa di Muusa gay bertu botol ɗo gemor taat ŋaa bere maktumne ta totiriikar ɗo daaciy ? »
40019008	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Muusa berko botol taat kuu totirin̰ daɗitko asaan kaƴko bombo. Yampa, ɗo teesindi-ak taar paaɗo.
40019009	Nu kaawaako, ya gem totirit daaciy ho ŋu bal obin iŋ gemo, kar ŋa obtu ta pey, taar-at daaciyɗo ar ŋa kokina karan di. »
40019010	Kar maajirnay kaawiiji aman : « Ya ampa-ak, guna mitik yaa goye bal daatko. »
40019011	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Gee okin̰co gediraaɗo icin kaaw-anta, illa ŋuur kuuk Buŋ berco ja.
40019012	Ka seener, gee daarin̰, min ŋu weeyiig di, botol ta obindi, Buŋ toɗcota. Daarin̰ gay, ŋu ticgu. Kar daarin̰ gay, maaniico kat ic niyine a ŋu obaaɗo daaɗ ɗo bi ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi. Ŋaar kaak nec icin̰ ɓilde ŋaar-aŋka, ŋa icga ! »
40019013	Min ŋaar-ak, gee iyiiji koogin ɗo Iisa a ŋaaco lee pise ho ŋaaco inde barkin min ɗo Buŋdi. Kar maajirnay gay leesiico ɗo gee-aku.
40019014	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Rasoŋ koogin-aŋ yaadu ase. Dakon̰co toɗenno, asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi, taar ɗo gee kuuk ar koogin-aŋku. »
40019015	Hiyya, ŋa leeyiico pisin̰ji, kar ŋa ɗeettu min ɗo wer-aka.
40019016	Min ŋaar-ak, gem rakki ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa ho ŋa indiig aman : « Gem kol tacco, naa gine maa kaak sellen̰ naa gase goye ka gaasɗo ? »
40019017	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Maa di ki indiin ɗo bi ka maan kaak sellen̰ ? Illa maan rakki di kaak sellen̰. Ya ki raka goye ka gaasɗo, karmiyiig gaanuun ka Buŋdi. »
40019018	Gem-ak indiig aman : « Gaanuun ka moo ? » Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Dakoŋ deenno gee, kuŋ miday, dakoŋ kokinenno daaɗ kara ho kuŋ daaɗ oki, dakoŋ kokinenno miday kara, okiŋko, dakoŋ kokinenno gamna ho dakoŋ diyenno kaaw ɗo gemor maalan di.
40019019	Beroŋ horoomine ɗo aginiyko ho elguwoŋ eeŋko ar ziŋka ku maaniiko. »
40019020	Ɗubil-ak kaawiiji aman : « Gaanuun-aŋ okin̰ji nu karmiyga. Di kar naa gine maman pey ? »
40019021	Iisa kaawiiji aman : « Ya ki raka gine zin̰ cawar, ɓaa gidiyig gamnan̰ okin̰co kuuk ki gintu ho berig gurusji ɗo pokirnar, kar kii gase malle kuwa ka samaaner. Min ki gin ko ampa-ak, asu ho aaɗnu. »
40019022	Min ɗubil-ak doriit kaaw-at, ŋa ƴiimiit wijeeney asaan ŋa gay gamnar.
40019023	Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, un̰je ka ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, ŋaar raɗa ɗo gay gamnar !
40019024	Nu ɗiyaako pey a lokumo gediraaɗo taa bire min ɗo bee ka ripirrer. Kar ɗo gay gamnar gay, un̰je ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaaji gine pey raɗ paka. »
40019025	Min maajirnay doriig kaaw-at, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Di ampa-aŋ gay, waa yaa gase jile ? »
40019026	Kar Iisa gay taliig ƴalaaŋ ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Maan kaak patiya kaƴco ku geemir, ɗo Buŋdi gay, ŋa melen̰ di. »
40019027	Hiyya, Piyer ictu kaawo, ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Cokay, ni rasig gamin okin̰co, ni aaɗin̰ciŋ. Nin gay yaa gase maa ? »
40019028	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya kiɗ newis marbinto, nun Roŋ gemor yaa goye ka seesdu ka darjiner. Kar kuŋ kuuk orok iŋ seer aaɗintu gay, kuu goye ɗo seesna ku sultan, kuu ɗukume seriine ɗo tamba ta orok iŋ seer ta gee ku Israyeel.
40019029	Ya gem kaak rasig geriy, siŋtay, aginiyji, kooginay wala morginay ɗo saan tanto, ŋaa gase dakin pak miya. Ho ŋaa gase pey goye ka gaasɗo.
40019030	Gee dakina kuuk ogir diŋka yaa ɗake aaro ho dakina kuuk aaro yaa ogire. »
40020001	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Cokiyoŋ, naako gaare Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar maa. Gin mee jineendi rakki kaak amil bariye gay riyor iŋ kawtir wer dugus-dugus a ŋu ɓaa gine riy ɗo jineenji.
40020002	Ŋa gastu gee, ŋu deetu kaawco a ŋaaco kappiye ar kaak ŋu kappiygiy eel ta riyor, kar ŋa n̰aamiig ɗo jineenji.
40020003	Ŋa amiltu pey iŋ pat parrika ta kawtira ho ŋa gastu gay riyor ku pey ɗo wer ka berel ka helliner. Ŋu goy maalan di.
40020004	Ŋa kaawiico aman : ‟ Kuŋko oki, ɓaaŋ ginoŋ riy ɗo jineendu ho naako kappiye maan kaak yaako kuuniye. ”
40020005	Hiyya, ŋu ɓaawtu. Kar mee jineendi-ak amiltu pey iŋ ƴiriyo ho ŋa n̰aamiig pey ɗo jineenji ŋuur kuuk goy maala-aku. Iŋ pat subba oki, ŋa gintu pa.
40020006	Ba aaro, ŋa amiltu pey iŋ pat beeƴ ta maako. Ŋa gastu pey gee goy maalan di ɗo wer ka berel-aka. Ŋa indiig aman : ‟ Maa di ku eeliy ɗo wer-aŋ di bal riyo ? ”
40020007	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : ‟ Di gem dakinti kollo ɗo riyor-ak gay ! ” Ŋa ɗiyiico aman : ‟ Di ŋaar-ak, kuŋko oki ɓaaŋ ginoŋ riy ɗo jineendu. ”
40020008	« Min pat gale, mee jineendi kaawiiji ɗo gay kappiye gurusdi aman : ‟ Kolig gay riyor ho ay gem di, kappiyiy ar kaak ŋu kappiygiy eel ta riyor. Tees ja iŋ ŋuur kuuk as ba aaro, kar kii gaase iŋ kuuk as awalle. ”
40020009	Hiyya, ŋuur kuuk tees riy iŋ pat beeƴ ta maako-ak astu, ho ay gem di, ŋa kappiyiiji ar eel ta riyor.
40020010	Ŋa kappiyiit ɗo ay gemo nam ŋa ottu ɗo ŋuur kuuk as awalle. Ŋuur gay pakira a wal ŋaaco kappiye dakin paka. Kar ŋuur oki, ŋa kappiyco ar ta een̰co di.
40020011	Min ŋa kappiyiico, aditco nigtu iŋ mee jineendi
40020012	ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : ‟ Ŋuur-aŋ kat as ba aaro ho ŋu gin riy pat rakki di. Nin-aŋ taaɓiy iŋ riyo, ni icit pat ɗo kaƴni nam ni eeltu. Kar kat ki kappiyinti sawa di ! ”
40020013	Kar mee jineendi-ak telkiiji ɗo minninco rakki aman : ‟ Gem kol royay, nun tiyaacinno. Gi kaaw ja a naan̰ kappiye tamma rakki ɗo eelon̰ wal maman ?
40020014	Icig gurusjiŋ ho ɗeettu ! Ya nu raka kappiye ɗo ŋaar kaak as ba aaro ar kaak nu kappiyiijiŋ lociŋ, taar-an isgicinno.
40020015	Nu gin botol taat naa gine maan kaak nu rakiy iŋ gurusdu wal nu ginno ? Wala ki giniit hasuudinaw-aŋ asaan nu sellen̰ ? ” »
40020016	Kar Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Paa ko, gee kuuk aaro yaa ogire ho kuuk ogire yaa ɗake aaro. »
40020017	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa coontu Zeruzaleem. Wiktin taat ŋu ɓaayiyo, ŋa koliig maajirnay kuuk orok iŋ seer keeco di ho ŋa kaawiico aman :
40020018	« Cokiyoŋ, diŋ gi ɓaa Zeruzaleem. Anner ko, nun Roŋ gemor, ŋuun berin ɗo pise ku agindaw ku gay satkiner ho iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi, ŋuu dee kaawco a ŋuun deendu.
40020019	Kar ŋuun berin pey ɗo gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo, ŋuudu samtiye, ŋuun koocin iŋ korɗiŋgo ho ŋuun ɗooɗin ka etor. Kar ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. »
40020020	Min ŋaar-ak, daaciy ta Zebede sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa iŋ kooginti kuuk seer-aku. Kar ta dersitu ɗo uŋji asaan ta raka indin̰ maanna.
40020021	Iisa gay indiit aman : « Ka raka maa ? » Taar gay aman : « Baan̰or ja, wiktin taat ki asiy teen Meennuwin̰, nu raka a kooginar kuuk seer-aŋ, rakki yaa goye ɗo meedan̰ ho rakki gay ɗo n̰ugilan̰. »
40020022	Iisa telkiico aman : « Kuŋ bal ibine baay ta maan kaak ku indiy-aka. Kuu gedire seen kordindi ta taaɓiner taat naa see-anta walla ? » Ŋuur gay aman : « Hii, nii gedire. »
40020023	Iisa telkiico aman : « Ka seener, kuu ase see min ɗo kordindir ta taaɓiner-ata. Kar ɗo goye kaak ɗo meedar wala ɗo n̰ugilal gay, nun ginno botol ta naa berin̰ji. Werin ŋuur-ak, Tanni kat siyiig ɗo ŋuur kuuk ŋa doɓtu. »
40020024	Min maajirna kuuk orok doriit kaawco-at, ŋu dapin̰iico ɗo siŋta kuuk seer-aku.
40020025	Hiyya, Iisa koliig okin̰co ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ku iban kadar meennay ku duniiner hokumiyaag geen̰co iŋ guwaane ho aginduwco goyaaco ɗo kaƴco.
40020026	Kar lokoŋ gay, ta ginaaɗo pa. Minninko ya gem kaak raka gine tatkaw, illa ŋaa ginen̰ ja ar gay riyko,
40020027	ho ya minninko rakki raka ogire, illa ŋaa ginen̰ ja ar ɓerriko.
40020028	Ansii ko, nun Roŋ gemor, nu bal ase a gee yaadu gine riyo. Nun as a naa gine riy ɗo geemir, naa bere zir ɗo ŋuur kuuk goy ɗo zunuubinnar a gee dakina yaa gase jile. »
40020029	Iisa iŋ maajirnay amiltu min geeger ka Zeriiko, ŋu ɓaayiy Zeruzaleem ho gee dakina aaɗiiga.
40020030	Ɗo wer-ak, gin noolin seer kuuk goy ɗo bit ka botildi. Ŋu dortu a Iisa bira min eɗe ho ŋu teestu koole raɗa aman : « Gem kol Rabbinni, Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwni ! »
40020031	Gee kuuk dakin-ak gay awn̰iico aman : « Ha’, bugumoŋ ! » Kar ŋuur gay jaalaat pey gaaƴco aman : « Gem kol Rabbinni, Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwni ! »
40020032	Iisa peytu, ŋa koliigu ho ŋa indiig aman : « Ku raka naako gine maa ? »
40020033	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbinni, pilniig odinni ! »
40020034	Iisa taliit aminduwco ho ŋa diiriig odinco. Ek di odinco piltu ho ŋu teestu aaɗin̰ji.
40021001	Wiktin taat Iisa iŋ maajirnay ɓaawtu moota iŋ Zeruzaleem, ŋu ottu ɗo koot ka Olibiyennar, moota iŋ hellin rakki taat ŋu koliy Betpaze. Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa tabirtu maajirnay seera
40021002	ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ ɗo hellin ta goy uŋda antare. Ya ku ote, kuu gase ɗurkila ɗuune iŋ roŋti. Ipironta ho iyonduuta iŋ roŋti.
40021003	Ya waan indaako a maa di ku ipiriit ɗurkil-anta, telkon̰ji aman : ‟ Ŋa Rabbin kat rakaata. ” Ek di ŋaako rasiŋko kuudu iyinti. »
40021004	Ta kuuniytu ampa-aŋ a kaaw taat nabiin̰ce kaawtu awalle astu ɗo werti aman :
40021005	« Kaawon̰co ɗo gee kuuk ɗo geeger ka Siyon aman : Taloŋ, sultinko asaako, Ŋa dalulle ho ŋa n̰ep ɗurkila, ka seener, ŋa n̰ep roŋ ka ɗurkilal. »
40021006	Maajirna-ak ɓaawtu ho ŋu gintu ar kaak Iisa kaawiico.
40021007	Ŋu iyiijit ɗurkila iŋ roŋti, ŋu siddiyiig iŋ kesuunco ho Iisa n̰eptu kuwa.
40021008	Gee dakina ɗeeriit kesuunco ɗo botildi. Daarin̰ gay, ƴiimtu tapar ku atiydi ho ŋu leeyiig ɗo botildi.
40021009	Gee kuuk jaawa ɗo uŋji ho kuuk aaɗaaga kooliy aman : « Hozanna, Roŋ ka Dawuud ! Barkin ɗo ŋaar kaak asa iŋ siŋ ku Rabbine ! Hozanna, ozilinteŋ Buŋte kaak goy kuwa ka samaaner ! »
40021010	Wiktin taat Iisa un̰jiy Zeruzaleem, gee ku geegirdi okin̰co gina yik-yik. Ŋu indiy ziŋkico aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ gay maa gemira ? »
40021011	Gee kuuk dakin-ak telkitu aman : « Ŋa Iisa, nabiin̰ce kaak min geeger ka Nazareet, kiɗ ka Galile. »
40021012	Min pa-ak, Iisa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa teestu atkin̰ okin̰co kuuk suugiya atta-aku. Ŋa akiliicog taabulnico ku gee kuuk maka gurus ho iŋ seesna ku gee kuuk suugiya ammaamna.
40021013	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Gerir, ŋaar ger ka salaaner. ” Kar kuŋ gay ginig ger ka kokiniydi. »
40021014	Wiktin taat Iisa goy misa ɗo ger ka Buŋdi-ak, noolna iŋ mersina asiiji ho ŋa cooliigu.
40021015	Agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ ku gaanuundi dapin̰tu min ŋu taliig gamin kuuk ajbay Iisa giniyo, iŋ koogin kuuk koola ɗo ger ka Buŋdi aman : « Hozanna, barkin ɗo Roŋ ka Dawuud ! »
40021016	Ampaa ko, ŋu kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Ki cokiyiit kaawco-ata ? » Iisa telkiico aman : « Hii, nu cokiyta. Ho ɗo Kitamner ŋu kaaw aman : ‟ Buŋni, ki giniy nam koogin ku n̰aaɗa oki, oziliika yaa amile min ɗo biŋkico. Ho ŋuur kuuk siya misa buw sa yaan̰ ozile. ” Kaaw-an, ku bal garkiyin ƴiriy rakki walla ? »
40021017	Min pa-ak, Iisa uctu ho ŋa rasiigu. Ŋa ɗeettu min ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem ho ŋa daktu wal Betani.
40021018	Min wer waltu, Iisa yeeptu ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem ho mey gay diyaaga.
40021019	Ŋa taltu et kaak ŋu kolaag pigiye ɗo bit ka botildi ho ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo baay. Ŋa kociltu, kar ŋa bal gase yoo roŋo, illa tapar di. Ŋa kaawiiji ɗo et-ak aman : « Kiŋke-aŋ wiyaaɗo pey yoo roŋo ! » Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, ta bite-aŋ di et-ak aaƴtu yarap.
40021020	Min maajirnay taliig et aaƴe-ak, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak. Kar ŋu indiig Iisa aman : « Maman et-aŋ aaƴtu koɗok ampa ? »
40021021	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya ku gin imaan ho aditko seerro-ak, kuu gedire ginin̰ maan kaak nu gintu ɗo et-aŋka ho kaak pak ŋaar-aŋka oki. Kuu gedire kaawe ɗo damba-an aman : ‟ Ucu, ɓaa gal ɗo barrer ! ” Ek di Buŋ yaa jaŋkinti.
40021022	Ay maan kaak ku indiy iŋ imaan min ɗo Buŋdi, ŋaako berin̰ji. »
40021023	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa teestu garkiye gee. Kar agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar ɓaawiiji ho ŋu indiig aman : « Waa berjiŋ botol taat ki giniig gamin-aŋku ? Izinne-an, ki gasit min momo ? »
40021024	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Nun oki yaako indiŋko maanna iŋ kaaw rakki di. Ya ku telkidu, naako gaarin̰ waan kaak beraadu botol taat nu giniig gamin-aŋku.
40021025	Waa n̰aamig Yaaya-Batist a ŋaa batiziye gee ? Ŋa Buŋ wala ŋu geen di ? » Kar agindaw-ak teestu meele benannico aman : « Kar giiji telkeŋ kat a maa ? Ya gi telkiji a ŋa Buŋ kat n̰aamga, ŋaate indinte pey aman : ‟ Maa di ku poociit kaawoy ? ”
40021026	Kar ya gi telkiji aman : ‟ Ŋu geeŋ kat n̰aamga, ” ŋaar-ak, paa gee kuuk dakin-aŋ yaate uce, asaan okin̰co pakira a Yaaya, ŋaar nabiin̰ce. »
40021027	Hiyya, ŋu telkiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Ni ibanno waan kaak n̰aamga. » Kar Iisa gay kaawiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, nun oki gaaraakonno waan kaak berdu botol taat nu giniig gamin-aŋku. »
40021028	Min pa-ak, Iisa kaawiico aman : « Pakiroŋ ɗo daŋil taat naako dele-anta : Gin gem rakki, kooginay seera. Ŋa kaawiiji ɗo roŋji kaak aawo aman : ‟ Ƴiriyta-aŋ, ki ɓaa gine riy ɗo jineendi. ”
40021029	Kar roŋji-ak gay telkiiji aman : ‟ Ha’a, nu ɓaaɗo. ” Kar ba aar gay, ŋa moyiit kaawoy-ata ho ŋa ɓaawtu.
40021030	Kar tacco kaawiiji pey ɗo aaroy a ŋa ɓaa gine riy ɗo jineendi. Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : ‟ Hii baaba, naa ɓaawe ! ” Kar ŋa ɗaktu. »
40021031	Kar Iisa indiig agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar-ak aman : « Kaawondu ja, min koogin kuuk seer-aŋ, ka moo ginit riy taat tacco gaariico-ata ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋaar kaak aawo-aka. » Hiyya, Iisa kaawiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, gay obe miirir iŋ azbinna yaako ogire ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
40021032	Ka seener gay, Yaaya-Batist asko gaar botol taat samaane ho kuŋ gay bal icin kaawoy. Kar azbinna iŋ gay obe miirir gay icta. Ku taliig iŋ odinko maan kaak ŋa gintu, kar iŋ taar-an oki, ku bal nedimin pikirriko ho ku bal icin kaawoy. »
40021033	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Cokiyoŋ, naako dele daŋil ta pey. Gin mee jineendi rakki. Ŋa taattu atay kuuk ŋu koliy bin̰ ɗo jineen-aka ho ŋa ŋaamiig iŋ kelel. Ŋa siytu dukitka taat ŋuu miƴin̰ roŋ ku atiydi-aku. Kar ŋa pintu ger bolok a ŋuu coke kuwa ŋuu gooƴin̰ji. Hiyya, ŋa rasig jineen-ak ɗo gee daarin̰ a ŋuu gooƴin̰ji ho ŋa ɗeettu marti.
40021034	Ɗo wiktin taat roŋ-ak nee, ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyoy ɗo gee kuuk gooƴaag jineen-ak a ŋuuji berin haginey.
40021035	Kar gay gooƴindi-ak obiig gay riyor-aku. Ka rakki ŋu koociiga, ka seeriŋkar ŋu deeyiiga, kar ka subbiŋkar gay ŋu dawig iŋ dambay, nam ŋaar oki mattu.
40021036	Kar mee jineendi-ak n̰aamtu gay riyor ku pey, dakin pak kuuk awalle. Kar ŋuur oki, gay gooƴindi-ak giniig ar kaak ŋu giniig een̰co ku awalle.
40021037	Ba aaro, mee jineendi n̰aamiicog roŋji. Ŋa kaawiy ɗo adiy aman : ‟ Roŋdu-aŋ, ŋuu karmiyin̰ji. ”
40021038	Kar min gay gooƴindi-ak taliig roŋji ɓaaco-ak, ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : ‟ Taloŋ, aŋkar ko kaak ya tacco mate, jineen yaaji ɗake. Asoŋ, daanteŋga, kar jineen yaate ɗake lote ! ”
40021039	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, ŋu obiiga, ŋu imiliig kara min ɗo jineendi ho ŋu deeyiiga. »
40021040	Min pa-ak, Iisa indiig gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak aman : « Ya mee jineendi kat as gay, ŋaa ginin̰co maman ? »
40021041	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋuur gee kuuk gelbinco samaanno-aku, ŋaa taaɓiyin̰ ko taaɓiye nam ŋaa deen̰co. Kar ŋaa berin̰ jineen-ak ɗo gee ku pey kuuk yaaji berin haginey ya wiktin ta okiɗin̰ji nece. »
40021042	Iisa gay kaawiico aman : « Ɗo Kitamner, ŋu kaaw aman : ‟ Ŋa dambi kaak gay pinindi accitu, Ŋaar ko gin dambi kaak taɓ ka gerdi. Aŋ ko maan kaak Rabbin Buŋ gintu, Ho ŋa ajbiyinte tak-tak. ” Kaaw-an, ku bal garkiyin ƴiriy rakki walla ? »
40021043	Iisa kaawiico pey aman : « Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Buŋ yaa imilin Meennuwiy minninko ho ŋaa berin ɗo gee ku pey kuuk yaa gine maan kaak Buŋ rakiyo.
40021044	[Ay waan kat galji ɗo dambi-aŋka, ŋaa ƴiime karap-karap, ho ya dambi-aŋ kat galji ɗo gemor gay, ŋaa rigin̰in̰ji dagiygay.] »
40021045	Min agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ Pariziyenna doriig dele ka daŋlay-at, ŋu ibintu kadar ŋa ceera loco.
40021046	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋu bariyiy botol taat ŋuu obin̰ji, kar gay, ŋu gina kolaw ɗo odin ku geemir, asaan okin̰co ŋu talaag Iisa ar nabiin̰ce.
40022001	Iisa kaawiico pey ɗo geemir iŋ dele ka daŋlal aman :
40022002	« Cokiyoŋ, naako gaare Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar maa. Taar ar sultan kaak gin tee ɗo iidin ta obe ka roŋji.
40022003	Ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyoy a ŋuu ɓaa kole gee kuuk siŋco goya ɗo teendi. Kar ŋuur gay pooce.
40022004	Min ŋu pooce, ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyor ku pey a ŋuuco kaawe ɗo gee-aŋ aman : ‟ Jaman̰ce, teendu ŋaar nee ko, nu dapsiyig barkiydu ho mallel kaak neere-neere. Gamin okin̰co odinco nece. Asoŋ kate ɗo tee ka obindi. ”
40022005	Kar ŋuur kuuk ŋu koliy-ak bal icin kaaw-at ɗo aditco. Daarin̰ ɗeet ɗo riyniico, daarin̰ ɗeet ɗo morginco ho daarin̰ gay ɗeet ɗo suuginniico.
40022006	Kar daarin̰ gay obiig gay riyor-aku, ŋu koociig ko kooce nam ŋu deeyiigu.
40022007	Hiyya, sultan adiy nigtu. Ŋa n̰aamtu askirnay ŋu deeyiig gay dee geemir-aku, ho geegirco sa, ŋu erga.
40022008	Min pa-ak, ŋa kaawiico ɗo gay riyor aman : ‟ Tee ka iidin ta obindi ŋaar nee ko. Kar gee kuuk siŋco goy-ak gay bal ture teen̰ji.
40022009	Diŋ amiloŋ ɗo ŋaamiig ta botilniidi ho ay gem kaak kuu ŋaame-ak, kaawon̰ji a ŋaa ase tee. ”
40022010	Hiyya, gay riyor amiltu. Ŋu n̰umiig gee okin̰co kuuk ŋu gastu, ŋuur kuuk samaane iŋ kuuk samaanno oki. Paa ko, ger kaak ŋuu iidiye-ak miintu iŋ gee.
40022011	Min sultan un̰jitu ɗo wer kaak marti goyiy-ak, ŋa taltu gem rakki kaak bal ise kesuun ta iidiner.
40022012	Kar ŋa indiig aman : ‟ Gem kol royay, ki un̰jitu anne bal kesuun ta iidiner-an gay maman ? ” Gem-ak gay bal pile biy.
40022013	Hiyya, sultan-ak kaawiico ɗo gay riyor aman : ‟ Gem-aŋ, ɗuunon̰jiig asin̰ji iŋ pisin̰ji ho accoŋ kara ɗo gondikor. Ɗo wer ka taaɓiner-ak, ŋaa ale ho ŋaa eeyme saaŋji. ”
40022014	Ampaa di oki, gee dakina, ŋu koliigu, kar kuuk Buŋ doɓtu gay, ŋuur sooɗ di. »
40022015	Min ŋaar-ak, Pariziyenna ɓaawtu dee kaawco. Ŋuu bariye botol taat ŋuu obin̰ji Iisa iŋ kaawo.
40022016	Min kaawco mate, ŋu n̰aamtu maajirinco daarin̰ iŋ daarin̰ min ŋuur kuuk aaɗaag Herood. Gee-ak kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, ni iban kadar ki kaawa seene. Ki garkiya gee iŋ botol ta Buŋdi taat taɓ. Kiŋ isgicinno iŋ gee kuuk kaƴco jaale ho ki ginno kolaw ɗo geemir.
40022017	Hadi kaawnin̰ ja, gaanuunte kaaw a gii kappiye miiri ɗo Sezaar, sultan ka tatik ka Room, wala gi kappiyaaɗo ? »
40022018	Kar Iisa gay ibinit pikirrico taat samaanno. Paa ko, ŋa telkiico aman : « Taloŋ gee kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkico di aŋku ! Maa di ku ɗibiidu ?
40022019	Gaarondu ja tamma ka kappiye miirir-aka ? » Hiyya, ŋu gaariijig tamma-aka.
40022020	Kar Iisa indiigu aman : « Kaa iŋ siŋ kuuk siir kuwa-aŋ gay ku waa ? »
40022021	Ŋu telkiiji aman : « Ku Sezaar. » Kar Iisa kaawiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, gamin ku Sezaar, beron̰jiig ɗo Sezaar, ho ku Buŋdi sa, beron̰jiig ɗo Buŋdi. »
40022022	Min ŋu doriit kaawoy-at, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak. Kar ŋu rasiiga ho ŋu ɗeettu.
40022023	Ƴiriy taar-at di, gee daarin̰ kuuk ŋu koliy Sadusiyenna ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa. Gee ŋuur-ak kaawa a gee ku mate, ŋuur nooyɗo. Ŋu astu indin̰ Iisa aman :
40022024	« Gem kol tacco, Muusa siir ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Ya gem ob daatko ho ŋa mat bal mico, siŋji yaa obin murgil-ata. Paa kat, taaji wee koogin ɗo siŋji kaak mate. ”
40022025	Cokay, gin siŋta peesira ɗo ɗatikni. Ka aawo obtu daatko, kar ŋa mattu bal mico. Ampaa ko, ŋa rasiit murgil-at ɗo siŋji kaak aaroy. Siŋji-ak obiita.
40022026	Min ŋa obta, ŋaar sa mattu. Ka subbiŋkar obiita. Ŋaar oki mattu. Okin̰co, siŋta kuuk peesir-ak obiita ho ŋu siibiytu bal koogina.
40022027	Min ŋu siibiye, ba aar taar sa menuwti gaastu.
40022028	Ɗo taar-an, kaawnin̰ ja, ɗo ƴiriy ta nooyindi, min kuuk peesir-aŋ, ka moo taa gine daaciy ? Asaan okin̰co-aŋ midiyti ! »
40022029	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Kuŋko-aŋ rawte, asaan ku ibanno kaaw ta Buŋdi wala gudurrey.
40022030	Ka seener, ɗo ƴiriy ta nooyindi, ginno pey obe. Gee yaa goye ar ɗubal ku Buŋdi kuuk goy ka samaaner.
40022031	Ɗo bi ka nooyindi, ku bal garkiyin kaaw taat Buŋ kaawiiko-anta wal maman ? Ŋa kaaw aman :
40022032	‟ Nun Buŋ ka Ibraayim, Buŋ ka Isaaka ho Buŋ ka Yakuub. ” » Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ŋa Buŋɗo ka gee kuuk mate, kar gay, ŋa Buŋ ka gee kuuk goy mento. »
40022033	Gee okin̰co kuuk dorit garaaney-at ajbiytu tak-tak.
40022034	Min ŋu dortu kadar Iisa gedirco ɗo Sadusiyennar nam ŋu gedarro pey pile biŋkico-ak, Pariziyenna n̰umtu a ŋuuji ɓaawe.
40022035	Min ŋu ote, rakki min agindaw ku gaanuundi ictu kaawo a ŋaaji ɗibe iŋ kaawo. Ŋa indiig aman :
40022036	« Gem kol tacco, min gaanuun ka Muusa okin̰ji-aŋ, ka moo paka ? »
40022037	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Kii elin̰ Rabbin Buŋjiŋ iŋ gelbin rakki, iŋ kelmon̰ okintiti ho iŋ pikirren̰ okintiti.
40022038	Ŋaar-aŋ ko gaanuun kaak awalle kaak pakgig okin̰co.
40022039	Goy pey ka seeriŋkar kaak ar ŋaar-aŋka. Ŋa ɗiya aman : ‟ Kii elin̰ gijiŋ ar zin̰ ka meen̰jiŋ. ”
40022040	Gaanuun ka Muusa okin̰ji iŋ kaawin kuuk nabiinna kaawtu, okin̰co n̰um ɗo kuuk seer-aŋ di. »
40022041	Min Pariziyenna goy misa ɗo wer ka n̰umin̰co-ak, Iisa indiig aman :
40022042	« Ku pakira maa ɗo bi ka Masi ? Ŋaa gine roŋ ka waa ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ŋaa gine roŋ ka Dawuud. »
40022043	Iisa indiig aman : « Ya ta as ampa-aŋ gay, maa di Ruwwin ta Buŋdi n̰aamig Dawuud, ŋa koliig a ‟ Rabbine ” ? Ka seener, Dawuud kaaw awalle aman :
40022044	‟ Rabbin Buŋ kaawji ɗo Rabbiner aman : As goy ɗo meedar nam wiktin taat naaco gedire ɗo adinen̰, ŋuu gine wer ka lee asin̰jiŋ. ”
40022045	Kar ya Dawuud kat kolaag Masi a ‟ Rabbiner ”, di maman ŋaa gine roŋji ? »
40022046	Ɗo wer-ak, waanco rakki sa balji gedire telke yoo maanna. Min ƴiriy taar-at, ŋu cimtu kaƴco cat, yoo waan sa indigigɗo pey.
40023001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay iŋ gee kuuk dakin-ak aman :
40023002	« Agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ Pariziyenna, Buŋ berco riy a ŋuu gaare baay ta gaanuun ka Muusa ɗo geemir.
40023003	Ampa-ak, karmiyon kaawco ho ginoŋ ay maan kaak ŋu kaawiiko. Kar gay, dakoŋ icenno botilco, asaan goyin̰co turro iŋ taat ŋu gaariy ɗo geemir.
40023004	Ŋu ɗuun gor oom aale ho ŋu diyiit ɗo geemir. Kar ŋuur maaniico gay, ŋu gaayɗo gee tak-tak iŋ icile ka gor-ata.
40023005	Riyco okintit taat ŋu giniy-at, ŋu rakiy a gee yaa talin̰co di. Gamin kuuk ŋu ɗuuniy a ŋu rawtaagɗo Buŋ, ŋu ginaag aginda. Ho batik sa, ŋu isa kuuk gin gamin ciilay-ciilay.
40023006	Ya ŋu kolig ɗo teendi, ŋu doɓa werin kuuk taɓ ho ɗo geray ku salaaner, ŋu el goye uŋda.
40023007	Ŋu el a gee yaaco ooye iŋ karaamine ɗo werin kuuk gee n̰umiyo ho ŋu el pey a gee yaa kolguwin̰ a ‟ Rabbine ”.
40023008	Kar kuŋ gay, ya ŋu kolaako a ‟ Gem kol Rabbiney ”, dakoŋ ooyenno, asaan kuŋ okiŋko siŋta di, ho Rabbinko sa, ŋaar rakki di.
40023009	Ɗo kiɗar, dakoŋ kolenno gemo a ‟ Takko ”, asaan Takko ŋaar rakki di ho ŋa goy kuwa ka samaaner.
40023010	Ya ŋu kolaako a ‟ Gem kol tatkaw ” oki, dakoŋ ooyenno. Asaan Tatkuwko, ŋaar oki rakki di : ŋaar ko Masi.
40023011	Kaak tatik minninko yaa gine gay riyko.
40023012	Kaak jaala kaay ɗatik geemir, Buŋ yaa onin̰ji, ho kaak ona kaay gay, Buŋ yaa jaalin̰ji.
40023013	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ku toɗaat botol ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi ɗo geemir. Ka seener, kuŋ maaniiko un̰jaaɗo ho ku rasaaɗo ŋuur kuuk raka un̰je.
40023014	[« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ku sokaacog gamin ku murgilgildi ho pey ɗo salaankon sa, ku osa kaawin dakina a paa kat gee yaako oziliŋko. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, seriin taŋko yaa gine raɗ paka.]
40023015	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ku aaliig barrinay ho ku jaawiig adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji a kuu gase gem rakki kaak yaa ice abaadinko. Kar ŋaar kaak ic kaawko gay, ku giniig a gem-aŋ tur ka aki pakgiko.
40023016	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ noolna gay ɗaan̰e noolnal-aŋku ! Ku ɗiya aman : ‟ Ya gem looga iŋ ger ka Buŋdi, taar-at tiyaaɗo. Kar ya gem looga iŋ daabne ka ger ka Buŋdi gay, taar-at yaa tee. ”
40023017	Hey, taloŋ kat oliyay ho noolna-aŋku ! Kaawondu ja, maa kaak tatik paka : daabne kaak ɗo ger ka Buŋdi wala ger ka Buŋdi kaak ginaag daabne cawar ? Ŋa ger ka Buŋdi kat paka wal maman ?
40023018	Ku kaawiy pey aman : ‟ Ya gem looga iŋ wer kaak ŋu giniy satkin ɗo Buŋdi, taar-at tiyaaɗo. Kar ya ŋa looga iŋ maan kaak ŋu bertu satkin-ak gay, taar-at kat yaa tee. ”
40023019	Hey, taloŋ kat noolna-aŋku ! Kaawondu ja, maa kaak tatik paka : ta satkin taat ŋu giniy kat paka wala ŋa wer kaak ŋu giniy satkine kaak ginaat satkin cawar kat paka. Ŋa wer kaak ŋu giniy satkin kat paka wala maman ?
40023020	Ya gem looga iŋ wer ka satkiner-aka, ŋa looga iŋ ŋaara ho iŋ gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu leetu kuwa.
40023021	Ya gem looga iŋ ger ka Buŋdi-ak, ŋa looga iŋ ŋaara ho iŋ Buŋ kaak goy atta.
40023022	Ya gem looga iŋ samaane, ŋa looga iŋ sees ka Buŋdi ho iŋ meen̰ji kaak goyji kuwa.
40023023	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi ho iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ku bera zakaane ɗo Buŋdi min tapar kuuk ɗo jineendi, ŋuur kuuk ɗiyaw ho kuuk aawa gala. Ku karmiygig gaanuun iŋ gamin ar ŋuur-aŋku, kar kaawin kuuk taɓ pak gay, ku rasgu : ɗukume ka seriiner kaak ɗo botiliy, selliŋkaw taat ɗo geemir ho iŋ imaan ta ɗo Buŋdi. Zer ŋuur-aŋ ko kuuk kuu gine paka, ho ŋuur kuuk ɗak gay, dakoŋ aan̰in̰coɗo.
40023024	Kuŋ noolna gay ɗaan̰e noolnal-aŋku ! Ku iban cille pitpiɗin̰ min ɗo amiydi, kar sando ku siɗa lokkam !
40023025	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi ho iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ɗawkinko iŋ parkikko, ku acaag arirco samaane. Kar aditco gay, ku tooygigɗo. Ampa-ak, aditko miin iŋ gamin ku kokinaw ho iŋ gamin kuuk gelbinko rakiyo.
40023026	Hey, Pariziyen̰ce kaak nool-aŋka ! Tooyit ja adti ka ɗawkar samaane, paa kat aarti oki yaa gine waƴar.
40023027	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi ho iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ku ar maggan kuuk ŋu ooyco maan portiko min kara. Ya ki talaag min kara-ak, ŋu samaane. Kar atta gay miin iŋ kaas ku gee kuuk mate ho iŋ ay gamin kuuk zooɗe.
40023028	Kuŋko oki, ɗo uŋco ka geemir, ku gaara ziŋkiko a ku goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Kar ta aditkoŋ gay keetiti ho ta miin iŋ gamin ku jookumo.
40023029	« Ɗo gaaƴiƴko, kuŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi ho iŋ kuŋ Pariziyenna. Kuŋ kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ! Ku siy maggan aginda ɗo nabiinna ku awalle, ho pey, ɗo ŋuur kuuk goy sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi gay, ku siiriig magginco samaane.
40023030	Kar ku kaaw aman : ‟ Ya nin kat goy ɗo wiktin taat aginiyni deeyiig nabiinna, ni gediraaɗo dee kaawni iŋ ŋuura nam nii min̰e baarco. ”
40023031	Ansi-ak, kuŋ maaniikoŋ di imil baƴko a ku kooginco kuuk gee kuuk deeyiig nabiinna !
40023032	Di ŋaar-ak, riy taat aginiyko teestu-at, gaasonta !
40023033	Kuŋ kuuk ar aalin-aŋku ! Kuŋ koogin ku koosinar ! Kuu gine maman, kuu pake min ak ta ba oole ?
40023034	Ɗo bi ŋaar-aŋ, cokiyoŋ, naako n̰aame nabiinna, gee kuuk iban kaawna ho agindaw ku gaanuundi kuuk taɓ. Kuu aaɗin̰ gee-ak geeger iŋ geeger kuu obin̰co. Ya ku obgu, daarin̰, kuu deen̰co, daarin̰, kuu ɗooɗin̰ ka atiydi, ho daarin̰ gay, kuu koocin̰co ɗo geriyko ku salaaner.
40023035	Ampa-ak, ɗo gaaƴiƴko, gee okin̰co kuuk aginiyko min̰tu baarco awalle-aŋku, min Abeel kaak sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi yoo Zakariya roŋ ka Baraaki. Zakariya-ak, ku deeyiig ɗatik taat iŋ ger ka Buŋdi ho iŋ wer kaak ŋu giniy satkine.
40023036	Ka seener nu kaawaako, muut ta gee okin̰co-aŋ yaaco gagire ɗo gee ku diŋka ! »
40023037	« Tuɓina, tuɓina, gee ku Zeruzaleem, kuŋko kuuk daggig nabiinna, ho ŋuur kuuk Buŋ n̰aamiiko oki, ku zeergig iŋ dambay nam ŋu matiyo. Dees minaw, nu ictu niyin a naako n̰umiŋko, kuŋ gee ku Zeruzaleem, ar kokir taat gootig roŋti iŋ gezgirti. Kar kuŋ gay pooce !
40023038	Di ŋaar-ak, goyiro iŋ gerko.
40023039	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ku talaanno pey tak-tak nam ƴiriy taat kuu asiy kaawe aman : ‟ Rabbin Buŋ yaa barkiyin̰ ŋaar kaak as iŋ siŋ kun̰ji ! ” »
40024001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa amiltu min ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Wiktin taat ŋa ɗeetiyo, maajirnay ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, tal ja samaanaw ta ger ka Buŋdi-aŋka. »
40024002	Kar Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Hii, ku talaag ger-aŋka ? Ka seener nu kaawaako, wiktin yaa ase taat ŋaa ɗime, yoo dambi rakki kaak ŋu diytu ɗo giji sa goyaaɗo. »
40024003	Min pa-ak, Iisa coktu ka koot ka Olibiyennar ho ŋa goytu. Maajirnay ɓaawiiji keeco ho ŋu indiig aman : « Gem kol tacco, kaawnin̰ ja, gamin-aŋ yaa ase kimin ? Ho kaawniŋ maan kaak yaani gaare asin̰jiŋ ho iŋ gaase ka duniiner. »
40024004	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Yaman pakiroŋ, dakoŋ rasenno ziŋkiko ŋuuko jagiŋko.
40024005	Gee dakina yaa ase iŋ siŋdu ho ŋuu kaawe aman : ‟ Ŋa nun ko Masi ! ” Ŋu asa rawte gee dakina min ɗo botilco ta samaane.
40024006	Moota ho serek ku asa dore gee kaawa ɗo bi ka gartar. Yaman, dakoŋ barjilenno. Ka seener, gamin-aŋ yaa asen̰ ja, kar duniin gay gaasaaɗo misa.
40024007	Darre iŋ darre asa taasin̰e ho sultan iŋ sultan oki asa taasin̰e. Meya yaa un̰je ɗo werin daarin̰ ho kiɗ asa azire.
40024008	Ar kaak daatik aawiy atti ka weendi, gamin okin̰co-aŋ sa gaara kadar gaase ka duniiner gaaye.
40024009	Gee kuuk ibanno Buŋ yaako ƴiliŋko ɗo saan tanto. Ŋuuko taaɓiyiŋko ho ŋuuko deeŋko.
40024010	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gee dakina yaa rasin imaanco. Ŋuu isine ɗo benannico ho ŋuu ƴile oki ziŋkico.
40024011	Nabiinna dakina kuuk raada yaa bayne ho ŋuu jage gee dakina iŋ raadinco.
40024012	Zunuubinna gaaya gaayen di nam gee dakina, elin̰co yaa gine sooɗa.
40024013	Kar gem kaak obit imaanji bombo nam ɗo muutuy gay, ŋaa gase jile.
40024014	Kabarre ta Gala ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi-at, ŋu asa gaarin ɗo duniin okintiti nam gee ku ay darre yaa dorinti. Kar kat duniin yaa gaaseŋ kate. »
40024015	« Gem kaak garkiyaat kaaw-an, ŋaa ibininti ! Ku asa tale gay nigindi kaak Buŋ ƴiliyo ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Maanna-ak, nabi Daniyeel kaaw biy.
40024016	Ya ku talga, gee kuuk goy ɗo geeger ka Zuude, illa ŋuu gaɗe ɗo baƴco ku dambiniidi.
40024017	Waan kaak jammiya kara gediraaɗo un̰je atta, ŋaa soke gamnay.
40024018	Ansii di oki, kaak ɗeet ɗo morgoy sa yeepaaɗo geero, ŋaa icin batkoy.
40024019	Raɗco ɗo daaɗ kuuk iŋ aditco ho kuuk macpi ɗo menaw ŋuur-aku !
40024020	Indoŋ Buŋ, gamin-aŋ yaa asenno ɗo koyin ku elgol kuuk ku gediraaɗo gaɗe kaƴko ho ɗo ƴiriy ta eele ka geeror !
40024021	Ka seener, wiktin taat kuu talin̰ maanna-aka, taaɓin yaa gine dakina ɗo geemir pak taat gee aawtu min Buŋ kilgiyiit duniine yoo diŋka. Kar ta ɗeelaaɗo pey tak-tak.
40024022	Ya Buŋ kat bal peyin taaɓin koɗok, waan pakaaɗo. Kar gay, ŋa peyit koɗok ɗo saan ta gee kuuk ŋa doɓtu.
40024023	Ɗo mena ŋuur-ak, ya ŋu kaawaako aman : ‟ Taloŋ, Masi, ŋaar goy anne ! ”, wala aman : ‟ Ŋaar goy annere ! ”, dakoŋ cokiyin̰coɗo.
40024024	Ka seener, gay raadindi dakina yaa ase : daarin̰ yaa kaawe a ŋuur ko Masi ho daarin̰ a ŋuur nabiinna. Ŋuu gine gamin dakina kuuk ajbay iŋ kuuk gaara gudurrico a ŋuu jage gee. Ŋuu jage yoo ŋuur kuuk Buŋ doɓtu ya ŋuu gedire.
40024025	Ha’ ! Yaman nun sa miniŋkoŋ ko.
40024026	« Di ŋaar-ak, ya ŋu kaawaako aman : ‟ Cokiyoŋ, Masi goy ɗo goosiner ! ”, dakoŋ ɓaanno. Wal ya ŋu kaawaako aman : ‟ Ŋa cigile-ak anne ! ”, dakoŋ cokiyin̰coɗo.
40024027	Ka seener gay, ar buŋ kaak irn̰aw cippit min baay yoo gale ka pati, nun Roŋ gemor oki, naa ase pa.
40024028	Cokiyoŋ pey, ɗo ay wer kaak maan mattu-ak di, daamarlin paayiyo. »
40024029	« Min mena ku taaɓiner-ak bire, koɗok di pat yaa mate, kooy sa ceeraaɗo pey, kaalin yaa solle min kuwa, ho gamin kuuk gin gudurre ka samaaner asa azire.
40024030	Kar kat, maan kaak gaara asindu ka nun Roŋ gemor yaa bayne kuwa. Gee okin̰co kuuk ɗo adiy ka kiɗar yaa aaye ale. Gee-ak yaan talin nun Roŋ gemor asa ɗatik ucar iŋ gudurre ho iŋ darjin okintiti.
40024031	Perin yaa ale raɗa, kar naa n̰aame ɗubildu ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji. Ɗubal-ak yaa n̰umin̰ gee kuuk nu doɓtu min ɗo coke ka pati yoo ɗo gale ka pati. »
40024032	« Cokiyoŋ daŋil ta pigiye. Ya ku tala leeginay kat eccaw ho ŋu lee, ku iban ko kadar kabuŋ gaaye.
40024033	Ampaa di, kuŋko oki, ya ku talaag gamin-aŋ asaw, ibinoŋ kadar nun Roŋ gemor, nu gaay ko ote.
40024034	Ka seener nu kaawaako, gee ku diŋka-aŋ mataaɗo di, gamin-aŋ okin̰co yaa ase.
40024035	Samaane iŋ kiɗa yaa sawle, kar kaawnar gay rawtaaɗo tak-tak. »
40024036	« Kar ɗo ƴiriy ta moo iŋ pat ta moo naa yeepe gay, waan ibinaagɗo, wala ɗubal ku Buŋdi, wala nun Roŋo. Tatte Buŋ keeji di iban.
40024037	Ƴiriy taat nun Roŋ gemor, naa yeepe-ak, taa kuuniye ar maan kaak asco ɗo geemir wiktin ta nabi Nowe.
40024038	Ka seener, min wiktin ta amay kuuk dakina bal teen̰ misa gee, ŋu tiyaw ho ŋu siyaw. Ŋu oba daaɗi ho gemsico oki, ŋu beriico miday. Ŋu giniy paa di nam ƴiriy taat Nowe un̰jitu ɗo markab ka tatiko.
40024039	Wiktin taat ŋu giniy paa di-ak, amay paaytu ho teeyiig okin̰co. Ɗo yeepe ka nun Roŋ gemor oki, ta asa gine pa.
40024040	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, ya gee seer gawna ɗo morginco, ka rakki ŋuu icin̰ji ho ka rakki ŋuu rasin̰ji.
40024041	Ya daaɗ seer eygaw, ta rakki ŋuu icinti ho ta rakki ŋuu rasinti.
40024042	Di ŋaar-ak, goyoŋ mento, asaan ku ibanno ƴiriy ta moo Rabbinko yaa yeepe.
40024043	« Diyoŋ ɗo kaƴko samaane : ya mee gerdi kat iban wiktin taat kokin yaa ase iŋ aando, ŋaa goye mento ho ŋa rasaagɗo ŋaa ɗobe jolo.
40024044	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak, kuŋko oki, siyoŋ ziŋkiko, asaan ku ibanno wiktin taat nun Roŋ gemor, naa yeepe. »
40024045	« Ampa-aŋ gay, kuuniyoŋ ar gay riyor kaak sellen̰ ho neenduwo. Ŋaar di kaak mee gerdi yaa diyin̰ji a ŋaa tale ɗo kaay ka geriy. Kar ya wiktin nece, ŋaa bere tee ɗo gee kuuk ŋu giniy riy sawa.
40024046	Nu kaawaako, galal ɗo gay riyor kaak ɗo wiktin taat tatkuwiy yeepe, ŋaa gasin̰ ŋa ginaat riy-ata.
40024047	Ka seener nu kaawaako, gem-ak, tatkaw yaaji berin̰ gamnay okin̰co ɗo pisin̰ji.
40024048	Kar gay, ya gay riyor ka jookumo osiig adiy a tatkuwiy yeepɗo koɗok,
40024049	kar ŋa teesiy koocin̰ een̰ji ku riyor, ŋa tiyaw ho ŋa siyaw nam ŋa ibanno ziy.
40024050	Ampa-ak, tatkuwiy yaa ase ƴiriy taat ŋa ergigɗo ho wiktin taat ŋa ibingitɗo.
40024051	Paa kat, tatkaw-ak yaa taaɓiyin̰ ko taaɓiye ar ŋu taaɓiyiig ŋuur kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkico di. Ɗo wer ka taaɓiner-ak, ŋuu ale ho ŋuu eeyme saaŋco. »
40025001	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaa kuuniye ar daŋil ta gemsa ku orok kuuk sok lampinco, ŋu ɓaa ŋaamin̰ ɗubil kaak obe.
40025002	Min gemsa-ak, kuuk beeƴ neenduway ho kuuk beeƴ gay oliyay.
40025003	Ŋuur kuuk oliyay-ak sokiig lampinco kar ŋu balco ice zaadin ka sewindi.
40025004	Kar ŋuur kuuk neenduway gay sokiig lampinco ho ŋu iciico pey zaadin ɗo ɗewniico.
40025005	Ŋu ƴokiig ɗubile-ak kee. Min ŋa asɗo koɗok, gemsa-ak teestu gon̰ce nam okin̰co weƴ iciigu.
40025006	« Iŋ ɗatik aandor, ŋu dortu gem koola raɗa aman : ‟ Ha’, taloŋ ɗubil ote ! Amiloŋ ŋaamoŋga ! ”
40025007	Min gemsa-ak dortu pa-ak, okin̰co ŋu niintu ho ŋu biƴiig lampinco.
40025008	Kuuk oliyay-ak indiig een̰co aman : ‟ Yaman lampinni mataw, beronin̰ ja sooɗ min sewiŋko-aka. ”
40025009	Kar kuuk neenduway-ak telkiico aman : ‟ Ha’a, ŋa necaatenno okinte. Ɓaaŋ, dakoŋ giday. ”
40025010	Ek di kuuk oliyay-ak ɗeettu gidiye sewe. Wiktin taat ŋu ɗeete, ɗubil-ak astu aarco. Kar gemsa kuuk siy ko ziŋkico un̰jitu iŋ ŋaara ɗo wer ka obindi. Min ŋu un̰je, ŋu ɗibiriit botol.
40025011	Kar ba aaro, kuuk oliyay-ak astu kate. Ŋu koliy raɗa aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, pilni botol ! ”
40025012	Kar ɗubil-ak telkiico aman : ‟ Nu kaawaako seene, nu ibingikonno. ” »
40025013	Hiyya, Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Goyoŋ mento, asaan ku ibanno ƴiriyo wala pat taat naa yeepe. »
40025014	« Meennaw ta Buŋdi-at yaa kuuniye oki ar gem kaak ɓaa marti. Ŋa koliig gay riyoy ho ŋa beriicog malley amaanne ɗo pisin̰co.
40025015	Ka rakki, ŋa berji tammin beeƴ ku daabner, ka seeriŋkar, seer ho ka subbiŋkar, rakki. Ay gem di ŋa berji uudin ta gudurrey. Min ŋa beriicog gurus-ak, ŋa ɗeettu marti.
40025016	Kar gay riyor kaak gas tammin beeƴ-ak, koɗok di, ŋa teestu taajire ho ŋa gastu tammin beeƴ min kuwa.
40025017	Ŋaar kaak gas seer-ak oki gintu pa ho ŋa gastu tammin seer min kuwa.
40025018	Kar ŋaar kaak gas tamma rakki-ak gay daktu ecar bee ho ŋa tiisiig gurus ka gemoy-aka.
40025019	« Goytu kee, gemco astu min ɗo martuwiy. Ŋa koliig gay riyor-aku a ŋaa tale maan kaak ŋu gintu iŋ gurus-aka.
40025020	Gay riyor kaak gas tammin beeƴ-ak astu ho ŋa gaariijig gurus kaak ŋa gastu min kuwa. Kar ŋa ɗiytu aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, aŋ gurus kaak ki beriidu amaanne ho ka aŋ gay kaak nu gastu min kuwa. ”
40025021	Gemoy-ak oziliig aman : ‟ Seese, kiŋke-aŋ gay riyor kaak samaane ho kaak nec naan̰ amniye. Ɗo gamin kuuk sooɗ-aŋ sa, ki gaar zin̰ kadar naan̰ amniye ho diŋ gay naan̰ bere kat kuuk dakina. As aacay iŋ nunu. ”
40025022	Ŋaar kaak gas tammin seer-ak astu ho ŋa ɗiytu aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, aŋ gurus kaak ki beriidu amaanne ho ka aŋ gay kaak nu gastu min kuwa. ”
40025023	Gemoy-ak oziliig aman : ‟ Seese, kiŋke-aŋ gay riyor kaak samaane ho kaak nec naan̰ amniye. Ɗo gamin kuuk sooɗ-aŋ sa, ki gaar zin̰ kadar naan̰ amniye ho diŋ gay naan̰ bere kat kuuk dakina. As aacay iŋ nunu. ”
40025024	Kar ba aaro, ŋaar kaak gas tamma rakki-ak astu ho ŋa ɗiytu aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, nu ibingiciŋ kiŋ gem toŋgo. Ki seɗaw gamin kuuk ki bal luwin̰co ho ki soka gamin kuuk ki bal suuɗe tiŋgon̰.
40025025	Ampaa ko, nu gintu kolaw ho nu dakiig tiis gurusjiŋ. Diŋ gay, ŋaar ko-aŋka, obig maannan̰. ”
40025026	Kar gemoy-ak kaawiiji aman : ‟ Kiŋke-aŋ gem kaak napkiyaaɗo. Ki zegilo ! Ki iban min awalle oki kadar nu seɗa gamin kuuk nu bal luwin̰co ho nu soka gamin kuuk nu bal suuɗe tiŋgor.
40025027	Ya ki iban ansi-ak, zer kii leen̰ gurusdu-aŋ ɗo wer ka dummaayner. Ansii kat ya nu yeepe, naa gasin̰ gurusdu wee. ”
40025028	Kar ŋa kaawtu aman : ‟ Icoŋ tamma-ak minniney ho beron̰jiig ɗo ŋaar kaak gin orok-aka.
40025029	Cokiyoŋ naako kaawe, waan kaak gine, Buŋ yaaji gaaye min kuwa nam ŋaa goye ɗo bidinaw. Kar ŋaar kaak bal gineŋ gay, ka sooɗ kaak ŋa gintu oki, Buŋ yaaji imilin̰ji.
40025030	Kar gay riyor kaak napkayɗo gay, atkoŋ kara ɗo gondikor, ɗo wer kaak ŋu alaw ho ŋu eeyma saaŋco. ” »
40025031	« Wiktin taat nun Roŋ gemor yaa yeepe ɗo darjiner iŋ ɗubal okin̰co, nu asiy goye ka seesdu ka sultinnaw.
40025032	Gee kuuk ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰co asa n̰ume uŋtu. Kar naa eerin̰co ar gay gooƴindi eergiy tamgi iŋ awgi.
40025033	Kar naa dibirin̰ tamgi ɗo meedar ho awgi gay ɗo n̰ugilal.
40025034	Kar nun kaak sultan, naaco kaawe ɗo kuuk ɗo meedar aman : « Kuŋ kuuk Tanni barkiyiŋko-aŋ, asoŋ ho un̰joŋ ɗo Meennaw taat Buŋ siytu loko min kilgiye ka duniiner.
40025035	Asaan mey deentu ho ku berdu tee. Ibin deentu ho ku berdu see. Nu ɓaawko martaw ho ku obintu samaane.
40025036	Nu tukinka ho ku berdu kesuune. Nu raɗaw wala ŋu obintu daŋaayne ho ku dakintu tala.
40025037	Hiyya, ŋuur kuuk sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi-ak yaadu telke aman : ‟ Gem kol Rabbine, kimin ni talin̰ciŋ mey diyaaciŋ ho ni beriijiŋ tee ? Kimin ibin diyaaciŋ ho ni beriijiŋ see ?
40025038	Kimin ki asinti martaw ho ni obin̰ciŋ samaane ? Kimin ki tukinka ho ni beriijiŋ kesuune ?
40025039	Kimin ki raɗtu wala ŋu obin̰ciŋ daŋaayne ho ni dakin̰ciŋ tala ? ”
40025040	Min pa-ak, nun kaak sultan, naaco telke aman : ‟ Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya ku ginit riy taar-an ɗo rakki min ɗo siŋtar kuuk siŋco allo tak-tak-aŋ, ar ku ginit lotu. ”
40025041	« Kar ba aaro, naaco newse ɗo kuuk ɗo n̰ugilal aman : ‟ Kuŋko-aŋ Buŋ surpiyiŋko, etiroŋ minniner serek. Ɓaaŋ ɗo ak taat ŋu biƴtu ɗo Seetanner iŋ ɗubilji. Ak-at matɗo tak-tak.
40025042	Asaan mey deentu ho ku baldu bere tee. Ibin deentu ho ku baldu bere see.
40025043	Nu ɓaawko martaw ho ku dakintu obɗo. Nu tukinka ho ku baldu bere kesuune. Nu raɗaw wala ŋu obintu daŋaayne ho ku bal ɓaa talindu. ”
40025044	Hiyya, ŋuur kuuk ɗo n̰ugilal-ak yaadu telke aman : ‟ Gem kol Rabbine, kimin ni talin̰ciŋ ki meya wala ibino, ki marte wala tukinka, ki raɗaw wala ɗo daŋaayner ho ni dakin̰ciŋ gaayɗo ? ”
40025045	Min pa-ak, naaco telke aman : ‟ Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya ku bal ginin riy taar-an ɗo rakki min ɗo siŋtar kuuk siŋco allo tak-tak-aŋ, ar ku bal ginin lotu. ”
40025046	Gee ŋuur-ak ɓaa goye doo ɗo ak taat matɗo ho ŋuur kuuk sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi-ak gay yaa gase goye ka gaasɗo. »
40026001	Min Iisa gaasiig kaawin-aŋ okin̰co, ŋa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay aman :
40026002	« Ku iban kadar iidin ta Paak ɗaktit ko mena seer di. Ek di nun Roŋ gemor, ŋuun berindu ɗo ŋuur kuuk yaan ɗooɗin ka etor. »
40026003	Hiyya, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar n̰umtu ɗo geriy ka gem rakki siŋji Kayip, ŋa Mee satkiner ka tatko.
40026004	Ŋu deetu kaawco a ŋuu obin̰ Iisa iŋ cigile ho ŋuu deen̰ji.
40026005	Ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : « Gi gediraaɗo obin̰ ƴiriy ta iidiner, yampa, gee yaa barjile. »
40026006	Ƴiriy rakki, Iisa goy ɗo geeger ka Betani ɗo ger ka Simon kaak ɗukum burɗum.
40026007	Wiktin taat ŋa goytu tee, daatik rakki asiig gasa. Ɗo pisinti, ta gin ɗew ka dambir kaak ŋu kolaag albaatir. Ɗewti-ak miin iŋ itir kaak gasɗo badam. Ta kockiciiji ɗo kaay ka Iisa.
40026008	Min maajirna taliig maanna-ak, aditco nigtu ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Maa di ta nigiig itir-aŋ dur di ?
40026009	Ya gi gidiyig itir-aŋ, nec gii gase gurus dakina ho gii ɗeeɗin̰ ɗo pokirnar ! »
40026010	Min Iisa doriit kaawco-at, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Maa di ku taaɓiyiit daatko-anta ? Riy taat ta giniidu-an samaane.
40026011	Ka seener, pokirna, ŋuur goy doo iŋ kuŋko, kar nun gay goyaaɗo iŋ kuŋko doo.
40026012	Min diŋ di ta kockicdu ko itir, uudin ta neginda ŋuu un̰jin̰ zir ɗo maginer.
40026013	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ay wer kaak ŋuu gaarin Kabarre ta Gala ɗo adiy ka kiɗar, ŋuu moye bit ka daatko-anta ho ŋuu ose ɗo maan kaak ta gintu. »
40026014	Min ŋaar-ak, Zuudas Iskariyoot kaak min paliinna ku Iisa ku orok iŋ seer-ak, ɓaawiico ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner
40026015	ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ya nu gaarko maman kuu obin̰ Iisa-ak, kuudu bere maa ? » Hiyya, ŋu beriiji tammin orok subba ku gurusdi.
40026016	Min ƴiriy taar-at di, ŋa teestu bariye botol taat maman ŋaaco gaarin̰ Iisa, ŋuu obin̰ji.
40026017	Ƴiriy taat awalle ta iidin ta mappa ka bal gele, maajirna sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋu indiig aman : « Ki raka a ni ɓaate gine tee ka Paakdi momo ? »
40026018	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ ɗo geegirdi ɗo wer ka gem rakki pa ho kaawon̰ji aman : ‟ Tatkaw kaawa a wiktiney gaaye. Ŋa asa iidiye iidin ta Paak ɗo gerin̰ iŋ maajirnay. ” »
40026019	Hiyya, maajirnay ɓaawtu, ŋu giniit ar taat Iisa kaawiico ho ŋu giniico tee.
40026020	Min pat gale, Iisa goytu tee iŋ paliinnay kuuk orok iŋ seera.
40026021	Wiktin taat ŋu tiyo, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, rakki minninko yaadu isine. »
40026022	Min ŋu doriit kaaw-at, ziŋkico ooliig koloc. Kar ŋu teestu indin̰ji rakki rakki aman : « Rabbine, ŋa nununno ɗoo ? »
40026023	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ŋaar kaak pisinni or ɗo parki-aŋ di, ŋaar-ak di yaadu isine.
40026024	Nun Roŋ gemor asa mate ar taat Kitamne kaawtu ɗo bi kanto. Kar gay, raɗji ɗo gem kaak isindu ! Gem-ak, ya ŋu bal ween̰ji sa guna ! »
40026025	Zuudas kaak isinaaji-ak indiig aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, ŋa nununno ɗoo ? » Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ meen̰ji kaawit ko. »
40026026	Wiktin taat ŋu goytu tee, Iisa ictu mappa, ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi, ŋa pirsiiga ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnay. Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Oboŋ ho taaŋ, ŋaar-aŋ zir. »
40026027	Kar ŋa ictu pey kordindi, ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi ho ŋa beriicota. Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Saaŋ okiŋko,
40026028	asaan ŋuur-aŋ baarir. Baar-aŋ ɗuunit Jamaw ta marbinto taat Buŋ asiy obe iŋ gee. Baar-ak yaa min̰e ɗo bi ka gee dakina a ŋuu gase saamiye ka zunuubinnico.
40026029	Nu kaawaako aman : ‟ Nu siyaaɗo pey maam ku bin̰di nam ƴiriy taat naa see kuuk marbinto iŋ kuŋko ɗo Meennaw ta Tanni. ” »
40026030	Hiyya, ŋu riytu riyin ku iidiner, kar ŋu amiltu, ŋu ɓaayiy coke koot ka Olibiyennar.
40026031	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Iŋ aando-an di, okiŋko, kuun rasindu. Ka seener, Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Naa deen̰ gay gooƴindi ho tamgiy yaa totire. ” »
40026032	Kar Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Wiktin taat nu nooy min ɗo muuti gay, naako ogire ɗo kiɗ ka Galile. »
40026033	Piyer gay kaawiiji aman : « Ya okin̰co-aŋ rasin̰ciŋ oki, nun gay rasaacinno tuk. »
40026034	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Cokay, naan̰ kaawe seene, ɗo aando-anta, kokir boogaaɗo di, kii tatire dees subba a ki ibinginno. »
40026035	Piyer gay telkiiji aman : « Ya nu mata iŋ kiŋke oki, nu tatiraaɗo a nu ibingicinno. » Kar maajirna okin̰co kaawtu paa di.
40026036	Hiyya, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ottu ɗo wer kaak ŋu kolaag Jetsemaane ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Goyoŋ anne, nun ɓaa inde Buŋ annere. »
40026037	Min ŋa ɓaayiyo, ŋa iciig Piyer iŋ koogin ku Zebede kuuk seera : Yaaya iŋ Zaak. Ɗo wer-ak, kelmoy amiltu ho ziy sa oolga.
40026038	Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Kelmol tiyaan but-but ar naa mate. Kuŋ goyoŋ anne ho goyoŋ mento iŋ nunu. »
40026039	Ŋa sin̰jitu uŋda sooɗ, ŋa dersitu ho ŋa nooɗig uŋji keɗer, kar ŋa teestu inde Buŋ aman : « Baaba, ya an kat niyinen̰, etirit taaɓin-an minniner. Yampa, taa ginenno ar taat nun rakiyo, illa taat kiŋ rakiyo. »
40026040	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa yeepiico ɗo maajirnay kuuk subba. Kar ŋa gasig ŋu weƴaw. Ŋa kaawiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Ku bal gedire goye mento sooɗ iŋ nunu ?
40026041	Goyoŋ mento ho indiguwoŋ Buŋ kuu goye bombo ya Seetanne gecaako. Gelbin ka gemor, ŋaar gin niyin taat ŋaa gine taat samaane, kar ziy gay gedarro. »
40026042	Ka seeriŋkar, ŋa ɗeettu pey inde Buŋ aman : « Baaba, ya taaɓin-an kat etiraaɗo minniner illa naa seenti ja, ŋaar-ak niyin tan̰jin di paka ! »
40026043	Kar ŋa yeeptu pey ɗo maarjirnay ho ŋa gasiig ŋu weƴaw nam ŋu gedarro pilin̰ odinco.
40026044	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa rasiigu ho ŋa ɗeettu pey inde Buŋ ka subbiŋkar. Ŋa ɗeeliig kaawin ŋuur-ak di.
40026045	Min ŋa inde Buŋ, ŋa yeeptu ɗo maajirnay ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ku weƴaw ho ku darma misa ? Way, diŋ wiktinti nec kate. Nun Roŋ gemor, ŋuun berindu ɗo pise ku gay zunuubinnar.
40026046	Taloŋ, gem kaak isindu-aŋ asa ko eka ! Ucoŋ, ŋaaminteŋga ! »
40026047	Min Iisa kaawa misan di, Zuudas min paliinna kuuk orok iŋ seer astu iŋ gee dakina. Min gee-ak, daarin̰ gin seepinpan ho daarin̰ gay gin doŋkilay. Agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar kat n̰aamgu.
40026048	Zuudas gaarco botol taat maman ŋuu obin̰ Iisa. Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ŋaar kaak naa baamiye, naaji gine cuuɗ, ŋa ŋaar ko ku rakiyo. Oboŋga ! »
40026049	Min ŋu ottu ɗo wer-aka, Zuudas sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋa ooyiiji aman : « Seek, gem kol Rabbiney ! » Kar ŋa baamiyiiga ho ŋa giniiji cuuɗ.
40026050	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Ab roya, maan kaak iyin̰ciŋ-aŋ, ginga ! » Hiyya, gee-ak ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋu obiiga.
40026051	Ek di rakki min maajirnay ku Iisa ceeptu seepiney, ŋa asiɗiig gay riyor kaak gina riy ɗo mee satkiner ka tatko ho ŋa ɗukumiijit ɗeŋgey.
40026052	Kar Iisa kaawiiji aman : « Un̰jig seepinen̰-aŋ ɗo caapoy, asaan okin̰co kuuk jaawa iŋ seepinpan-ak, ŋuu deen̰co iŋ seepinpan.
40026053	Ya ɗo tan̰jiŋ, ki pakira a nu gediraaɗo indin̰ Tanni yaadu male walla ? Ya nu indiga, koɗok di ŋaadu n̰aame ɗubal dakin dakina.
40026054	Kar ya nu gina ampa-ak gay, maman taat ŋu siirtu awalle ɗo Kitamner yaa ase ɗo werti ? Asaan Kitamne kaaw a taa kuuniye ansi. »
40026055	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa newsiico ɗo gee-ak aman : « Kun kawta, nu goy iŋ kuŋko ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Maa di ku obginno annere ? Ku astu iŋ seepinpan ho iŋ doŋkilay a kuun obindu. Wala nu kokino ?
40026056	Kar gay, ta kuuniytu ampa-ak a kaaw taat nabiinna siirtu awalle ɗo Kitamner yaa ase ɗo werti. » Min ŋaar-ak, maajirnay okin̰co gaɗtu, ŋu rasiiga.
40026057	Gee kuuk obig Iisa-ak iyiig ɗo ger ka Kayip, mee satkiner ka tatko. Ɗo wer-ak ko, agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar n̰umtu.
40026058	Piyer gay aaɗaag min serek nam ŋu ottu ɗo ger ka mee satkiner-aka. Kar ŋa un̰jitu ɗo wer ka berel ka gerdi-aka ho ŋa goytu iŋ askirna. Ŋa raka tale maman ŋuu deen kaawco.
40026059	Sando, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku Yuudinnar bariya botol taat ŋuuji diye kaaw ɗo Iisa ŋuu deen̰ji. Ya kaaw-at ɗo wertiɗo oki, ɗo tan̰co-at, ta ginaaɗo maanna.
40026060	Gee dakina uctu, ŋu diyiiji kaaw ta raadiner, kar iŋ taar-at oki, ŋu balji gase oorne. Ba aaro, gee seer uctu ho ŋu kaawtu aman :
40026061	« Gem-aŋ kaawa a ŋaa ɗimin̰ ger ka Buŋdi-aŋka, kar ɗo menaw subba di, ŋaa pinin̰ ɗo weriy. »
40026062	Hiyya, mee satkiner-ak uctu ho ŋa kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Kiŋ telkaacoɗo ga ? Gee-aŋ kaawa ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ ɗoo ? »
40026063	Kar Iisa gay buguma di. Kar mee satkiner-ak togiliiji aman : « Iŋ Buŋ kaak goy mento-aŋka, kaawnin̰ ja, kiŋ ko Masi, Roŋ ka Buŋdi walla ? »
40026064	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ meen̰jiŋ kaawit ko. Kar gay, nu kaawaako, ɗak mena sooɗ di, nun Roŋ gemor, kuun talin nu goy ɗo meeday ta Buŋ kaak gin gudurre okintiti, ho kuun talin pey wiktin taat naa ase min ka samaaner iŋ uca. »
40026065	Min mee satkiner dortu pa-ak, ŋa eeriit kesuuney ho ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Ŋa niga biy iŋ Buŋ ! Wala gi raka pey saadine ! Ku doraaga, ŋa geema ziy iŋ Buŋ !
40026066	Ya loko-ak, gee ginin̰ji maman ? » Ŋu telkiiji aman : « Taar-an nec ko iye muutuy. »
40026067	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu piciiji uln̰a ɗo wijeeney, ŋu koociiga, ho daarin̰ gay baasiiga
40026068	ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Hey Masi-aŋka, ya kiŋ kat nabiin̰ce-ak, kaawni ja waa kaak men̰n̰in̰ciŋ ? »
40026069	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Piyer gay goy kara ɗo wer ka berel-aka. Kar gay riyor rakki ɓaawiiji moota ho ta kaawiiji aman : « Kiŋke oki goy iŋ Iisa, gem kaak min Galile ! »
40026070	Kar Piyer gay tatiriig Iisa ɗo uŋco ka geemir ho ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Nu ibanno taat ka rakiy kaawe. »
40026071	Kar wiktin taat ŋa raka n̰ere min ɗo wer-aka, gay riyor taat pey taliiga ho ta ɗiyiico ɗo gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak aman : « Taloŋ, gem-aŋ oki iŋ Iisa kaak min Nazareet. »
40026072	Ka seeriŋkar, Piyer tatirtu pey ho ŋa togiltu aman : « Iŋ Buŋ, nu ibingigɗo gem-aŋka tara ! »
40026073	Jammiy sooɗa, gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak ɓaawiiji ɗo Piyer ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Ka seener, kiŋke sa min ŋuura ! Ni ibinaaciŋ min ɗo kaawon̰-an di. »
40026074	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa togiltu pey aman : « Iŋ Buŋ-aŋka, nu ɗiykon ɗoo a nu ibingigɗo gem-aŋka ! Ya nu raada sa, Buŋ, ŋaan surpiyindu. » Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak di, kokir boogtu.
40026075	Ek di Piyer moyiit kaaw taat Iisa kaawiiji aman : « Awal ta kokir yaa booge, kii tatire dees subba a ki ibinginno. » Hiyya ŋa amiltu kara ho ŋa zugiig ale.
40027001	Iŋ kawtir wer dugus-dugus, agindaw ku gay satkiner okin̰co iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar deetu kaawco a ŋuu deen̰ Iisa.
40027002	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu ɗuuniiga, ŋu iyiiga ho ŋu beriijig ɗo Pilaat kaak gee ku Room diyiig guberneer ɗo wer-aka.
40027003	Min Zuudas kaak isinji ɗo Iisa taltu kadar ŋu raka deen̰ Iisa-ak, ginji raɗa. Hiyya, ŋa ɓaawiico ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar a ŋaaco yeepin̰ tammin kuuk orok subba-aku.
40027004	Min ŋa gasiigu, ŋa ɗiyco aman : « Nun di bir gallo asaan nu isinji ɗo gem-aŋ ŋuu deen̰ maalan di ! » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ginir ! Nin isgininno, taan̰ gagire ɗo gaaƴan̰ ! »
40027005	Min Zuudas doriit kaaw-at, ŋa dawiig gurus-ak ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa ɗeettu zikiɗe ziy.
40027006	Kar agindaw ku gay satkiner ipiniig gurus-aka ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Gaanuunte berro botol taat gii n̰umin̰ gurus-aŋ iŋ kaak gi dummiyiy ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, asaan ŋa gurus ka kaƴar. »
40027007	Hiyya, ŋu deetu kaawco, ŋu iciig gurus-aka ho ŋu daktu giday morgo ka gem kaak pina gamin iŋ golŋo. Ŋu gidiyiig morgo-ak a ŋaa gine wer kaak ŋuu tiisguwe awraatinna.
40027008	Ɗo saan taar-at ko, yoo ƴiriyta ŋu koliig morgo-ak aman : « Morig ka baarir. »
40027009	Ansii ko, kaaw taat nabi Zeremi kaawtu awalle astu ɗo werti aman : « Ŋu ic tammin orok subba ku gurusdi. Gee ku Israyeel talaag gurus-aŋ nec ko iŋ kaƴay.
40027010	Kar iŋ gurus-ak, ŋu gidiytu morgo ka gem kaak pina gamin iŋ golŋo ar taat Rabbin Buŋ kaawiidu. »
40027011	Min ŋu beriig Iisa ɗo guberneer Pilaat, Pilaat indiig aman : « Kiŋ ko sultan ka Yuudinnar walla ? » Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ meen̰jiŋ kaawit ko. »
40027012	Agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar diyiiji kaawna, kar Iisa gay bugum mayaat.
40027013	Kar Pilaat kaawiiji aman : « Ki doraag ɗoo di gee-aŋ diyiijiŋ kaawin-aŋku ? »
40027014	Ŋaar gay balji telke maanna nam guberneer din sa ajbiy tak-tak.
40027015	Ay iidin ta Paakdi, guberneer Pilaat imilgiy gem rakki min daŋaayne, ŋaar kaak gee inditu.
40027016	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gin gay daŋaayner rakki siŋji alaw, ŋu kolaag Iisa Barabaas.
40027017	Pilaat indiig gee kuuk n̰um dakin-ak aman : « Naako pike waa min ɗo daŋaayner ? Iisa Barabaas wala Iisa kaak ŋu koliy Masi ? »
40027018	Pilaat ibina tam kadar min hasuudinaw di, agindaw-ak iyiijig Iisa.
40027019	Ɗo wiktin taat Pilaat goy misa ɗo sees ka seriiner, daaciy n̰aamiiji kaawo aman : « Yaman cim kaan̰ min kaawin ku gem-aŋka. Ŋa bal nige maanna. Maako-an nu bal weƴe min sooniika ɗo bi kan̰ji. »
40027020	Ɗo wer-ak, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar isinaag gee ku dakin-ak, ŋuu indin̰ Pilaat a ŋaaco pikin̰ Barabaas, kar Iisa gay ŋuu deen̰ji.
40027021	Ampaa ko, wiktin taat guberneer Pilaat indiig pey gee-ak aman : « Min kuuk seer-aŋ, ka moo ku rakiy naako pike ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Barabaas ! »
40027022	Pilaat indiigu pey aman : « Kar Iisa kaak ŋu koliy Masi gay, naa ginin̰ maman ? » Okin̰co, ŋu telkiiji aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! »
40027023	Ŋa indiigu pey aman : « Kar ŋa nig maa di ? » Ŋuur gay koola koolen di aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! »
40027024	Min Pilaat taltu kadar ŋa gediraacoɗo ho kaawco bira maan ka pey-ak, ŋa ictu amay ho ŋa aciig pisin̰ji ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Kar ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Di ŋaar-ak giniro, nun maan isginno iŋ muut ta gem-aŋka ! »
40027025	Gee okin̰co telkiiji aman : « Ya an di kaawon̰-ak, baariy ŋu gagirni ɗo gaƴiƴni yoo ɗo kooginni ! »
40027026	Hiyya, Pilaat pikiicog Barabaas. Kar Iisa gay, ŋa ɗiyiico a ŋuu koocin̰ iŋ korɗiŋgo. Min ŋu koocga, ŋa beriicog ɗo askirnar a ŋuu ɗooɗin̰ ka etor.
40027027	Min ŋaar-ak, askirnay ku Pilaat iyiig Iisa ɗo geriy ka guberneer. Askirnay okin̰co n̰umtu ɗo wer-aka, Iisa gay ɗatikco.
40027028	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu cimijiit kesuuney ho ŋu isiiji batik ta dindik buŋ ar ta sultinniidi.
40027029	Kar ŋu siyiiji jakumne ta jamiidi ho ŋu isiiji ar jakumne ta sultinniidi. Min ŋu isjiigu, ŋu beriiji eto ɗo pisin̰ji ka meeda ar ka sultan icgiyo. Kar ŋu dersiy ɗo uŋji ho ŋu ajimiyiig aman : « Gem kol sultan ka Yuudinnar, ooyaajiŋ ! »
40027030	Kar ɗo wer-ak, ŋu piciiji uln̰a ho ŋu iciig etoy-aka, ŋu men̰n̰iig ɗo kaay.
40027031	Min ŋu ajimiyig ko ajimiye, ŋu cimiijit batko-ata, kar ŋu isiijit tan̰ji, ŋu ɓaay ɗooɗin̰ ka etor.
40027032	Min ŋu amiliy min ɗo geegirdi, ŋu ŋaamtu iŋ gem rakki pa siŋji Simon. Gem-ak min geeger ka Sireen. Askirna asiriig a ŋa icin̰ etoy ka Iisa.
40027033	Ŋu ottu wer rakki ŋu kolaag Golgota. Pa-ak ɗiya aman : « Ɗawik ta kaar. »
40027034	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu beriiji ɗo Iisa maam kuuk amse iŋ maan kaak ƴuutu. Min ŋa aawiig di, ŋa pooctu seen̰co.
40027035	Hiyya, ŋu ɗooɗiig ka etor. Min ŋu ɗooɗga, ŋu ɗeeɗiit kesuuney werin dakina ho ay gem di iciy taat galji.
40027036	Ba aaro, askirna-ak goytu eɗe ŋuu gooƴin̰ji.
40027037	Kar ɗo et ka Iisa gay, ŋu ɗooɗ maan kuwa ɗo kaay. Ɗo maanna-ak, ŋu siir maan kaak iy obin̰ji aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ ko Iisa, sultan ka Yuudinnar. »
40027038	Gin kokinay seera oki ŋu ɗooɗgu ɗo serpay ka atiydi, rakki ɗo meeday ho rakki gay ɗo n̰ugilay.
40027039	Gee kuuk bira min eɗe-ak sekiƴiy kaƴco ho ŋu wariig Iisa aman :
40027040	« Kiŋ kaak rak ɗimin̰ ger ka Buŋdi ho iŋ menaw subba di kii pine ka pey, ya kiŋ kat Roŋ ka Buŋdi-ak, jil kat ɗoo zin̰ ka meen̰jiŋ ho paay min ka etor ! »
40027041	Yoo agindaw ku gay satkiner, agindaw ku gaanuundi, iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar sa samtiyaaji aman :
40027042	« Ŋa jil gee ku pey, kar diŋ gay, ŋa gedarro jile ziy ka meen̰ji ! Sultan ka Israyeel kat ampa ? Paay diŋ di min ka etor, kar niin̰ aamine.
40027043	Ŋa diyiit kaay iŋ Buŋ ho ŋa kaawiy a ŋa Roŋ ka Buŋdi. Di ya Buŋ elgiga-ak, diŋ ŋa jilga kate ! »
40027044	Yoo kokinay kuuk ŋu ɗooɗtu ka atiydi iŋ ŋaara oki, waraag pa.
40027045	Min pat ottu ƴiriyo, ta mattu. Wer astu gondiko ɗo kiɗ okin̰ji nam pat subba ta maako.
40027046	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Iisa kooltu raɗa aman : « Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani ? » Ansi-ak aman : « Buŋdu, Buŋdu, maa di ki poociinu ? »
40027047	Gee daarin̰ kuuk goy moota-ak dorga ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Cokiyoŋ ja, ŋa kolaag Eli ! »
40027048	Ɗo wer-ak, rakki minninco gaɗtu ŋa ictu bit ka jarɗor, ŋa ɗuuniit ɗo bi ka etor ho ŋa coopiig ɗo maam kuuk tooro. Kar ŋa beriijig ɗo Iisa a ŋaa cooɗe.
40027049	Daarin̰ gay kaawiy aman : « Eron̰ ja, gii tale ya Eli kat asa jilin̰ji. »
40027050	Ba aar, Iisa kooltu pey raɗa kar ŋa mattu.
40027051	Min ŋa mattu, zimilla kuuk ɓigira ŋu caaltu atta ɗo ger ka Buŋdi eertu min ɗatko min kuwa yoo keɗer. Ɗo wer-ak, kiɗ sa azirtu ho dambinay sa ɗoostu.
40027052	Maggan pile ho min gee kuuk sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho mate, dakina nooye.
40027053	Gee-ak amiltu min ɗo magginco ho min Iisa nooytu, ŋu ɓaawtu Zeruzaleem, geeger kaak cawar, ho gee dakina taliigu.
40027054	Min ŋa mattu, tatkaw ka askirin ku Room iŋ geen̰ji kuuk gooƴaag Iisa taliig kiɗ azire iŋ ay maan kaak kuuniy-ak, kolaw obiig tak-tak ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Way, gem-aŋ Roŋ ka Buŋdi ka seener ! »
40027055	Ɗo wer-ak, goy oki daaɗ dakina kuuk aaɗig Iisa min kiɗ ka Galile ho ŋu taliy kaaci. Ŋu taliy min serek.
40027056	Minninco goy Mariyam ta Magdala, Mariyam atan̰ Zaak iŋ Yuusup, ho iŋ atan̰ koogin ku Zebede.
40027057	Iŋ pat ta maako, gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Yuusup min geeger ka Arimate. Ŋa gay gamnar ho ŋaar oki min maajirna ku Iisa.
40027058	Gem-ak dakiig gas Pilaat ho ŋa indiig momtey ka Iisa. Hiyya, Pilaat beriico izinne ɗo askirnar a ŋuuji berin̰ji.
40027059	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa dakiig paaya ho ŋa maliyiig iŋ batik marbinto.
40027060	Kar ŋa iciiga ho ŋa un̰jiig ɗo magin ta meen̰ji taat ŋu doɗɗitu ka dambar. Magin-at, yoo momte rakki oki, ŋu baltit un̰je. Min pa-ak, ŋa tuŋkiltu dambi tatik, ŋa ɗibiriit magin-ata, kar ŋa ɗeettu.
40027061	Wiktin taar-at, Mariyam ta Magdala iŋ gaati Mariyam goy keɗer aaniy magine.
40027062	Ka kawtinti, iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ Pariziyenna n̰umtu ho ŋu ɓaawtu wer ka Pilaat.
40027063	Min ŋu ottu, ŋu ɗiyiiji aman : « Iŋ karaaminen̰, ni moy kaaw taat gay raadindi-aŋ kaawtu min ŋa goy misa iŋ odinay. Ŋa kaaw aman : ‟ Iŋ menaw subba di, naa nooye min ɗo muuti. ”
40027064	Baan̰u, gem kol tatkaw, ɗiyco ɗo askirnan̰ a ŋuu gooƴin magin-an nam mena subba. Yampa, maajirnay asa kokinin̰ momtey ho ŋuu ɗiye ɗo geemir aman : ‟ Ŋa nooye min ɗatik ta gee ku mate. ” Kar raade kaak ba aar-aŋ yaa pakin̰ ka awalle. »
40027065	Kar Pilaat kaawtu aman : « Paa ko, askirin eku. Ɓaaŋ iŋ ŋuura ho kaawon̰co a ŋuu gooƴin magine ar taat ku rakiyo. »
40027066	Hiyya, ŋu ɓaawtu ɗo maginer, ŋu n̰aariig dambi ka ɗo bit-aka, kar ŋu rasiig askirna-ak yaa gooƴinti.
40028001	Min ƴiriy ta sabit birtu, iŋ dumaas kawtir kawtira, Mariyam ta Magdala iŋ gaati Mariyam ɓaawtu talin magine.
40028002	Min ŋu ottu, aawa kar kiɗ azirtu liŋic. Ɗubil ka Buŋdi paaytu min ka samaaner. Ŋa tuŋkiliig dambi kaak ɗo bit ka maginer-aka ho ŋa goyiiji kuwa.
40028003	Ɗubile-ak, ziy irn̰a ar irn̰e ka buŋdi ho kesuuney portik kar ar n̰irn̰e.
40028004	Min askirin kuuk gooƴaat magine taliig maanna-ak, kelimco amiltu nam ŋu aziraw. Ŋu sollitu keɗer ar gee ku mate.
40028005	Kar ɗubil ka Buŋdi kaawiico ɗo daaɗ-ak aman : « Dakoŋ ginenno kolaw. Nu iban kadar ku bariya Iisa kaak ŋu ɗooɗtu ka etor-aka.
40028006	Ŋaar ginno anne, ŋa nooye ar taat ŋa kaawiiko. Asoŋ, taloŋ, aŋ ko wer kaak ŋu diyiiga.
40028007	Kar ɓaaŋ koɗok, dakon̰co kaaw ɗo maajirnay aman : ‟ Iisa ŋaar nooye ho ŋa ogirkoŋ ko ɗo kiɗ ka Galile. Anner kat, ku ɓaayiy talin̰ji. ” An di ta iyiintu. »
40028008	Min ŋu doriit kaaw-at, koɗok di ŋu uctu min ɗo maginer. Kolaw obiigu ho galal sa miin aditco. Iŋ gaɗco, ŋu iyaat kabarre-at ɗo maajirnay.
40028009	Tala kar, Iisa ŋaamaagu ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Nu ooyko ! » Kar daaɗ-ak sin̰jiiji moota, ŋu obiig asin̰ji ho ŋu abdiyiiga.
40028010	Hiyya, Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Dakoŋ ginenno kolaw. Ɓaaŋ kaawon̰co ɗo siŋtar a ŋu ɓaa ɗo geeger ka Galile. Anner kat, ŋu ɓaan talindu. »
40028011	Wiktin taat daaɗ-ak ɓaawiico ɗo maajirnay, askirin daarin̰ kuuk gooƴaat magin-at ɓaawtu ɗo geegirdi. Ŋu osiico ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner gamin okin̰co kuuk kuuniye.
40028012	Ɗo wer-ak, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar n̰umtu, ŋu deetu kaawco. Ŋu beriico gurus dakina ɗo askirnar
40028013	ho ŋu kaawiico aman : « Yaman, kuu kaawe a maajirnay kokinig momte-ak aando wiktin taat ku weƴiyo.
40028014	Ya kaaw-an kat gal ɗo ɗeŋgey ta guberneer, nin di yaa gaasin iŋ ŋaara ho yaako ɗake kaƴko. »
40028015	Min ŋu kaawiico pa-ak, askirna iciig gurus-aka ho ŋu giniit ar taat ŋu kaawiico. Ansii ko, kaaw-at totirtu ɗo Yuudinnar okin̰co yoo diŋka a maajirnay kat kokinga.
40028016	Ya ɗo maajirna ku Iisa kuuk orok iŋ rakki gay, ŋu ɓaa ɗo kiɗ ka Galile, ɗo damba taat ŋa kaawiico.
40028017	Min ŋu taliiga, ŋu abdiyiiga. Kar minninco, daarin̰ gay aditco osaw.
40028018	Kar Iisa ɓaawiico ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Buŋ berduut gudurre okintit kuwa ho keɗer.
40028019	Ansi-ak, ɓaaŋ ɗo gee ku darrinay okin̰co, ginoŋgu maajirnar, batiziyoŋgu iŋ siŋ ku Tati, ku Roŋo, iŋ ku Ruwwin ta Buŋdi
40028020	ho ɓildoŋgu ŋuu gine gamin okin̰co kuuk nu kaawiiko. Nun gay goy iŋ kuŋko kun kawta nam duniin yaa gaase. »
41001001	An ko baati ta Kabarre ta Gala, ta kaawa ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi, Roŋ ka Buŋdi.
41001002	-
41001004	Gem rakki, siŋji Yaaya, as mine gee ɗo bi ka asin̰ji ka Iisa. Ɗo bi ka Yaaya-ak ko, Buŋ kaawtu awalle ɗo maktumne ta nabi Ezaayi aman : « Nun naa n̰aame gay tabiriikar uŋci a ŋaan̰ siyin botilin̰. Gaaƴ toŋgo kaawa ɗo kalaaner aman : ‟ Siyon botol ta Rabbiner. Siyon̰jiig botilay ɗalaŋ. ” » Wiktin ta Yaaya goyiy ɗo kalaaner, gee asiiji moota ho ŋa ɗiyco aman : « Ibinoŋ nigiŋko, rasoŋ goye kaak awalle, ŋuuko batiziyiŋko ho Buŋ yaako saamiyin̰ zunuubinniko. » Kar ŋuur kuuk ooye, ŋa batiziyiigu.
41001005	Gee dakina asiiji min kiɗ ka Zuude ho min ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem. Kar ŋu gaariig zunuubinnico ɗo uŋco ka geemir ho Yaaya batiziyiig ɗo barre ka Zurdan-aka.
41001006	Kesuuney ta Yaaya, ŋu siyit iŋ law ku lokumi ho ŋa ɗuunit maasoy iŋ karrabin̰ ka zaami. Teen̰ji gay, ŋa eeyma bagi iŋ ƴiime.
41001007	Ŋa kaawiico ɗo gee-ak aman : « Gin gem kaak pakginu kat asaw. Nun sa da necɗo kaak naa sorin̰ n̰ugiray.
41001008	Nun batiziyaako iŋ amay, kar ŋaar gay yaako batiziyiŋko iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi. »
41001009	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Iisa uctu min geeger ka Nazareet ɗo kiɗ ka Galile, ŋa dakiig gas Yaaya. Min ŋa gasga, Yaaya batiziyiig ɗo barre ka Zurdan.
41001010	Wiktin ta Iisa imiliy kaay min ɗo amiydi, ŋa taliig samaan pil waakilak. Kar Ruwwin ta Buŋdi paayiiji ar ammaama.
41001011	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa dortu gaaƴ kaawa min kuwa ka samaaner aman : « Kiŋke ko roŋdu, nu elgiciŋ dakina ho ki berdu galal dakina. »
41001012	Min ŋaar-ak di, koɗok di, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi n̰aamiig Iisa ɗo goosiner.
41001013	Ŋa gintu menaw orok pooɗ ɗo wer-aka. Wiktin ta ŋa goyiy eɗe-ak, Seetanne astu gecin̰ji. Ŋa goy ko iŋ kumin ku yeer di ho ɗubal ku Buŋdi gay tala kaaci.
41001014	Ƴiriy rakki, ŋu obiig Yaaya daŋaayne. Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa ɓaawtu ɗo kiɗ ka Galile, ŋa teestu gaare Kabarre ta Gala ta asa min ɗo Buŋdi.
41001015	Ŋa kaawiy ɗo geemir aman : « Wiktinti taar ase. Meennaw ta Buŋdi askoŋ ko moota. Jiptoŋ goyiŋko ho icon Kabarre ta Gala ! »
41001016	Goytu kee, Iisa jaawiy ɗo bi ka barre ka Galile. Ŋa gastu gay cabe boosir seera : Simon iŋ siŋji Andre. Wiktin taat ŋa gasiigu, ŋu caba iŋ ribbinco.
41001017	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Asoŋ aaɗonnu ho naako giniŋko gay cabe geemir. »
41001018	Koɗok di ŋu rasiig ribbinco ho ŋu aaɗiiga.
41001019	Iisa sin̰jitu pey uŋda sooɗ ho ŋa gasiig kun̰ Zaak iŋ siŋji Yaaya, roŋji ku Zebede. Ŋu goy siye ribbinco ka markabar iŋ tacco.
41001020	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Aaɗonnu ! » Hiyya, ŋu rasiig markabco iŋ tacco ho ŋu aaɗiiga.
41001021	Goytu kee, Iisa ɓaawtu ɗo geeger kaak ŋu koliy Kapernayuum iŋ maajirnay. Iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, ŋa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar ho ŋa teestu ɓilde gee.
41001022	Gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak ajbiytu ɗo ɓildin̰ji, asaan ɓildin̰ji-ak arro iŋ ka agindaw ku gaanuundi. Kar gay, ŋa ɓildaag iŋ izinne.
41001023	Wiktin ta Iisa garkiyiy-ak, gem kaak aariɗ obga astu. Kar ŋa teestu koole aman :
41001024	« Wayyay, Iisa ka min Nazareet, ki rakaani gine maman ? Ki asinti ide walla ? Nun iban tam kadar kiŋke gem kaak Buŋ doɓtu ho ŋa n̰aamtu. »
41001025	Iisa leesiiji ɗo aariɗ-ak aman : « Yalla bugam ho amal min ɗo gem-aŋka ! »
41001026	Aariɗ-ak azbiig gem-ak zid-zid-zid, kar ŋa amiltu iŋ koriyay.
41001027	Gee okin̰co ajbiytu, ŋu teestu kaawe benannico aman : « Way ! Taar-an garaan ta marbinto, ŋa kaawiit iŋ izinne ! Gem-aŋ awn̰a yoo ɗo aariɗnar ho ŋu karmiyaaga ! »
41001028	Koɗok di, kabarrey ta Iisa totirtu ɗo kiɗ ka Galile okin̰ji.
41001029	Hiyya, ŋu amiltu min ɗo ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar ho ŋu ɓaawtu wer kan̰ Simon iŋ Andre. Zaak iŋ Yaaya sa ɓaawtu iŋ ŋuura.
41001030	Kogoy ta Simon gay raɗaw. Ta weƴaw, ziti kobire. Wiktin ta Iisa astu, ŋu miniiga.
41001031	Ŋa sin̰jitu moota, ŋa obtu pisinti, kar ŋa copiliita. Ek di ziti ooltu ho ta teestu tale kaaco.
41001032	Iŋ maako, min pat gale, ŋu iyiijig gee okin̰co kuuk raɗaw, iŋ gee kuuk aariɗna obgu.
41001033	Gee ku geegirdi okin̰co n̰umtu wer geero.
41001034	Kar Iisa cooltu gee dakina kuuk gin ay biyaw ta raɗuwar ho kuuk aariɗna obgu oki. Aariɗna-ak, ŋa balco rase botol taat ŋuu kaawe, asaan ŋu ibingiga.
41001035	Ka kawtinti, Iisa saktu iŋ kawtira. Ŋa uctu min ɗo geegirdi ho ŋa ɗeettu ɗo kalaaner. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa teestu inde Buŋ.
41001036	Simon iŋ een̰ji amiltu joriyin̰ji.
41001037	Min ŋu gasga, ŋu ɗiyiiji aman : « Gee okin̰co joriyaaciŋ. »
41001038	Iisa gay ɗiyiico aman : « Yallinte wer ka pey, ɗo hellinnan aŋkure. Annere oki nu ɓaa gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi. Taar-an di taat iyintu. »
41001039	Ampaa ko, ŋa jaawiig kiɗ ka Galile okin̰ji. Ŋa gaariy kaawin ɗo geray ku salaaner ku Yuudinnar ho ŋa atkiy aariɗna.
41001040	Gem kaak gin burɗum asiiji ɗo Iisa. Ŋa dersitu ɗo uŋji, ŋa loklikiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, kiin gedire calindu ya ki ooye. »
41001041	Iisa taltu aminduwiy, ŋa n̰aamtu pisin̰ji, ŋa diiriiga ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Hii, nu ooye, diŋ calu ! »
41001042	Ek di ŋa caltu cawar min ɗo burɗumji.
41001043	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa n̰aamiiga ho ŋa karmiig aman :
41001044	« Yaman, dak kaawenno bat ɗo waanna. Kar gay, ɓaa gaar zin̰ ɗo gay satkiner ho ber satkin uudin taat gaanuun ka Muusa kaawtu. Paa kat, ŋuu ibine kadar ki cale »
41001045	Gem-ak gay ɗeettu, ŋa daktu tees ose wer okin̰ji maan ka coolga. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Iisa pooctu un̰je ɗo geegirdi, ŋa goytu ɗo kalaaner di. Geeŋ gay digaaji digen di.
41002001	Gin menaw, Iisa yeeptu ɗo geeger ka Kapernayuum ho gee dortu kadar ŋa ɗuw ko geero.
41002002	Ɗo wer-ak, gee asiy asiyo nam wer arme, kara oki wer ginno. Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa gaariico kaaw ta Buŋdi.
41002003	Wiktin ta Iisa kaawiyo, gee iyiiji gem ka ruŋgiye. Minninco gee pooɗ icilga.
41002004	Geeŋ gay goy dakina eɗe, ŋu bal gedire iyin̰ ɗo uŋji ka Iisa. Hiyya, ŋu coktu kuwa ka gerdi, aaniy ɗo wer kaak Iisa goyiyo ho ŋu noomtu bee. Min ŋu noomiig bee, ŋu paayiig gem ka ruŋgiy-ak iŋ dariŋgal.
41002005	Min Iisa taliit imaanco, ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo ruŋgiiner-ak aman : « Gem kol roŋji, zunuubinnan̰, ŋu saamiyjiŋgu. »
41002006	Ɗo wer-ak, agindaw ku gaanuun ka Yuudinnar sa goya. Min ŋu doriit kaaw ta Iisa, ŋu teestu kaawe ɗo aditco aman :
41002007	« Gem-aŋ ɗiya a maa ? Ŋa nigiy biy iŋ Buŋ. Waa yaa gedire saamiye zunuubinna ? Illa Buŋ keeji di ! »
41002008	Koɗok di, Iisa ibiniit pikirrico ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Maa di ku giniit pikirre taar-an ɗo aditko ?
41002009	Ya nu ɗiy ɗo ruŋgiiner-aŋ aman : ‟ Zunuubinnan̰ ŋu saamiyjiŋgu ” wala ya nu ɗiyiiji aman : ‟ Ucu, icig dariŋgiljiŋ ho jaawu ”, taat moo melen̰ ?
41002010	Kar gay, nu raka kuu ibine kadar nun Roŋ gemor, nu gin gudurre ta saamiye zunuubinnar ɗo duniiner. » Kar pey ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo ruŋgiiner-ak aman :
41002011	« Nu kaawiijiŋ-aŋ, ucu, icig dariŋgiljiŋ ho ɗeet gerko. »
41002012	Koɗok di, min ɗo uŋco ka geemir, gem-ak uctu, ŋa iciig dariŋgilji ho ŋa ɗeettu. Okin̰co, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak. Ŋu oziliig Buŋ ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Maan ŋaar-aŋ, gi bal talin̰ ƴiriy rakki ! »
41002013	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa yeeptu pey ɗo bi ka barre ka Galile. Gee dakin asiiji, ŋa gaariico kaaw ta Buŋdi.
41002014	Iisa sin̰jitu sooɗ min ɗo wer-aka ho ŋa taltu gay obe miirir rakki, siŋji Lebi roŋ ka Alpe. Ŋa goy ɗo riyoy. Kar Iisa ɗiyiiji aman : « Uc aaɗnu ! » Ek di Lebi uctu, ŋa aaɗiiga.
41002015	Iisa ɓaawtu iŋ maajirnay ɗo ger ka Lebi ho ŋu goytu tee. Ɗo wer-ak, gay obe miirir iŋ gee kuuk goyin̰co arro astu dakina tee iŋ ŋuura. Ŋu goyiy ɗo wer-ak, asaan min gee kuuk aaɗaag Iisa, gee ar ŋuur-aŋ goy dakina.
41002016	Min Pariziyenna kuuk agindaw ku gaanuundi oki taltu kadar Iisa tiya iŋ gee-ak, ŋu indiig maajirnay aman : « Maa di, ŋa tiyiy iŋ gee-aŋku ? »
41002017	Iisa doriit kaawco ho ŋa telkiico aman : « Gee kuuk cewey barayɗo daptoor, illa ŋuur kuuk raɗaw. Nun bal ase ɗo gee kuuk tala ziŋkico a ŋu sellen̰. Nu as ɗo ŋuur kuuk ibina kadar ŋu gina jookumo. »
41002018	Ƴiriy rakki, maajirnay ku Yaaya-Batist iŋ Pariziyenna ictu sayamne uudin ta ŋu icgiyo. Gee astu indin̰ Iisa aman : « Maajirin ku Yaaya-Batist iŋ ku Pariziyennar ica sayamne. Maa di, kun̰jiŋ gay icgiyɗo ? »
41002019	Iisa telkiico aman : « Gee kuuk ŋu kolig ɗo iidin ta obindi, ya ŋu goy misa iŋ ŋaar kaak obe, wala kuu gedire kuuco kaawe a ŋuu ice sayamne ? Ha’a, ŋu gediraaɗo ice sayamne wiktin ta gem kaak ob goy ɗatikco !
41002020	Kar gay, wiktin yaa ase taat ŋuu icin̰ ŋaar kaak obe min ɗo ɗatikco. Ƴiriy taar-at kat, ŋu asiy ice sayamne. »
41002021	Kar Iisa kaawiico pey aman : « Waan naallo kesuun taat zooɗe iŋ giteen kaak marbinto. Yampa, giteen-ak obaat miriŋ ta ɓokiyo ho mutti gaayiy pey tatiko.
41002022	Waan laaɗo maam kuuk eelaw ɗo etirsinna kuuk taay ko. Yampa, maam-ak yaa pikin̰ etirsinna-aku, ŋuu n̰aale keɗer ho etirsinna-ak sa yaa nige. Kar gay, gee liya maam kuuk eelaw illa ɗo etirsinna kuuk marbinto. »
41002023	Ƴiriy rakki ta sabitdi taat Yuudinna eelgiy geero, Iisa iŋ maajirnay aaɗtu ɗo morginar. Wiktin ta ŋu biriyo, maajirnay teestu ƴiime kaƴ ku gemer, ŋu eeymiyo.
41002024	Pariziyenna taliigu, kar ŋu ɗiyiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Talu ! Maa di, maajirnan̰ giniy maan kaak gi gingigɗo iŋ eele ka geeror ? »
41002025	Iisa telkiico aman : « Ku bal garkiyin̰ ga maan kaak Dawuud iŋ een̰ji gintu ƴiriy rakki taat mey diyiigu ?
41002026	Ɗo wiktin taat Abiyataar goy mee satkiner ka tatko, Dawuud un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa teetu mappa kaak ŋu bertu satkin ɗo Buŋdi ho ŋa beriico ɗo een̰ji oki. Zer tee ŋaar-ak, ŋuur bal gine botol taat ŋu teen̰ji, illa gay satkiner di. »
41002027	Iisa kaawiico pey aman : « Geeŋ ke wala ŋu kilgiyig ɗo bi ka eele geeror di ? Ha’a ! Ŋu diyit ƴiriy ta sabitdi a taa gaaye gee.
41002028	Ŋaar nun Roŋ gemor di mee sabitdi. »
41003001	Kar Iisa un̰jitu pey ɗo ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar-aka ho ŋa gastu gem kaak pisin̰ji mate.
41003002	Adin gay ɗibiiji ɗo Iisa. Ŋu rakiy tale ya ŋaa coolin̰ gem-ak iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, kar ŋuuji diye kaawo.
41003003	Iisa kaawiiji ɗo gem kaak pisin̰ji mat-ak aman : « Ucu ! As ɗatik anne ! »
41003004	Iisa indiig gee ku talaaga-ak aman : « Gaanuunte kaaw a gii ginguwe taat sellen̰ wala gii ginguwe taat jookumo iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi ? Gii jilguwe gee wala gii idguwin̰co ? » Ŋuur gay bugum di.
41003005	Min ŋa indiig pa-ak, ŋa taliig gee-ak iŋ dapin̰ko, asaan ɗeŋginco amil lawa. Kar ŋa yeepiiji ɗo gem ka pisin̰ji mat-ak aman : « Taarig pisin̰jiŋ. » Ek di ŋa taariiga ho pisin̰ji cooltu ɗo weriy.
41003006	Min ŋaar-ak, Pariziyenna amiltu. Ek di ŋu deetu kaawco iŋ gee ku aaɗaag sultan Herood maman ŋuu deen̰ Iisa.
41003007	Iisa iŋ maajirnay uctu ho ŋu ɓaawtu ɗo bi ka barre ka Galile. Gee dakin aale aaɗiiga. Ŋu asa min Galile, min Zuude,
41003008	min Zeruzaleem ho min kiɗ ka Idume. Goy kuuk asa min aar barre ka Zurdan ho min kiɗ ka geeger ka Tiir iŋ ka Sidon. Gee-ak asiiji ɗo Iisa, ŋu dor maan kaak ŋa giniyo.
41003009	Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay a ŋuuji iyin̰ markab moota paa gee kuuk dakin-ak yaa tirƴin̰ji.
41003010	Uudin taat ŋa cooliy gee-ak, gee ku raɗaw okin̰co akiliy ziŋkico, ŋu rakiy diirin̰ji.
41003011	Ya gee ku gin aariɗna talga-ak, ŋu solligiy ɗo uŋji ho ŋu kooliy aman : « Kiŋken di Roŋ ka Buŋdi. »
41003012	Kar ŋa karmiig tak a ŋuu gaarin̰jiɗo.
41003013	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa coktu ka dambar. Ŋa koltu gee kuuk ŋa rakiyo ho ŋu asiiji.
41003014	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa doɓtu minninco gee orok iŋ seera, ŋa diyiico siŋ a ŋu paliinna. Ŋa doɓiigu asaan ŋa raka ŋuu goye iŋ ŋaara, ŋaa tabirin̰co, ŋu ɓaay gaare Kabarre ta Gala
41003015	ho ŋuu atikguwe aariɗna.
41003016	Aŋ ko siŋco ku paliinnar kuuk orok iŋ seera : Simon kaak Iisa koliig oki Piyer,
41003017	Zaak roŋ ka Zebede iŋ siŋji Yaaya kuuk Iisa koliig oki Bowanergees, siŋ ŋuur-aŋ ɗiya aman : ‟ gee ku ar dildile ka buŋdi ”,
41003018	Andre, Pilip, Bartelemi, Matiye, Tooma, Zaak roŋji ka Alpe, Taade, Simon kaak mala ɗo darrey,
41003019	iŋ Zuudas Iskariyoot, ŋaar kaak asaaji isine ɗo Iisa.
41003020	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa yeeptu geero. Gee dakina n̰umiiji pey nam Iisa iŋ maajirnay bal gase wiktin ta ŋuu tee.
41003021	Min siŋtay dortu pa-ak, ŋu astu a ŋuu iyin̰ gerco, asaan ŋu kaawa ɗo aditco a ŋa oliyaw.
41003022	Agindaw ku gaanuun ka Yuudinnar astu min Zeruzaleem ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Ŋa gin Seetanne kaak ŋu koliy Belzebuul ! » Ho ŋu kaawtu pey aman : « Gem-aŋ atkaag aariɗna illa iŋ gudurre ta tatkaw ka aariɗnar ! »
41003023	Kar Iisa koliigu, ŋa deliico daŋla aman : « Maman Seetanne yaa gedire pey atke ziy ?
41003024	Ya meennaw taat geenti taasin̰a benannico, maman goyin̰co yaa ɓaawe ?
41003025	Ho ya gee kuuk ɗo adiy ka gerco kat ello ziŋkico, maman goyin̰co yaa ɓaawe ?
41003026	Pa-ak, ya Seetanne kat ello ziy ho ya geen̰ji kat kaawco ɓagɗo, gudurrey gediraaɗo taa taaye, illa taa peye.
41003027	« Ku iban di, waan gediraaɗo un̰je ɗo ger ka gem kaak bombo, ŋaa soke gamnay, illa ya ŋa ɗuunig ja. Kar ya ŋa ɗuunig gay, ŋaa gedire sokin̰ gamnay bal kaawo.
41003028	Ka seener nu kaawaako, Buŋ yaa saamiye zunuubinna okin̰co ku geemir yoo ŋuur kuuk biŋkico amila gallo iŋ ŋaara oki.
41003029	Kar gem kaak niga biy iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gay, Buŋ saamiyaajiɗo. Gem ŋaar-ak gin zunuubinna kuuk gaasɗo tak-tak. »
41003030	Iisa kaawiy pa-ak, asaan ŋu ɗiya a ŋa gin aariɗ.
41003031	Min ŋaar-ak, atan̰ Iisa iŋ siŋtay astu. Ŋu peytu kara, kar ŋu n̰aamtu gem ɓaawtu kolin̰ji.
41003032	Gee dakina leyig Iisa ɗatko, kar gem-ak ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, yaako iŋ siŋtan̰ goy kara, ŋu indaaciŋ. »
41003033	Kar Iisa telkiiji aman : « Yaani kat waa ho siŋtar gay kun̰ waa ? »
41003034	Ŋa taliig gee kuuk leyga-ak, kar ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Taloŋ, aŋ ko yaani ho siŋtar.
41003035	Ka seener, ay gem kaak gina taat Buŋ rakiyo, ŋaar di siŋdu, boor ho yaani. »
41004001	Iisa teestu pey garkiye gee ɗo bi ka barre ka Galile. Gee dakina n̰umiiji nam ŋa cok ka markabar, kat ŋa goytu. Geeŋ gay goy ɗo goŋgumor.
41004002	Ŋa gaariico kaawin dakina iŋ dele ka daŋlal. Ŋa kaawiico aman :
41004003	« Cokiyoŋ ! Gin gem rakki ɓaa luwo ɗo morgoy.
41004004	Wiktin taat ŋa luwiy-ak, busumji daarin̰ sollitu ɗo botildi ho ɗiiɗ teeyiig okin̰co.
41004005	Busumji daarin̰ sollitu ɗo wer kaak gin karŋiƴo ho kiɗay perew di. Koɗok di, busam-ak amiltu asaan kiɗco sooɗ di.
41004006	Wiktin taat pat korsitu, ta aaƴiig kuuk amil-aku asaan ŋu bal paaye caari.
41004007	Daarin̰ gay sollitu ɗo wer kaak gin pompal kuuk gin jamay. Ŋu maaɗiy sawa nam pompal-ak gootiigu, yoo roŋ sa ŋu bal imile.
41004008	Kar daarin̰ gay sollitu ɗo kiɗ kaak samaane nam ŋu neetu. Ganduulin daarin̰ wee roŋ orok subba, daarin̰ orok bijigiƴ ho daarin̰ gay miya. »
41004009	Kar Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane, kuu cokiye ! »
41004010	Wiktin ta Iisa sin̰jitu sooɗ min gee-ak, maajirnay iŋ gee kuuk goy ɗo serpey indiig a ŋaaco gaare baat ta daŋlal.
41004011	Ŋa telkiico aman : « Buŋ gaarkoŋ loko maan kaak cigile kaak kaawa ɗo bi ka Meennuwiy. Kar ɗo gee ku pey gay, ŋa kaawaaco iŋ dele ka daŋlal.
41004012	Asaan ‟ Ya ŋu tala sa, ar ŋu tallo ho ya ŋu cokiya sa, ar ŋu cokayɗo. Yampa, ta-aŋ ŋuu jipte goyin̰co ho Buŋ yaaco saamiye. ” »
41004013	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ku ibanno baat ta daŋlal-anta walla ? Kar di maman kuu ibine baat ta daŋlal ta pey ?
41004014	Anne-ak, gem kaak luwaw, ŋaar totira kaaw ta Buŋdi. Ŋuur kuuk cokiyaat kaaw gay, ŋuur ar wer ka busam solliyo.
41004015	Gee daarin̰, ŋuur ar bit ka botildi, wer ka kaaw-at totiriyo. Min ŋu doriit kaaw-at di, Seetanne asiy imiliit min ɗo aditco.
41004016	Kar daarin̰co gay, ŋuur ar wer kaak gin karŋiƴo. Ŋu cokiyiit kaaw ta Buŋdi ho koɗok di, ŋu ooyiit iŋ galal.
41004017	Kar kaaw-at gay, ŋu rasgitɗo taa paaye caari, ŋu obiit ɗo menuwir di. Ya taaɓin ase wal gee waraagu ɗo bi ka imaanco, ek di ŋu rasiita.
41004018	Pey daarin̰co ar wer kaak gin pompal kuuk gin jamay. Ŋu cokiyiit kaawo,
41004019	kar gay, ŋu pakira ɗo goyin̰co di, ŋu bariya malle ka duniiner, ŋu diya gelbinco ɗo gamin ku duniiner. Gamin ŋuur-ak imiliit kaaw taat ŋu dortu min ɗo aditco ho ta rawtiy maala.
41004020	Gee daarin̰ gay ar wer ka samaane. Ŋuur-ak cokiyiit kaawo, ŋu ooyiita ho ta wiyiy roŋ : daarin̰ wee roŋ orok subba, daarin̰ orok bijigiƴ ho daarin̰ gay miya. »
