41004021	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ginno gem kaak biƴa lampa ho ŋa zuɓkiit iŋ bardila wala ŋa diyiit ba daŋlil. Kar gay, ya gem biƴ lampa-ak, ŋa diyiit ɗo wer ka jaɗaŋ.
41004022	Gamin okin̰co kuuk cigile, ŋuu imilin̰co kara, ho kuuk ŋu rakaaɗo a gee yaa ibinin̰co sa, ŋuu ibinin̰co nam ŋuu talin̰co waraŋ.
41004023	Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane kuu cokiye. »
41004024	Iisa ɗiyiico pey aman : « Pakiroŋ samaane ɗo maan kaak kuu cokiye ! Buŋ yaako yeepin̰ maan kaak ku giniy ɗo geemir, kar ŋaako gaaye pey min kuwa.
41004025	Gem kaak gine, Buŋ yaaji gaaye pey min kuwa. Kar ŋaar kaak bal gineŋ gay, ya ŋa diy kaay a ŋa gin maanna oki, ŋuuji imilin̰ minniney. »
41004026	Iisa ɗiytu pey aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi ar gem kaak liya buur.
41004027	Gem-ak, aando, ŋa weƴiyo, ƴiriy ŋa goyiy mento, kar ŋa ibanno maman kooy amiliyo ho ta maaɗiyo.
41004028	Ta amiliy-ak, kiɗ boosit ko. Ta teesiy ja min aaro, ta buriyiyo, ta pikiyo, ta obiy roŋ, kar kat ta niyiyo.
41004029	Ya koo-at nee, gem-ak iciy goole, ŋa teesiy seɗe, asaan wiktin ta seɗindi nec ko. »
41004030	Iisa ɗiytu pey aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar maa ho naa gaarin iŋ daŋil ta moo ?
41004031	Taar ar busum ka mutaard kaak gem luwtu. Min roŋ okin̰co, ŋaar di kapak tak-tak.
41004032	Kar ya ŋa amile ho ŋa maaɗe, ŋa ɗeetiy tatik pak gamin okin̰co kuuk amila ɗo jineendi. Ŋa imiliy leegin aginda nam ɗiiɗ sa saaƴiy geriyco ɗo leeginay. »
41004033	Ansii ko, Iisa garkiyiy gee iŋ dele ka daŋlal dakina ar taar-an di, uudin taat ŋuu gedire obe ɗo kaƴco.
41004034	Ŋa garkiyiy gee illa iŋ dele ka daŋlal di. Kar ya ŋu ɗak keeco iŋ maajirnay gay, ŋa gaariico baati okintiti.
41004035	Ƴiriy taar-at di, iŋ maako, Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay a ŋuu aale aar barrer.
41004036	Iisa gay goy ka markabar di. Kar maajirnay ɗeettu iŋ ŋaara, ŋu rasiig gee ɗo goŋgumor. Markabin daarin̰ sa ɗeettu iŋ ŋuura.
41004037	Koɗok di, us teestu abire gidi-gidi-gidi ɗo barrer ho amay teestu awke. Amay aastu ɗo markabar nam ŋa miintu.
41004038	Wiktin taar-at, Iisa gay weƴa ɗo markabar aaro nam ŋa tokume. Maajirnay niiniig aman : « Gem kol tacco, kiŋ isin̰cinno ga ? Ucu ! Amay tiyaate. »
41004039	Iisa niintu, kar ŋa leesiiji ɗo usi ho ŋa ɗiyiico ɗo amiydi aman : « Bugumoŋ ! Yalla peyoŋ ! » Ek di us peytu ho wer siimtu dil.
41004040	Kar Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Maa di ku giniy kolaw ansi ? Yoo diŋka, ku amnayɗo misa walla ? »
41004041	Ŋuur gay kolaw un̰jiico, kar ŋu teestu inde ziŋkico aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ kat maa gemir kaak nam usu iŋ amay din sa karmiyaaga ? »
41005001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ottu aar barre ka Galile, ɗo kiɗ ka gee ku ŋu koliy Zeraziyenna.
41005002	Iisa paaytu min ka markabar. Tala kar gem rakki aariɗ obga amiliiji min ɗo maggindi.
41005003	Gem-ak goyin̰ji ɗo maggindi di. Yoo iŋ jinzirre oki, ŋu gedarro ɗuunin̰ji.
41005004	Awalle, ŋu ɗooɗgiijiig asin̰ji iŋ jinzirre ho ŋu ɗuungiijiig pisin̰ji iŋ zirŋac. Kar ŋa okiɗiig zirŋac ho ŋa kilig jinzirre. Ginno pey gem ka bombo yaa gedire ɗuunin̰ji.
41005005	Ƴiriyo, aando, goyin̰ji ɗo maggindi ho ka dambiniidi di. Ŋa kooliyo ho meen̰ji di awriy ziŋkay iŋ dambay.
41005006	Min ŋa taliig Iisa min serek di, ŋa iciig gaɗi ho ŋa astu dersa ɗo uŋji.
41005007	Kar ŋa kooltu raɗa aman : « Ki rakaan ginin maman, Iisa, roŋ ka Buŋ ka kuwa ? Baan̰u, nu indaaciŋ, dakin taaɓiyinduɗo ! »
41005008	Gem-ak kaawiy pa-ak, asaan Iisa ɗiyiiji aman : « Amal, rasig gem-aŋka, aariɗ ka maala-aŋka. »
41005009	Kar Iisa indiig aman : « Kiŋ siŋjiŋ waa ? » Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : « Nun siŋdu ‟ Dakinaw ”, asaan nin dakina. »
41005010	Kar ŋa loklikiiji ɗo Iisa a ŋaa n̰aamin̰coɗo kara min ɗo darrer.
41005011	Ɗo wer-ak, gin kinziirna dakina gooƴa ka dambar.
41005012	Aariɗna loklikiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Atikni ni ɓaay un̰je ɗo kinziirna aŋkure. »
41005013	Iisa ooytu. Hiyya, aariɗna-ak amiltu min ɗo gem-aka ho ŋu un̰jitu ɗo kinziirnar. Koɗok di, min ka dambar, kinziirna-ak okin̰co eeztu tem iŋ gaɗco, ŋu sollitu ɗo barrer ho amay teeyiigu. Kinziirna-ak yaa nece ar alip seer pa.
41005014	Min gee kuuk gooƴa kinziirna-ak taliig maan kaak kuuniy-ak, ŋu gaɗtu, ŋu iyiit kabarre-at ɗo geegirdi ho ɗo hellinniidi. Min gee doriit kabarre-at, ŋu astu talin̰ maan kaak kuuniy-aka.
41005015	Ŋu asiiji ɗo Iisa ho ŋu taliig gem ka aariɗna obga-ak goy keɗer, ŋa coole nam ŋa is ko kesuune. Min ŋu taliiga-ak, kolaw obiigu.
41005016	Gee kuuk talig maanna-ak osiico ɗo een̰co maman gem kaak aariɗna obga-ak cooltu ho maman aariɗna-ak un̰jitu ɗo kinziirnar.
41005017	Kar gee-ak kaawiiji ɗo Iisa a ŋaa baan̰e, ŋaa ɗeete min ɗo kiɗco.
41005018	Wiktin taat Iisa n̰eptu ka markabar, ŋa rakiy ko ɗeete, gem ka cool-ak loklikiiji a ŋa ɓaa iŋ ŋaara.
41005019	Iisa gay poocji. Kar ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Yeep gerko, gasgu geen̰jiŋ ho osco maan kaak Buŋ giniijiŋ ho maman ŋa taltu aminduwin̰. »
41005020	Gem-ak ɗeettu. Ŋa teestu kaawe ɗo kiɗ kaak ŋu koliy Geegirnay ku Orok. Ŋa osiicog ay maan kaak Iisa giniiji. Gee okin̰co ku dorit kaawoy-at ajbiytu.
41005021	Wiktin taat Iisa yeeptu iŋ markaba min aar barrer, ŋa paaytu ɗo goŋgumor ho gee dakina asiiji.
41005022	Ɗo wer-ak, gin gem rakki siŋji Jayrus astu. Ŋaar ko tatkaw ka ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar. Min ŋa taliig Iisa, ŋa dersitu ɗo uŋji.
41005023	Ŋa loklikiiji aman : « Romor ta kapak raka mate. As kiiti lee pisin̰jiŋ ɗo kaati, taa coole ! »
41005024	Hiyya, Iisa ɗeettu iŋ ŋaara. Gee dakina aaɗiigu nam ŋu tirƴaaga.
41005025	Ɗo wer-ak, gin daatik rakki baarti taaɓiyaata. Elgin orok iŋ seer, ŋu min̰a min̰en di.
41005026	Ta taaɓiy dakina, ta jaaw ɗo gay dawner dakina, ta gaasig ka pisinti. Iŋ taar-at oki ta bal coole, baarti goy min̰a di.
41005027	Ta dortu gee kaawa ɗo bi ka Iisa, ta sin̰jitu moota min aar ta geemir, ta diiriit bit ka kesuuney.
41005028	Ta giniy pa-ak asaan ɗo adti ta kaawa aman : « Ya nu gedir diirin bit ka kesuuney-an di, naa coole. »
41005029	Ek di baarti peytu, ta aawtu ziti kadar ta coole.
41005030	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa aawtu kadar gudurre amil min ɗo ziy. Ŋa kolsitu, ŋa indiig gee-ak aman : « Waa diirit kesuuner ? »
41005031	Maajirnay telkiiji aman : « Ki tala di gee tirƴaaciŋ, kar ki indiy kat a ‟ waa ga diirintu ” ? »
41005032	Iisa gay talaag di, ŋa rakiy ibine waa kaak diirga.
41005033	Daatko-at kolaw obiita, ta teestu azire asaan ta iban maan kaak astiti. Ta astu, ta dersitu ɗo uŋji, kar ta kaawijiit seen okintiti.
41005034	Iisa ɗiyiitit aman : « Gem kol romoy, imaanke cooliŋke. Ɓaa iŋ aapiye. Raɗuwke rasiŋke. »
41005035	Wiktin taat Iisa kaawiy pa-ak, gee astu min ger ka Jayrus tatkaw ka ger ka salaaner-aka ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Romon̰ taar mat ko. Maa di ki taaɓiyiig pey Rabbin-aŋka ? »
41005036	Kar Iisa doriit kaaw-ata ho ŋa telkiiji ɗo Jayrus aman : « Dak ginenno kolaw. Aaman di. »
41005037	Iisa toɗiico ɗo geemir a ŋuu aaɗin̰coɗo, illa ŋa kol Piyer, Zaak, iŋ siŋji Yaaya.
41005038	Min ŋu ottu wer kan̰ Jayrus, Iisa gastu gee dakina hawiyaw. Ŋu alaw ho ŋu koolaw.
41005039	Iisa un̰jitu geero, ŋa kaawiico ɗo gee-ak aman : « Maa di ku aliyo ho ku giniy hawne ? Mic-an taar bal mate, ta weƴa di. »
41005040	Gee-ak ajimiyaag Iisa. Kar ŋaar gay imiliig okin̰co kara, illa ɗak aginiyti ku micar iŋ maajirnay ku subba di. Kar ŋa un̰jitu zugar, wer ka mic-at goyiyo.
41005041	Ŋa obiit min ɗo pisinti ho ŋa kaawiitit aman : « Talita kum ! » Ampa-ak aman : « Gem kol romoy, nu kaawaake : ucu ! »
41005042	Mic-at uctu puruk, ta teestu jaawe. Elginti orok iŋ seera. Ɗo wer-ak, ta bico sa amallo ho ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak.
41005043	Kar Iisa karmiig a ŋu kaawenno tak-tak ɗo gemor ho ŋa ɗiyiico pey a ŋuuti bere tee.
41006001	Hiyya, Iisa amiltu min ɗo wer-aka, ŋa ɗeettu ɗo darrey ho maajirnay sa aaɗiiga.
41006002	Ƴiriy ta sabitdi, Iisa ɓaawtu ɗo ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar ho ŋa teestu garkiye gee. Ŋuur kuuk cokiyaaga-ak, okin̰co ajbiytu tak-tak. Ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : « Kaawnay-aŋ, ŋa gasig min momo ? Ilimji ho gudurre taat ŋa giniy gamin kuuk ajbay-aŋ, ŋa gasig min momo ?
41006003	Yampa, ŋa ginaaɗo gem ka gerkiɗe atiydi-aka, roŋti ka Mariyam, siŋco kan̰ Yakuub, Yuusup, Zuud iŋ Simon ? Siŋtay ku daaɗ sa goy iŋ ginte annen ɗoo di ? » Taar-an ko toɗco aamine.
41006004	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ay wero, nabiin̰ce, ŋu karmiyaag di. Illa ɗo wer kaak ŋu weeyiiga ho ɗo adiy ka gerco di, ŋu karmiygigɗo. »
41006005	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa bal gine gamin dakina ku ajbay, illa ŋa lee pisin̰ji ɗo gee minaw minaw paa di ku raɗaw ho ŋu cooltu.
41006006	Iisa ajbiytu ɗo bi ka imaanco taat sooɗ-ata. Kar ŋa jaawig hellinnan ku moota iŋ geeger ka Nazareet, ŋa garkiyiy gee.
41006007	Ƴiriy rakki, Iisa koliig maajirnay kuuk orok iŋ seera ho ŋa beriico izinne taat ŋuu atke aariɗna. Ŋa n̰aamiig seer, seer.
41006008	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Yaman ya ku ɓaawaw, dakoŋ icenno yoo maanna, wala tee, wala mokolle, wala gurus, illa doŋkilo.
41006009	Isoŋ n̰ugira ho kesuun sa taat ɗo ziŋkikon di. »
41006010	Kar ŋa kaawiico pey aman : « Ɗo ay ger kaak ku paaytu, goyoŋ eɗen di nam menuwko yaa gaase. Ya menuwko gaase, kar kuu ɗeete min ɗo ger-aka.
41006011	Kar wer kaak gee pooc obiŋko ho ŋu pooc cokiye kaawkoŋ gay, ɗeetoŋ min eɗe ho kokoŋ burintal kuuk ɗo asiŋko. Pa-ak yaaco gaare kadar ŋu gin jookumo. »
41006012	Maajirnay ɗeettu, ŋu teestu kaawe ɗo geemir a ŋuu jipte goyin̰co.
41006013	Ŋu atkiy aariɗna ho ŋu etiliico sewe ɗo gee kuuk raɗaw, kar gee-ak cooliyo.
41006014	Wiktin taat Herood dortu gee kaawa bi ka Iisa, siŋji alaw aale, asaan ŋu ɗiya aman : « Gem-aŋ, ŋaar Yaaya-Batist ! Ŋaar nooy min ɗo muuti. Paa ko, ŋa gintu gudurre taat ŋa giniy gamin kuuk ajbay. »
41006015	Kar daarin̰ a ŋa Eli. Daarin̰ gay a ŋa nabiin̰ce kaak ar nabiinna kuuk min awalle.
41006016	Min Herood doriig kaawin-aŋ okin̰co, ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Ŋa Yaaya-Batist kaak nu ɗukumtu kaay-ak di nooye. »
41006017	-
41006018	Ɗo wiktin taat Yaaya goyiy misa iŋ odinay, Herood gay obit Herodiyaad, daaciy ta siŋji Pilip. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Yaaya kaawiiji ɗo Herood aman : « Gaanuun baljiŋ bere botol taat kii obin Herodiyaad, daaciy ta siŋjiŋ. » Min Herood dortu pa-ak, ŋa bertu izinne ŋu obiig Yaaya, ŋu ɗuuniig iŋ jinzirre ho ŋu un̰jiig daŋaayne.
41006019	Herodiyaad obiijit ɗo Yaaya, ta bariya ko muutuy di. Kar ta bal gase botol.
41006020	Herood gay karmiyaag Yaaya. Ya ŋa cokiy kaawoy, kaaw-at barjilaaga. Iŋ taar-at oki, ŋa el cokiye kaawnay. Asaan ŋa iban kadar Yaaya kaawa seene ho ŋa gem sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Herood gooƴaag min ɗo Herodiyaad.
41006021	Kar ƴiriy rakki, Herood gintu iidin ta alguway. Ŋa koliig agindaw ku darrer, agindaw ku askirnar ho iŋ aginay ku Galile okin̰co.
41006022	Ɗo wer-ak, romti ta Herodiyaad un̰jitu waare ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Min Herood iŋ gee kuuk ŋa koltu taliita-ak, ta ajbiygu nam Herood kaawiitit a ŋaati bere ay maan kaak ta inditu di.
41006023	Kar ŋa togiliitit aman : « Iŋ Buŋ, ya maan kaak ka inditu di, naake berin̰ji yoo cenne ta meennuwir oki. »
41006024	Hiyya, mic-at amiltu, ta indiit yaaco aman : « Naa indeŋ kat maa ? » Yaaco gay telkiitit aman : « Ɓaa indig kaay ka Yaaya-Batist. »
41006025	Mic-at yeepiiji koɗok ɗo sultan ho ta kaawiiji aman : « Nu raka kiidu berin̰ji kaay ka Yaaya-Batist annen di ɗo gartar ! »
41006026	Ɗo wer-ak, sultan Herood adiy nigtu. Kar min ŋa togil ɗo uŋco ka geemir gay, ŋa bal nakire pey ɗo kaawoy.
41006027	Ek di sultan tabirtu askirin̰ce ho ŋa beriiji izinne a ŋa ɓaa iyin̰ji kaay ka Yaaya-Batist. Askirin̰ce-ak ɓaawtu ɗo daŋaayner ho ŋa ɗukumiig kaay ka Yaaya-Batist.
41006028	Min ŋa ɗukumga, ŋa iciig ɗo gartar ho ŋa beriitig ɗo gemso-ata. Taar gay beriitig ɗo yaaco.
41006029	Wiktin ta maajirnay ku Yaaya doriit kabarre-at, ŋu asiig ic momtey ho ŋu tiisiiga.
41006030	Min paliinna yeeptu, ŋu osiiji ɗo Iisa gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu gintu ho ɓilde kaak ŋu ɓilditu gee.
41006031	Gee dakina asiyo ho ŋu yeepiyo nam Iisa iŋ maajirnay bal gase wiktin ta ŋuu tee. Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Yallinte yeero, ku ɓaay ɗak jammiye sooɗa. »
41006032	Hiyya, ŋu n̰eptu markaba ho ŋu ɗeettu keeco yeero.
41006033	Wiktin taat ŋu ɗeetiy-ak di, gee dakina ibiniig wer kaak ŋu ɓaayiyo. Gee ku min ɗo hellinniidi okin̰co amiltu iŋ asin̰co, ŋu gaɗtu, ŋu ɓaawtu ɗo wer-aka nam ŋu ogiriico ɗo kun̰ Iisa.
41006034	Min Iisa paaytu min ka markabar, ŋa gasiig gee kuuk dakin-aku. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa taltu aminduwco, asaan ŋu ar tamgi kuuk ginno gemco ka gooƴindi. Kar ŋa teestu ɓildin̰co iŋ kaawin dakina.
41006035	Wiktin taat pat gal ko, maajirnay sin̰jiiji moota ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, pat-an ɗeete ho wer sa serek.
41006036	Kaawco ɗo gee-aŋ a ŋuu totire ɗo hellinniidi ho ɗo geray ku gee kuuk goy yeero, ŋu ɓaayiy gidiye tee. »
41006037	Kar Iisa telkiico aman : « Kuŋ maaniikon di beron̰co tee ! » Ŋuur gay indiig aman : « Gee-aŋ, gurus dakin ja kat yaaco nece. Ki raka a ni ɓaa gidiye paa di walla ? »
41006038	Iisa gay ɗiyiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ, dakoŋ tala, ku gin mappa minaw. » Ŋu daktu tala, kar ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Ni gin mappa beeƴi iŋ boos seera. »
41006039	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Kaawon̰co ɗo gee-aŋ a ŋuu goye ka gan̰ ka balan̰. »
41006040	Hiyya, ŋu goytu, ŋu ɗeettu werin dakina, daarin̰ miya, daarin̰ gay orok beeƴ.
41006041	Min ŋu goye, ŋa sokiig mappa kaak beeƴ iŋ boos kuuk seer-aku, ŋa jaaltu kaay ka samaaner ho ŋa deltu barkin ɗo Buŋdi. Kar ŋa pirsiig mappa ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnar a ŋuu ɗeeɗin̰ ɗo gee-aku. Boos ku seer-ak sa, ŋa ɗeeɗiicog okin̰co.
41006042	Okin̰co ŋu teetu, ŋu aaytu.
41006043	Kar maajirin miintu girdin orok iŋ seer iŋ mappa ho boos kuuk ɗak-aku.
41006044	Miday kuuk tee-ak gay yaa nece ar alip beeƴ pa.
41006045	Min ŋaar-ak, koɗok di, Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay a ŋuu n̰epe ka markabar ŋuuji ogire ar barrer aaniy geeger ka Betsayda. Ŋaar gay ɗaktu a ŋaa n̰aamin̰co ja gee-aku.
41006046	Min ŋa n̰aamiigu, ŋa coktu ka dambar a ŋaa inde Buŋ.
41006047	Pat gale, maajirnay iŋ markabco ot ko ɗatik barrer. Iisa gay ɗak keeji kara.
41006048	Us teestu abire gidi-gidi-gidi, ŋa ŋaamiigu nam markabco sin̰jaaɗo. Iŋ ɗatik kawtira, Iisa jaawa ka amiydi, ŋa ica botilco nam ŋa gaay birin̰co.
41006049	Wiktin taat ŋu taliig Iisa jaawa ka amiydi-ak, ŋuur a wal ta kelmo ho ŋu teestu koole raɗa.
41006050	Okin̰co min ŋu taliiga-ak, kolaw un̰jiico tak-tak. Kar koɗok di Iisa diyiico aman : « Oboŋ aditko ! Ŋa nunun di, dakoŋ ginenno kolaw. »
41006051	Kar ŋa coktu iŋ ŋuura ka markabar, us peytu min ɗo abirin̰ji ho maarjirnay sa ta bico amallo.
41006052	Ŋu ajbiytu-ak asaan maan ka Iisa gintu iŋ mappa-ak sa, ŋu bal ibine baay, kaƴco ɗibire.
41006053	Min Iisa iŋ maajirnay aaliig barre-ak, ŋu ottu ɗo kiɗ ka Zenezareet ho ŋu peyiig markabco ɗo goŋgumor.
41006054	Ŋu paaytu keɗer, koɗok di gee ibiniig Iisa.
41006055	Gee-ak jaawiig kiɗ ka Zenezareet okin̰ji, ŋu miniy ziŋkico ɗo wer ka Iisa ottu, kar ŋu iyiijig geen̰co kuuk raɗaw iŋ dariŋgilnico.
41006056	Ɗo ay helline wal geeger wal ɗo geray ku gee kuuk goy yeero, ŋu imiliig geen̰co ku raɗaw ɗo wer ka berel. Kar ŋu marmiliiji a ŋaa rasin̰co ŋuu diire kin bit ka kesuuney-at di. Paa ko, okin̰co kuuk diirta-at cooltu.
41007001	Gee ku ŋu koliy Pariziyenna iŋ agindaw daarin̰ ku gaanuun ka Yuudinnar astu min Zeruzaleem. Ŋu n̰umiiji ɗo Iisa.
41007002	Ŋu tal maajirnay daarin̰ bal karmiye ace ka pisin̰co ar ka aginiyco gingiy ya ŋu raka tee.
41007003	Ka seener gay, Pariziyenna iŋ Yuudinna okin̰co, ŋuur karmiya kaaw taat aginiyco rasiico. Uudin ta aadin ta aginiyco, ŋuur taaɗo ya ŋu bal ace pisin̰co samaane.
41007004	Ya ŋu yeep min ɗo suuginer, ŋu aca ja asin̰co kar kat ŋu tiyiyo. Ta taar-anno di, ŋu karmiya pey gamin ku pey kuuk aginiyco gaariico ar ace ka kordindinar, ka balsinsindi iŋ ka koŋgilgildi ku hadinner.
41007005	Pariziyenna iŋ agindaw ku gaanuun ka Yuudinnar indiig Iisa aman : « Maa di maajirnan̰ iciyɗo kaaw taat aginiyte rasiite ? Ya ŋu raka tee, maa di ŋu acgiyɗo pisin̰co ar kaak aginiyte ɗiyiite ? »
41007006	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Taloŋ gee kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkico di ho ta aditco keetiti-aŋku ! Kaaw taat Buŋ ɗiytu ɗo bi kaŋko, taar ka seener. Ŋa kaaw awalle iŋ bi ka nabi Ezaayi aman : ‟ Gee ŋuur-aŋ beraadu horoomin iŋ biŋkico di, kar aditco gay serek min nunu.
41007007	Abaadin taat ŋu abdiyin-an, taar uca maalan di, asaan garaan taat ŋu garkiyiy gee sa, geen di imilit min ɗo kaƴco. ” »
41007008	Kar Iisa kaawiico pey aman : « Gaanuun kaak Buŋ kaawtu, kuŋ rasig serpiya, kar ku karmiya kat kaaw ta geemir.
41007009	Ku zeeɗa pooce gaanuun ka Buŋdi, kar ku makiig iŋ kaaw ta aginiydi !
41007010	Muusa, ŋaar ɗiyko aman : ‟ Ber horoomine ɗo yaako iŋ takko. ” Ŋa ɗiy pey aman : ‟ Waan kaak niga biy iŋ tacco wala iŋ yaaco, tan̰ji-at, illa muutu. ”
41007011	Kar kuŋ gay garkiya gee a ŋuu kaawe ɗo aginiyco aman : ‟ Maan kaak zer naako bere ka gaayor, taar-at satkin taat waaliya Buŋ, ”
41007012	ho ansi-ak, ŋu gediraaɗo pey ŋuuco bere.
41007013	Kaawin kuuk ku gaariy ɗo ziŋkiko, ŋuur deet kaaw ta Buŋdi. Ku gina pey gamin dakina kuuk ar ŋuur-aŋku. »
41007014	Kar Iisa koliig pey gee, ŋa kaawiico aman : « Laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane ho cokiyoŋ ! Naako dele daŋla.
41007015	Maan kaak gem tiyiy, ŋaar nigaagɗo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ŋaar maan ka amila min ɗo gelbiney kat nigaag ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. [
41007016	Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane kuu cokiye. »]
41007017	Wiktin ta Iisa rasiig gee ŋa un̰jitu geero, maajirnay indiig aman : « Gaarnin̰ ja baat ta daŋlal-anta. »
41007018	Iisa telkiico aman : « Kuŋ kaƴko ɗibir ga ? Taloŋ, maan ka gem tiyiy-ak, ŋaar niggigɗo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
41007019	Maan ka gem tiyiy-ak, ŋaar un̰ja ɗo adiy, kar ba aaro, gem-ak ɓaay dooye. Maan ka gem tiyiy-ak, ŋaar n̰aamgigɗo ŋaa gine gamin ku samaanno. » Iisa kaawtu pa-ak a gamin okin̰co, ŋuur ku teendi.
41007020	Kar Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Kaaw ta gem kaawiyo iŋ maan ka ŋa giniyo, ŋuur di nigaag ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
41007021	Asaan min ɗo gelbiney-ak ko amiliy pikirre taat samaanno ta n̰aamiig ɗo ɓaaƴe kaak mun̰jam, ɗo kokinaw, ɗo dee ka geemir,
41007022	ɗo kokine ka miday wal daaɗ kara. Ampaa ko, ŋu giniy tamaanaw, ŋu giniy motol, ŋu caaciyiy gee, ŋu giniy ta ŋu rakiyo, ŋu giniy hasuudinaw, ŋu nigiy biŋkico iŋ een̰co, ŋu iciy ziŋkico, ho ŋu poociy jipte goyin̰co.
41007023	Ŋuur-aŋ ko gamin ku samaanno kuuk amila min ɗo adiy ka gemor, ho nigaag ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. »
41007024	Min Iisa gaasiit kaawoy, ŋa uctu min ɗo wer-aka ho ŋa ɗeettu ɗo kiɗ ka Tiir. Ŋa un̰jitu ɗo ger rakki, ŋa rakaaɗo waan yaa ibine a ŋa goy eɗe. Kar gay, ŋa bal gedire cigile ziy.
41007025	-
41007026	Tala kar daatik rakki romti aariɗ obta dortu gee kaawa ɗo bi ka Iisa, ta asiiji. Taar gay Yuudin̰caɗo, ŋu weeyit ɗo geeger Siri ɗo ka kiɗ ka Penisi. Min ta asiiji, ta dersitu ɗo uŋji ho ta marmiliiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, baan̰u ! Atkig aariɗ-aŋ min ɗo romor. »
41007027	Iisa ɗiyiitit aman : « Ras ja koogin yaa aaye ! Yampa, kuuniyaaɗo ŋuu icin̰ji tee ka kooginar ho ŋuu orin̰ ɗo kan̰ir. »
41007028	Daatko-at kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, kaawon̰-an ka seener. Kar kan̰ sa, ŋuur tiya meerin kuuk gaama min ɗo pise ku kooginar di. »
41007029	Min pa-ak, Iisa ɗiyiitit aman : « Kaawke ka seener ! Yeep ko gerke, aariɗ, ŋaar amil ko min ɗo romke. »
41007030	Hiyya, daatko-at ɗuwtu geero. Min ta ote, ta gasiit romti aariɗ rasta ho ta jammiya ko ka daŋlil.
41007031	Min Iisa kaawtu iŋ daatko-at, ŋa ɗeettu min kiɗ ka Tiir, ŋa aaɗtu min kiɗ ka Sidon iŋ kiɗ kaak ŋu koliy Geegirnay ku Orok ho ŋa birtu ɗo biy barre ka Galile.
41007032	Ɗo wer-ak ŋu iyiiji gem kaak duŋguyuuyu ho gaaƴay amallo. Ŋu marmiliiji ɗo Iisa a ŋaa lee pisin̰ji ɗo gem-ak ŋaa coole.
41007033	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa obiig gem-aka, ŋa imiliig serek min ɗo geemir ho ŋa koln̰iijig ɗeŋginay ku gem-ak iŋ kormay, kar ŋa pictu uln̰a ɗo kormay ho ŋa diirijiit leesey ta gem-aka.
41007034	Iisa kociltu kuwa, ŋa niiztu ho ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo gem-ak aman : « Eppata ! » ansi-ak aman : « Pilu ! »
41007035	Ɗo wer-ak, koɗok di, gem-ak teestu cokiye, leesey teestu awke, ho ŋa baagtu kaawe samaane.
41007036	Iisa kaawiico ɗo gee okin̰co aman : « Dakoŋ kaawenno ɗo gemor. » Min ŋa kaawiico pa-ak, ŋuur gay totiraat kat kaaw ɗo geemir.
41007037	Gee-ak ajbiytu tak-tak ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Way, gem-aŋ gina riy samaane nam duŋguyuuyin sa, ŋa coolaagu ŋu doriyo ho gee kuuk gaaƴiƴco amallo sa, kaawiyo ! »
41008001	Ɗo wiktin taar-at gee dakina n̰umtu ho ŋu ginno maan ka teendi. Min pa-ak, Iisa koliig maajirnay ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman :
41008002	« Gee-aŋ, nu tala aminduwco, asaan mena subba ŋu goy iŋ nun di ho ŋu ginno maan ka teendi.
41008003	Ya nu n̰aamaag aditco aaƴe, gudurrico yaa arme botildi, asaan daarin̰co as min serek. »
41008004	Maajirnay telkiiji aman : « Kalaan ta aŋka, kar giico gase tee momo kaak yaa necin̰co ? »
41008005	Iisa indiig aman : « Ku gin mappa minaw ? » Ŋuur gay aman : « Ni gin mappa peesira »
41008006	Kar Iisa kaawiico ɗo gee-ak a ŋuu goye keɗer. Hiyya, ŋa sokiig mappa kaak peesir-aka, ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi, ŋa pirsiiga ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnay a ŋuuco ɗeeɗin̰ji. Hiyya, maajirnay ɗeeɗiicog ɗo gee-aku.
41008007	Ŋu gin oki teŋilna minaw-minaw pa. Iisa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi ɗo teŋilna-aku ho ŋa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay a ŋuuco ɗeeɗin̰co oki !
41008008	Okin̰co, ŋu teetu, ŋu aaytu. Maajirna sokiig kaak ɗake nam ŋu miin girdin peesira.
41008009	Miday ku tee-ak yaa nece alip pooɗ pa. Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ kate ! »
41008010	Kar koɗok di, ŋa n̰eptu markaba iŋ maajirnay ho ŋu birtu ɗo kiɗ ka Dalmanuta.
41008011	Pariziyenna astu, ŋu teestu meele iŋ Iisa. Ŋu rakiiji ɗibe. Ŋu indiig a ŋaaco gaare maan kaak ajbay kaak asa min ɗo Buŋdi.
41008012	Iisa niiztu puus kar ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Maa di gee ku diŋka indiy maan kaak ajbay ? Ka seener nu kaawaako, gee ku diŋka-aŋ, nu gediraaɗo naaco gine maan kaak ajbay loco. »
41008013	Kar ŋa rasiigu, ŋa n̰eptu markaba ho ŋa aaltu aar barrer.
41008014	Min ŋu ottu ɗatik barrer, maajirnay pakirtu a ŋu bal ice tee, ŋu gin mappa rakki di ɗo markabco.
41008015	Iisa taaƴiigu aman : « Yaman pakiroŋ ! Goyoŋ goɗom min gel ta Pariziyennar iŋ ta Herood. »
41008016	Maajirnay kaawtu benannico aman : « Ŋa kaawiite pa-ak asaan gi bal ice mappa-aŋ di walla ? »
41008017	Iisa ibiniit pikirrico ho ŋa indiig aman : « Maa di ku kaawiy aman : ‟ Gi bal ice mappa-aŋ di walla ? ” Yoo diŋ sa ku tallo misa walla ? Kaƴko icɗo misa ? Ŋu goy misa bombo di ?
41008018	Ku talig gamin okin̰co kuuk nu gintu ho ku dorig gamin okin̰co kuuk nu ɗiytu, kar kaƴko icɗo di bat.
41008019	Wiktin taat nu pirsiig mappa ka beeƴi, miday alip beeƴ teetu, ku miin girdin minaw iŋ ka ɗake ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ni miin girdin orok iŋ seera. »
41008020	Kar Iisa indiigu pey aman : « Hadi wiktin taat nu pirsiig mappa ka peesira, gee alip pooɗ teetu-ak gay, ku miin girdin minaw iŋ ka ɗake ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ni miin girdin peesira. »
41008021	Iisa ɗiyiico pey aman : « Yoo diŋ sa ku ibinginno a nu waa ? »
41008022	Hiyya, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ottu Betsayda. Annere, ŋu ɗaan̰iiji nool rakki, kar ŋu marmiliiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, baan̰u ! Diirga, ŋaa pile. »
41008023	Iisa obiig pisin̰ji ka nool-ak, ŋa imiliig serek min ɗo helliner. Kar ŋa giniiji ulin̰ ɗo odinay, ŋa leeyiiji pise ho ŋa indiig aman : « Ek kat ki tala maanna ? »
41008024	Nool-ak telkiiji aman : « Nu tala gee ar atay, kar ŋu jaawaw. »
41008025	Iisa leeyiiji pey pise ɗo odinay. Gem-ak odinay piltu. Ŋa taliy ko karaŋ.
41008026	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa ɗiyiiji aman : « Ɗeet ko gerko, dak jagenno ɗo helliner. »
41008027	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ɗeettu ɗo hellinnan ku moota iŋ kiɗ ka Sezare ka Pilip. Ɗo botildi, ŋa indiig maajirnay aman : « Ɗo bi kanto, gee kaawa a nu waa ? »
41008028	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Daarin̰ kaawa a ki Yaaya-Batist, daarin̰, a ki Eli, ho daarin̰ gay, a ki min nabiinna ku min awalle. »
41008029	Kar Iisa indiig pey aman : « Hadi kuŋ gay ɗiya a nu waa ? » Piyer telkiiji aman : « Kiŋke Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu. »
41008030	Kar Iisa karmiig maajirnay a ŋu kaawenno tak-tak ɗo waanna a ŋaar ko Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu.
41008031	Kar Iisa teestu pey ɓildin̰ maajirnay aman : « Illa nun Roŋ gemor, naa taaɓiyen̰ ja dakina. Aginay ku darrer, agindaw ku gay satkiner ho iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi yaan poocindu. Ŋuu asiin deendu ho ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. »
41008032	Ŋa kaawcot ko waraŋ di. Kar Piyer imiliig serpiya ho ŋa leesiiji.
41008033	Kar Iisa kolsiig maajirnay ho ŋa uciiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Ɓaa annere, Seetan-aŋka ! Pikirren̰, taar arro iŋ ta Buŋdi, taar ta geemir di. »
41008034	Kar Iisa koliig gee kuuk dakina ho iŋ maajirnay, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ya waan kaak rakaan aaɗindu, ŋaa pooce pey bariye galal ta meen̰ji, ŋaa icin̰ etoy ka taaɓiner ho ŋaan aaɗindu.
41008035	Asaan waan kaak raka jile goyin̰ji ka meen̰ji, ŋaa rawtin̰ji. Kar waan kaak rawtaag goyin̰ji ɗo bi kanto ho ɗo bi ka Kabarre ta Gala gay, ŋaa gase goye kaak taɓ.
41008036	Yampa, ya gem kaak obit duniin okintit ɗo pisin̰ji ho ŋa rawtig goyin̰ji, ŋaar-ak galilti gay maa ?
41008037	Ŋaa bere maa ŋaa gidiye goye ka gaasɗo ?
41008038	Gee ku diŋka, ŋuur gina taat samaanno ho ŋu newsiji kop ɗo Buŋdi. Ya gem kaak gina sokan̰ lotu iŋ ɗo kaawnar ɗo uŋco ka gee-aku, nun Roŋ gemor oki, naaji gine sokan̰ ɗo wiktin taat naa ase iŋ darjin ta Tanni ho iŋ ta ɗubal ku Buŋdi kuuk cawar oki. »
41009001	Iisa ɗiyiico pey aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, min gee kuuk goy anne-aŋ, daarin̰co mataaɗo di ŋuu talin Meennaw ta Buŋdi asa iŋ gudurre. »
41009002	Gin mena bijigiƴ, Iisa koliig Piyer, Zaak iŋ Yaaya ho ŋa iyiig keeco kuwa ka damba ta bolok. Tala kar Iisa ziy newse.
41009003	Kesuuney ɗeettu portik kar nam ta diya odina. Min irn̰en di, ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji, ginno gem kaak ya acin portik ansi.
41009004	Ta bite-aŋ di, maajirna taltu nabiinna seer bayintu. Nabiinna-ak, ŋuur Muusa iŋ Eli kat kaawa iŋ Iisa.
41009005	Hiyya, Piyer kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, gala ni goyiy anne-aŋka. Niiko siye tarram subba, rakki locin, rakki ɗo Muusa ho rakki gay ɗo Eli. »
41009006	Kar Piyer gay ibanno taat ŋaa kaawe, asaan kolaw obgu.
41009007	Min Piyer kaawa misan di, uc gootiigu ho min ɗo uc-at amila gaaƴ kaawa aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ Roŋdu, nu elgig dakina. Cokiyon kaawoy ! »
41009008	Koɗok di, maajirnay taliy-ak Muusa iŋ Eli sawle, illa Iisa keeji di goya.
41009009	Min ŋu paayiy min ka dambar, Iisa karmiig maajirnay aman : « Yaman, dakoŋ kaawenno ɗo waanna ɗo maan kaak ku taltu-aŋka nam nun Roŋ gemor, naa nooyen̰ ja min ɗo muuti. »
41009010	Ŋu ooyiit kaawoy. Kar ŋu teestu inde ziŋkico aman : « Ŋa raka kaawe maa, ŋa ɗiyiy a ‟ naa nooyen̰ ja aŋka ? ” »
41009011	Kar maajirnay indiig aman : « Maa di agindaw ku gaanuundi kaawiy a Eli yaa asen̰ ja ? »
41009012	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Hii, Eli yaa ase, ŋaa leen̰ gamin-aŋ ɗo botilco. Kar ku iban di ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner a nun Roŋ gemor, naa taaɓiye dakina ho gee yaan poocindu.
41009013	Kar gay nu kaawaako, Eli ŋaar as ko, kar gee gay taaɓiyig ar taat ŋu rakiyo uudin taat Kitamne kaawtu. »
41009014	Wiktin ta Iisa iŋ maajirnay ku subba yeepiy ɗo een̰co, ŋu gastu gee dakina n̰umco ɗo een̰co-aku. Min gee-ak, goy oki agindaw ku gaanuundi meela iŋ ŋuura.
41009015	Min gee-ak taliig Iisa, ŋu raastu, ŋu gaɗtu a ŋu ɓaaji ooye.
41009016	Iisa indiig maajirnay aman : « Ku meela ɗo bi ka moo iŋ agindaw-aŋku ? »
41009017	Gem rakki min ɗatik geemir ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, nu iyjiŋ roŋdu, kiidu coolin̰ji. Ŋa gin aariɗ ka toɗaaji kaawo.
41009018	Ay wer kaak aariɗji ucji, ŋa accigig keɗer nam biy amila toppiyo, ŋa eeyma saaŋji ho ziy aaƴiy yap. Nu indig maajirnan̰ a ŋuuji atkin̰ji, kar gay, ŋu bal gedire. »
41009019	Iisa kaawiico aman : « Kuŋ gee ku diŋka-aŋ, ku geenno ho imaanko sa sooɗa. Ɗakdu mena mina naa goye iŋ kuŋko ho naako sosiŋko pey ? Iyiig roŋji-aŋ anne. »
41009020	Kar ŋu iyiijiga. Min aariɗ talig Iisa-ak, ŋa azbiig mic-ak zid-zid-zid. Ŋa galtu keɗer, ŋa tuŋkiliyo nam biy amila toppiyo.
41009021	Iisa indiig takan̰ mic-ak aman : « Min kimin aariɗ-aŋ obiiga ? » Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : « Min ŋa kapaki.
41009022	Kun kawta, aariɗ n̰aamgig ɗo aki wal ɗo amiydi, ŋa rakiy deen̰ji. Ya kii gedire kiini gaaye, tal aminduwni. »
41009023	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Maa di ki ɗiyiy a ‟ ya ki gedire kiini gaaye ? ” Ɗo ŋaar kaak aamine, botol goya a ŋaa gine ay maanna. »
41009024	Koɗok di, takan̰ mic-ak kaawtu raɗa aman : « Nu aamin kadar kii gedire ginin̰ maanna-aŋka. Kar gay, gaayorduut pey imaandu ! »
41009025	Min Iisa taltu kadar gee n̰uma n̰umen di-ak, ŋa leesiiji ɗo aariɗ-ak aman : « Kiŋ aariɗ, ki ginaag gee duŋguyuuyna ho ki toɗa awke ka leeser. Yalla amal rasig mic-aŋka ho dak yeepenno pey tak-tak ! »
41009026	Aariɗ-ak kooltu raɗa, ŋa azbiig mic-ak zid-zid-zid, kar ŋa amiltu. Ɗo wer-ak, mic-ak weƴtu lasaan̰ nam gee ku goy eɗe-ak kaawiy aman : « Ŋa mate ! »
41009027	Hiyya, Iisa obiig min ɗo pisin̰ji, ŋa copiliiga ho mic-ak peytu.
41009028	Wiktin ta Iisa un̰jitu geero, maajirnay indiig aman : « Gem kol tacco, maa di ni baltu gedire atkin̰ aariɗ-aŋka ? »
41009029	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Kar gay, aariɗ ŋaar-aŋ, kuu gedire imilin̰ji-ak, illa iŋ inde ka Buŋdi ja. »
41009030	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa ɗeettu min eɗe iŋ maajirnay ho ŋu aaɗtu min kiɗ ka Galile. Iisa rakaaɗo gee ya ibine wer ka ŋa goyiyo,
41009031	asaan ŋa garkiyaag maajirnay. Ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Nun roŋ gemor, ŋu asaan berin ɗo pise ka midir, ŋuun deendu ho ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. »
41009032	Kar ŋuur gay bal ibinin baat ta kaawoy. Paa ko, ŋu gintu kolaw taat ŋuu indin̰ Iisa ɗo bi ŋaar-aka.
41009033	Hiyya, ŋu ottu kat Kapernayuum. Wiktin ta ŋu goyiy geero, Iisa indiig maajirnay aman : « Ku meela ɗo bi ka moo botildi ? »
41009034	Ŋuur gay bugum cit-cit, asaan botildi, ŋu meel benannico a ŋuu ibine waa kaak tatik paka.
41009035	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa goytu keɗer, ŋa kolig maajirnay ku orok iŋ seera, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ya gem kaak raka ogire ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ŋaa ɗake aar ta een̰ji ho ŋaa gine gay riyco. »
41009036	Kar Iisa obtu mic rakki, ŋa iyiig ɗo ɗatikco, ŋa diyiig ɗo tumkay ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman :
41009037	« Gem kaak obig mic-aŋ samaane ɗo bi kanto, ar ŋa obin nun meendu. Kar gay, gem kaak obintu, ŋa da obɗo nun di, ŋa obig ŋaar kaak n̰aamintu. »
41009038	Yaaya ɗiyiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, ni gas gem kaak atka aariɗna iŋ siŋji kun̰ji ho nin gay toɗaaji asaan ŋaar iŋ gintenno. »
41009039	Kar Iisa gay kaawtu aman : « Dakon̰ji toɗenno. Asaan ginno waan kaak yaa gedire gine maan kaak ajbay iŋ siŋ kunto ho ba aar, ŋaa nige pey biy iŋ nunu.
41009040	Waan kaak adiy pondikɗo iŋ kuŋko, ŋaar kaŋko.
41009041	Gem kaak gaayaako, Buŋ yaaji berin haginey. Ka seener nu kaawaako, ŋaa gasin haginey yoo ŋa beraako amay sooɗ ku maala pondik-aŋ di ɗo saan ta ku geen̰ji ku Masi. »
41009042	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Gem kaak un̰ja rakki min een̰ji kuuk imaanco sooɗa ɗo zunuubinnar, ŋuuji ɗuune tolo ɗo gaaƴay ho ŋuu accin̰ ɗo barrer sa guna.
41009043	Ya pisin̰jiŋ kat iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar-ak, ɗukumga. Gunjiŋ kii un̰je iŋ pisin̰jiŋ rakki di ɗo goye ka gaasɗo min kii un̰je iŋ pisin̰jiŋ seerco ɗo ak taat matɗo. [
41009044	Ɗo wer ŋaar-ak, gur ku matɗo tiyiig momtina ho ak sa goy doo.]
41009045	Ya asin̰jiŋ kat iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar-ak, ɗukumga. Gunjiŋ kii un̰je iŋ asin̰jiŋ rakki di ɗo goye ka gaasɗo min kii un̰je iŋ asin̰jiŋ seerco ɗo ak taat matɗo. [
41009046	Ɗo wer ŋaar-ak, gur ku matɗo tiyiig momtina ho ak sa goy doo.]
41009047	Ya odon̰ di iyaaciŋ ɗo zunuubinnar-ak, ɗimta. Guna kii un̰je iŋ odon̰ rakki di ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, min kii un̰je iŋ odinan̰ seerco ɗo ak taat matɗo.
41009048	Ɗo wer ŋaar-ak, gur ku matɗo tiyiig momtina ho ak sa goy doo.
41009049	Uudin taat ak siyiig hadinne ho uudin taat maral giniig tiw gala, Buŋ sa icit taaɓine, ŋa newsiig gemo, ŋa giniy cawar.
41009050	Ku iban tam kadar maral ŋuur gala. Kar ya ŋuur kat cille gay, kuuco gaaye maa, ŋuu aawe ? Ŋaar-ak, kuŋko oki goyoŋ gala ar maral ho goyoŋ iŋ aapiye benanniko. »
41010001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa uctu min eɗe, ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude, aar barre ka Zurdan. Pey gee dakin aale n̰umiiji, ŋa teestu garkiyin̰co uudin ta ŋa garkiygiigu.
41010002	Pariziyenna daarin̰ ɓaawiiji moota, ŋu rakiy gaase baay. Paa ko, ŋu indiig aman : « Gaanuunte bera botol taat gem yaa totirin daaciy walla ? »
41010003	Kar Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Muusa gay, ŋaar rasko maa gaanuun da ? »
41010004	Ŋuur gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Muusa ber botol a gem ya siire maktumne ta totiriikar ho ŋaa totirin daaciy. »
41010005	Min Iisa dortu pa-ak, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Muusa berko botol taat kuu totirin̰ daɗitko asaan kaƴko bombo.
41010006	Yampa, ɗo teesindi, Buŋ kilgiyit duniine, ŋa kilgiyig mitko iŋ daatko.
41010007	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, mitko yaa rasin̰ tacco iŋ yaaco, ŋa ɓaayiy n̰ume iŋ daaciy,
41010008	ho seerco, ŋuu gine ar gem rakki di ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ampa-ak, ŋu seerro pey, ŋu n̰um ko gem rakki di.
41010009	Maan kaak Buŋ ɗuunga-ak, gem ipiraagɗo. »
41010010	Wiktin taat ŋu un̰jitu geero, maajirnay ku Iisa indiig pey ɗo bi ka totiriikar.
41010011	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Gem kaak totirit daaciy ho ŋa obtu ta pey, ŋaar-ak kokina karan di.
41010012	Ar taar-an ko, geem taat rasig mitti ho ta obtu ka pey, taar-at kokina karan di. »
41010013	Gee iyiiji koogin ɗo Iisa a ŋaaco lee pise, ŋaa barkiyin̰co. Kar maajirnay gay leesiico ɗo gee-aku.
41010014	Min Iisa taliig maajirnay leesaaco ɗo geemir-ak, ŋa dapin̰tu ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Rasoŋ koogin-aŋ yaadu ase. Dakon̰co toɗenno, asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ɗo gee kuuk ar koogin-aŋku.
41010015	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya waan kaak bal ooyin Meennaw ta Buŋdi ar mico, ŋa un̰jaaɗo tak-tak. »
41010016	Hiyya, ŋa baamiyiig koogina, ŋa leeyiico pise ho ŋa barkiyiigu.
41010017	Ɗo wiktin ta Iisa amiltu ko, gem rakki ŋaamiig iŋ gaɗiy. Ŋa dersitu ɗo uŋji, kar ŋa indiig aman : « Gem kol tacco, kiŋ kaak sellen̰, naa gine maman naa gase goye ka gaasɗo ? »
41010018	Iisa gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Maa di ki koliin a nu sellen̰ ? Ginno gem kaak sellen̰ ɗo kiɗar, illa Buŋ keeji di.
41010019	Kiŋ ibingig gaanuun kaak Buŋ bertu ɗo geemir : ‟ Dakoŋ deenno gee, kuŋ miday, dakoŋ kokinenno daaɗ kara ho kuŋ daaɗ oki, dakoŋ kokinenno miday kara, okiŋko, dakoŋ kokinenno gamna, dakoŋ raadenno iŋ siŋ ku gemor, dakoŋ diyenno kaaw ɗo gemor, beroŋ horoomin ɗo aginiyko. ” »
41010020	Gem-ak telkiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, nu karmiyiig gaanuun-ak okin̰ji min nu kapak di. »
41010021	Iisa taliig gem-ak ajbiyga ho ŋa elgig dakina, ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ɗakjiŋ pey maan rakki : ɓaa gidiyig gamnan̰ okin̰co ho ɗeeɗig gurus-ak ɗo pokirnar. Paa kat, kii leen̰ mallen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Kar asu, aaɗnu. »
41010022	Min gem-ak doriit kaaw-at, ŋa ƴiimiit wijeeney asaan ŋa gay gamnar.
41010023	Iisa taliig maajirnay kuuk goy ɗo serpey, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Un̰je kaak ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, ŋaar raɗa ɗo gay gamnar ! »
41010024	Kaawoy-at un̰jiico kolaw ɗo maajirnay. Kar Iisa ɗiyiico pey aman : « Gem kol siŋtay, un̰je ka ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, ŋaar raɗa !
41010025	Lokumo gediraaɗo taa bire min ɗo bee ka ripirrer. Kar ɗo gay gamnar gay, un̰je ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaaji gine pey raɗ paka. »
41010026	Ɗo wer-ak, maajirnay ajbiytu tak-tak, ŋu indiy ziŋkico aman : « Di ampa-aŋ gay, waa yaa gase jile ? »
41010027	Kar Iisa gay taliig ƴalaaŋ ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Maan kaak patiya kaƴco ku geemir, ɗo Buŋdi gay, ŋa melen̰ di. »
41010028	Min ŋaar-ak, Piyer ɗiyiiji aman : « Cokay, ni rasig gamin okin̰co a niin̰ aaɗe. »
41010029	-
41010030	Kar Iisa ɗiytu aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya gem kaak rasig geriy, siŋtay, aginiyji, kooginay wala morgoy ɗo saan tanto iŋ Kabarre ta Gala, ɗo goye ka diŋka, ŋaa gase pey pak miya : geray, siŋta, aginay, koogina iŋ morgina. Wariy sa, ŋaa gase. Kar ɗo wiktin taat yaa ase neginda gay, ŋaa gase goye ka gaasɗo.
41010031	Gee dakina kuuk ogir diŋka yaa ɗake aaro, ho dakina kuuk aaro yaa ogire. »
41010032	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ictu botol ta Zeruzaleem. Iisa ogiriico. Kar maajirnay iŋ gee kuuk aaɗaagu, kolaw un̰jiico ɗo maan ka yaaji ase Zeruzaleem. Iisa koliig maajirnay ku orok iŋ seera, ŋa teesiico gaare maan ka yaaji ase.
41010033	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Cokiyoŋ, diŋ gi coona Zeruzaleem. Anner ko, nun Roŋ gemor, ŋuun berin ɗo pise ku agindaw ku gay satkiner ho iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi, ŋuu dee kaawco a ŋuun deendu. Kar ŋuun berin ɗo gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo.
41010034	Gee-ak yaadu samtiye, ŋuudu pice uln̰a, ŋuun koocindu iŋ korɗiŋgo ho ŋuun deendu. Kar ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. »
41010035	Min ŋaar-ak, Zaak iŋ Yaaya, kooginay ku Zebede, ɓaawiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋu ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, ni raka kiini ginin̰ maan kaak niin̰ inde-aŋka. »
41010036	Iisa indiigu aman : « Ku raka naako gine maa ? »
41010037	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ya ki icit Meennuwin̰, ni raka gemni rakki yaa goye ɗo meedan̰ ho rakki gay ɗo n̰ugilan̰. »
41010038	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Kuŋ bal ibine baay ta maan kaak ku indiy-aŋka. Kuu gedire kuu seen kordindi ta taaɓiner taat naa see-anta walla ? Kuu gedire ooyin̰ batem ka taaɓiner kaak eraanu-aŋka walla ? »
41010039	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Hii, nii gedire. » Iisa kaawiico aman : « Ka seener, kuu gedire see kordindir taat naa see ho kuu ooyin̰ batem kaak nu kaawtu.
41010040	Kar ɗo goye kaak ɗo meedar wala ɗo n̰ugilal gay, nun ginno botol ta naa berin̰ji. Werin ŋuur-ak, Buŋ siyig ɗo ŋuur kuuk ŋa doɓtu. »
41010041	Min maajirna kuuk orok doriit kaawco-at, ŋu dapin̰iico ɗo kun̰ Zaak iŋ Yaaya.
41010042	Hiyya, Iisa koliig okin̰co ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ku iban kadar meennay ku duniiner hokumiyaag geen̰co iŋ guwaane ho aginduwco goyaaco ɗo kaƴco.
41010043	Kar lokoŋ gay, ta ginaaɗo ampa. Minninko, ya gem kaak raka gine tatkaw, illa ŋaa ginen̰ ja ar gay riyko,
41010044	ho ya minninko rakki raka ogire, illa okiŋko, ŋaa ginen̰ ja ar ɓerriko.
41010045	Asaan nun Roŋ gemor, nu bal ase a gee yaadu gine riyo. Nun as a naa gine riy ɗo geemir, naa bere zir ɗo ŋuur kuuk goy ɗo zunuubinnar a gee dakina yaa gase jile. »
41010046	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ho iŋ gee dakina kuuk aaɗaaga-ak, ŋu ottu ɗo geeger ka Zeriiko. Min ŋu aaliig geeger-ak, ŋu gastu nool kaak goy oce ɗo bit ka botildi. Nool-ak, ŋu kolaag Bartime, ŋa roŋji ka Time.
41010047	Min ŋa dortu kadar ŋa Iisa kaak min Nazareet kat biraw-ak, ŋa teestu koole aman : « Iisa, Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwir ! »
41010048	Gee dakina awn̰iiji aman : « Ha’, bugam ! » Kar ŋaar gay gaaƴay jaala jaalen di aman : « Iisa Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwir ! »
41010049	Iisa peytu, ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Koloŋga ! » Ŋu dakiiji ɗiy aman : « Obig adin̰ ! Ucu, ŋa kolaaciŋ. »
41010050	Hiyya, nool-ak acciit batkoy, ŋa uctu iŋ beerin̰ji ho ŋa ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa.
41010051	Min ŋa ɓaawe, Iisa indiig aman : « Ki raka naan̰ gine maa ? » Nool-ak telkiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, nu raka kin odinar yaa pile-aŋ di. »
41010052	Iisa gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Ɓaa kate, imaanjiŋ jilin̰ciŋ. » Ta bite-aŋ di, odinay piltu ho ŋa aaɗiig Iisa.
41011001	Wiktin taat Iisa iŋ maajirnay ɓaawtu moota iŋ Zeruzaleem, ŋu ottu ɗo koot ka Olibiyennar, moota iŋ hellinnan kuuk ŋu koliy Betpaze iŋ Betani. Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa tabirtu maajirnay seera.
41011002	Ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ ɗo hellin ta goy uŋda-antare. Ya ku ote, kuu gase roŋ ɗurkilal ɗuune. Ƴiriy rakki waan bal n̰epin̰ji. Ipiroŋga ho iyoŋduuga.
41011003	Ya gem indaako aman : ‟ Maa di ku ipirig roŋ ɗurkil-aŋka ? ” Telkon̰ji aman : ‟ Rabbin kat rakaaga ho ŋaako yeepin̰ji koɗok di. ” »
41011004	Hiyya, ŋu ɓaawtu, ŋu gasiig roŋ ɗurkil-ak ɗuun ɗo botildi, moota iŋ ger ka gemor. Ŋu ontu ipirin̰ji.
41011005	Wiktin taat ŋu ipiriiga, gee daarin̰ kuuk goy eɗe-ak indiig aman : « Ŋaar ku gina maa ? Maa di ku ipiriig roŋ ɗurkil-aŋka ? »
41011006	Ŋuur gay telkiico aman : « Rabbin kat rakaaga ho ŋaako yeepin̰ji koɗok di. » Min pa-ak, gee-ak rasiigu, ŋu ɗeettu.
41011007	Hiyya, maajirin ku seer-ak iyiijig roŋ ɗurkil-ak ɗo Iisa. Ŋu siddiyiig iŋ kesuunco ho Iisa n̰eptu kuwa.
41011008	Gee dakina ɗeeriit kesuunco ɗo botildi. Daarin̰ gay ƴiim tapar min ɗo kalaaner, ŋu leeyiig ɗo botildi.
41011009	Gee kuuk jaawa ɗo uŋji ho kuuk aaɗaaga kooliy aman « Hozanna, Rabbin Buŋ yaa barkiyin̰ ŋaar kaak asa iŋ siŋ kun̰ji !
41011010	Buŋ ya barkiyin Meennaw ta asaw, Meennaw ta tatte sultan Dawuud. Ozilinteŋ Buŋte kaak goy kuwa ka samaaner ! »
41011011	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa un̰jitu Zeruzaleem, ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa taliig gamin okin̰co kuuk goy atta. Min ŋa taliigu, ŋa amiltu iŋ maajirnay ku orok iŋ seera ho ŋu birtu ɗo hellin ta Betani, asaan pat ɗeete.
41011012	Ka kawtinti, wiktin ta ŋu amiliy min Betani, Iisa mey diyaaga.
41011013	Ŋa taltu min serek et ar buguwa lee. Iisa ɓaawtu tale ya ŋa gase roŋji. Kar gay, min ŋa otiiji moota, illa ŋa tala tapar di, asaan wiktin ta ween̰ji misa.
41011014	Hiyya, Iisa ɗiyiiji ɗo et-ak aman : « Waan aawaaɗo pey roŋjiŋ tak-tak ! » Wiktin ta ŋa kaawiy pa-ak, maajirnay doraaga.
41011015	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iŋ maajirnay yeeptu pey Zeruzaleem. Iisa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa teestu atkin̰ ŋuur kuuk suugiya atta-aku. Ŋa akiliicog taabulnico ku gee kuuk maka gurus ho iŋ seesna ku gee kuuk suugiya ammaamna.
41011016	Kar ɗo gee kuuk jalla gaminco ŋu biriy min ɗo ger ka Buŋdi sa, ŋa toɗco.
41011017	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa garkiyiigu ho kaawiico aman : « Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Gerir, ŋaar gin ger ka salaaner ka gee okin̰co. ” Kar kuŋ gay ginig ger ka kokiniydi. »
41011018	Agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi doriit riy ta Iisa gintu. Ŋu teestu bariye botol taat maman ŋuu deen̰ji. Kar gay, ŋu gina kolaw asaan gee okin̰co ajbiy tak-tak ɗo garaan taat ŋa garkiyiigu.
41011019	Iŋ pat ta maako, Iisa iŋ maajirnay amiltu min ɗo geegirdi.
41011020	Ka kawtinti iŋ kawtira, wiktin taat ŋu yeepiy Zeruzaleem, ŋu taliig et ka Iisa surpiytu-ak aaƴ yarap min ɗo caariy.
41011021	Piyer moyiit kaawoy ta Iisa ho ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, talig et ka ki surpiytu-aŋ aaƴ yarap. »
41011022	Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Cokiyoŋ, nu kaawaako ka seener, aaminoŋ ɗo Buŋdi iŋ gelbin rakki !
41011023	Ya gem ɗiytit ɗo damba-an aman : « Ucu, ɓaa gal ɗo barrer. » Nec Buŋ yaa jaŋkinti. Kar Buŋ yaaji ooye-ak, illa ya adiy seerro ho ŋa aamin iŋ gelbin rakki kadar maan kaak ŋa inditu-ak yaa kuuniye.
41011024	Ansi-ak, nu kaawaako, ay maan kaak ku indiy min ɗo Buŋdi-ak, diyoŋ ɗo gelbinko kadar ku gasig ko ho Buŋ yaako berin̰ji.
41011025	Kar ya ku tees salaane ho ya ku gin kaaw iŋ gemo, saamiyon̰ji ja. Ansii ko, Takko kaak goy ka samaaner yaako saamiyin̰ zunuubinniko oki. [
41011026	Kar ya ku saamayɗo ɗo eeŋko, Takko kaak goy ka samaaner sa saamiyaakonno zunuubinniko.] »
41011027	Kar Iisa iŋ maajirnay yeeptu pey Zeruzaleem. Wiktin ta Iisa jaawiig ger ka Buŋdi, agindaw ku gay satkiner, agindaw ku gaanuundi ho iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar ɓaawiiji moota.
41011028	Ŋu indiig aman : « Waa berjiŋ botol ki giniy gamin-aŋku ? Izinne-an, ki gasit min momo ? »
41011029	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Nun oki yaako indiŋko maanna iŋ kaaw rakki di. Ya ku telkidu, naako gaarin̰ waan kaak beraadu botol taat nu giniig gamin-aŋku.
41011030	Waa n̰aamig Yaaya-Batist a ŋaa batiziye gee ? Ŋa Buŋ walla ŋu geen di ? Telkondu ja. »
41011031	Ŋuur gay teestu meele benannico aman : « Kar giiji telkeŋ kat a maa ? Ya gi telkiji a ŋa Buŋ kat n̰aamga, ŋaate indinte pey aman : ‟ Maa di ku poociit kaawoy ? ”
41011032	Kar ginte gediraaɗo gii ɗiye a ‟ ŋu gee kat n̰aamga. ” Ŋu gina kolaw ɗo geemir, asaan gee okin̰co pakira kadar Yaaya-Batist, ŋaar nabiin̰ce ka seener. »
41011033	Hiyya, ŋu telkiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Ni ibanno waan kaak n̰aamga. » Kar Iisa gay kaawiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, nun oki gaaraakonno waan kaak berdu botol taat nu giniig gamin-aŋku. »
41012001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa teesiico dele daŋla ɗo agindaw ku Yuudinnar aman : « Gin mee jineendi rakki. Ŋa taattu atay kuuk ŋu koliy bin̰ ɗo jineen-aka ho ŋa ŋaamiig iŋ kelel. Ŋa siytu dukitka taat ŋuu miƴin̰ roŋ ku atiydi-aku. Kar ŋa pintu ger bolok a ŋuu coke kuwa ŋuu gooƴin̰ji. Hiyya, ŋa rasig jineen-ak ɗo gee daarin̰ a ŋuu gooƴin̰ji ho ŋa ɗeettu marti.
41012002	Ɗo wiktin taat roŋ-ak nee, ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyor ɗo gee kuuk gooƴaaga a ŋuuji berin haginey.
41012003	Kar gay gooƴindi-ak obiig gay riyor-aku, ŋu koociiga ho ŋu atkiig pisin̰ji orok.
41012004	Wiktin taat gem ka jineendi taliig ŋa as pisin̰ji aaƴe-ak, ŋa n̰aamtu ka pey. Ŋuur gay, min ŋa otiico, ŋaar sa ŋu obiiga, ŋu wariiga ho ŋu kayiig ɗo kaay.
41012005	Min ŋaar-ak, gem ka jineendi-ak n̰aamtu ka pey. Ŋaar-ak sa, ŋu deeyiig kalak. Ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyor dakina ku pey, daarin̰, ŋu koocgu, daarin̰ gay, ŋu deegu.
41012006	Gem kaak ɗakji-ak illa roŋji kon di, ŋa elgig dakina. Kar ŋa osiig adiy aman : ‟ Roŋdu-aŋ, ŋuu karmiyin̰ji. ” Kar ŋa n̰aamiig ba aaro.
41012007	Kar min gay gooƴindi-ak taliig roŋji ɓaaco-ak, ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : ‟ Taloŋ, aŋkar ko kaak ya tacco mate, jineen yaaji ɗake. Asoŋ, daanteŋga kar jineen yaate ɗake lote. ”
41012008	Hiyya, ŋu obiiga, ŋu deeyiiga ho ŋu acciig kara min ɗo jineendi. »
41012009	Min pa-ak, Iisa indiig gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak aman : « Mee jineendi-ak yaa ginin̰co maman ? Ŋa asa deen̰ gee kuuk gooƴaag jineen-aka ho ŋaa berin̰ ɗo gee ku pey.
41012010	Kar ŋa kaawiico pey aman : Kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner-an baati maa ? ‟ Ŋa dambi kaak gay pinindi accitu, Ŋaar ko gin dambi kaak taɓ ka gerdi.
41012011	Aŋ ko maan kaak Rabbin Buŋ gintu, ho ŋa ajbiyinte tak-tak. ” »
41012012	Min ŋaar-ak di, agindaw ku Yuudinnar ibintu kadar Iisa deliit daŋlay-at, ŋa ceera loco. Paa ko, ŋu bariy botol taat ŋuu obin̰ji. Kar gay, ŋu gin kolaw ɗo geemir. Hiyya, ŋu rasiig ŋu ɗeettu.
41012013	Agindaw ku Yuudinnar n̰aamiiji gee ɗo Iisa a ŋuuji ɗibe iŋ kaawo. Min gee-ak, gin Pariziyenna daarin̰ iŋ gee ku Herood oki.
41012014	Ŋu dakiiji kaaw aman : « Gem kol tacco, ni iban kadar ki kaawa seene. Ya kaaw sa, ki kaawaat ɗo gee okin̰co. Kiŋ isgicinno iŋ gee kuuk kaƴco jaale. Ki garkiya gee iŋ botol ta Buŋdi taat taɓ. Hadi kaawnin̰ ja, gaanuunte kaaw a gii kappiye miiri ɗo Sezaar, sultan ka tatik ka Room wala kawwi ? Gii kappiye wala gi kappiyaaɗo ? »
41012015	Kar Iisa gay iban kadar ŋu bal imilin ta aditco. Ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Maa di ku ɗibiidu ? Iyondu ja tamma rakki, naa tale. »
41012016	Ŋu iyiiji. Kar Iisa indiigu aman : « Kaa iŋ siŋ kuuk siir kuwa-aŋ gay ku waa ? » Ŋu telkiiji aman : « Ku Sezaar. »
41012017	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, gamin ku Sezaar, beron̰jiig ɗo Sezaar, ho ku Buŋdi sa, beron̰jiig ɗo Buŋdi. » Kaaw ta Iisa taar-at ajbiygu.
41012018	Min ŋaar-ak, gee kuuk ŋu koliy Sadusiyenna ɓaawiiji moota ɗo Iisa. Gee ŋuur-ak kaawa a gee ku mate, ŋuur nooyɗo. Ŋu astu indin̰ aman :
41012019	« Gem kol tacco, Muusa siirte ɗo gaanuunji aman : ‟ Ya gem ob daatko ho ŋa mat bal mico, siŋji yaa obin murgil-ata. Paa kat, taaji wee koogin ɗo siŋji kaak mate. ”
41012020	Cokay, gin siŋta peesira. Ka aawo obtu daatko, kar ŋa mattu bal mico.
41012021	Ka seeriŋkar oki obiit daatko-ata. Ŋaar oki mattu bal mico. Ka subbiŋkar obiita, ŋaar oki mattu.
41012022	Hiyya, okin̰co siŋta ku peesir-ak obiita ho ŋu siibiytu bal koogina. Ba aaro, taar sa menuwti gaastu. »
41012023	Kar Sadusiyenna-ak indiig Iisa aman : « Ɗo taar-an, kaawnin̰ ja, ɗo ƴiriy ta nooyindi, min kuuk peesir-aŋ, ka moo taa gine daaciy ? Asaan kuuk peesir-aŋ okin̰co midiyti ! »
41012024	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Kuŋko-aŋ rawte, asaan ku ibanno kaaw ta Buŋdi wala gudurrey.
41012025	Ka seener, ɗo ƴiriy ta nooyindi, ginno pey obe. Gee yaa goye ar ɗubal ku Buŋdi kuuk goy ka samaaner.
41012026	Ɗo bi ka nooyindi, ku bal garkiyin kaaw taat ɗo gaanuun ka Muusa wiktin taat Buŋ bayniiji ɗo pompil kaak kobir ako, wal maman ? Ŋa kaaw aman : ‟ Nun Buŋ ka Ibraayim, Buŋ ka Isaaka ho Buŋ ka Yakuub. ” »
41012027	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ŋa Buŋɗo ka gee kuuk mate, kar gay, ŋa Buŋ ka gee kuuk goy mento. Ɗo taar-an, ku rawte tak-tak. »
41012028	Wiktin ta Iisa meeliy iŋ gee ku ŋu koliy Sadusiyenna, tatkaw rakki ka gaanuun ka Yuudinnar oki hadire. Min tatkaw-ak taltu kadar Iisa telkiico samaan-ak, ŋa ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋa indiig aman : « Gem kol tacco, min gaanuun ka Muusa okin̰ji-aŋ, ka moo paka ? »
41012029	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Cokiyoŋ, koogin ku Israyeel ! Rabbin Buŋte, ŋaar rakki di.
41012030	Kii elin̰ Rabbin Buŋjiŋ iŋ gelbin rakki, iŋ kelmon̰ okintiti, iŋ pikirren̰ okintiti ho iŋ gudurren̰ okintiti.
41012031	An gay ka aaɗaag ka awalle : Kii elin̰ giji ar zin̰ ka meen̰jiŋ. Min ku seer-aŋ ginno pey gaanuun ka pakgigu. »
41012032	Hiyya, tatkaw ka gaanuundi ɗiyiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Seese, gem kol tacco ! Kaawon̰-an ka seener. Rabbine, ŋaar ko Buŋ kaak rakki-aŋ di ho ginno ka pey.
41012033	Gii elin̰ Buŋ iŋ gelbin rakki, iŋ pikirrite okintiti ho iŋ gudurrite okintiti. Ho gii elin̰ eente ar ziŋka ku maaniite. Gamin ŋuur-aŋ pakgig satkin ta mallel ho iŋ satkin taat gee beriy ɗo Buŋdi. »
41012034	Min Iisa taltu kadar gem-ak telkiji iŋ ibine-ak, ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Kiŋke-aŋ serekɗo iŋ Meennaw ta Buŋdi. » Min ƴiriy taar-at, ŋu cimtu kaƴco cat, yoo waan sa indigigɗo pey.
41012035	Wiktin ta Iisa garkiyiy gee ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, ŋa ɗiy aman : « Maman agindaw ku gaanuundi kaawiy a Masi ŋaar roŋ ka Dawuud ?
41012036	Ya ŋa roŋ ka Dawuud, maa di Ruwwin ta Buŋdi n̰aamig sultan Dawuud meen̰ji ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Buŋ kaawji ɗo Rabbiner aman : ‟ As goy ɗo meedar nam wiktin taat naaco gedire ɗo adinen̰, ŋuu gine wer ka lee asin̰jiŋ. ”
41012037	Paa ko, Dawuud meen̰ji oki kolaag Masi-ak a ‟ Rabbine ”. Di maman ŋaa gine roŋji ? » Wiktin ta ŋa kaawiy pa-ak, gee dakina goya. Kaawoy-at ginco gala.
41012038	Wiktin taat Iisa garkiyiy gee, ŋa kaawiico aman : « Goyoŋ goɗom min agindaw ku gaanuundi kuuk el jaawe iŋ batik ku aginda ho el a gee yaaco ooye ɗo werin kuuk gee n̰umiyo.
41012039	Ɗo geray ku salaaner, ŋu el goye uŋda ho ya ŋu kolig ɗo teendi, ŋu doɓa werin kuuk taɓ.
41012040	Ŋu tiyaag murgilgal iŋ neendaw. Kar ɗo salaanco sa, ŋu osa kaawin dakina a paa kat, gee yaa ozilin̰co. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, taaɓin tan̰co yaa gine raɗ pak ta gee okin̰co. »
41012041	Kar Iisa goytu moota iŋ maan kaak gee liyiy gurus ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa taliy maman gee liyiy gurus ɗo maanna-aka. Gay gamnar liya gurus dakina.
41012042	Kar murgil rakki pokirin̰ca astu. Ta leetu tammin seer kuuk bal baaco.
41012043	Hiyya, Iisa koliig maajirnay ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, murgil-an ber gurus dakina pakgig gee okin̰co kuuk liya gurus ɗo maanna-aŋka,
41012044	asaan okin̰co-aŋ ber min gurusco kaak ɗaka maala. Kar murgil-an gay, iŋ pokirruwti, gurusti kaak nec taa tee ɗo menuwir, okin̰ji ta berga. »
41013001	Wiktin ta Iisa amiliy min ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, min maajirnay rakki ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol tacco, tal ja dambay-aŋku, tal ja pine-aŋka ! »
41013002	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Ka seener ŋa samaane, kar wiktin yaa ase taat ŋuu ɗime, yoo dambi rakki kaak ŋu diytu ɗo giji sa goyaaɗo. »
41013003	Min pa-ak, Iisa coktu ka koot ka Olibiyennar ho ŋa goytu aaniy ger ka Buŋdi. Ɗo wer-ak, maajirnay kun̰ Piyer, Zaak, Yaaya iŋ Andre goy keeco. Ŋu indiig aman :
41013004	« Gem kol tacco, kaawnin̰ ja, gamin-aŋ yaa ase kimin ? Ho kaawniŋ maan kaak yaani gaare asin̰co ka gamin-aŋ okin̰co. »
41013005	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Yaman pakiroŋ, dakoŋ rasenno ziŋkiko ŋuuko jagiŋko.
41013006	Gee dakina yaa ase iŋ siŋdu ho ŋuu kaawe aman : ‟ Ŋa nun ko Masi ! ” Ŋu asa rawte gee dakina min ɗo botilco ta samaane.
41013007	Ya ku dora gee kaawa ɗo bi ka gartar, moota wala serek, dakoŋ barjilenno. Ka seener, gamin-aŋ yaa asen̰ ja, kar duniin gay gaasaaɗo misa.
41013008	Darre iŋ darre asa taasin̰e ho sultan iŋ sultan oki asa taasin̰e. Werin daarin̰ kiɗ asa azire ho mey yaa ase. Ar kaak daatik aawiy atti ka weendi, gamin okin̰co-aŋ sa gaara kadar gaase ka duniiner gaaye. «
41013009	Kuŋ gee kuuk aaɗintu gay, yaman pakiroŋ ɗo goyiŋko ! Gee asaako iyiŋko ɗo werin ku ɗukume seriiner, ŋu asaako koociŋko ɗo geray ku salaaner. Ɗo bi kanto, ŋuuko iyiŋko ɗo uŋco ka guberneernar ho ɗo sultinniidi. Paa kat, kuuco kaawin seenko.
41013010	Kar gay, Kabarre ta Gala, ŋuu gaarin ja ɗo darrinay okin̰co.
41013011	Wiktin taat yaa ŋu obiŋko ho ŋu sakkiyiŋko, dakoŋ moyenno ɗo kaaw taat kuu kaawe. Kaawin ŋuur-ak, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi yaako gaarin̰co ɗo wiktin-at di. Kaawoŋ kaaw taat ta ɗiyiiko di. Ampa-ak, ŋa kuŋɗo kat kaawaw, ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
41013012	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gee asa bere siŋta ku maaniico ŋuu deen̰co ho aginay sa yaa gine paa ɗo kooginco. Koogin asa gine adin ku aginiyco ho ŋu asa bariye muutco.
41013013	Ɗo bi kanto, gee dakina asaako poociŋko. Kar gem kaak obit imaanji bombo nam ɗo muutuy gay, ŋaa gase jile. »
41013014	« Gem kaak garkiyaat kaaw-an, ŋa iban baati ! Ku asa tale maan ka nigindi kaak Buŋ ƴiliyo goy ɗo wer kaak kuunayɗo kan̰ji. Ya ku talga, gee kuuk goy ɗo geeger ka Zuude, illa ŋuu gaɗe ɗo baƴco ku dambiniidi.
41013015	Waan kaak jammiya kara gediraaɗo un̰je atta ŋaa soke gamnay.
41013016	Ansii di oki, kaak ɗeet ɗo morgoy sa yeepaaɗo geero, ŋaa icin batkoy.
41013017	Raɗco ɗo daaɗ kuuk iŋ aditco ho kuuk macpi ɗo menaw ŋuur-aku !
41013018	Indoŋ Buŋ, gamin-aŋ yaa asenno ɗo koyin ku elgol ku raɗa.
41013019	Ka seener ɗo wiktin taar-at, taaɓin yaa gine dakina ɗo geemir pak taat gee aawtu min Buŋ kilgiyiit duniine yoo diŋka. Kar ta ɗeelaaɗo pey tak-tak.
41013020	Ya Buŋ kat bal peyin taaɓin koɗok, waan pakaaɗo. Kar gay, ŋa peyit koɗok ɗo saan ta gee kuuk ŋa doɓtu.
41013021	Ɗo mena ŋuur-ak, ya ŋu kaawaako aman : ‟ Taloŋ, Masi, ŋaar goy anne ! ”, wala aman : ‟ Ŋaar goy annere ! ”, dakoŋ cokiyin̰coɗo.
41013022	Ka seener, gay raadindi dakina yaa ase : daarin̰ yaa kaawe a ŋuur ko Masi ho daarin̰ a ŋuur nabiinna. Ŋuu gine gamin dakina kuuk ajbay iŋ kuuk gaara gudurrico a ŋuu jage gee. Ŋuu jage yoo ŋuur kuuk Buŋ doɓtu ya ŋuu gedire.
41013023	Kuŋ gay, yaman pakiroŋ ! Nun miniŋkoŋ ko. »
41013024	Kar Iisa kaawiico pey ɗo maajirnay aman : « Ɗo menaw ŋuur-ak, ya taaɓin-at bire, pato yaa mate, kooy sa ceeraaɗo pey,
41013025	kaalin yaa solle min kuwa ho gamin kuuk gin gudurre ka samaaner asa azire.
41013026	Kar kat, gee yaan talin nun Roŋ gemor yaa ase ɗatik ucar iŋ gudurrer okintiti ho iŋ darjiner.
41013027	Naa n̰aame ɗubildu ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji, ŋuu n̰umin̰ gee kuuk nu doɓtu min ɗo coke ka pati yoo ɗo gale ka pati. »
41013028	« Cokiyoŋ daŋil ta pigiye. Ya ku tala leeginay kat eccaw ho ŋu lee, ku iban ko kadar kabuŋ gaaye.
41013029	Ampa di kuŋko oki, ya ku talaag gamin-aŋ asaw, ibinoŋ kadar nun Roŋ gemor, nu gaay ko ote.
41013030	Ka seener nu kaawaako, gee ku diŋka-aŋ mataaɗo di, gamin-aŋ okin̰co yaa ase.
41013031	Samaane iŋ kiɗa yaa sawle, kar kaawnar gay rawtaaɗo tak-tak.
41013032	« Kar ɗo ƴiriy ta moo iŋ pat ta moo naa yeepe gay, waan ibinaagɗo, wala ɗubal ku Buŋdi, wala nun Roŋo. Tatte Buŋ keeji di iban.
41013033	Yaman pakiroŋ, goyoŋ mento asaan ku ibanno kimin wiktin-at yaa ase.
41013034	Maanna-aŋ, ŋaar ar gem kaak ɓaa marti. Ŋa rasiig geriy ɗo gay riyoy. Ay gem di ŋa gaarji riy taat ŋaa gine ho ɗo gem kaak gooƴaajiig geriy gay, ŋa ɗiyiiji a ŋaa goye mento.
41013035	Di ŋaar-ak, goyoŋ mento, asaan ku ibanno ƴiriy ta moo mee gerdi yaa yeepe. Kin ŋaa ase iŋ maako, ɗatik aandor, iŋ kokir ka awalle wal iŋ kawtira !
41013036	Ya ŋa yeep rimsilik sa, ŋa gasaakonno ku weƴe.
41013037	Taat nu kaawiiko-an, nu kaawiit ɗo gee okin̰co : « Goyoŋ mento ! »
41014001	Ɗak ko menaw seer di, Yuudinna yaa gine iidinco taat ŋu koliy Paak ho iŋ ta mappa kaak bal gele. Agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi bariya botol taat ŋuu obin̰ Iisa iŋ cigile a ŋuu deen̰ji.
41014002	Ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : « Gi gediraaɗo obin̰ iŋ ƴiriy ta iidiner, yampa, gee yaa barjile. »
41014003	Ƴiriy rakki, Iisa goy ɗo geeger ka Betani ɗo ger ka Simon kaak ɗukum burɗum. Wiktin taat ŋa goytu tee, daatik rakki un̰jitu. Ɗo pisinti ta gin ɗew ka dambir kaak ŋu kolaag albaatir. Ɗewti-ak miin iŋ itir kaak gasɗo badam, ŋu kolaag « naar ». Itir-ak, ŋu bal amsin̰ iŋ maan ka pey. Min ta un̰jitu, ta kilciit gaaƴ ta ɗewti kar ta kockiciiji itir ɗo kaay ka Iisa.
41014004	Min gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak, daarin̰ dapin̰tu ho ŋu kaawiy benannico aman : « Maa di ta nigiig itir-aŋ dur di ?
41014005	Ya gi gidiyig itir-aŋ, nec ŋaate iye gurus pak tammin miy subba ho gii ɗeeɗin̰ ɗo pokirnar. » Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu uciitit ɗo daatko-ata.
41014006	Kar Iisa gay ɗiytu aman : « Rasonta ! Maa di ku taaɓiyiita ? Riy taat ta giniidu-an samaane.
41014007	Ka seener, pokirna ŋuur goy doo iŋ kuŋko ho ya ku rakaw, nec kuuco gine taat samaane. Kar nun gay goyaaɗo iŋ kuŋko doo.
41014008	Ta gin ta gudurriti. Min diŋ di ta kockicdu ko itir, uudin ta neginda ŋuu un̰jin̰ zir ɗo maginer.
41014009	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ay wer kaak ŋuu gaarin Kabarre ta Gala ɗo adiy ka kiɗar, ŋuu moye bit ka daatko-anta ho ŋuu ose ɗo maan kaak ta gintu. »
41014010	Hiyya, min paliinna ku Iisa kuuk orok iŋ seer-aku, rakki kaak ŋu kolaag Zuudas Iskariyoot ɓaawtu ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner ho ŋa kaawiico iŋ maman ŋaaco gaarin̰ Iisa, ŋuu obin̰ji.
41014011	Min ŋu doriit kaaw ta Zuudas, aawco gala. Ŋu ɗiyiiji a ŋuuji bere gurus. Min ƴiriy taar-at di, Zuudas teestu bariye botol taat maman ŋaaco gaarin̰ Iisa, ŋuu obin̰ji.
41014012	Ƴiriy taat awalle ta iidin ta mappa ka bal gele, ƴiriy taar-at, ŋu daggiy baar, ŋu gingiy tee ka Paakdi. Maajirnay indiig Iisa aman : « Ki raka a ni ɓaate gine tee ka Paak momo ? »
41014013	Kar Iisa tabirtu maajirnay seera ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ ɗo geegirdi, kuu ŋaame iŋ gem rakki icil jaliŋ ka amiydi, aaɗoŋga.
41014014	Ɗo ger kaak ŋaa un̰je, kaawon̰ji ɗo mee ka gerdi-ak aman : ‟ Tatkaw n̰aaminti a niin̰ inde wer kaak ŋaa tee tee ka iidiner iŋ maajirnay ? ”
41014015	Kar ŋaako gaare ger berel ka gusuurdi, gamnay okin̰co goy ko. Eɗeŋ ko, kuute gine tee. »
41014016	Hiyya, maajirnay ɓaawtu ɗo geegirdi. Ŋu gasiig gamin-ak uudin taat Iisa kaawiico ho ɗo wer-ak ko, ŋu gintu tee ka Paakdi.
41014017	Min pat gale, Iisa iŋ paliinnay ku orok iŋ seer ottu.
41014018	Wiktin taat ŋu tiyo, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, rakki minninko yaadu isine. Ŋaar kaak tiya iŋ nun-aŋ di. »
41014019	Min ŋu doriit kaaw-at, ziŋkico ooliig koloc. Kar ŋu teestu indin̰ji rakki rakki aman : « Ŋa nununno ɗoo ? »
41014020	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Min kuŋko kuuk orok iŋ seera, ŋa ŋaar kaak pisinni oraw ɗo parki-aŋ di.
41014021	Ka seener, nun Roŋ gemor asa mate ar taat Kitamne kaawtu ɗo bi kanto. Kar gay, raɗji ɗo gem kaak isindu ! Gem-ak, ya ŋu bal ween̰ji sa guna ! »
41014022	Wiktin taat ŋu goytu tee, Iisa ictu mappa, ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi, ŋa pirsiiga ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnay. Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Oboŋ ho taaŋ, ŋaar-aŋ zir. »
41014023	Kar ŋa ictu pey kordindi, ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi ho ŋa beriicota ho okin̰co seetu.
41014024	Kar ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ŋuur-aŋ baarir. Baar-aŋ ɗuunit Jamaw ta marbinto taat Buŋ asiy obe iŋ gee ho kuuk min̰ ɗo saan ta gee dakina.
41014025	Ka seener nu kaawaako, nu siyaaɗo pey maam ku bin̰di nam ƴiriy taat naa see kuuk marbinto ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi. »
41014026	Hiyya, ŋu riytu riyin ku iidiner, kar ŋu amiltu ŋu ɓaayiy coke koot ka Olibiyennar.
41014027	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Okiŋko, kuun rasindu, asaan ɗo Kitamner ŋu kaaw aman : ‟ Naa deen̰ gay gooƴindi ho tamgiy yaa totire. ” »
41014028	Kar Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Wiktin taat nu nooy gay, naako ogire ɗo kiɗ ka Galile. »
41014029	Piyer gay kaawiiji aman : « Ya okin̰co-aŋ rasin̰ciŋ oki, nun gay rasaacinno tuk. »
41014030	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Cokay, naan̰ kaawe seene, ƴiriyta-an di, ɗo aando-anta, kokir boogaaɗo dees seer di, kii tatire dees subba a ki ibinginno. »
41014031	Piyer gay wakiliiji aman : « Ha’a, ya nu mata iŋ kiŋke oki, nu tatiraaɗo a nu ibingicinno » Kar maajirna okin̰co kaawtu paa di.
41014032	Hiyya, Iisa iŋ maajirnay ottu ɗo wer kaak ŋu kolaag Jetsemaane ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Goyoŋ anne, nun ɓaa inde Buŋ. »
41014033	Kar ŋa koliig Piyer, Zaak iŋ Yaaya. Ɗo wer-ak, kelmoy amiltu ho ziy sa oolga.
41014034	Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Kelmol tiyaan but-but ar naa mate. Kuŋ goyoŋ anne ho goyoŋ mento. »
41014035	Ŋa sin̰jitu uŋda sooɗa, ŋa dersitu ho ŋa teestu inde Buŋ a ŋa rakaw ŋaaji etirin wiktin ta taaɓiner-an minniney.
41014036	Ŋa indiig aman : « Baaba, lociŋ-ak raɗɗo, etirit taaɓin-an minniner. Yampa, taa ginenno ar taat nun rakiyo, illa taat kiŋ rakiyo. »
41014037	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa yeepiico ɗo maajirnay kuuk subba. Kar ŋa gasiig ŋu weƴaw. Ŋa kaawiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Simon, ki weƴa ga ! Ki bal gedire goye mento pat rakki di oki ?
41014038	Goyoŋ mento ho indiguwoŋ Buŋ kuu goye bombo ya Seetanne gecaako. Gelbin ka gemor, ŋaar gin niyin taat ŋaa gine taat samaane, kar ziy gay gedarro. »
41014039	Ka seeriŋkar ŋa etirtu, ŋa inditu Buŋ ho ŋa ɗeeliig kaawnay ŋuur-ak di.
41014040	Kar ŋa yeeptu pey ɗo maarjirnay ho ŋa gasiig ŋu weƴaw nam ŋu gedarro pilin̰ odinco, ŋu ibanno taat ŋuuji kaawe.
41014041	Min ŋa inde Buŋ ka subbiŋkar, ŋa yeepiico ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ku weƴaw ho ku darma misa ? Way, diŋ wiktinti nec kate. Nun Roŋ gemor, ŋuun berindu ɗo pise ku gay zunuubinnar.
41014042	Taloŋ, gem kaak isindu-aŋ asa ko eka ! Ucoŋ, ŋaaminteŋga ! »
41014043	Min Iisa kaawa misan di, Zuudas min paliinna kuuk orok iŋ seer astu iŋ gee dakina. Min gee-ak, daarin̰ gin seepinpan ho daarin̰ gay gin doŋkilay. Agindaw ku gay satkiner, agindaw ku gaanuundi ho iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar kat n̰aamgu.
41014044	Zuudas, kaak isinji ɗo Iisa, gaarco botol taat maman ŋuu obin̰ji. Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ŋaar kaak naa baamiye, naaji gine cuuɗ, ŋa ŋaar ko ku rakiyo. Oboŋga, ɗeetoŋga ho gooƴoŋ samaane. »
41014045	Min ŋu ottu, ta bite-aŋ di Zuudas sin̰jiiji moota ɗo Iisa ho ŋa ooyiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney ! » Kar ŋa baamiyiiga ho ŋa giniiji cuuɗ.
41014046	Hiyya, ŋuur kuuk daarin̰ ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋu obiiga.
41014047	Ek di rakki min maajirnay ku Iisa ceeptu seepiney, ŋa asiɗiig gay riyor kaak gina riy ɗo mee satkiner ka tatko ho ŋa ɗukumiijit ɗeŋgey.
41014048	Kar Iisa piltu biy aman : « Ku astu iŋ seepinpan ho iŋ doŋkilay a kuun obindu. Wala nu kokino ?
41014049	Kun kawta, nu goy iŋ kuŋko ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho nu garkiyiy gee. Maa di ku obginno annere ? Kar gay, ta kuuniytu ampa-ak a kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner yaa ase ɗo werti. »
41014050	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirnay okin̰co gaɗtu, ŋu rasiiga.
41014051	Ɗo wer-ak gin ɗubil rakki kaak aaɗaag Iisa. Ŋa ginno kesuune illa ŋa kakil zimilla di. Gee-ak obaaga.
41014052	Ŋaar gay pikicog zimillay-aku ho ŋa gaɗtu tukinka.
41014053	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋu iyiig Iisa ɗo ger ka mee satkiner ka tatko. Ɗo wer-ak ko, agindaw ku gay satkiner, agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ aginay ku Yuudinnar n̰umtu.
41014054	Piyer gay aaɗaag min serek nam ŋu ottu ɗo ger ka mee satkiner-aka. Kar ŋa un̰jitu ɗo wer ka berel ka gerdi-aka ho ŋa goytu iŋ askirna, ŋu ooriy ako.
41014055	Sando, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku Yuudinnar bariya botol taat ŋuuji diye kaaw ɗo Iisa, ŋuu deen̰ji. Ya kaaw-at ɗo wertiɗo oki, ɗo tan̰co-at, ta ginaaɗo maanna.
41014056	Ka seener gay, gee dakin diyiiji kaaw ta raadiner, kar kaawco gay rakki ɗo.
41014057	Gee daarin̰ uctu, ŋu diyiiji kaaw ta raadiner aman :
41014058	« Ni dorig gem-aŋ kaawa a ŋaa ɗimin̰ ger ka Buŋdi kaak gee pintu-aŋka, kar ɗo menaw subba di, ŋaa pine ka pey. Ger ŋaar-ak, ŋuur geenno kat yaa pinin̰ji. »
41014059	Ɗo kaaw taar-an sa, kaawco rakkiɗo.
41014060	Hiyya, mee satkiner ka tatko uctu ɗo uŋco ka geemir, ŋa indiig Iisa aman : « Kiŋ telkaacoɗo ga ? Gee-aŋ kaawa ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ ɗoo ? »
41014061	Kar Iisa gay buguma di, ŋa telkiɗo. Min ŋaar-ak, mee satkiner ka tatko indiig pey aman : « Kiŋ ko Masi, Roŋ ka Buŋ kaak gee abdiyiyo walla ? »
41014062	Iisa gay ooytu aman : « Hii ! Ŋa nun ko ho kuun talin nun Roŋ gemor goy ɗo meeday ta Buŋ kaak gin gudurre okintiti ho kuun talin pey wiktin taat naa ase min ka samaaner iŋ uca. »
41014063	Min mee satkiner dortu pa-ak, ŋa eeriit kesuuney ho ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Wala gi raka pey saadine !
41014064	Ku doraaga, gem-aŋ nigiy biy iŋ Buŋ-aŋka ! Ya ɗo taŋko, gem-aŋ, gii ginin̰ maman ? » Kar okin̰co ɗiytu aman : « Taar-an nec ko iye muutuy. »
41014065	Min gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak, daarin̰ teesiiji pice ulin̰ ɗo Iisa. Ŋu ɗuuniig odinay, ŋu koociiga ho ŋu indiig aman : « Hey nabiin̰ce-aŋka, kaawnin̰ ja waa kaak men̰n̰in̰ciŋ ! » Kar askirna ŋaamiig Iisa iŋ baase.
41014066	Wiktin taat Piyer goyiy kara ɗo wer ka berel ka gerdi, gay riyor ta mee satkiner ka tatko astu.
41014067	Ta taliig Piyer oora ako, ta ibiniiga, kar ta ɗiyiiji aman : « Kiŋke oki, ki goy iŋ Iisa kaak min Nazareet-aka. »
41014068	Kar Piyer gay tatirtu aman : « Nu ibingigɗo. Nu ibanno taat ka rakiy kaawe. » Min pa-ak, Piyer amiltu kara min ɗo wer-aka, ŋa peytu ɗo bit ka botildi. Hiyya, kokir boogtu.
41014069	Gay riyor-at gay taliiga ho ta ɗiyiico ɗo gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak aman : « Kuŋ gem-aŋ ŋaar min ŋuura tara. »
41014070	Piyer gay tatira di pey. Darum sooɗa, gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak ɗiyiiji pey ɗo Piyer aman : « Ka seener, kiŋke sa min ŋuura, asaan kiŋke min Galile. »
41014071	Kar Piyer teestu togile aman : « Iŋ Buŋ-aŋka, nu ɗiyko ɗoo a nu ibingigɗo gem kaak ku kaawiy-aŋka ! Ya nu raada sa, Buŋ, ŋaa daan kara. »
41014072	Ɗo wer-ak di, kokir boogtu ka seeriŋkar. Ek di Piyer moyiit kaaw taat Iisa kaawiiji aman : « Awal ta kokir yaa booge dees seera, kii tatire dees subba a ki ibinginno. » Hiyya, ŋa amiltu kara ho ŋa zugiig ale.
41015001	Iŋ kawtir wer dugus-dugus, agindaw ku gay satkiner, aginay ku Yuudinnar, agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ gay ɗukume seriiner, okin̰co n̰umtu dee kaawco. Min ŋu deetu kaawco, ŋu ɗuuniig Iisa, ŋu iyiiga ho ŋu beriijig ɗo Pilaat, guberneer ka Room.
41015002	Pilaat indiig Iisa aman : « Kiŋ ko sultan ka Yuudinnar walla ? » Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ meen̰jiŋ kaawit ko. »
41015003	Agindaw ku gay satkiner diyiiji kaawin dakina.
41015004	Pilaat indiig pey aman : « Ki telkaaɗo ga ? Ki doraag ɗoo di kaawin okin̰co kuuk ŋu diyiijiŋ-aŋku ? »
41015005	Kar Iisa gay balji telke maanna nam Pilaat din sa ajbiye.
41015006	Ay iidin ta Paakdi, guberneer Pilaat imilgiy gem rakki min daŋaayne, ŋaar kaak gee inditu.
41015007	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gin gem rakki siŋji Barabaas, goy daŋaayne. Gem-ak, ŋu obig daŋaayin sawa iŋ een̰ji kuuk ŋu barjiliig gee ho ŋu dee gemo.
41015008	Gee dakina ɓaawiiji ɗo Pilaat. Ŋu teestu indin̰ji a ŋaaco gine maan kaak ŋa gingiyco ay iidin ta Paakdi.
41015009	Pilaat telkiico aman : « Ku raka naako pikin̰ Sultan ka Yuudinnar walla ? »
41015010	Pilaat ibina tam kadar min hasuudinaw di, agindaw ku gay satkiner iyiijig Iisa.
41015011	Ɗo wer-ak, agindaw ku gay satkiner isiniig gee-ak a ŋuu indin̰ Pilaat ŋaaco pikin̰ Barabaas.
41015012	Pilaat indiigu pey aman : « Kar ŋaar kaak ku koliy Sultan ka Yuudinnar-aŋ gay, naa ginin̰ maman ? »
41015013	Ŋuur gay baagtu koole aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! »
41015014	Pilaat indiigu pey aman : « Ŋaar nig maa di ? » Ŋuur gay koola koolen di aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! »
41015015	Pilaat rakaaɗo nige aditco ku gee-aku. Hiyya, ŋa pikiicog Barabaas. Kar Iisa gay, ŋa ɗiyiico a ŋuu koocin̰ iŋ korɗiŋgo. Min ŋu koocga, ŋa beriicog ɗo askirnar a ŋuu ɗooɗin̰ ka etor.
41015016	Min ŋaar-ak, askirna iyiig Iisa ɗo geriy ka guberneer, ŋu un̰jiig atta. Kar ŋu koliig een̰co askirna okin̰co.
41015017	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu isiiji batik ta dindik buŋ ar ta sultinniidi. Kar ŋu siyiiji jakumne ta jamiidi ho ŋu isiiji ar jakumne ta sultinniidi.
41015018	Kar ŋu teesiiji ooye aman : « Seek, sultan ka Yuudinnar ! »
41015019	Kar ŋu men̰n̰iig ɗo kaay iŋ eto, ŋu piciiji uln̰a ho ŋu dersiy ɗo uŋji, ansi-ak a ŋu karmiyaaga.
41015020	Min ŋu ajimiyig ko ajimiye, ŋu cimiijit batko-ata, kar ŋu isiijit tan̰ji, ŋu ɓaay ɗooɗin̰ ka etor.
41015021	Wiktin ŋu ɓaayiyo, ŋu ŋaamtu iŋ gem rakki paa siŋji Simon. Gem-ak min geeger ka Sireen ho ŋa asa min yeero. Ŋa takan̰ Alekzandir iŋ Rupuus. Ŋu asiriig a ŋaa icin̰ etoy ka Iisa.
41015022	Kar ŋu iyiig Iisa ɗo wer rakki ŋu kolaag Golgota. Pa-ak ɗiya aman : « Ɗawik ta kaar. »
41015023	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu rakji bere maam kuuk amse iŋ dawin kaak ŋu koliy « miir ». Ŋaar gay pooce.
41015024	Hiyya, ŋu ɗooɗiig ka etor. Min ŋu ɗooɗga, ŋu ɗeeɗiit kesuuney werin dakina ho ay gem di iciy taat galji.
41015025	Wiktin taat ŋu ɗooɗiig Iisa, pat nec parrika ta kawtira.
41015026	Ŋu siirtu kaaw taat iy obin̰ji aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ ko sultan ka Yuudinnar. »
41015027	Gin kokinay seera oki ŋu ɗooɗgu ɗo serpay ka atiydi, rakki ɗo meeday ho rakki gay ɗo n̰ugilay. [
41015028	Ansii ko, kaaw ta ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner astu ɗo werti aman : « Ŋu osig iŋ gee kuuk jookumo. »]
41015029	Gee kuuk bira min eɗe-ak sekiƴiy kaƴco ho ŋu wariig Iisa aman : « Hey ! Kiŋ kaak rak ɗimin̰ ger ka Buŋdi ho iŋ menaw subba di, kii pine ka pey,
41015030	jil kat ɗoo zin̰ ka meen̰jiŋ ho paay min ka etor ! »
41015031	Yoo agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi sa samtiyaaji ɗo Iisa, ŋu kaawiy benannico aman : « Ŋa jil gee ku pey, kar diŋ gay, ŋa gedarro jile ziy ka meen̰ji !
41015032	Seese Masi, sultan ka Israyeel. Paay diŋ di min ka etor, nii tale kar niin̰ aamine. » Yoo kokinay kuuk ŋu ɗooɗtu iŋ ŋaara oki waraaga.
41015033	Min pat ottu ƴiriyo, ta mattu. Wer astu gondiko ɗo kiɗ okin̰ji nam pat subba ta maako.
41015034	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Iisa kooltu raɗa aman : « Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani ? » Ansi-ak aman : « Buŋdu, Buŋdu, maa di ki poociinu ? »
41015035	Gee daarin̰ kuuk goy moota-ak dorga ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Cokiyoŋ ja, ŋa kolaag Eli ! »
41015036	Ɗo wer-ak, rakki minninco gaɗtu ŋa ictu bit ka jarɗor, ŋa ɗuuniit ɗo bi ka etor ho ŋa coopiig ɗo maam kuuk tooro. Kar ŋa beriijig ɗo Iisa a ŋaa cooɗe. Kar ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Eron̰ ja, gii tale ya Eli kat asa paayin̰ min ka etor. »
41015037	Kar Iisa kooltu raɗa ho ŋa mattu.
41015038	Min ŋa mattu, zimilla kuuk ɓigira ŋu caaltu atta ɗo ger ka Buŋdi eertu min ɗatko min kuwa yoo keɗer.
41015039	Min tatkaw ka askirin ku Room ka pey ɗo uŋji ka Iisa taltu maman Iisa mattu-ak, ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Way, gem-aŋ Roŋ ka Buŋdi ka seener ! »
41015040	Ɗo wer-ak, goy oki daaɗ daarin̰ kuuk aaɗig Iisa. Ŋu taliy min serek. Minninco goy Mariyam ta Magdala, iŋ Mariyam atan̰ Zaak ka kapaki iŋ Zooze, ho iŋ Salome.
41015041	Ŋu aaɗig Iisa wiktin ta ŋa goyiy Galile, ŋu taliy kaaci. Ɗo wer-ak goy oki daaɗ dakina ku pey, kuuk coon iŋ ŋaara Zeruzaleem.
41015042	Wiktin taat Iisa mattu ka etor, Yuudinna okin̰co siya ziŋkico ɗo ƴiriy ta sabitdi. Ƴiriy taar-at teesa min gale ka pati nam gale ka pat ta kawta. Ɗo aadinco ta Yuudinnar, waan un̰jaaɗo gem ka mate ɗo maginer iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi.
41015043	Ɗo wer-ak, gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Yuusup min geeger ka Arimate. Ŋaar oki min agindaw ku darrer ho gee karmiyaaga. Ŋa era ase ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi. Yuusup bal rake a zi ka Iisa yaa goye ka etor iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi. Ŋa ɓaawiiji ɗo Pilaat bal kolaw ho ŋa indiig zi ka Iisa.
41015044	Min Pilaat dortu kadar Iisa mat ko, ŋa ajbiytu tak-tak. Kar ŋa koliig tatkaw ka askirnar-aka ho ŋa indiiga ya Iisa mat ko jammiye.
41015045	Min Pilaat doriit kaaw ta tatkaw ka askirnar-ak, ŋa beriiji botol ɗo Yuusup ŋa ɓaayiy paayin̰ zi ka Iisa.
41015046	Hiyya, Yuusup gidiytu kapanne, ŋa paayiig zi ka Iisa min ka etor ho ŋa maliyiig iŋ kapanne-ata. Min ŋa maliyga, ŋa ɓaawtu un̰jiig ɗo magin taat ŋu doɗɗitu ka dambar. Min pa-ak, ŋa tuŋkiltu dambi ho ŋa ɗibiriit magin-ata.
41015047	Wiktin taar-at, Mariyam ta Magdala iŋ Mariyam atan̰ Zooze goy tala ɗo wer kaak ŋu diyiig Iisa.
41016001	Min ƴiriy ta sabit birtu, kun̰ Mariyam ta Magdala, iŋ Mariyam atan̰ Zaak, iŋ gaaco Salome gidiytu itir, ŋu ɓaawiiji kockice ɗo zi ka Iisa.
41016002	Iŋ ƴiriy ta dumaas, wer dugus-dugus sabaan cokaw, ŋu amiltu, ŋu ɓaayiy ɗo maginer.
41016003	Ɗo botildi, ŋu kaawiy benannico aman : « Waa yaate tuŋkilin̰ dambi min ɗo bit ka maginer ? »
41016004	Kar ŋu jaaltu kaƴco, ŋu tala kar dambi ka tatiko-ak waan tuŋkilig ko.
41016005	Wiktin taat ŋu un̰jiyo, ŋu gastu ɗubil rakki goy keɗer iŋ serip ta meeda. Ɗubil-ak is kesuun portiko. Min ŋu taliiga-ak, kolaw obiigu.
41016006	Kar ɗubil-ak kaawiico aman : « Dakoŋ ginenno kolaw. Nu iban kadar ku bariya Iisa ka min Nazareet kaak ŋu ɗooɗtu ka etor. Ŋaar ginno anne, ŋa nooye. Taloŋ, aŋ ko wer ka ŋu diyiiga.
41016007	Kar ɓaaŋ, dakon̰co kaaw ɗo maajirnay iŋ ɗo Piyer aman : ‟ Ŋaar ogirkoŋ ko ɗo kiɗ ka Galile. Anner kat, ku ɓaayiy talin̰ji uudin ta ŋa kaawiiko. ” »
41016008	Hiyya, daaɗ-ak amiltu ho ŋu gaɗtu serek min ɗo maginer. Asaan ŋu barjile ho ŋu azira jug-jug. Min kolaw di yoo ɗo waan sa, ŋu bal kaawe.
41016009	[Min Iisa nooytu, ƴiriy ta dumaas iŋ kawtir kawtira, ŋa bayniitit ja ɗo Mariyam taat min geeger ka Magdala, taat ŋa atiktu aariɗna peesira min ɗo ziti.
41016010	Ta ɓaawtu, ta osiico ɗo ŋuur kuuk awalle goy iŋ ŋaara. Ŋu morkaw ho ŋu alaw.
41016011	Kar ŋuur gay, min ŋu doriit kaawti taat a ta talig Iisa nooye-ak, ŋu bal icin kaawti.
41016012	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa ziy newsitu ho ŋa bayniico ɗo maajirnay kuuk seera ɗo wiktin taat ŋu ɓaayiy yeero.
41016013	Hiyya, ŋu yeeptu geero ho ŋu osiico ɗo een̰co maan kaak kuuniyco botildi. Kar ŋuur gay bal icin kaawco.
41016014	Hiyya, ba aar Iisa bayniico ɗo maajirnay kuuk orok iŋ rakki ɗo wiktin ta ŋu tiyiyo. Ŋa leesiico ɗo bi ka imaanco taat sooɗa ho iŋ kaƴco kuuk bombo, ŋu icgiyɗo kaaw ta gee kuuk talig ŋa nooye.
41016015	Kar Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Jaawoŋ adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji. Gaaron Kabarre ta Gala ɗo gee okin̰co.
41016016	Ŋaar kaak aamine ho ŋu batiziyga, Buŋ yaa jilin̰ji. Kar ŋaar kaak bal aamine gay, Buŋ yaaji ɗukume seriine.
41016017	-
41016018	Aŋ ko gamin kuuk ajbay kuuk yaa gaare a gee-aŋ aamin lotu : ŋuur kuuk aamin lotu-ak yaa gedire atke aariɗna iŋ siŋdu ho ŋuu gedire kaawe kaawin kuuk marbinto. Ŋuu obe aalna wal ya ŋu see kop taat diya sa, ginaacoɗo maanna. Ŋuu lee pisin̰co ɗo gee ku raɗaw ho gee-ak yaa coole. »
41016019	Min Rabbin Iisa kaawiico pa-ak, Buŋ coonig ka samaaner ho ŋa diyiig ɗo meeday.
41016020	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirnay totirtu ɗo ay wero, ŋu gaariy Kabarre ta Gala. Rabbin gaayiigu ŋu giniy gamin kuuk ajbay kuuk gaara kadar kaawco ka seener.]
42001001	Gem kol siŋji Teyopil, min awalle, gee dakina gec siirin̰ gamin kuuk kuuniy ɗo ɗatikte.
42001002	Ŋu gaarteŋ gamin-ak ar kaak awalle gee kuuk tal iŋ odinco osiiteŋgu, ŋuur-ak riyco ta gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi di.
42001003	Ampa-ak, nun oki, aldu gala taat min nu bariytu baaco samaane ta gamin okin̰co kuuk kuuniy min ɗo teesindi, nu siiriijiŋ gamin-ak rakki rakki locin.
42001004	Nu siiriijiŋ-ak asaan kii ibine seen ta garaan taat ki gastu.
42001005	Ɗo wiktin taat Herood goyiy sultan ka Zuude, gin gay satkiner rakki ŋu kolaag Zakariya. Ŋa gina riy ɗo ger ka Buŋdi iŋ gay satkiner ku Abiya. Daaciy, siŋti Elizabeet, ta min tamba ta Haruun.
42001006	Zakariya iŋ daaciy, seerco, ŋu gee sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ho iŋ gelbin rakki, ŋu karmiyaag gaanuun ka Buŋdi okin̰ji.
42001007	Kar ŋuur gay bal wee asaan Elizabeet, taar mogina ho seerco ŋu zaɓ ko tak-tak.
42001008	Ƴiriy rakki, tamba tan̰ Zakariya as gine satkine ɗo ger ka Buŋdi asaan ta kaminco.
42001009	Zakariya kat ta gal ɗo kaay a ŋa ɓaa onne dokkanne atta ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ar kaak gay satkiner gingiy ɗo aadinco.
42001010	Wiktin taat dokkanne onniy-ak, gee okin̰co gay goy salkiya kara.
42001011	Tala kar, ɗubil ka Buŋdi bayniiji ɗo Zakariya ho ŋa pey ɗo meeday ta wer kaak dokkanne onniy-aka.
42001012	Min Zakariya taliig ɗubil-ak, ŋa barjiltu ho kolaw obiiga.
42001013	Kar ɗubil-ak gay kaawiiji aman : « Zakariya, dak ginenno kolaw. Buŋ cokiyit salaanen̰. Daaciŋ Elizabeet yaan̰ wee mico. Ya ta wee, kii kolin̰ Yaaya.
42001014	Adin̰ yaa gine portik aale ho gee dakina yaa aaciye iŋ kiŋke ɗo bi ka ween̰ji.
42001015	Asaan mic-ak asa gine gay riyor tatko ka Buŋdi. Wala ŋa siya maama, wala ŋa siya argi. Min ɗo adti ka yaaco di, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi miinig ko.
42001016	Ŋa asa iyin̰ koogin ku Israyeel dakina ɗo botol ta Rabbinco Buŋ.
42001017	Ŋaa ogirin̰ uŋji, ŋaa gine riyoy iŋ gudurre ho iŋ ruwwine ar kaak nabi Eli gintu awalle. Ŋaa amrin̰ aginay iŋ kooginco ho ŋaa newsin̰ gee kuuk kaƴco bombo ŋuu gine gee sellen̰. Paa kat, ŋaa n̰ume gee kuuk yaa kuuniye kun̰ji. »
42001018	Zakariya telkiiji ɗo ɗubil ka Buŋdi-ak aman : « Nunu iŋ daatur, seertini ni zaɓ ko, kar maman naa ibine kadar maanna-aŋ ka seener ? »
42001019	Ɗubil-ak kaawiiji aman : « Nun ko kaak ŋu koliy Jibriin kaak peya ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ŋa n̰aamintu a naan̰ iyin kabarre ta gala-anta.
42001020	Kar kiŋ gay bal aamine ɗo kaawor. Kaawor-at yaa asen di ɗo wiktinti. Ɗo saan taar-at ko, Buŋ yaan̰ sokumin̰ bin̰ nam ƴiriy taat gamin-ak yaa kuuniye. »
42001021	Wiktin taat Zakariya kaawiy iŋ ɗubil ka Buŋdi-ak, gee kuuk eraag kara gay ajbiytu ɗo taaye kaak ŋa taaytu atta-aka.
42001022	Min ŋa amiltu, biy sokume. Illa ŋa tawga iŋ pisin̰ji di. Ampaa ko, gee-ak ibintu kadar maan bayinji atta ɗo ger ka Buŋdi.
42001023	Hiyya, min kun̰ Zakariya deet kaminco, ŋu yeeptu geero.
42001024	Ba aaro, daaciy Elizabeet ictu adi. Koyin beeƴ ta cigil geer di. Ta kaawtu ɗo adti aman :
42001025	« Way, Rabbin tal kaatu. Diŋ ŋa imilduut kat sokun̰uwir min uŋco ka geemir. »
42001026	Adti ka Elizabeet nec ko koyin bijigiƴ, kar Buŋ n̰aamiig ɗubiley Jibriin ɗo geeger ka Nazareet ɗo kiɗ ka Galile.
42001027	Ŋa n̰aamiig ɗo gemso rakki, siŋti Mariyam taat kaawco mat ko iŋ Yuusup a ŋuu obe. Yuusup gay, ŋaar min baa tan̰ Dawuud.
42001028	Ɗubil-ak un̰jitu ɗo werti, ŋa ooyiititi, ho ŋa kaawiitit aman : « Kaŋ aacay, ka gas barkin min ɗo Buŋdi. Ŋa goy iŋ kaŋke. »
42001029	Min Mariyam doriit kaawoy-at, ta barjiltu tak-tak. Kar ta ostu ɗo adti aman : « Taar-an gay baati maa ? »
42001030	Ɗubil-ak kaawiitit aman : « Dak ginenno kolaw, Mariyam, asaan ka gas barkin ta Buŋdi.
42001031	Kaa ice adi, kaa wee mico ho kaaji diye siŋ Iisa.
42001032	Mic-ak, siŋji asa aale. Ŋuu kolin̰ Roŋ ka Buŋ ka kuwa. Rabbin Buŋ yaaji berin̰ sees ka sultan kaak min ka tacco Dawuud.
42001033	Ŋaa goye sultan ka gee ku Israyeel doo ho meennuwiy gaasaaɗo tak-tak. »
42001034	Mariyam telkiiji ɗo ɗubil-ak aman : « Maanna-aŋ yaa kuuniye maman asaan nun ibanno misa mitko ? »
42001035	Ɗubil-ak kaawiitit aman : « Ruwwin ta Buŋdi yaake ase ho gudurre taat min kuwa yaake gootiŋke ar kelmo. Ansii ko, mic kaak kaa wee-ak yaa goye sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ŋuu kolin̰ Roŋ ka Buŋdi.
42001036	Cokay ! Elizabeet taat min baako oki iŋ adti. Taar taat gee osiy a ta mogina din sa, diŋ adti koynay bijigiƴ ko ho taa wee mico.
42001037	Asaan ginno maan kaak pak Buŋ. »
42001038	Min pa-ak Mariyam kaawtu aman : « Nun gay riyor ta Rabbiner. Kaaw taat ki kaawiidu-an yaa ase ɗo botilti. » Hiyya, ɗubil-ak rasiita ho ŋa ɗeettu.
42001039	Menaw ŋuur-ak di, Mariyam uctu ho ta birtu sak-sak iŋ uŋti ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude ɗo geeger rakki ka dambar.
42001040	Ta un̰jitu ɗo ger kan̰ Zakariya ho ta ooyiitit ɗo Elizabeet.
42001041	Min Elizabeet doriit ooyti-at di, mic kaak ɗo adti-ak teestu awke ho Ruwwin ta Buŋdi miiniita.
42001042	Ta kaawtu iŋ gaaƴ toŋgo aman : « Min daaɗ okin̰co-aŋ, kaŋken di Buŋ barkiyiŋke ho mic kaak ɗo adke oki, ŋa barkiyga.
42001043	Nun gay waa, taat nam atan̰ Rabbiner asiin talindu ?
42001044	Talu, ɗo wiktin taat nu dorig gaaƴke di, mic kaak ɗo adir-aŋ alji gala nam ŋa awke.
42001045	Galal loke, kaŋ taat aamin ɗo kaaw taat Rabbin kaawiike a taa nece ɗo werti ! »
42001046	Kar Mariyam ictu riye aman : « Nu ozila Rabbin Buŋ, ŋaar kaak tatiko.
42001047	Gelbiner miin iŋ galal, asaan Buŋ jilaanu.
42001048	Ŋa tal aminduwir, nun taat gay riyoy ho diŋ ŋa jaalintu. Ka seener gay, min ƴiriyta ɓaayiy iŋ uŋti, gee okin̰co yaa kaawe a Buŋ berdu galal,
42001049	asaan Buŋ kaak gin gudurre okintiti berdu gamin kuuk samaan lotu. Sellen̰ gay siŋji.
42001050	Aminduwiy goy doo ɗo gee kuuk karmiyaaga.
42001051	Ŋa gaarit gudurrey iŋ soriyay. Ŋa totirig gee kuuk jaala ziŋkico kuwa.
42001052	Ŋa paayig sultinnay min ɗo jarɗico, ho ŋa jaalig masaakanna kuwa.
42001053	Gee kuuk mey diyaagu, ŋa berco tee, ho gay gamnar gay, ŋa atkiig iŋ pisin̰co orok.
42001054	Ŋa mogig gay riyoy, gee ku Israyeel. Ansi-ak, ŋa moyiig tale ka aminduwiy.
42001055	Aminduwiy-at, ŋa taliit doo ɗo Ibraayim iŋ tambaay ar taat ŋa kaawiico ɗo aginiyte. »
42001056	Min ŋaar-ak, Mariyam taaytu wer ka Elizabeet ar koyin subba pa, kar ta yeeptu gerco.
42001057	Elizabeet, min menuwti ku weendi nectu, ta weetu mico.
42001058	Mutkiyti iŋ aginiyti dortu a Rabbin tal aminduwti-ak, ŋu aaciytu iŋ taara.
42001059	Min mic-ak gintu menaw porpoɗ, kar ŋu astu ɗo ɗukume ka seln̰ol. Zer ŋu rakji diye siŋ ku tacco Zakariya.
42001060	Kar yaaco gay kaawiico aman : « Ha’a, paaɗo ! Gii kolin̰ Yaaya. »
42001061	Ŋuur gay telkiitit aman : « Ɗo baako, ginno gem kaak siŋji pa. »
42001062	Kar ŋu kaawiiji iŋ pisin̰co ɗo tacco Zakariya aman : « Ki raka roŋji, gii kolin̰ waa ? »
42001063	Ŋaar gay inditu maan ka siirindi, kar ŋa siirtu aman : « Siŋji Yaaya. » Hiyya, gee-ak okin̰co ajbiytu.
42001064	Ɗo wer-ak, biy piltu kate ho ŋa teestu kaawe. Ŋa oziliig Buŋ.
42001065	Gee-ak kolaw un̰jiico. Kaaw-at totirtu ɗo kiɗ okin̰ji ka dambiniidi ka Zuude ho ŋu kaawa ko ɗo bi ŋaar-ak di. Okin̰co, gee kuuk doriit kaaw-at, kolaw un̰jiico,
42001066	ŋu obiit ɗo gelbinco ho ŋu ɗiytu aman : « Mic-aŋ asa gine maa gemira ? » Ka seener, gudurre ta Buŋdi goy iŋ ŋaara.
