42013006	Kar Iisa deliico daŋla aman : « Cokiyoŋ, gem rakki gin jineene. Ɗo jineen-ak, gin et ar buguwa. Gem-ak ɓaawtu okiɗe roŋji, kar ŋa bal gase yoo rakki.
42013007	Kar ŋa kaawiiji ɗo gay riyoy aman : ‟ Talu ! Gin ko elgin subba, nu asgiy okiɗe roŋ ku et-aŋka, kar nu gasɗo maanna. Doliyiig kara asaan ŋa ica wer maala. ”
42013008	Kar gay riyoy-ak telkiiji aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, rasig pey ɗo elgol-anta. Naaji siye porɗa ɗo baay ho naaji lee dooyo.
42013009	Pa-ak, wal ŋaa ween diŋ ga roŋ weeno. Kar ya ŋa bal weeŋ gay, kii doliyin̰ji di. ” »
42013010	Ƴiriy rakki ta sabitdi, Iisa goy ɓilda gee ɗo ger ka salaaner.
42013011	Ɗo wer-ak, gin daatik rakki aariɗ obta nam elgin orok iŋ porpoɗ ta goy kooŋ di. Ta gedarro taa peye tal.
42013012	Min Iisa taliit daatko-at, ŋa koliita ho ŋa kaawiitit aman : « Kaŋ coole min ɗo raɗuwke. »
42013013	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa leetu pisin̰ji ɗo kaati, ek di ta peytu tal ho ta teestu ozile Buŋ.
42013014	Kar tatkaw ka ger ka salaaner-ak dapin̰tu ɗo bi kaak a Iisa cool geem iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋa kaawiico ɗo gee kuuk dakin-ak aman : « Gi gin mena bijigiƴ ku riyor. Ɗo mena ŋuur-ak kat kuu ase ŋuuko cooliŋko. Yampa, dakoŋ asenno iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi. »
42013015	Kar Rabbin Iisa telkiiji aman : « Kuŋ gee kuuk kaawa iŋ biŋkikon di ho ta aditkoŋ gay keetiti ! Iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, waa kaak iparro berkiy wala ɗurkilji min ɗo saayney ho ŋa ɓaayiji bere amay ?
42013016	Kar daatko-an, taar min tamba ta Ibraayim. Seetanne ɗuunit nam elgin orok iŋ porpoɗ. Kar maa di nu ipiriitɗo min ɗo raɗuwti iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi ? »
42013017	Wiktin taat Iisa kaawiy pa-ak, adiney okin̰co sokan̰ deeyiig ko dee. Kar gee kuuk dakin-ak gay, aaciyaw ɗo gamin okin̰co kuuk ajbay ŋa gintu.
42013018	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa kaawtu aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ar maa ho naa taskiyin iŋ maa ?
42013019	Taar kapak ar roŋ ka mutaard kaak gem luwtu ɗo jineendi. Roŋ-ak amiltu, ŋa maaɗtu ho ŋa gintu ar eto nam ɗiiɗ sa saaƴtu ɗo leeginay. Meennaw ta Buŋdi oki pa. »
42013020	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar naa taskiyin iŋ maa ?
42013021	Taar ar gele taat sooɗ di taat daatik liyiy ɗo kurgal kuuk dakina, ta eɗiigu ho ŋu uciy gusus. »
42013022	Wiktin taat Iisa ɓaay Zeruzaleem, ŋa aaɗa geegirnay ho hellinnan iŋ ɓilde ka geemir.
42013023	Ɗo botildi, waan rakki indiig aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, Buŋ yaa jile gee sooɗ di walla ? » Kar Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo gee kuuk goy ɗo wer-ak aman :
42013024	« Zeeɗoŋ kuu un̰je min ɗo botol ta n̰elel. Asaan nu kaawaako, gee dakina yaa bariye botol taat ŋuu un̰je, kar ŋu gediraaɗo.
42013025	« Wiktin yaa ase taat mee gerdi yaa uce ŋaa ɗibirin botol. Ya ku goy kara ɗo wiktin-ata, ku as kooce ɗibiro ho kuu indin̰ aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, pilni botol. ” Ŋaar gay yaako telke aman : ‟ Nu ibanno kuŋ min momo ? ”
42013026	Kar kuuji telke aman : ‟ Ni tee ho ni see iŋ kiŋke. Ki ɓilde oki gee ɗo werin kuuk berel ku geegirni. ”
42013027	Kar mee gerdi-ak yaako telke pey aman : ‟ Nu ibanno kuŋ min momo, etiroŋ serek minniner, okiŋko, kuŋ gee kuuk gina jookumo. ”
42013028	Kar ɗo wiktin taat kuu talin̰ aginiyko Ibraayim, Isaaka, Yakuub ho iŋ nabiinna okin̰co ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, kar kuŋ gay, ŋuuko oriŋko kara-ak, kuu eeyme saaŋko ho zulin̰ko yaa min̰e dakina.
42013029	Ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi-at, gee yaa ase min coke ka pati, min gale ka pati, min watiine ho min munsakne. Okin̰co, ŋuu goye keɗer ɗo tee ka iidin ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
42013030	Ansii ko, min gee kuuk diŋ goy aaro, daarin̰ yaa ogire, ho min gee kuuk diŋ ogire, daarin̰ yaa ɗake aaro. »
42013031	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Pariziyenna daarin̰ ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Uc min anne, ɗeet wer ka pey. Yampa, Herood rakaan̰ dee. »
42013032	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ kaawon̰ji ɗo guberneer kaak neenduw ar sokriya-ak aman : ‟ Min ƴiriyta yoo kawta, nu gina riy ta atke aariɗnar ho ta coole geemir. Kar ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa gaasin riy-ata. ”
42013033	Kar gay, nu ic ko botol ta Zeruzaleem. Min ƴiriyta, kawta ho neginda oki, illa naa sin̰je iŋ uŋdu. Yampa, nabiin̰ce, ŋu daggigɗo kara min ɗo geeger-aka.
42013034	« Tuɓina, tuɓina, gee ku Zeruzaleem, kuŋko kuuk daggig nabiinna, ho ŋuur kuuk Buŋ n̰aamiiko oki, ku zeergig iŋ dambay nam ŋu matiyo. Dees minaw, nu ictu niyin a naako n̰umiŋko, kuŋ gee ku Zeruzaleem, ar kokir taat gootig roŋti iŋ gezgirti. Kar kuŋ gay pooce !
42013035	Di ŋaar-ak, goyiro iŋ gerko. Ka seener nu kaawaako, ku talaanno pey tak-tak nam ƴiriy taat kuu asiy kaawe aman : ‟ Rabbin Buŋ yaa barkiyin̰ ŋaar kaak as iŋ siŋ kun̰ji ! ” »
42014001	Ƴiriy rakki iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, rakki min agindaw ku Pariziyennar ɓaawtu iŋ Iisa ɗo geriy a ŋu ɓaa tee. Gee kuuk goy eɗe-ak okin̰co leeyig odinco ruum ɗo Iisa ya ŋaa n̰epiɗin̰ gaanuunco wala kawwi.
42014002	Ɗo wer-ak, gem rakki gin raɗuw ta waase ziŋkar goy ɗo uŋji ka Iisa.
42014003	Iisa ictu kaawo ho ŋa indiig agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ Pariziyenna aman : « Gaanuunte beraate botol ta coole gemor iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi wala kawwi ? »
42014004	Kar ŋuur gay bugum cit-cit. Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa obiig gem kaak raɗaw-aka, ŋa cooliiga ho ŋa kaawiiji a ŋaa ɗeete.
42014005	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iciico kaawo ɗo gee kuuk ɗo ger-ak aman : « Waa minninko iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, ya roŋji wala berkiy kat gal ɗo beendi, ɓaayiyɗo imilin̰ koɗok ? »
42014006	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak oki, ŋu bugum di cit-cit. Ŋu bal gedire telke.
42014007	Min gee kuuk ŋu koltu-ak, ay gem di bariya wer kaak taɓ ŋaa goye uŋda. Min Iisa taltu pa-ak, ŋa deliico daŋla aman :
42014008	« Ya waan kolin̰ciŋ ɗo iidin ta obindi, dak goyenno uŋda. Paa ŋuu kole gem kaak tatik pakgiciŋ.
42014009	Yampa, gem kaak koliŋko-ak yaan̰ kaawe aman : ‟ Gem kol siŋji, uc rasig wer-aŋ ɗo gijiŋ. ” Hiyya, kii uceŋ kat iŋ kaan̰ waase, ki ɓaay goye aar ta geemir.
42014010	Kar gay, ya waan kolin̰ciŋ-ak, goy aar ta geemir di. Ampaa kat, ya kaak kolin̰ciŋ-ak ase, ŋaan̰ kaawe aman : ‟ Gem kol royay, as kii goye uŋda anne. ” Paa kat, gee kuuk ku tiyiy sawa yaa ibine kadar kiŋ kaan̰ jaale.
42014011	Nu kaawiy pa-ak, asaan ya gem kaak jaala ziy ɗo uŋco ka een̰ji-ak, Buŋ yaa yeepin̰ kapak tak-tak, ho ya gem kaak yeepa ziy kapak gay, Buŋ yaa jaalin̰ji. »
42014012	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa kaawiiji ɗo ŋaar kaak kolig ɗo teendi aman : « Ya ki kol gee a ŋu ɓaa tee ɗo gerin̰, ƴiriyo wala aando, dak kolenno roynan̰, siŋtan̰, gee ku adiy ka gerko, wala mutkiyin̰ kuuk gay gamnar. Yampa, ŋuur oki yaan̰ kole ho ŋuun̰ kapiyin haginen̰ taat ŋu teetu.
42014013	Kar gay, ya ki bera tee ka iidiner, kol pokirna, mersina, noolna iŋ kuuk ziŋkico galcoɗo.
42014014	Ya ki gina pa-ak, kii gase galal, asaan ŋuur gediraaɗo ŋuun̰ kapiyin haginen̰ taat kiŋ beriico. Illa Buŋ kat yaan̰ kapiyinti ɗo wiktin taat ŋaa nooyin̰ ŋuur kuuk goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji. »
42014015	Min gee kuuk tiyaw dortu pa-ak, rakki kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Galal ɗo ŋaar kaak yaa goye ɗo tee ka iidin ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi. »
42014016	Iisa gay deliiji daŋla aman : « Gem rakki gina iidine. Ŋa koltu gee dakina ɗo teendi.
42014017	Pat ta teendi nece, ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyoy rakki a ŋa ɓaa kole gee kuuk siŋco goya aman : ‟ Asoŋ koɗok ! Tee ŋaar nee ko. ”
42014018	Kar ŋuur gay, okin̰co imiltu kaƴco a ŋu otaaɗo. Ka awalle-ak kaawiiji ɗo gay riyor-ak aman : ‟ Baan̰u, kaawiy ɗo tatkuwin̰ ŋaadu saamiye. Diŋ di nu gidiy morgo, illa nu ɓaa ja talin̰ji. ”
42014019	Ka seeriŋkar kaawiiji aman : ‟ Baan̰u, kaawiy ɗo tatkuwin̰ ŋaadu saamiye. Diŋ di nu gidiy barkay orok ku riyor, nu ɓaa ja gecin̰co. ”
42014020	Ka subbiŋkar kaawiiji aman : ‟ Nun daaɓiner di ob daatko. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, nu gediraaɗo naa ɓaawe. ”
42014021	Hiyya, gay riyor-ak yeeptu ɗo tatkuwiy ho ŋa osiijig kaawinco-aku. Min tatkaw-ak doriig kaawin-ak, ŋa dapin̰tu ho ŋa kaawiiji ɗo gay riyoy-ak aman : ‟ Gaɗ koɗok ɗo werin kuuk berel ho ɗo botilay ku geegirdi. Ɓaa kolig pokirna, mersina, noolna ho iŋ kuuk ziŋkico galcoɗo. ”
42014022	Jammiy sooɗa, gay riyoy-ak yeeptu, ŋaa kaawiiji ɗo tatkuwiy aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, nu ginit taat ki kaawiidu, kar wer gay goy di ɗake. ”
42014023	Hiyya, mee gerdi-ak kaawiiji aman : ‟ Ɓaa ɗo botilay ku yeero ho gee kuuk kii ŋaame, wakilco ŋuu un̰je, paa kat, gerir yaa miine iŋ gee.
42014024	Ka seener nu kaawaako, min gee kuuk awalle nu koltu ho pooc-aŋ, yoo waan sa aawaagɗo teendu. ” »
42014025	Ƴiriy rakki, Iisa ica botol ho gee dakin aaɗaaga. Ŋa kolsitu ho ŋa kaawiico aman :
42014026	« Ya waan kaak rakaan aaɗindu, illa ŋaan elindu pak aginiyji, daaciy, kooginay, siŋtay ho ziy ka meen̰ji oki. Yampa, ŋa ginaaɗo tak-tak maajirin̰cer.
42014027	Ya waan kaak icaagɗo etoy ka taaɓiner a ŋaan aaɗindu, ŋaar-ak gediraaɗo gine maajirin̰cer.
42014028	Ya minninko rakki raka pine ger tatiko, illa ŋa goya ja keɗer, ŋaa tale ya gurusji yaaji nece ŋaa peyin̰ ger-aka.
42014029	Yampa, ya ŋa durcit baay ho ŋa bal peyin̰ji, gee okin̰co kuuk biraw yaaji samtiye aman :
42014030	‟ Huu, taloŋ ja, gem-aŋ tees pine gero kar ŋa bal peyin̰ji ! ”
42014031	Ya sultan rakki raka taasin̰e iŋ giji, illa ŋa tala ja iŋ askirnay kuuk alip orok ya ŋaa gedire taasin̰e sultan kaak gin orok seer alip askirna ɗo aaroy.
42014032	Ya ŋa gediraaɗo gay, ŋaaji n̰aame paliinna min ŋu misa sereki, ŋuuji kaawe ɗo sultan-ak a ŋuu gine maman garta yaa peye. »
42014033	Iisa gaayiitit pey ɗo kaawoy aman : « Minninko rakki gediraaɗo ŋaan aaɗindu ya ŋa bal rasin̰ malley okin̰ji kaak ŋa gintu. »
42014034	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ku iban tam kadar maral, ŋuur gala. Kar ya ŋuur kat cille gay, kuuco gaaye maa ŋuu aawe ? Ha’a, ginno maanna.
42014035	Maral kuuk cille-ak, ŋuur kuunayɗo diyarre ɗo kiɗar wala ɗo morginar. Gee oraag ka suusi. Ya ku gin ɗeŋgina, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane, kuu cokiye. »
42015001	Ƴiriy rakki, min gay obe miirir iŋ gee ku pey kuuk gin zunuubinna, dakina ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa a ŋuu cokiyin̰ji.
42015002	Ɗo wer-ak, Pariziyenna iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi dapin̰tu ho ŋu kaawtu aman : « Gem-aŋ jaawa iŋ gee kuuk gin zunuubinna ho ŋa tiya iŋ ŋuura. »
42015003	Iisa gay deliico daŋla aman :
42015004	« Cokiyoŋ, ya rakki minninko gin tamgi miya ho ta rakki rawte, ŋaa gine maman ? Ŋaa rasin̰ kuuk dakina ɗo kalaaner iŋ gemo ho ŋa ɓaayiy bariyin ta rawte nam ŋaa gasinti.
42015005	Ya ŋa gasta, ŋaa aaciye ho ŋaa icin ɗo gornay.
42015006	Ŋaa yeepe geero ho min ŋa ote, ŋaa kolin̰ roynay iŋ mutkiyiy ho ŋaaco kaawe aman : ‟ Asoŋ, aaciyoŋ iŋ nunu asaan tamgar taat rawte-at, nu gasta. ”
42015007	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ampaa kat, ya gem rakki gay zunuubinnar ibinig nigin̰ji, ɗubal ku Buŋdi yaa aaciye dakina. Aaciye ŋaar-ak pakgig aaciye kaak ɗubal-ak yaa aaciye iŋ gee kuuk orok parrika iŋ parrika kuuk pakira a ŋu goy ko iŋ botol ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho isgigɗo iŋ jipte ka goyin̰co. »
42015008	Iisa gaayiitit ɗo kaawoy aman : « Ya daatik rakki gin tammin orok ku gurusdi ho rakki rawte, ta biƴaaɗo lampa taa tale samaane ho taa eln̰e lapaɗ-lapaɗ adiy ka gerti nam taa gasin̰ji walla ?
42015009	Ya ta gasga, ta kolin̰ gaadinti iŋ mutkiyti ho taaco kaawe aman : ‟ Asoŋ, aaciyoŋ iŋ nunu, asaan tammar kaak rawte, nu gasga. ”
42015010	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ɗubal ku Buŋdi yaa aaciye oki dakin pa, ya gay zunuubinnar rakki kat ibinig nigin̰ji. »
42015011	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Gem rakki gin koogin seera.
42015012	Ƴiriy rakki, roŋji ka kapak kaawiiji ɗo tacco aman : ‟ Baaba, baan̰u, min malle-aŋ, berduut ko haginer. ” Hiyya, tacco ooytu ho ŋa ɗeeɗiicog malley ɗo kooginay seerco.
42015013	Gin menaw seer subba, roŋji ka kapak-ak gidiyiig gamnay okin̰co ho ŋa ɗeettu iŋ gurusji ɗo darre ta serek. Anner-ak, ŋa kan̰jit ko kan̰je iŋ gurus nam wer kaak ŋa gaasiiga.
42015014	Wiktin taat ŋa gaasga, mey yaarik un̰jitu ɗo darre-ata ho maan kaak ŋaa tee sa ginno tak-tak.
42015015	Hiyya, ŋa ɓaawtu bariye riyo. Gem rakki min ɗo darre-at iciiga, ŋa n̰aamiig gooƴe kinziirna ɗo morginay.
42015016	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa raka kin miine adiy iŋ keckil kaak kinziirna eeymiy-ak di oki, waan bergijiɗo.
42015017	Hiyya, ŋa pakiriit kat duniin kee ho ŋa kaawtu aman : ‟ Way, nun-aŋ kati, gay riyor ku tanni tiya maak-kawtira nam ŋu pica siro. Kat nun gay mata anne iŋ meya !
42015018	Nun naa yeepe iŋ tanni ho naaji kaawe aman : Baaba, nu nig ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ɗo uŋjiŋ.
42015019	Dakin talinduɗo pey ar roŋji. Talin ko ar nu gay riyon̰ di. ”
42015020	Hiyya, ŋa uctu, ŋa ɗeettu wer ka tacco. Min ŋa asa misa serek di, tacco taliiga ho ŋa taltu aminduwiy dakina. Ŋa uctu iŋ gaɗiy, ŋa ɓaawtu ŋaamin̰ji. Min ŋu ŋaame, ŋa baamiyiig tipic ho ŋa giniiji cuuɗ.
42015021	Kar roŋji kaawiiji aman : ‟ Baaba, nu nig ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ɗo uŋjiŋ. Dakin talinduɗo pey ar roŋjiŋ. ”
42015022	Kar tacco gay kaawiico ɗo gay riyoy aman : ‟ Kuŋ-aŋku, gaɗoŋ koɗok. Iyon̰jit kesuun taat kaalne-ata ho ison̰jiita. Un̰jon̰ji korkiɗo ho ison̰ji oki n̰ugira.
42015023	Iyoŋ ijilin̰ kaak dub-dub-aka ho dapsiyoŋga. Gininte iidin yaarko ho aaciyinte !
42015024	Gii iidiye-ak asaan roŋdu kaak ku taliy-aŋ, ar ŋa mate ho diŋ gay ŋa goy iŋ odinay. Ŋa rawte ho diŋ gay, nu gasga. ” Hiyya, ŋu teestu iidine.
42015025	« Wiktin taar-at, roŋji ka aawo gay ɗeet yeero. Ɗo yeepin̰ji, min ŋa gaay ote geero, ŋa dora gaŋgin alaw.
42015026	Hiyya, ŋa koltu gay riyor rakki ho ŋa indiig aman : ‟ Ŋaar maa di kuuniy geero ? ”
42015027	Gay riyor-ak telkiiji aman : ‟ Ŋaar siŋjiŋ kaak kapak-ak ɗoo ase ho takko dapsiyig ijilin̰ kaak dub-dub-aka, asaan ŋa as iŋ cewey. ”
42015028	Min roŋji ka aawo dortu pa-ak, ŋa dapin̰tu aale ho ŋa pooctu un̰je geero. Kar tacco amiltu salin̰ji a ŋaa un̰je geero.
42015029	Ŋaar gay telkiiji ɗo tacco aman : ‟ Cokay baaba ! Gin elgin dakina nu gina riy lociŋ di ho ƴiriy rakki nu bal pooce kaawon̰. Kar lotu gay, yoo roŋ awkor oki, ki baldu bere naa iidiye iŋ roynar.
42015030	Kar gay, wiktin ta roŋjiŋ kaak kan̰je iŋ mallen̰ iŋ azbinna as gay, ki dapsiyjiig ijilin̰ kaak dub-dub-aka. ” »
42015031	Tacco gay telkiiji aman : « Gem kol roŋji, kiŋ goy doo iŋ nunu ho gamin kunto, okin̰co, ŋuur kun̰jiŋ di.
42015032	Kar gay, ya taɓ-ak, ginte iidiye ho ginte aaciye, asaan siŋjiŋ kaak ki taliy-aŋ, ar ŋa mate, ho diŋ gay, ŋa goy iŋ odinay. Ŋa rawte ho diŋ gay, nu gasga ! »
42016001	Ƴiriy rakki, Iisa deliico pey daŋla ɗo maajirnay aman : « Gem rakki gay gamnar, ŋa gin gay riyor rakki ŋa beriijig gamnay ɗo pisin̰ji. Kar gee daarin̰ astu ŋu osiiji ɗo tatkaw-ak aman : ‟ Yaman gay riyon̰-aŋ nigaag gamnan̰. ”
42016002	Tatkuwiy-ak koliiga ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : ‟ Nu dor gee kaawa jookumo ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ. Osor ja gurus kaak ki gastu, asaan min ƴiriyta-aŋ ki goyaaɗo pey tak-tak kaaco ka gamnar. ”
42016003	Kar gay riyor-ak osiig adiy aman : ‟ Tatkuwir imilaan min ɗo riyor. Gawin sa, nu ka gawnarro ho naa oce sa, sokan̰ diyaanu. Kar nun-aŋ, naa gine zir maman ga ?
42016004	Wayya ! Nun iban maan kaak naa gine. Ansi-ak, ya ŋa imilin min ɗo riyor oki, gee goy di kuuk yaan obindu tara ! ”
42016005	Kar ŋa koliig ŋuur okin̰co kuuk ic ɗaan ta tatkuwiy a ŋuu ase rakki rakki. Ŋaar kaak asji awalle-ak, ŋa kaawiiji aman : ‟ Ɗaanan̰ minaw taat kiiji kappiye ɗo tatkuwir ? ”
42016006	Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : ‟ Nun, naaji kappiye yogingan miya ku sewindi. ” Kar gay riyor-ak telkiiji aman : ‟ Aan katkiɗjiŋ ta ɗaani, goy keɗer koɗok ho siir yogingan orok beeƴ di. ”
42016007	Kar ŋa kaawtu pey ɗo ka pey aman : ‟ Kiŋ gay tan̰jiŋ minaw ? ” Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : ‟ Nun, naaji kappiye suwaalin miya ku gemer. ” Gay riyor-ak kaawiiji aman : ‟ Aan katkiɗjiŋ ta ɗaani, goy keɗer koɗok ho siir suwaalin orok porpoɗ di. ”
42016008	Hiyya, tatkuwiy oziliig gay riyoy kaak jookumo asaan ŋa ginit riyoy iŋ neendaw. Ka seener, gee ku ɗo duniiner-aŋ, neenduwco taat benannico pakgit ta ŋuur kuuk goy ɗo portikaw ta Buŋdi. »
42016009	Iisa gaaytu pey aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, obguwoŋ roynaw iŋ gurus kaak jagaag gee ku duniiner. Paa kat, wiktin taat gurus-ak gaase, Buŋ yaako obiŋko ɗo geriy kuu goye doo.
42016010	Ŋaar kaak gaara ziy a ŋuu amniyin̰ji iŋ gamin kuuk sooɗa, kuuk dakina oki, ŋaaco gedire. Kar ŋaar kaak nigaag gamin kuuk sooɗ-ak gay, kuuk dakina oki, ŋaa nigin̰co.
42016011	Ya gamin ku duniiner kat ku balco gedire-ak, waa yaako amniye gamin kuuk taɓ ?
42016012	Ya ku tiya gamin ku geemir, ku maaniikoŋ gay, waa yaako berin̰co.
42016013	« Ginno gay riyor kaak yaa gine riy ɗo agindaw seera. Ya ŋa gina pa, ka rakki, ŋaa elin̰ji, ho ka rakki gay, ŋaa poocin̰ji. Kar pey, ka rakki, ŋaa ice kaawoy, ho ka rakki gay, ŋa icaatɗo. Ku gediraaɗo abdiye Buŋ ho kuu abdiye pey gurus. »
42016014	Ɗo wer-ak, Pariziyenna kuuk goy cokiya kaawin ku Iisa-ak samtiyaaji asaan ŋu el gurus dakina.
42016015	Kar Iisa kaawiico aman : « Kuŋ Pariziyenna, ku el gaare ziŋkiko ɗo uŋco ka geemir a ku gee sellen̰. Kar Buŋ gay ibingit ta aditko. Asaan maan kaak gee taliig taɓ-ak, Buŋ gay ƴilaaga.
42016016	« Taat gaanuun ka Muusa kaawtu iŋ taat nabiinna gaartu, tan̰co di tee kee nam wiktin taat Yaaya-Batist astu. Min ŋa ase, ŋu gaariit ko Kabarre ta Gala ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi ho ay gem di oosa kaay a ŋaa un̰je.
42016017	Ku tala maman ? Samaane iŋ kiɗa, ŋuu sawle melen̰ di walla ? Ha’a, melen̰ɗo. Kar nun gay kaawaako, taar-at oki melen̰ min wer rakki kaak ŋu siirtu ɗo gaanuundi yaa amile.
42016018	« Gem kaak totirit daaciy ho ŋa obtu ta pey, ŋaar-ak kokina karan di. Kar gem kaak ob daatik taat mitti totirta, taar-at oki daaciyɗo. »
42016019	Iisa deltu daŋla aman : « Gin gem rakki gay gamnar. Ŋa isa kesuun taat samaane, dindiko ho kaalne, ho kun kawta ŋa gina iidine, ŋa tiya gala.
42016020	Gin oki pokirin̰ce rakki siŋji Lazaar. Ŋa weƴa ɗo botol ta geero ta gay gamnar-aka. Ziŋkay okin̰co mutay di.
42016021	Ya gay gamnar-ak tiyaw, ŋa raka kin tee kaak gaama keɗer-ak di, oki ŋa gasɗo. Illa kan̰ kat asa meraag mutiyji.
42016022	Ƴiriy rakki, pokirin̰ce-ak mattu ho ɗubal ku Buŋdi iyiig ɗo wer kaak Ibraayim goyiyo. Kar gay gamnar oki mattu ho ŋu tiisiiga.
42016023	Gay gamnar-ak taaɓiya dakina ba oole. Ŋa jaaltu kaay ho ŋa taliig min serek Ibraayim iŋ Lazaar kaak goy ɗo serpey.
42016024	Hiyya, ŋa teestu koole aman : ‟ Kuk, gem kol tacco Ibraayim, tal aminduwir. Kaawiy ɗo Lazaar ŋaa coopin̰ kormoy ɗo amiydi, ŋaadu corre ɗo bir, gaaƴar yaa boosen ɗako. Yampa, ak-an patiy kaar. ”
42016025	Kar Ibraayim kaawiiji aman : ‟ Gem kol roŋji, pakar ɗo goyin̰ji ka awalle. Ki gas galal ho Lazaar gay taaɓiye. Diŋ anne-aŋ, Lazaar gas galal, ŋa jammiy kate ho kiŋ gay taaɓiyaw.
42016026	Ta taar-anno di, gin oki bee baata ɗatikte. Ansii kat, ya gee kuuk uc min anne raka ɓaa ɗo werko wala kuuk min ɗo werko ho rakaani ase-ak, ŋu gediraaɗo ŋuu aalin̰ bee-aka. ”
42016027	Hiyya, gay gamnar-ak kaawtu aman : ‟ Baan̰ ja, n̰aamig Lazaar ɗo ger ka tanni.
42016028	Nu gin kur siŋtar beeƴ, ŋa ɓaa minin̰co paa ŋuur oki yaa ase ɗo wer kaak nun taaɓiyiy-aŋka. ”
42016029	Ibraayim telkiiji aman : ‟ Siŋtan̰, ŋuur gin ko gaanuun kaak Muusa siirtu ho iŋ taat nabiinna gaartu. Illa ŋuu ice kaawco ! ”
42016030	Gay gamnar-ak kaawiiji aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco Ibraayim, taar-an sooɗco. Illa ya waan kaak min ba oole ɓaawco ja kat, ŋuu ibinin̰ nigin̰co. ”
42016031	Ibraayim gay kaawiiji aman : ‟ Ya ŋu pooc icin̰ gaanuun kaak Muusa siirtu ho iŋ kaawin kuuk nabiinna gaartu-ak, ya waan kaak nooy min ɗo muuti kaawco oki, ŋu icaaɗo kaawoy. ” »
42017001	Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Gamin goy di kuuk iya gee ɗo zunuubinnar. Kar ŋaar kaak un̰jaag een̰ji ɗo zunuubinnar gay, ɗo gaaƴay.
42017002	Gem ŋaar-ak, ŋuuji ɗuune tolo ɗo gaaƴay ho ŋuu accin̰ ɗo barrer, guna min ŋaa un̰je rakki min een̰ji kuuk imaanco sooɗa ɗo zunuubinnar.
42017003	Yaman goyoŋ goɗom ! « Ya siŋjiŋ kat nigjiŋ, leesiy. Kar ya ŋa ibinig nigin̰ji-ak, saamiyiy.
42017004	Ya ƴiriy rakki di ŋa nigjiŋ dees peesira ho ŋa asji dees peesira a kiiji saamiye, ŋaar-ak saamiyiy. »
42017005	Min ŋaar-ak, paliinna kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol Rabbinni, gaayninta imaanni. »
42017006	Kar Rabbin Iisa telkiico aman : « Nu kaawaako, ya ku gin imaan kapak ar roŋ ku mutaard, nec kuuji kaawe ɗo et-aŋ aman : ‟ Jaŋku ɗo barrer. ” Ek di ŋaa jaŋke. »
42017007	Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Ya rakki minninko gin gay riyor kaak gawnaaji wala kaak gooƴaaji, ya ŋa asa curtaŋ min yeer di, kiiji kaaweŋ ko a ŋaa tee walla ?
42017008	Ha’a, kaawaajiɗo. Kiiji kaawe aman : ‟ Sorig gamnan̰ ho is ku pey, ginor maan naa tee. Kar wiktin taat nu tee aay ja, kat kiŋ asiy tee ba aaro. ”
42017009	Gem-ak yaa ozilin̰ gay riyoy asaan ŋa ginit riy okintit taat ŋa gaariiji walla ? Ha’a, ozilaagɗo.
42017010	Ansi-ak kuŋko oki, ya ku ginit riy okintit taat Buŋ gaariiko, kaawo aman : ‟ Nin gay riyor kuuk maala, ni ginit riyni taat ŋu gaarintin di. ” »
42017011	Wiktin taat Iisa ɓaayiy Zeruzaleem, ŋa aaliig guŋgar ku kiɗ ka Samari iŋ ka Galile.
42017012	Min ŋa gaay un̰je ɗo helliner, gee orok kuuk ɗukum burɗum ɓaawtu ŋaamin̰ji. Min ŋu ŋaamtu, ŋu peytu serek
42017013	ho ŋu teestu koole aman : « Hey, gem kol tacco Iisa, tal aminduwni ! »
42017014	Min Iisa taliigu, ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ gaaroŋ ziŋkiko ɗo gay satkiner. » Hiyya, min ŋu ɓaa misan di, ŋu caltu ko.
42017015	Min ŋu tal ziŋkico cale, rakki minninco yeeptu ɗo Iisa ho ɗo yeepin̰ji-ak ŋa oziliy Buŋ iŋ gaaƴ toŋgo aman : « Darjin ɗo Buŋdi ! Darjin ɗo Buŋdi ! »
42017016	Kar min ŋa ottu ɗo wer ka Iisa, ŋa dersitu ɗo uŋji nam ŋa nooɗig uŋji keɗer ho ŋa oziliiga. Gem-ak min kiɗ ka Samari.
42017017	Hiyya, Iisa kaawtu aman : « Gee kuuk orok-ak okin̰co bal cale walla ? Kar kuuk parrik gay moo ?
42017018	Taloŋ kate, min okin̰co kuuk cale-aŋ, illa ŋa marte-aŋ di kaak yeep ozile Buŋ. »
42017019	Kar Iisa kaawiiji ɗo gem-ak aman : « Ucu, ɓaa kate. Imaanjiŋ kat jilin̰ciŋ. »
42017020	Min ŋaar-ak, Pariziyenna indiig Iisa aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaa ase kimin ? » Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Meennaw ta Buŋdi, taar asaaɗo ar maan kaak gee taliyo.
42017021	Gee kaawaaɗo aman : ‟ Taloŋ, ta anta ” wal ‟ Taar ko antare, ” asaan, ka seener, Meennaw ta Buŋdi, taar goy ko ɗatikko. »
42017022	Kar Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman : « Wiktin yaa ase taat ku rakaan talin nun Roŋ gemor ho ku talaanno, yoo ƴiriy rakki di oki.
42017023	Gee yaako kaawe aman : ‟ Taloŋ ŋaar ko aŋka ” wal ‟ Ŋaar ko aŋkare. ” Dakoŋ ɓaanno ho dakoŋ aaɗin̰coɗo.
42017024	Ka seener gay, nun Roŋ gemor, naa ase ar buŋ kaak irn̰aw cippit min baay yoo gale ka pati.
42017025	Kar gay, illa nun Roŋ gemor, naa taaɓiyen̰ ja dakina ho gee ku diŋka yaan poocindu.
42017026	Ƴiriy taat nun Roŋ gemor, naa yeepe-ak, taa kuuniye ar maan kaak asco ɗo geemir wiktin ta nabi Nowe.
42017027	Wiktin taar-at, gee tiyaw, ŋu siyaw ho ŋu oba daaɗi nam ƴiriy taat Nowe un̰jitu ɗo markab kaak tatiko. Hiyya, amay kuuk dakina paaytu ho kuuk ɓoka ɓoke teeyiig gee okin̰co.
42017028	Ampaa di oki, ɗo wiktin ta gem kaak ŋu koliy Loot : gee tiyaw ho siyaw, ŋu gidiya gamna ho ŋu imila gaminco ku gidiyir. Ŋu taata atay ho ŋu pina geray.
42017029	Kar gay, ƴiriy taat Loot amiltu min ɗo geeger ka Sodom, Buŋ n̰okiico ak ta baruukiner, ho okin̰co, ŋa idiigu dakap.
42017030	Ampaa ko, wiktin taat nun Roŋ gemor, naa ase oki, taa kuuniye pa.
42017031	« Ƴiriy taar-at, gem kaak jammiya kara gediraaɗo un̰je atta ŋaa soke gamnay. Ansii di oki, kaak ɗeet ɗo morgoy sa yeepaaɗo geero.
42017032	Moyoŋ ɗo taat astit ɗo daaciy ta Loot.
42017033	Gem kaak gooƴa ziy asa rawtin̰ji ho kaak rawtaag ziy asa jilin̰ji.
42017034	Nu kaawaako, ɗo aando taar-ata, ya gee seer weƴa ka daŋlil, ka rakki ŋuu icin̰ji ho ka rakki ŋuu rasin̰ji.
42017035	Ya daaɗ seer eygaw, ta rakki ŋuu icinti ho ta rakki ŋuu rasinti. [
42017036	Ya gee seer ɓaa ɗo morgor, ka rakki ŋuu icin̰ji ho ka rakki gay ŋuu rasin̰ji. »]
42017037	Kar maajirnay ku Iisa indiig aman : « Gem kol Rabbinni, maanna-aŋ yaa kuuniye momo ? » Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Ɗo wer kaak maan mattu-ak di, damaarlin paayiyo. »
42018001	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa deliico pey daŋla ɗo maajirnay a ŋuu salkiyguwe doo, ŋuu rasenno tak-tak.
42018002	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Gin gem pa gay ɗukume seriiner ɗo geeger rakki. Ŋa karmayɗo Buŋ ho ŋa indaɗo.
42018003	Ɗo geeger-ak, gin oki murgil rakki. Ta ɓaggiyji ɗo ka seriiner-aka. Ta sakkiyiiji aman : ‟ Gem kol tatkaw, baan̰u, talit kaawni iŋ adiner-aŋka. ”
42018004	Dees dakina zer ŋa poocaadi, kar min ŋaar-ak, ŋa osiig adiy aman : ‟ Ka seener, nu karmayɗo Buŋ ho nu indaɗo.
42018005	Iŋ taar-an oki, naati talin kaawti paa di. Yampa, daatko-an toɗdu wero. Ya nu talit kaawti, taan rasindu, naa gase kaar. ” »
42018006	Rabbin Iisa gaayiitit ɗo kaawoy aman : « Taloŋ ja gay ɗukume seriiner kaak ɓagɗo botol-aŋka ! Diŋ sa ŋa talit kaaw ta murgil-anta.
42018007	Kar ya ŋuur kuuk Buŋ doɓtu alaaji ƴiriyo ho aando, maa di ŋa ɗukumiicoɗo seriine. Wala ŋaa taaye talin kaawco ? Ha’a, taayaaɗo.
42018008	Ka seener nu kaawaako, koɗok di Buŋ yaaco ɗukume seriin iŋ botilti. Kar maan rakki goya, wiktin ta nun Roŋ gemor naa yeepe, naa gase gee kuuk gin imaan walla ? »
42018009	Iisa deltu daŋla rakki ɗo gee kuuk tala ziŋkico a ŋu goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ŋu talaag een̰co ar maan ka maala. Ŋa kaawiico aman :
42018010	« Ƴiriy rakki, gee seer un̰je salaane ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Ka rakki Pariziyen̰ce, ka rakki gay, gay obe miirir.
42018011	Pariziyen̰ce-ak teestu salkiye ɗo adiy iŋ ka peyin̰ji aman : ‟ Buŋdu, nu delaajiŋ barkine asaan nun arro gee kuuk kokinay, kuuk jookumo ho kuuk kokina miday wal daaɗ kara. Naan̰ ozile asaan nun arro gay obe miirir-aŋka.
42018012	Ɗo suugin rakki, nu ica sayamne menaw seera ho nu bera zakaane min gamnar okin̰co kuuk nu gasiyo. ”
42018013	Kar gay obe miirir-ak gay, peytu aaro ho ŋa oniig kaay. Ŋa rakaaɗo kocile tak-tak ka samaaner. Ŋa obiig goŋgumoy ho ŋa lokliktu aman : ‟ Buŋdu, tal aminduwir, nun gay zunuubinnar. ” »
42018014	Iisa gaayiitit pey ɗo kaawoy aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, ɗo wiktin taat gay obe miirir-ak yeeptu geero, Buŋ talga a ŋa goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji. Kar Pariziyen̰ce gay, ŋa poocga. Asaan ŋaar kaak jaala ziy, Buŋ yaa onin̰ji ho ŋaar kaak ona ziy gay, Buŋ yaa jaalin̰ji. »
42018015	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gee daarin̰ iyiig kooginco ku n̰aaɗa ɗo Iisa a ŋaaco lee pise, ŋaa barkiyin̰co. Min maajirna taliigu, ŋu leesiico ɗo gee-aku.
42018016	Kar Iisa gay koliig koogin-aku ho ŋa kaawtu ɗo maajirnay aman : « Rasoŋ koogin-aŋ yaadu ase. Dakon̰co toɗenno, asaan Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar ɗo gee kuuk ar koogin-aŋku.
42018017	Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya waan kaak bal ooyin Meennaw ta Buŋdi ar mico, ŋa un̰jaaɗo tak-tak. »
42018018	Ɗo wer-ak, tatkaw ka Yuudinnar rakki indiig Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, kiŋ kaak sellen̰, naa gine maman naa gase goye ka gaasɗo ? »
42018019	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Maa di ki koliin a nu sellen̰ ? Ginno gem kaak sellen̰ ɗo kiɗar, illa Buŋ keeji di.
42018020	Kiŋ ibingig gaanuun kaak Buŋ bertu ɗo geemir : ‟ Kuŋ miday, dakoŋ kokinenno daaɗ kara ho kuŋ daaɗ oki, dakoŋ kokinenno miday kara, okiŋko, dakoŋ deenno gee, dakoŋ kokinenno gamna, dakoŋ raadenno iŋ siŋ ku gemor, beroŋ horoomin ɗo aginiyko. ” »
42018021	Gem-ak telkiiji aman : « Nu karmiyiig gaanuun-aŋ okin̰ji min nu kapak di. »
42018022	Min Iisa dortu pa-ak, ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ɗakjiŋ pey maan rakki : ɓaa gidiyig gamnan̰ okin̰co ho ɗeeɗig gurus-ak ɗo pokirnar. Paa kat, kii leen̰ mallen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Kar asu, aaɗnu. »
42018023	Min gem-ak doriit kaaw-at, ŋa ƴiimiit wijeeney asaan ŋa gay gamnar.
42018024	Min Iisa taltu kadar gem-ak ƴiimit wijeeney-at, ŋa kaawtu aman : « Un̰je ka ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi, ŋaar raɗa ɗo gay gamnar !
42018025	Ka seener, lokumo gediraaɗo taa bire min ɗo bee ka ripirrer. Kar ɗo gay gamnar gay, un̰je ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaaji gine pey raɗ paka. »
42018026	Gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak kaawtu aman : « Di ampa-aŋ gay, waa yaa gase jile ? »
42018027	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Maan kaak patiya kaƴco ku geemir, ɗo Buŋdi gay, ŋa melen̰ di. »
42018028	Hiyya, Piyer kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Kar nin kuuk rasig gaminni ho ni aaɗin̰ciŋ-aŋ gay ? »
42018029	Kar Iisa kaawiico aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, ya gem kaak rasig geriy, daaciy, siŋtay, aginiyji, kooginay ɗo saan ta Meennaw ta Buŋdi-ak,
42018030	ɗo goye ka diŋka, ŋaa gase dakin paka, ho ɗo wiktin taat yaa ase neginda gay, ŋaa gase goye ka gaasɗo. »
42018031	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa koliig paliinna kuuk orok iŋ seer keeco ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Cokiyoŋ, diŋ gi coona Zeruzaleem. Anner kat, gamin okin̰co kuuk nabiinna siirtu ɗo saan ta nun Roŋ gemor-ak yaa ase uudinco.
42018032	Ŋuun berin ɗo pise ka gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo, ŋuun warindu, ŋuudu samtiye ho ŋuudu pice uln̰a.
42018033	Ŋuun koocindu iŋ korɗiŋgo ho ŋuun deendu. Kar ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. »
42018034	Kar paliinnay gay ibanno tak-tak maan kaak Iisa rakiy kaawe asaan ŋu cigilcot baat ta seener.
42018035	Wiktin taat kun̰ Iisa gaay ote ɗo geeger ka Zeriiko, gin nool kaak goy oce ɗo bit ka botildi.
42018036	Min ŋa doriig gee kuuk dakina biraw-ak, ŋa inditu maan kaak kuuniye.
42018037	Ŋu telkiiji aman : « Ŋa Iisa kaak min geeger ka Nazareet kat biraw. »
42018038	Hiyya, ŋa teestu koole aman : « Iisa Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwir ! »
42018039	Gee kuuk ogir-ak, awn̰iiji aman : « Ha’, bugam ! » Kar ŋaar gay, gaaƴay jaala jaalen di aman : « Iisa, Roŋ ka Dawuud, tal aminduwir ! »
42018040	Iisa peytu ho ŋa kaawiico a ŋuuji iyin̰ji. Min ŋu iyiijiga, Iisa indiig aman :
42018041	« Ki raka naan̰ gine maa ? » Nool-ak telkiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, nu raka kin odinar yaa pile-aŋ di. »
42018042	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Odinan̰, ŋu piloŋ. Imaanjiŋ kat coolin̰ciŋ. »
42018043	Ta bite-aŋ di, odinay piltu. Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa aaɗiig Iisa ho ŋa oziliy Buŋ, ho gee okin̰co kuuk taliig maanna-ak, ŋuur oki oziliig Buŋ.
42019001	Kun̰ Iisa un̰jitu ɗo geeger ka Zeriiko, kar ŋu bira iŋ uŋco.
42019002	Ɗo geeger-ak, gin gem rakki paa siŋji Zaase. Ŋa tatkaw ka gay obe miiri ho ŋa gay gamnar.
42019003	Ŋa bariya botol taat ŋaa talin̰ a Iisa kar waa. Kar gay, ŋa talgigɗo asaan ŋa geeram ho gee ginji dakina.
42019004	Hiyya, ŋa gaɗtu uŋda, ŋa coktu ka et kaak ŋu koliy sikomoor. Paa kat, ŋaa talin̰ Iisa ya ŋa biraw.
42019005	Min Iisa ottu ɗo wer-aka, ŋa jaaltu kaay ho ŋa koliig aman : « Zaase, paay koɗok. Ƴiriyta-aŋ illa nu ɓaa paaye gerko. »
42019006	Koɗok di, Zaase paaytu ho ŋa ŋaamiig Iisa iŋ galal.
42019007	Min gee okin̰co taltu pa-ak, ŋu teestu gujumjume aman : « Ha’, taloŋ gem-aŋ ɓaa paaye ɗo wer ka gay zunuubinnar-aŋka ! »
42019008	Min ŋaar-ak, Zaase peytu ɗo uŋji ka Rabbin Iisa ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, nun naa berin serip ta mallel ɗo pokirnar ho ya nu ic gurus ɗo gemor iŋ gaayo, naaji yeepin̰ dees pooɗi. »
42019009	Hiyya, Iisa kaawiiji aman : « Ƴiriyta-aŋ Buŋ as jilin̰ gee ku ger-aŋka, asaan Zaase oki min roŋ ku Ibraayim.
42019010	Ka seener gay, nun Roŋ gemor as bariye gee kuuk rawte, naa jilin̰co. »
42019011	Iisa gaayiitit pey ɗo daŋlay ɗo gee kuuk cokiyaaga, asaan ŋaar gaay ko ote Zeruzaleem ho gee pakira kadar Meennaw ta Buŋdi taar asa ko.
42019012	Daŋlay-at aman : « Gin gem rakki baaco tiya meennaw. Ŋa raka ɓaa marti serek a ŋuu darjiyin̰ji sultan ɗo darrey, kar kat ŋaa yeepe.
42019013	Paa ko, ŋa koltu min gay riyoy gee orok. Ŋa ɗeeɗiico tammin orok kuuk ŋu koliy ‛miin’ ho ŋa kaawiico aman : ‟ Ginoŋ iŋ ŋaar riyo nam ƴiriy taat naa yeepe. ”
42019014	Kar gee ku darrey gay elgigɗo. Paa ko, ŋu n̰aamtu gee ɗo aaroy, ŋuuji kaawe ɗo sultan kaak tatko aman : ‟ Gem-aŋ ni rakaagɗo kiini darjiyin̰ sultan. ”
42019015	Iŋ taar-ata oki, ŋu darjiyiiga ho ŋa yeeptu ɗo darrey. Min ŋa yeepe, ŋa koliig gay riyoy kuuk ŋa berco gurus-aku, ŋa raka tale maan kaak ŋu gastu min kuwa.
42019016	« Kaak awalle ɓaawtu ho ŋa kaawtu aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, gurusji-aŋ iy pey een̰ji orok min kuwa. ”
42019017	Sultan-ak oziliig aman : ‟ Seese, kiŋke-aŋ gay riyor kaak samaane. Ɗo gamin kuuk sooɗ-aŋ sa, ki gaar zin̰ kadar naan̰ amniye. Ŋaar-ak, naan̰ diye tatkaw, kii goye kaaco ɗo geegirnay kuuk orok. ”
42019018	« Ka seeriŋkar ɓaawtu ho ŋa kaawtu aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, gurusji-aŋ iy pey een̰ji beeƴ min kuwa. ”
42019019	Sultan gay oziliig aman : ‟ Seese, kiŋke-aŋ oki, naan̰ diye tatkaw, kii goye kaaco ɗo geegirnay kuuk beeƴ. ”
42019020	« Kar gay riyor ka pey astu ho ŋa kaawtu aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, aŋ gurusji. Nu ɗuuniig iŋ n̰aŋguuna ho nu dummiyjiŋga.
42019021	Nu ginaajiŋ kolaw asaan kiŋ gem toŋgo. Ki soka gamin kuuk ki bal suuɗe tiŋgon̰ ho ki seɗa gamin kuuk ki bal luwin̰co. ”
42019022	« Sultan-ak kaawiiji aman : ‟ Taloŋ ja gay riyor kaak napkiyaaɗo-aŋka ! Naan̰ obe iŋ kaaw taat amil min ɗo bin̰. Ki iban kadar nun gem toŋgo. Nu soka gamin kuuk nu bal suuɗe tiŋgor ho nu seɗa gamin kuuk nu bal luwin̰co.
42019023	Ya ki iban pa-ak, maa di ki dummiygigɗo gurusdu wer ka dummaayner ? Ansii kat, ya nu yeepe naa gasin̰ gurusdu wee. ”
42019024	Kar ŋa kaawiico ɗo ŋuur kuuk goy eɗe-ak aman : ‟ Icoŋ tamma-ak minniney ho beron̰jiig ɗo ŋaar kaak gin orok-aka. ”
42019025	Kar ŋuur gay kaawiiji aman : ‟ Gem kol tacco, ŋaar gin ko tammin orok ! ”
42019026	Sultan-ak telkiico aman : ‟ Cokiyoŋ, naako kaawe, waan kaak gine, Buŋ yaaji gaaye min kuwa. Kar ŋaar kaak bal gineŋ gay, ka sooɗ kaak ŋa gintu oki, Buŋ yaaji imilin̰ji.
42019027	Kar adiner kuuk rakaaɗo a naa gine sultinco-ak gay iyonduug anne ho daaŋgu uŋtu. ” »
42019028	Min Iisa gaastu iŋ kaawoy, ŋa ogiriico, ŋu ictu botol taat coona Zeruzaleem.
42019029	Wiktin taat Iisa gaay ote ɗo hellinnan kuuk ŋu koliy Betpaze iŋ Betani, moota iŋ koot ka Olibiyennar, ŋa tabirtu maajirnay seera.
42019030	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ ɗo hellin ta uŋda antare. Ya ku ote, kuu gase roŋ ɗurkilal ɗuune. Ƴiriy rakki, waan bal n̰epin̰ji. Ipiroŋga ho iyoŋduuga.
42019031	Kar ya waan indaako aman : ‟ Maa di ku ipirig roŋ ɗurkil-aŋka ? ” Telkon̰ji aman : ‟ Rabbin kat rakaaga. ” »
42019032	Maajirnay ɓaawtu ho ŋu gasiig gamin-ak uudin taat Iisa kaawiico.
42019033	Wiktin taat ŋu ipiriiga, maaniico ku ɗurkil-ak indiigu aman : « Maa di ku ipirig roŋ ɗurkilal-aŋka ? »
42019034	Ŋuur gay telkiico aman : « Rabbin kat rakaaga. »
42019035	Hiyya, ŋu iyiijig ɗo Iisa. Kar iŋ kesuunco ŋu siddiyiiga ho ŋu n̰epiig Iisa.
42019036	Wiktin taat Iisa ɓaawiy-ak, gee ɗeeraaji kesuunco uŋci.
42019037	Min ŋa paayiy min ɗo koot ka Olibiyennar ho ŋa gaay ko ote Zeruzaleem, maajirnay okin̰co iŋ dakinuwco-at alco gala. Ŋu teestu ozile Buŋ iŋ gaaƴ toŋgo ɗo gamin okin̰co kuuk ajbay ŋu taltu.
42019038	Ɗo ozilin̰co-ak, ŋu kaawiy aman : « Rabbin Buŋ yaa barkiyin̰ sultan kaak as iŋ siŋ kun̰ji ! Aapiye kuwa ka samaaner ho darjin ɗo Buŋdi ɗo wer-aka ! »
42019039	Min gee-aku, gin Pariziyenna daarin̰ kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, awin̰co ɗo maajirnan̰ a ŋuu bugume. »
42019040	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Nu kaawaako, ya ŋuur kat bugume, dambay gay yaa kooleŋ kate. »
42019041	Wiktin taat Iisa gaay ko ote ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem ho ŋa talaag ko, ŋa altu ɗo saan ta geen̰ji
42019042	aman : « Wayyayo, gee ku Zeruzaleem ! Ƴiriyta-aŋ ku bal ibine maman aapiy yaa ase ! Kar diŋ gay, aapiy taar-at cigilko, ku gediraaɗo gasinti.
42019043	Wiktin yaa ase taat adinko yaa pine durdurre, ŋuuko leyiŋko ɗatko nam ku gediraaɗo amile ho ŋuuko taasin̰iŋko.
42019044	Ŋuuko idiŋko dakap, kuŋko iŋ geegirko, yoo dambi rakki sa goyaaɗo ɗo giji, asaan ku bal ibinin wiktin taat Buŋ astu a ŋaako mogiŋko. »
42019045	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa teestu atkin̰ gee kuuk suugiya atta-aku.
42019046	Ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Gerir, ŋaar gin ger ka salaaner. ” Kar kuŋ gay ginig ger ka kokiniydi. »
42019047	Min ŋa atkiigu, kun kawta, Iisa ɓildiig gee ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Kar gay, aginay ku darrer, agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ ku gaanuundi bariya botol taat ŋuu deen̰ji.
42019048	Kar ŋu ibanno maman ŋuu obin̰ji asaan gee okin̰co cokiyaaga ho ŋu tala ko ŋaar di.
42020001	Ƴiriy rakki, wiktin taat Iisa ɓildiy gee ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa gaariico Kabarre ta Gala, agindaw daarin̰ ɓaawiiji, ŋuur agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ ku gaanuundi, iŋ aginay ku darrer oki.
42020002	Ŋu indiig aman : « Kaawni ja, waa berjiŋ botol taat ki giniy gamin-aŋku ? Izinne-an, ki gasit min momo ? »
42020003	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Nun oki naako indiŋko, kar telkondu :
42020004	‟ Waa n̰aamig Yaaya ŋa batiziyiy gee ? Ŋa Buŋ walla, ŋu geen di ? ” »
42020005	Ŋu teestu meele benannico aman : « Kar giiji telkeŋ kat a maa ? Ya gi telkiji a ŋa Buŋ kat n̰aamga, ŋaate indinte pey aman : ‟ Maa di ku poociit kaawoy ? ”
42020006	Kar ya gi telke aman : ‟ Ŋu gee kat n̰aamga, ” gee kuuk okin̰co-aŋ yaate dawinte iŋ dambay ŋuute deente, asaan okin̰co, ŋu pakira kadar Yaaya, ŋaar nabiin̰ce. »
42020007	Hiyya, ŋu telkiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Ni ibanno waan kaak n̰aamga. »
42020008	Kar Iisa gay kaawiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, nun oki gaaraakonno waan kaak berdu botol taat nu giniig gamin-aŋku. »
42020009	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa deliico daŋil ɗo gee-ak aman : « Gin mee jineendi rakki. Ŋa taattu rezeŋ, ŋa rasig ɗo gay riyor a ŋuu gooƴin̰ji, kar ŋa ɗeettu marti ho ŋa taaytu.
42020010	Ɗo wiktin taat roŋ-ak nee, ŋa n̰aamtu gay riyor ɗo gee kuuk gooƴaaga a ŋuuji berin haginey. Kar gee kuuk gooƴaaga-ak, koocig gay riyor kaak ŋa n̰aamtu-aka ho ŋu atkiig pisin̰ji orok.
42020011	Kar mee jineendi-ak n̰aamtu gay riyor ka pey. Gee kuuk gooƴaaga-ak koociiga, ŋu wariiga ho ŋaar oki, ŋu atkiig pisin̰ji orok.
42020012	Ŋa n̰aamtu pey ka subbiŋkar. Ŋaar-ak oki, ŋu koociiga, ŋu awriiga ho ŋu acciig kara min ɗo jineendi.
42020013	Kar mee jineendi-ak osiig adiy aman : ‟ Di naa gine maman ? Naa n̰aame roŋ ka adir kaak nu elgiy dakina. Ŋaar-ak, ŋu karmiyin̰ji ! ”
42020014	Kar min gay gooƴindi-ak taliig roŋji ɓaaco-ak, ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : ‟ Taloŋ, aŋkar ko kaak ya tacco mate, jineen yaaji ɗake. Daanteŋga kar jineen yaate ɗake lote. ”
42020015	Hiyya, ŋu imiliig kara min ɗo jineendi ho ŋu deeyiiga. » Min pa-ak, Iisa indiig gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak aman : « Mee jineendi-ak yaa ginin̰co maman ?
42020016	Ŋa asa deen̰ gee kuuk gooƴaag jineen-aka ho ŋaa berin̰ ɗo gee ku pey. » Min gee-ak doriit kaawoy-at, ŋu kaawtu aman : « Tuɓina, maan ŋaar-aŋ, Buŋ yaa iyin̰jiɗo tak-tak ! »
42020017	Kar Iisa gay taliig ƴalaaŋ ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Kitamne kaaw aman : ‟ Ŋa dambi kaak gay pinindi accitu, Ŋaar ko gin dambi kaak taɓ ka gerdi. ” Kaaw-an baati maa ?
42020018	Ay gem kaak galji ɗo dambi-aŋka, ŋaa ƴiime karap-karap ho ya dambi-aŋ kat galji ɗo kaay gay, ŋaa rigin̰in̰ji dagiygay. »
42020019	Min Iisa gaasiit kaawoy, agindaw ku gaanuundi iŋ agindaw ku gay satkiner ibintu kadar Iisa deliit daŋlay-at, ŋa ceera loco. Min ŋaar-ak di, ŋu teestu bariye botol taat ŋuu obin̰ji. Kar gay, ŋu gina kolaw ɗo geemir.
42020020	Min pa-ak, ŋu gooƴa ko ŋaar di. Ŋu n̰aamiiji gee kuuk gina ziŋkico a ŋu sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Gee-ak raka obin̰ji iŋ kaawo a ŋuu gase botol taat ŋuu iyin̰ji ɗo uŋji ka guberneer kaak gin izinne.
42020021	Paa ko, ŋu indiig Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, ni iban kadar ɓildin̰jiŋ iŋ kaawnan̰, ŋuur ɗo botilco. Kiŋ isgicinno iŋ gee kuuk kaƴco jaale. Ki ɓilda gee iŋ seen ta Buŋdi.
42020022	Hadi kaawnin̰ ja, gaanuunte kaaw a gii kappiye miiri ɗo Sezaar, sultan ka tatik ka Room, wala gi kappiyaaɗo ? »
42020023	Kar Iisa gay ibiniit neenduwco ho ŋa kaawiico aman :
42020024	« Gaarondu ja tamma ka gurusdi. Kaa iŋ siŋ kuuk siir kuwa-aŋ gay ku waa ? » Ŋu telkiiji aman : « Ku Sezaar. »
42020025	Kar Iisa kaawiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, gamin ku Sezaar, beron̰jiig ɗo Sezaar, ho ku Buŋdi sa, beron̰jiig ɗo Buŋdi. »
42020026	Iŋ neenduwco-at oki, ŋu bal gase kaaw taat ŋuu obin̰ji ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu bugumtu dil, ŋu ajbiy ɗo telke kaak ŋa telkiico.
42020027	Min ŋaar-ak, gin gee daarin̰ ŋu kolaag Sadusiyenna. Gee ŋuur-ak kaawa a gee ku mate, ŋuur nooyɗo. Ŋu ɓaawiiji moota ɗo Iisa
42020028	ho ŋu indiig aman : « Gem kol tacco, Muusa siirte ɗo gaanuunji aman : ‟ Ya gem ob daatko ho ŋa mat bal mico, siŋji yaa obin murgil-ata. Paa kat, taaji wee koogin ɗo siŋji kaak mate. ”
42020029	Cokay, gin siŋta peesira. Ka aawo obtu daatko, kar ŋa mattu bal mico.
42020030	Ka seeriŋkar oki obiit daatko-ata. Ŋaar oki mattu bal mico.
42020031	Ka subbiŋkar oki paa di, nam okin̰co kuuk peesir-ak obiita ho ŋu mattu bal koogina.
42020032	Ba aar, daatko-at sa, menuwti gaastu.
42020033	Ɗo taar-an, kaawnin̰ ja, ɗo ƴiriy ta nooyindi, min kuuk peesir-aŋ ka moo taa gine daaciy ? Asaan kuuk peesir-aŋ okin̰co midiyti ! »
42020034	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Gee ku diŋka, ŋuur obaw.
42020035	Kar gay, gee kuuk Buŋ berco botol a ŋuu goye ɗo duniin taat asa neginda ho kuuk asa nooye min ɗo muut-ak, ginno pey obe.
42020036	Gee ŋuur-ak mataaɗo tak-tak asaan ŋuu gine ar ɗubal ku Buŋdi. Ŋuu gine koogin ku Buŋdi asaan ŋa nooyig nooye.
42020037	Ɗo bi ka nooyindi, Muusa gaarit waraŋ ɗo wiktin taat Buŋ bayniiji ɗo pompil kaak kobir ako. Ŋa koliig Buŋ aman : ‟ Rabbine, kiŋ Buŋ ka Ibraayim, Buŋ ka Isaaka ho Buŋ ka Yakuub. ”
42020038	Ŋa Buŋɗo ka gee kuuk mate, kar gay, ŋa Buŋ ka gee kuuk goy mento. Asaan ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, gee ku subba-aŋ, okin̰co goy mento. »
42020039	Agindaw ku gaanuundi daarin̰ ictu kaawo aman : « Gem kol tacco, an kat kaawo. »
42020040	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋu bal gedire pey indin̰ tak-tak.
42020041	Min pa-ak, Iisa kaawiico aman : « Maman gee kaawiy a Masi, ŋaar roŋ ka Dawuud ?
42020042	Ya ŋa roŋ ka Dawuud, maa di sultan Dawuud meen̰ji kaawiy ɗo maktumne ta Soom aman : ‟ Rabbin Buŋ kaawji ɗo Rabbiner aman : As goy ɗo meedar
42020043	nam wiktin taat naaco gedire ɗo adinen̰, ŋuu gine wer ka lee asin̰jiŋ. ”
42020044	Paa ko, Dawuud kolaag Masi-ak a ‟ Rabbiner ”. Di maman ŋaa gine roŋji ? »
42020045	Ɗo wiktin taat gee okin̰co cokiyiy-ak, Iisa kaawiico ɗo maajirnay aman :
42020046	« Goyoŋ goɗom min agindaw ku gaanuundi kuuk el jaawe iŋ batik ku aginda ho el a gee yaaco ooye ɗo werin kuuk gee n̰umiyo. Ɗo geray ku salaaner, ŋu el goye uŋda ho ya ŋu kolig ɗo teendi, ŋu doɓa werin kuuk taɓ.
42020047	Ŋu tiyaag murgilgal iŋ neendaw. Kar ɗo salaanco sa, ŋu osa kaawin dakina, paa kat, gee yaa ozilin̰co. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, taaɓin tan̰co yaa gine raɗ pak ta gee okin̰co. »
42021001	Iisa jaaltu kaay ho ŋa taliig gay gamnar kuuk bera gurus ɗo Buŋdi. Gurusco-ak, ŋu leeyiig ɗo koopor ka goy ɗo ger ka Buŋdi.
42021002	Ŋa taltu oki murgil rakki pokirin̰ca tak-tak. Ta bertu tammin seer kuuk bal baaco.
42021003	Kar Iisa kaawtu aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaako, murgil-an ber gurus dakina pakgig gee-aŋ okin̰co,
42021004	asaan ŋuur ber min gurusco kaak ɗaka maala. Kar murgil-an gay, iŋ pokurruwti, gurusti kaak nec taa tee ɗo menuwir, okin̰ji, ta berga. »
42021005	Ɗo wer-ak, gee daarin̰ gay kaawa ɗo bi ka ger ka Buŋdi aman : « Taloŋ ja, ger-aŋ ŋu pinig samaanaw, ŋu siirig iŋ gamin kuuk gee bertu ɗo Buŋdi ho iŋ dambay kuuk samaane. »
42021006	Kar Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Okin̰co kuuk ku taliy-aŋ, wiktin yaa ase taat ŋuu ɗime, yoo dambi rakki kaak ŋu diytu ɗo giji sa goyaaɗo. »
42021007	Gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak indiig Iisa aman : « Gem kol tacco, gamin kuuk ki kaawiy-aŋ yaa ase kimin ho kaawnin̰ ja maan kaak yaani gaare asin̰co ? »
42021008	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Yaman pakiroŋ, dakoŋ rasenno ziŋkiko ŋuuko jagiŋko. Gee dakina yaa ase iŋ siŋdu ho ŋuu kaawe aman : ‟ Ŋa nun ko Masi ! ” wal ‟ Wiktin taar nec ko ! ” Kar kuŋ gay, dakoŋ icenno kaawco.
42021009	Ya ku dora gee kaawa ɗo bi ka gartar ho gee amila sawirnaw, dakoŋ barjilenno. Ka seener, gamin-aŋ yaa asen̰ ja, kar duniin gay gaasaaɗo misa. »
42021010	Kar Iisa kaawiico pey aman : « Darre iŋ darre asa taasin̰e ho sultan iŋ sultan oki asa taasin̰e.
42021011	Kiɗ asa azire liŋic. Meya iŋ raɗuwa yaa ase anne-anne ɗo kiɗin daarin̰. Gee yaa tale gamin kuuk isa kolaw ho gamin kuuk gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi kuuk asa min kuwa ka samaaner.
42021012	Kar gay, awal taat gamin-aŋ yaa ase, gee yaako obiŋko ɗo bi kanto, ŋuuko taaɓiyiŋko. Ŋuuko iyiŋko ɗo geray ku salaaner, ŋuuko un̰jiŋko daŋaayne, ŋuuko iyiŋko ɗo uŋco ka sultinniidi ho ɗo guberneernar.
42021013	Taaɓin taar-at yaako bere botol taat kuu kaawe seene ɗo bi kanto.
42021014	Min diŋka-aŋ, diyoŋ ɗo kaƴko, dakoŋ moyenno ɗo kaaw taat kuu imile kaƴko,
42021015	asaan nun naako bere lees ta gala ho iŋ ibine kaak nam adinko sa gediraaɗo yaako meeliŋko wala yaako telke.
42021016	Nam aginiyko, siŋtiko, jaamko ho royinko ku maaniikon di yaako sakkiyiŋko ɗo wer ka seriine. Minninko daarin̰, ŋuu deen̰co.
42021017	Gee dakina yaako ƴiliŋko ɗo saan tanto.
42021018	Kar gay, yoo duruwko rakki sa galaaɗo keɗer.
42021019	Goyoŋ bombo, zeeɗoŋ ɗo imaanko. Paa kat, kuu gase goye ka gaasɗo.
42021020	« Wiktin taat ku tala askirin leyig geeger ka Zeruzaleem, ibinoŋ kadar ŋa gaay ko ide.
42021021	Ɗo menaw ŋuur-ak, gee kuuk ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude, illa ŋuu gaɗe ɗo baƴco ku dambiniidi, kuuk ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem yaa amile koɗok yeero ho kuuk yeero un̰jaaɗo ɗo geegirdi.
42021022	Buŋ yaaco peyin ɗo kaƴco ɗo menaw ŋuur-aku, asaan gamin kuuk nabiinna siirtu ɗo makaatamnar as ɗo botilco.
42021023	Raɗco ɗo daaɗ kuuk iŋ aditco ho kuuk macpi ɗo menaw ŋuur-aku ! Gee ku darre-at yaa taaɓiye aale iŋ dapin̰ko ta Buŋdi.
42021024	Gee daarin̰, ŋuu deen̰co iŋ seepinpan, daarin̰, ŋuu obin̰co ŋuu iyiin̰co ɗo darriniyco. Kar gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo gay yaa icin̰ geeger ka Zeruzaleem, ŋuu gine ɗo ginin̰co nam wiktinco yaa bire.
42021025	« Min ka samaaner, kuu talin̰ gamin kuuk gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi : ka pati, ɗo koyer, ɗo kaalnal. Ɗo kiɗar, barre yaa uce gulɓan̰-gulɓan̰ ho gee yaa dore hawin ta amiydi gidi-gidi-gidi nam gee kuuk ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰co kellimco yaa amile ho kolaw yaa obin̰co.
42021026	Ya ŋu pakira ɗo gamin kuuk yaa ase ɗo adiy ka kiɗar-ak, kellimco amiliyo nam ŋu mataw, asaan gamin kuuk gin gudurre ka samaaner asa azire.
42021027	Kar kat, gee yaan talin nun Roŋ gemor yaa ase ɗatik ucer iŋ gudurrer okintiti ho iŋ darjiner.
42021028	Ɗo wiktin taat gamin-aŋ baynaw-ak, jaaloŋ kaƴko kuwa, asaan Buŋ gaay ko jiliŋko. »
42021029	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa deliico pey daŋla aman : « Taloŋ ja pigiye-aŋka ho atay okin̰co-aŋku.
42021030	Ya ku talaag ŋu eccaw, kuŋ maaniiko iban ko kadar kabuŋ gaaye.
42021031	Ampaa di kuŋko oki, ya ku talaag gamin-aŋ baynaw, ibinoŋ kadar Meennaw ta Buŋdi gaay ko.
42021032	Ka seener nu kaawaako, gee ku diŋka-aŋ mataaɗo misan di, gamin-aŋ okin̰co yaa bayne.
42021033	Samaane iŋ kiɗa yaa sawle, kar kaawnar gay rawtaaɗo tak-tak. »
42021034	Kar Iisa kaawtu pey aman : « Yaman pakiroŋ ! Dakoŋ diyenno gelbinko leŋ-leŋ ɗo seendi di ho ɗo pikirre ta gamin ku duniiner. Ya ku gina ampa-ak, ƴiriy ta ɗukume seriiner yaako cokiŋko bordiko,
42021035	ar boos kuuk ŋu sokig iŋ ribino. Ansii ko, gee kuuk goy ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji, taaco ase loco.
42021036	Goyoŋ mento ho salkiyoŋ doo. Paa kat, kuu gase gudurre taat kuu pake min ɗo gamin okin̰co kuuk yaako ase ho kuu ɓaa ɗo uŋdu, nun Roŋ gemor, bal sokan̰. »
42021037	Iŋ ƴiriyo, Iisa ɓildigiy gee ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Iŋ aando gay, ŋa ɓaggiy wale kuwa ka koot ka Olibiyennar.
42021038	Kar iŋ kawtir wer dugus-dugus, gee okin̰co asgiy ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, ŋuu cokiyin̰ji.
42022001	Iidin ta mappa kaak bal gele taat Yuudinna koliy Paak gaay ko.
42022002	Agindaw ku gay satkiner ho iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi bariya botol taat ŋuu deen̰ Iisa, kar ŋu gina kolaw ɗo geemir.
42022003	Ɗo wer-ak, Seetanne un̰jiiji ɗo Zuudas kaak ŋu koliy oki Iskariyoot, ŋaar min paliinna ku Iisa kuuk orok iŋ seera.
42022004	Ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku gay gooƴe ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa kaawiico iŋ maman ŋaaco gaarin̰ Iisa, ŋuu obin̰ji.
42022005	Gee-ak, aawco gala ho ŋu kaawtu a ŋuuji bere gurus.
42022006	Hiyya, Zuudas ooytu ho ŋa teestu bariye botol taat maman ŋaaco gaarin̰ Iisa ɗo wiktin taat ya gee dakin ginno ja.
42022007	Ƴiriy ta iidiner astu, ƴiriy taar-at, ŋu daggiy baar, ŋu gingiy tee ka Paakdi.
42022008	Iisa n̰aamiig Piyer iŋ Yaaya. Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ɓaaŋ ku ɓaate gine tee ka iidin ta Paakdi. »
42022009	Ŋuur gay indiig aman : « Ki raka a ni ɓaate gine tee momo ? »
42022010	Iisa telkiico aman : « Cokiyoŋ samaane, ya ku un̰jaw ɗo geegirdi, kuu ŋaame iŋ gem rakki icil jaliŋ ka amiydi. Aaɗoŋga ɗo ger kaak ŋaa un̰je.
42022011	Kaawon̰ji ɗo mee gerdi-ak aman : ‟ Tatkaw n̰aaminti a niin̰ inde wer kaak ŋaa tee tee ka iidiner iŋ maajirnay. ”
42022012	Kar ŋaako gaare ger berel ka gusuurdi, gamnay okin̰co goy ko. Eɗeŋ ko, kuute gine tee. »
42022013	Hiyya, maajirin ɓaawtu, ŋu gasiig gamin-ak uudin taat Iisa kaawiico ho ɗo wer-ak ko, ŋu gintu tee ka Paakdi.
42022014	Wiktin taat pat nectu ta teendi, Iisa goytu tee iŋ paliinnay
42022015	ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Min taaɓiner bal ase misa-aŋ, nu raka ja a illa gii tee sawa tee ka iidin ta Paakdi-anta.
42022016	Nu kaawiiko ampa-ak asaan min tee ŋaar-aŋ, nu tiyaaɗo pey tee ka iidin-anta nam ƴiriy taat Buŋ asiy gaare baat ta iidin-an ɗo Meennuwiy. »
42022017	Kar ŋa iciit kordindi, ŋa deltu barkin ɗo Buŋdi ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Obon kordindi-anta, kuu see, kuu ɗakguwe ɗo ziŋkiko.
42022018	Ka seener nu kaawaako, min diŋka-aŋ, nu siyaaɗo pey maam ku bin̰di nam ƴiriy taat Meennaw ta Buŋdi yaa ase. »
42022019	Kar ŋa ictu mappa, ŋa deliiji barkin ɗo Buŋdi, ŋa pirsiiga ho ŋa beriicog ɗo maajirnay. Kar ŋa kaawtu aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ zir kaak naa bere satkin ɗo saan taŋko. Ginguwoŋ ansii kat kuu moyguwe bir. »
42022020	Min ŋu tee, ŋa beriico oki kordindi ar kaak ŋa beriico mappa ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Kordindi-an gaara Jamaw ta marbinto taat Buŋ asiy obe iŋ gee iŋ baarir kuuk min̰ ɗo saan taŋko.
42022021	Kar gay taloŋ, gem kaak asaadu isine pisinni ora ɗo parki.
42022022	Ka seener, nun Roŋ gemor asa mate ar taat Buŋ kaawtu. Kar gay, raɗji ɗo gem kaak isindu ! »
42022023	Min Iisa kaawtu pa-ak, maajirnay teestu inde ziŋkico aman : « Waa kaak yaa ginin riy-anta ? »
42022024	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirna teestu meele benannico a minninco-aŋ waa tatik paka.
42022025	Kar Iisa kaawiico aman : « Sultinnay ku duniiner goy kaaco ka geen̰co. Ŋu hokumiyaag geen̰co iŋ guwaane, kar ŋu raka pey a gee yaa kolin̰co a ‟ gay selliŋkaw ”.
42022026	Kuŋko-aŋ, dakoŋ ginenno ar ŋuura. Minninko, gem kaak tatik paka yaa tale ziy ar ŋa kapak, ho ŋaar kaak hokumiya yaa gine ar gay riyor.
42022027	Naako indiŋko : ya ɗo taŋko, gem kaak tiya kat tatko wala kaak iya tee ? Kaak tiyaw-ak ɗoo di ? Kar nun gay, nu goy ɗatikko ar gay riyor kaak iyaako tee.
42022028	Kuŋko-aŋ ko, wiktin taat taaɓin gasintu, ku balnu rasindu.
42022029	Ɗo saan taar-at ko, nun naako berin Meennaw ɗo pisiŋko ar Tanni Buŋ beriiduuta.
42022030	Paa kat, ku asiy tee ho kuu see iŋ nunu ɗo Meennuwir. Ku asiy goye ar sultinnay, kuu ɗukume seriin ɗo tamba ta Israyeel taat orok iŋ seera. »
42022031	Iisa kaawiiji ɗo Simon Piyer aman : « Simon cokay samaane, Seetanne indig Buŋ a ŋaako dodiyiŋko ar ŋu dodiyiy geme.
42022032	Kar nun gay indijiŋ Buŋ imaanjiŋ giniyɗo sooɗa. Kar wiktin taat Seetanne gecin̰ciŋ ko ho ki goy pey bombo ɗo imaanjiŋ, ɗeŋrig siŋtan̰ oki. »
42022033	Piyer gay kaawiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Gem kol Rabbine, ya ŋu un̰jaaciŋ daŋaayne wala ŋu diyaaciŋ oki, nun rasaacinno. »
42022034	Kar Iisa telkiiji aman : « Piyer, nu kaawaajiŋ ka seener, ƴiriyta iŋ aando-anta, kokir boogaaɗo di, kii tatire dees subba a ki ibinginno. »
42022035	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa indiig maajirnay aman : « Wiktin taat nu n̰aamiŋko ɗo riyor, ku bal soke ɗo pisiŋko wala gurus, wala mokolle, wala n̰ugira. Ɗo wiktin taar-at, maan arumko walla ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ha’a ! Maan balni arme. »
42022036	Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Min diŋka-aŋ, kaak gin gurus, ŋa icga. Kaak gin mokolle oki, ŋa icta. Kaak ginno seepin gay, ŋa gidiyit batkoy ho ŋaa gidiye seepine.
42022037	Kar nu kaawaako, kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner ɗo bi kanto yaa ase ɗo werti. Kaaw-at aman : ‟ Ŋu asa talin̰ ŋaar oki atta iŋ gee kuuk jookumo. ” Ka seener, kaawin okin̰co kuuk ŋu siirtu ɗo bi kanto-ak gaay ko nece. »
42022038	Maajirnay kaawiiji aman : « Gem kol Rabbinni, aŋ seepinpan seera. » Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Rason kaaw-anta. »
42022039	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa amiltu iŋ maajirnay min ɗo geegirdi. Ŋu ɓaawtu ɗo koot ka Olibiyennar uudin ta ŋa ɓaggiyo.
42022040	Min ŋu ottu ɗo wer-ak, ŋa kaawiico aman : « Indoŋ Buŋ kuu goye bombo ya Seetanne gecaako, kuuji gedire. »
42022041	Kar Iisa etirtu minninco serek sooɗ, ŋa dersitu ho ŋa indiy Buŋ aman :
42022042	« Baaba, lociŋ-ak raɗɗo, etirit taaɓin-an minniner. Yampa, taa ginenno ar taat nun rakiyo, illa taat kiŋ rakiyo. » [
42022043	Hiyya, ɗubil ka Buŋdi bayniiji a ŋaa ɗeŋrin̰ji.
42022044	Iisa kelmoy amile nam ŋa tala aminda. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa salkiytu iŋ gelbin rakki paa nam tiŋgoy etila cus-cus ar baar.]
42022045	Min ŋa gaastu iŋ salaaney, ŋa uctu ho ŋa yeeptu wer ka maajirnay. Min ŋa ottu, ŋa gasiig ŋu weƴe asaan ŋu moya gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu dortu ho kuuk yaa ase ba aaro.
42022046	Kar ŋa indiig aman : « Maa di ku weƴiyo ? Ucoŋ, indoŋ Buŋ kuu goye bombo ya Seetanne gecaako. »
42022047	Min Iisa kaawa misan di, tala kar gee asaw. Zuudas kaak min paliinna kuuk orok iŋ seer ogirco. Ŋa ɓaawiiji ɗo Iisa, ŋa baamiyiiga ho ŋa giniiji cuuɗ.
42022048	Kar Iisa gay kaawiiji aman : « Zuudas, nun kaak Roŋ gemor, iŋ cuuɗ-an di, ki isiniidu ! »
42022049	Min maajirin ku Iisa taltu maan kaak yaa kuuniye-ak, ŋu indiig aman : « Rabbine, ni asiɗin̰ gee-aŋ iŋ seepinpan walla ? »
42022050	Ek di rakki min maajirnay ku Iisa ceeptu seepiney, ŋa asiɗiig gay riyor kaak gina riy ɗo mee satkiner ka tatko ho ŋa ɗukumiijit ɗeŋgey ta meeda.
42022051	Kar Iisa ictu kaawo aman : « Ha’a, paaɗo, goyoŋ werko rakki ! » Kar ŋa atiit ɗeŋge-at ɗo werti.
42022052	Min pa-ak, Iisa kaawiico ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner, ku gay gooƴe ger ka Buŋdi ho aginay ku Yuudinnar aman : « Ku astu iŋ seepinpan ho iŋ doŋkilay a kuun obindu, wala nu kokino ?
42022053	Nun sa goy doo iŋ kuŋko ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Maa di ku obginno annere ? Kar diŋ gay, wiktin taŋko ase, taar taat gondikaw yaa gaare gudurriti. »
42022054	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋu obiig Iisa, ŋu iyiig ɗo ger ka mee satkiner ka tatko ho ŋu un̰jiig atta. Piyer gay aaɗaag min aaro, ɗatikco ɗukume.
42022055	Min ŋaar-ak, gee daarin̰ ŋaamtu ako ɗo wer ka berel ŋu ooriyo. Piyer oki goytu iŋ ŋuura.
42022056	Daatik rakki gay riyor taliig Piyer oora ako, ta taliig ƴalaaŋ ho ta kaawiico ɗo gee-ak aman : « Ha’, taloŋ gem-aŋ oki iŋ ŋaara ! »
42022057	Kar Piyer gay tatirtu aman : « Ha’a, nu ibingigɗo gem-aŋka. »
42022058	Jammiy sooɗ, gem ka pey taliiga ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Kiŋ oki rakki min maajirnay ku Iisa ɗoo ? » Kar Piyer telkiiji aman : « Ha’a, nun min ŋuurro. »
42022059	Goytu kee, yaa gine ar pat rakki pa, kar gem rakki ka pey wakiliy di aman : « Ka seener gay, gem-aŋ, ŋaar goy iŋ ŋaara asaan ŋaar oki min kiɗ ka Galile. »
42022060	Kar Piyer gay telkiiji aman : « Hey kiŋke-aŋka, kaawon̰-an gay min momo ? » Min ŋa bal deen kaawoy misan di, kokir boogtu.
42022061	Ɗo wer-ak, Rabbin kolsiig Piyer ho ŋa taliig ƴalaaŋ. Hiyya, Piyer moyiit kaaw taat Rabbin kaawiiji aman : « Ƴiriyta iŋ aando-anta, kokir boogaaɗo di, kii tatire dees subba a ki ibinginno. »
42022062	Min ŋaar-ak, Piyer amiltu kara ho ŋa zugiig ale.
42022063	Gee kuuk gooƴaag Iisa ajimiyiiga ho ŋu koociiga.
42022064	Ŋu ɗuuniig odinay ho ŋu indiig aman : « Hey nabiin̰ce-aŋka, kaawnin̰ ja waa kaak men̰n̰in̰ciŋ ! »
42022065	Kar ŋu wariig ko ware.
42022066	Min wer waltu, aginay ku Yuudinnar n̰umtu, ŋuur agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ agindaw ku gaanuundi. Kar gee kuuk gooƴaag Iisa-ak iyiicoga.
42022067	Min ŋu iyga, ŋu indiig Iisa aman : « Kaaw ta gaaƴan̰, ya kiŋ ko Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu. » Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Ya nun kat ɗiyaako, ku amniyaanno,
42022068	ho ya nun kat indaako, ku yeepaaduɗo.
42022069	Kar gay, ɗak mena sooɗ di, nun Roŋ gemor yaa goye ɗo meeday ta Buŋ kaak gudurre okintit ɗo pisin̰ji. »
42022070	Ɗo wer-ak, okin̰co kaawtu aman : « Di pa-ak, kiŋ ko Roŋ ka Buŋdi walla ? » Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Kuŋ maaniiko kaawit ko a ŋa nunu. »
42022071	Hiyya, ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : « Maaniite cokiyit ko ta biy, wala gi raka pey saadine ! »
42023001	Ɗo wer-ak, gee ku ɗukuma seriin-ak uctu okin̰co, ŋu iyiig Iisa ɗo uŋji ka guberneer Pilaat.
42023002	Min ŋu iyiiga, ŋu diyiiji kaaw aman : « Ni gasig gem-aŋ as nigin darrini ho ŋa isinaag gee a ŋuu kappiyenno miiri ɗo Sezaar, sultan ka tatik ka Room. Ŋa gina ziy a ŋa Masi, ansi-ak a ŋa Sultan. »
42023003	Pilaat indiig Iisa aman : « Kiŋ ko sultan ka Yuudinnar walla ? » Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ meen̰jiŋ kaawit ko. »
42023004	Pilaat kaawiico ɗo agindaw ku gay satkiner ho ɗo gee kuuk dakin-ak aman : « Nun bal gase oorin taat naa obin̰ gem-aŋka. »
42023005	Kar gee kuuk diyji kaaw-ak wakiliy kon di aman : « Ŋa isinaag gee iŋ ɓildin̰ji, min kiɗ ka Galile yoo kiɗ ka Zuude okin̰ji nam ŋa astu anne. »
42023006	Wiktin taat Pilaat dortu-ak, ŋa inditu aman : « Gem-aŋ min Galile walla ? »
42023007	Kar min ŋu kaawiiji a Iisa asa min ɗo kiɗ ka Galile ɗo wer kaak Herood Antipaas goy kaaci, ŋa n̰aamiijiga. Ɗo menaw ŋuur-ak, Herood oki goy ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem.
42023008	Min ŋu ottu ho Herood taliiga-ak, alji gal aale asaan min awalle ŋa raka talin̰ji. Ŋa dor gee kaawa biy ho ŋa raka talin̰ ŋaa gine maan kaak ajbay.
42023009	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa indiig iŋ kaawin dakina, kar Iisa gay bugum mayaat.
42023010	Agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ ku gaanuundi sa goya. Ŋu diyiiji kaawin kuuk ooma.
42023011	Ɗo wer-ak, Herood iŋ askirnay wariiga. Ŋu isiiji batik taat samaane ho ŋu ajimiyiiga. Kar ŋu n̰aamiijig pey ɗo Pilaat.
42023012	Awalle Herood iŋ Pilaat, ŋuur adine ho ƴiriy taar-at di ŋu amirtu.
42023013	Min ŋu yeepig Iisa, Pilaat n̰umiig Yuudinna iŋ aginduwco iŋ agindaw ku gay satkiner
42023014	ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Ku iyduug gem-aŋka ho ku diyji kaawo a ŋa isinaag gee a wer yaa nige. Kar nu indig uŋko ho min kaawin okin̰co kuuk ku diyji, oorin rakki sa nu balji gase taat yaaji iye obe.
42023015	Herood oki balji gase oorin taat ŋaa obin̰ji. Paa ko, ŋa n̰aamiteŋga. Di ŋaar-ak, gem-aŋ ŋaar ginno oorin taat yaaji iye muutu.
42023016	Ansi-ak, naa koocin̰ji di kar naa pikin̰ji. » [
42023017	Ɗo ay iidin ta Paak, ɗo aadiney, Pilaat imilgiyco ɗo Yuudinnar gem rakki min ɗo daŋaayner.]
42023018	Kar gay, okin̰co, ŋu teestu obe kuuri aman : « Daag gem-aŋka ho pikiniig Barabaas. »
42023019	(Barabaas gay, ŋu un̰jiig daŋaayne asaan ŋa barjilig gee ku geegirdi ho ŋa dee gemo.)
42023020	Pilaat gay, ɗo tan̰ji-at, ŋa raka pikin̰ Iisa. Ampaa ko, ŋa kaawiico paa ɗo gee kuuk dakin-aku.
42023021	Kar ŋuur gay kaawiy raɗa aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! »
42023022	Ka subbiŋkar, Pilaat ictu pey kaawo aman : « Ŋaar nig maa di ? Yoo oorin rakki taat nec yaa iye muutuy oki, nu balji gase. Naa koocin̰ iŋ korɗiŋgo kar naa pikin̰ji. »
42023023	-
42023024	Kar ŋuur gay wakila di kaawe raɗa aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! » Gaaƴco jaala jaalen di nam Pilaat giniicot taat ŋu rakiyo.
42023025	Ŋa pikiicog Barabaas ar taat ŋu inditu, ŋaar kaak barjilig gee ku geegirdi ho dee gemo. Kar Iisa gay, ŋa beriicog ɗo pise ka askirnar a ŋuuji gine taat gee-ak rakiyo.
42023026	Ŋu iyiig Iisa ɗo wer kaak ŋuu deen̰ji ho ŋu iciig et kaak ŋu ɗooɗin̰ kuwa. Ɗo botildi, ŋu ŋaamtu iŋ gem rakki pa siŋji Simon. Gem-ak min geeger ka Sireen ho ŋa asa min yeero. Ŋu asiriig ŋaa icilin̰ et-ak ɗo goroy ho ŋaa aaɗin̰ Iisa.
42023027	Gee dakin aale aaɗaaga. Minninco goy oki daaɗ kuuk alaw ho kuuk marmilaw ɗo saan tan̰ji.
42023028	Iisa kolsiig daaɗ-aku ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Kuŋ daaɗ ku Zeruzaleem, dakoŋ alenno lotu. Illa aloŋ ta maaniiko ho ta kooginko,
42023029	asaan wiktin yaa ase taat gee yaa kaawe aman : ‟ Galal ɗo moggan, ŋuur kuuk bal aawe wee ho kuuk bal bere popo tak-tak. ”
42023030	Ɗo menaw ŋuur-ak, gee yaa kaawe ɗo dambiniidi aman : ‟ Sollonni ɗo kaƴni ” ho ɗo kotat aman : ‟ Gootonni. ”
42023031	Ka seener, ya et kaak balan̰ kat ŋu doliyaag ampa-ak, kar kaak aaƴ gay ŋuu ginin̰ji maman ? »
42023032	Ɗo werco-ak, ŋu iytu oki kokinay seera a ŋuu deen̰co iŋ Iisa.
42023033	Min ŋu ottu ɗo koot kaak ŋu koliy « Ɗawik ta kaar », ŋu ɗooɗig Iisa ka etor. Ŋu ɗooɗiig oki kokinay-aku : rakki ɗo meeday ho rakki gay ɗo n̰ugilay.
42023034	Min ŋu ɗooɗig Iisa, ŋa inditu tacco Buŋ aman : « Baaba, saamiyco ɗo gee-aŋku asaan ŋu ibanno maan kaak ŋu giniyo. » Kar askirna-ak ɗeeɗiit kesuun ta Iisa werin dakina ho ay gem di iciy taat galji.
42023035	Gee gay talaaga. Ŋuur agindaw ku Yuudinnar oki samtiyaaji aman : « Ŋa jil gee ku pey. Diŋ gay, ŋa jil ziy ka meen̰ji ya ŋaar kat Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu kare ! »
42023036	Askirin oki samtiyaaji. Ŋu ɓaawiiji moota ho ŋu beriiji maam ku tooro
42023037	ho ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Ya kiŋ kat sultan ka Yuudinnar-ak, jil kat ɗoo zin̰ ! »
42023038	Kar ɗo et ka Iisa, ŋu ɗooɗ maan kuwa ɗo kaay kaak ŋu siirji aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ ko sultan ka Yuudinnar. »
42023039	Rakki min kokinay kuuk ŋu ɗooɗtu-ak wariig Iisa aman : « Kiŋke-aŋ ɗoo ko kaawa a ki Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu-aka ! Jil zin̰ ho kiini jile oki ! »
42023040	Kar kokin ka seeriŋkar-ak gay leesiiji ɗo giji aman : « Ginte-aŋ, ŋu obinte ŋuute deente ar ŋaara. Kiŋ ginno kolaw ɗo Buŋdi walla ?
42023041	Tante-an taar ɗo botilti asaan ŋuute deente ɗo maan kaak gi gintu. Kar ŋaar-aŋ gay nig maa ? »
42023042	Kar ŋa kaawtu pey aman : « Gem kol tacco Iisa, dakin rawtinno ɗo wiktin taat ki asiy teen meennuwin̰. »
42023043	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Ka seener nu kaawaajiŋ, ƴiriyta-aŋ di, ki ɓaa goye ɗo janni iŋ nunu. »
42023044	-
42023045	Wiktin taat pat nectu ƴiriyo, ta mattu. Wer astu gondiko ɗo kiɗ okin̰ji nam pat subba ta maako. Ɗo ger ka Buŋdi sa, zimilla kuuk ŋu ɗuuntu ɗo botol taat un̰ja ɗo wer kaak cawar aale eertu min ɗatko min kuwa yoo keɗer.
42023046	Hiyya, Iisa kooltu raɗa aman : « Baaba, nu diyit ruwwiner ɗo pisin̰ciŋ. » Kar min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak di, ŋa mattu.
42023047	Min tatkaw rakki ka askirin ku Room taliig gamin okin̰co kuuk kuuniy-ak, ŋa oziliig Buŋ ho ŋa kaawtu aman : « Way, ka seener, gem-aŋ bal nige maan tak-tak ! »
42023048	Ɗo wer-ak, goy gee dakina kuuk as tale maan kaak kuuniye. Min ŋu totirtu, ŋu deliig goŋguminco min nige kaak aditco nigtu.
42023049	Roynay ku Iisa okin̰co ho iŋ daaɗ kuuk aaɗig min Galile-ak peytu serek ho ŋu taliy maan kaak kuuniya-aka.
42023050	-
42023051	Ɗo wer-ak, gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Yuusup. Ŋaar min geeger ka Yuudinnar kaak ŋu koliy Arimate. Gem-ak goyin̰ji samaane ho ŋa sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ŋa era ase ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi. Ŋaar min aginay ku Yuudinnar, kar gay, ŋa bal ooye ɗo kaawco ho ɗo maan kaak ŋu gintu.
42023052	Ŋa ɓaawtu gasin̰ Pilaat ho ŋa indiig zi ka Iisa.
42023053	Kar ŋa paayiig min ka etor, ŋa maliyiig iŋ kapanne ho ŋa ɓaawtu un̰jiig ɗo magin taat ŋu doɗɗitu ka dambar. Magin-at, yoo momte rakki oki ŋu balti diye.
42023054	Ƴiriy taar-at ta siye ka ziŋkar asaan ƴiriy ta sabitdi gaay ko.
42023055	Daaɗ kuuk as min Galile iŋ Iisa-ak aaɗiig Yuusup min aaro. Ŋu taliit magin-ata ho maman ŋu ɗeeriig Iisa.
42023056	Kar ŋu yeeptu ɗo geriyco ho ŋu teestu siye gamin kuuk ŋuuji ooye ɗo momtey ka Iisa : itir iŋ sewe. Kar gay, iŋ ƴiriy ta sabitdi, ŋu bal ɓaawe ɗo maginer, ŋu eeltu geero uudin taat gaanuun kaawtu.
42024001	Iŋ ƴiriy ta dumaas, wer dugus-dugus, daaɗ-ak sokiig gamin kuuk ŋu siytu a ŋuuji ooye ɗo ziy ka Iisa ho ŋu ɓaawtu ɗo bit ka maginer.
42024002	Min ŋu ote, ŋu gasig dambi kaak ŋu goottu magin-ak tuŋkil serpiya.
42024003	Ŋu un̰jitu ɗo maginer, kar ŋu bal gasin̰ zi ka Rabbin Iisa.
42024004	Ŋu ajbiytu nam ta bico sa amallo. Ɗo wer-ak, tala kar gee seer kesuunco irn̰a pit-pit bayniico.
42024005	Daaɗ-ak kolaw obiigu nam ŋu onig kaƴco. Kar gee-ak kaawiico aman : « Maa di ku bariyiy gem kaak goy mento min ɗatik ta gee kuuk mate ?
42024006	Ŋaar kawwi ɗo maginer, ŋa nooye. Pakiroŋ ɗo kaaw taat ŋa kaawiiko wiktin taat ŋa goyiy Galile.
42024007	Kaaw-at aman : ‟ Illa nun Roŋ gemor, ŋuun berin ɗo pise ka gee kuuk jookumo. Ŋuun ɗooɗin ka etor ho ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay, naa nooye. ” »
42024008	Hiyya, daaɗ-ak moyiig kaawin kuuk Iisa kaawiico.
42024009	Ŋu yeeptu min ɗo maginer ho ŋu osiicog gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu taltu ɗo paliinna kuuk orok iŋ rakki ho ɗo gee okin̰co kuuk aaɗig Iisa.
42024010	Daaɗ kuuk iyiit kabarre ɗo paliinnar-ak, ŋuur Mariyam ta min geeger ka Magdala, Zaan, Mariyam atan̰ Zaak ho iŋ daaɗ daarin̰ ku pey.
42024011	Kar min paliinna-ak doriit kabarre-at, ɗo tan̰co a wal daaɗ-ak osa kaawin kuuk bal baaco diŋ ga. Paa ko, ŋu baltu amniyin̰co.
42024012	Kar Piyer gay uctu, ŋa iciig gaɗi ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo maginer. Min ŋa ottu, ŋa ƴogiltu ho ŋa taltu jarɗaɗ di goy keeco. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa ajbiytu tak-tak. Hiyya, ɗo yeepin̰ji ŋa osiig kat adiy ɗo maan kaak kuuniye.
42024013	Ɗo ƴiriy taar-at di, maajirna seer ku Iisa ɓaa ɗo hellin taat ŋu koliy Emayuus. Hellin-at, min Zeruzaleem yaa nece ar kilomeetir orok.
42024014	Ɗo botildi ŋu kaawiy benannico ɗo gamin okin̰co kuuk kuuniye.
42024015	Wiktin taat ŋu kaawiyo ho ŋu meeliy-ak, Iisa meen̰ji jorkiigu ho ŋa toliyiy iŋ ŋuura.
42024016	Maajirna-ak talaaga, kar gay, maan toɗco ŋuu ibinin̰ji.
42024017	Iisa indiig aman : « Ku meela ɗo bi ka moo botildi ? » Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu peytu ɗut ho ŋu ƴiimiit wijeenco.
42024018	Rakki minninco siŋji Kileyopaas telkiiji aman : « Min gee kuuk goy Zeruzaleem, kiŋ keejiŋ di ibingigɗo gamin kuuk kuuniy ɗo menaw-aŋku walla ? »
42024019	Iisa indiig aman : « Ŋuur maa ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Maan kaak asji ɗo Iisa ka min Nazareet ! Ŋaar nabiin̰ce tatiko. Ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ɗo uŋco ka gee okin̰co, ŋa gaarit gudurrey iŋ gamin kuuk ŋa giniyo ho iŋ kaawin kuuk ŋa kaawiyo.
42024020	Aginduwte ku gay satkiner iŋ aginiyte ku darre berig ɗo pise ka agindaw ku Room a ŋuu obin̰ji, ŋuuji diye kaawo ho ŋuu deen̰ ka etor.
42024021	Zer nin pakir a wal ŋaar ko kaak asa jilin̰ gee ku Israyeel min adinco. Kar taar gay bal ase pa, ho diŋ gay gin ko menaw subba min gamin-aŋ kuuniytu.
42024022	Illa gay daaɗ daarin̰ minninni iyinti kaawin kuuk ajbay. Ŋu sak bit ka maginer,
42024023	kar ŋu bal gasin̰ ziy ka Iisa. Ŋu asinti kaaw a ɗubal ku Buŋdi bayinco ho ŋu kaawiico a ŋa goy mento.
42024024	Minninni, daarin̰ ɓaawtu ɗo maginer ho ŋu gasiig gamin-ak uudinco ar taat daaɗ-ak kaawiico. Kar ŋaar gay, ŋu bal gasin̰ji. »
42024025	Hiyya, Iisa kaawiico aman : « Kuŋ maa di kaƴko ɗibirtu ampa ? Kaawin okin̰co kuuk nabiinna iyiiko-aŋku, maa di ŋu un̰jigikonno koɗok ?
42024026	Ka seener, nabiinna kaaw a illa Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu yaa taaɓiyen̰ ja ampa, kar kat, ŋaa un̰je ɗo darjiney. »
42024027	Kar Iisa gaariico baaco ta kaawin kuuk ŋu siirtu ɗo saan tan̰ji. Ŋa teestu iŋ makaatamna ku Muusa iŋ ku nabiinnar nam ŋa gasiit Kitamne okintiti.
42024028	Wiktin taat ŋu gaay ote ɗo hellin taat maajirna-ak ɓaayiyo, Iisa gintu ar ŋa bira iŋ uŋji.
42024029	Kar ŋuur gay toɗiiji aman : « Ha’a, gem kol siŋte, as iŋ nini asaan pat-an ɗeete. » Hiyya, Iisa ooytu ho ŋa ɓaawtu goye iŋ ŋuura.
42024030	Wiktin taat ŋu goyiy keɗer ɗo teendi, ŋa ictu mappa ho ŋa deltu barkin ɗo Buŋdi. Ŋa pirsiiga ho ŋa ɗeeɗiicoga.
42024031	Ɗo wer-ak odinco piltu kate ho ŋu ibiniig Iisa. Kar ta bite-aŋ di, ŋa sawiltu min ɗo uŋco.
42024032	Min pa-ak, ŋu kaawtu benannico aman : « Min ŋa kaawiite ɗo botildi ho ŋa gaariite baat ta Kitamner-at, kaaw-at eruwgintenno walla ? »
42024033	Koɗok di, ŋu uctu ho ŋu yeeptu Zeruzaleem. Ŋu gasiig paliinna kuuk orok iŋ rakki n̰um iŋ een̰co.
42024034	Maajirna-ak, kaawiico ɗo ŋuur kuuk asa min hellin ta Emayuus-ak aman : « Ka seener, Rabbin nooye ! Ŋa bayinji ɗo Simon. »
42024035	Kar maajirin ku seer-ak osiico oki maan kaak kuuniyco ɗo botildi ho maman ŋu ibiniig Iisa ɗo wiktin taat ŋa pirsiig mappa.
42024036	Wiktin taat ŋu kaawa misan di, tala kar Iisa goy ɗatikco ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Aapiye, taa goye iŋ kuŋko ! »
42024037	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu raastu ho kolaw obiigu, ŋuur a wal ta kelmo.
42024038	Kar Iisa gay kaawiico aman : « Maa di ku barjiliyo ho aditko gintu seera ?
42024039	Taloŋ pisindu ho asindu. Ka seener ŋa nunu ! Diironnu ho kuu tale asaan kelim taar bal gine kuma wala kaaso ar ku taliy nun gintu-aŋka. »
42024040	Min ŋa kaawiico pa-ak, ŋa gaariico pisin̰ji iŋ asin̰ji.
42024041	Alco gala ho ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak, kar iŋ ajbiyin̰co-ak oki, ŋu bal amniye loci. Paa ko, Iisa indiig aman : « Ku gin maan ka teendi walla ? »
42024042	Ŋuur gay aman : « Hii, ni gine. » Kar ŋu persiiji boos ka bike.
42024043	Iisa iciiga ho ŋa teeyig uŋco.
42024044	Kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Aan taat nu kaawiiko wiktin taat nu goyiy iŋ kuŋko : Gamin kuuk siir ɗo bi kanto ɗo gaanuun ka Muusa, ɗo makaatamna ku nabiinnar ho iŋ ta Soom, okin̰co yaa asen̰ ja uudinco. »
42024045	Ɗo wer-ak, Iisa piliig kaƴco ho ŋu ibiniit kat baat ta Kitamner.
42024046	Ŋa kaawiico aman : « An kaaw taat siir ɗo Kitamner : ‟ Illa Masi yaa taaɓiyen̰ ja, ŋaa mate, kar ƴiriy ta subbiŋkar gay ŋaa nooye min ɗo muuti. ”
42024047	Paa kat, gee yaa gaare Kabarre ta Gala iŋ siŋ kun̰ji min Zeruzaleem yoo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji. Kabarre-at a ŋuu ibinin̰ nigin̰co, ŋu poocin̰ goyin̰co kaak samaanno ho Buŋ yaaco saamiyin̰ zunuubinnico.
42024048	Kuŋ kon di gee kuuk talig gamin-aŋ iŋ odinko.
42024049	Kar nun meendu yaako n̰aame maan kaak Tanni kaawtu a ŋaako bere. Kuŋ gay, goyoŋ ɗo geeger-aŋ di nam gudurre taat asa min kuwa yaako miiniŋko. »
42024050	Min ŋaar-ak, ƴiriy rakki Iisa imiliig maajirnay min ɗo geeger-aka, ŋa iyiig moota iŋ hellin ta Betani. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa jaaltu pisin̰ji ho ŋa barkiyiigu.
42024051	Wiktin taat ŋa barkiyiigu-ak di, ŋa etirtu minninco ho Buŋ coonig ka samaaner.
42024052	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu abdiyiiga, kar ŋu yeeptu Zeruzaleem iŋ galal dakina.
42024053	Min ŋu yeepe, ŋu ɓaggiy ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋu oziliiga.
43001001	Awalle, min Buŋ bal kilgiyin misa duniine, gem kaak ŋu koliy Kaaw ta Buŋdi goy ko. Ŋa goy sawa iŋ Buŋ ho ŋaar meen̰ji di Buŋ.
43001002	Min Buŋ bal kilgiyin misa duniine, ŋa goy ko iŋ ŋaara.
43001003	Iŋ Kaaw-at di, Buŋ kilgiyiig gamin okin̰co. Maan ginno kaak ŋa kilgiytu bal taara.
43001004	Ta taar kat ber goye ɗo gamin okin̰co. Ho iŋ goye kanti ko, gee taltu portikaw.
43001005	Portikaw-at caapiy ɗo gondikor, kar gondikaw baltit gine maanna.
43001006	Kar gay, gin gem rakki kaak Buŋ n̰aamtu, ŋu kolaag Yaaya-Batist.
43001007	Ŋaar as kaawe ɗo geemir ɗo bi ka ŋaar kaak gaarit portikaw-ata, asaan gee yaa cokiye kaawoy ho ŋuu aamine iŋ ŋaara.
43001008	Yaaya gay, ŋaar meen̰jiɗo kat portikaw, ŋaar as kaawe biti di.
43001009	Portikaw-at taar ko seene. Taar as ɗo adiy ka kiɗar ho ta caapiy ɗo gee okin̰co.
43001010	Gem kaak ŋu koliy Kaaw-ak, ŋaar goy ɗo adiy ka kiɗar. Iŋ ŋaar ko, Buŋ kilgiyiig kiɗa. Kar gee kuuk ɗo adiy ka kiɗar gay bal ibinin̰ji.
43001011	Ŋa ɓaaw goye iŋ geen̰ji ku meen̰ji, kar geen̰ji gay bal obin̰ji.
43001012	Kar ɗo gee kuuk obga ho kuuk aamin iŋ siŋji, ŋa berco botol taat ŋuu gine koogin ku Buŋdi.
43001013	Ŋuu gine kooginay-ak, asaan Buŋ kat bercog wee ka marbinto. Wee ŋaar-ak wala isgig iŋ niyin ta gemor, wala iŋ pikirre ta gemor.
43001014	Gem kaak ŋu koliy Kaaw-ak gintu gemo ho ŋa astu goye iŋ ginte. Gi talit darjiney taat ŋa gastu min Tacco Buŋ. Darjiney-at, taar ko ta Roŋji ka daŋgiro. Iŋ barkiney, ŋa elgiy gee ho ŋa gaariico seen ta Buŋdi.
43001015	Yaaya gay, ŋaar kaaw biy. Ŋa kaawtu raɗa aman : « Taloŋ ! Aŋ ko gem kaak nu kaawiiko awalle aman : ‟ Gin gem rakki kaak yaa ase ɗo aaror, kar gay, ŋa ogirdu. Asaan min nu bal ase misan di, ŋaar goy ko. ” »
43001016	Paa ko, iŋ selliŋkuwiy-at, ŋa barkiyiite dakina, okinte ŋa barkiyaateŋ di gaay iŋ gaayo.
43001017	Awalle Buŋ berteŋ gaanuun min ɗo pise ka Muusa. Kar barkin iŋ seen gay, Buŋ berteŋgu iŋ ase ka Iisa Masi.
43001018	Ginno waan kaak talig Buŋ. Illa Roŋji ka daŋgiro, ŋaar kaak goy sawa iŋ Buŋ-ak di, gaarteŋga.
43001019	Ƴiriy rakki, agindaw ku Yuudinnar kuuk goy Zeruzaleem n̰aamtu gay satkiner iŋ gee ku min baaco tan̰ Lebi a ŋuu gasin̰ Yaaya. Min ŋu gasga, ŋu indiig aman : « Kiŋ waa ? »
43001020	Ŋaar gay balco cigile maanna. Ŋa telkiico aman : « Nun-aŋ Masiɗo. »
43001021	Ŋuur gay indiig pey aman : « Di kiŋ ke waa ? Wal kiŋ ko Eli ? » Yaaya gay telkiico aman : « Ha’a ! Nun Eliɗo. » Ŋu indiig pey aman : « Di wal kiŋ ko nabiin̰ce kaak ŋu kaawtu biy ɗo Kitamner-aka ? » Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Ha’a ! Ŋa nunno. »
43001022	Kar ŋuur gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Di kiŋ waa ? Ki kaawa maa ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ ? Asaan ni raka niico yeepe kaaw ɗo ŋuur kuuk n̰aaminti. »
43001023	Yaaya telkiico aman : « Nun ko gem kaak nabi Ezaayi kaawtu biy aman : ‟ Gin gem rakki koola ɗo kalaaner a Rabbinte asaw. Ucoŋ, siyon̰ji botol ɗalaŋ. ” »
43001024	Min gee kuuk ŋu n̰aamtu ɗo Yaaya, goy oki gee kuuk ŋu koliy Pariziyenna.
43001025	Ŋu indiig aman : « Di ya kiŋ kat Masiɗo, wala ki Eliɗo, wala ki nabiin̰ceɗo kaak ŋu kaawtu biy ɗo Kitamner-ak, maa di ki batiziyiy gee ? »
43001026	Yaaya telkiico aman : « Nun-aŋ batiziya gee iŋ amay di. Kar gem rakki goy ɗo ɗatikko kaak ku ibingigɗo.
43001027	Gem-ak yaa ase ɗo aaror, kar gay, nun bal nece kaak naa one, naa sorin̰ n̰ugiray. »
43001028	Maanna-ak kuuniy ɗo wer kaak Yaaya batiziyiy gee, ɗo geeger ka Betani, aar barrer kaak ŋu koliy Zurdan.
43001029	Ka kawtinti, Yaaya taliig Iisa asaaji. Ɗo bi kan̰ji, ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Taloŋ, aŋ ko Roŋ tamgi ka Buŋdi, ŋaar sooya zunuubinna ku geemir.
43001030	Ɗo bi kan̰ji ko, nu ɗiytu aman : ‟ Goy gem rakki kaak yaa ase ɗo aaror, kar gay, ŋaar ogirdu. Asaan min nu bal ase misan di, ŋaar goy ko. ”
43001031	Awalle, nunu oki ibingigɗo. Kar diŋ gay, nun as batiziye gee iŋ amay a naa gaarin̰ji ɗo gee ku Israyeel. »
43001032	Ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi, Yaaya kaawtu pey aman : « Nu tal Ruwwin ta Buŋdi paayiiji ɗo Iisa ar ammaama ho ta goyiiji.
43001033	Awalle nun ibingigɗo oki, kar gay, Buŋ kaak n̰aamintu a naa batiziye gee iŋ amay kat kaawdu aman : ‟ Ki asa tale gem rakki, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi yaaji paaye ho taaji goye. Gem ŋaar-ak ko asa batiziye gee iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi. ”
43001034	Nun talig maanna-ak iŋ odinar ho nu kaawaako ka seener, gem-aŋ, ŋaar Roŋ ka Buŋdi. »
43001035	Ka kawtinti, Yaaya-Batist goy pey ɗo wer-ak iŋ maajirnay seera.
43001036	Ɗo wiktin taat ŋa taliig Iisa biraw, ŋa kaawtu aman : « Taloŋ, aŋ ko Roŋ tamgi ka Buŋdi ! »
43001037	Maajirnay ku Yaaya ku seer-ak dorit kaawoy taat ŋa kaawtu-ata ho ŋu teestu aaɗin̰ Iisa.
43001038	Iisa kolsitu ho ŋa tala ŋu aaɗaaga. Ŋa indiig aman : « Ku aaɗiin gay ku bariya maa ? » Ŋuur gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Rabbine, kiŋ goy momo ? » (Siŋ ku Rabbin-ak ɗiya a « Tatkaw ».)
43001039	Ŋaar gay telkiico aman : « Asoŋ tala. » Hiyya, ŋu daktu tal wer ka ŋa goyiyo. Wiktin taar-at yaa neceŋ ko pat pooɗ ta maako. Hiyya, ŋu eeltu iŋ ŋaara.
43001040	Min gee seer kuuk doriit kaaw ta Yaaya ho aaɗiig Iisa-ak, Andre siŋji ka Simon Piyer sa goya.
43001041	Ŋa uctu dakiig gas siŋji Simon ho ŋa miniig aman : « Ni gasig Masi. » (Siŋ ku Masi-ak ɗiya a « Ŋaar kaak Buŋ doɓtu. »)
43001042	Kar ŋa iyiijig Simon ɗo Iisa. Iisa taliig ƴalaaŋ kar ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Kiŋke Simon, roŋ ka Yaaya. Min ƴiriyta-aŋ gee yaan̰ koleŋ ko Sepaas. » (Siŋ ku Sepaas-ak ɗiya a « Piyer ».)
43001043	-
43001044	Ka kawtinti, Iisa ictu niyin taat ŋaa ɓaawe ɗo kiɗ ka Galile. Ɗo botildi, ŋa ŋaamtu iŋ gem rakki siŋji Pilip kaak min Betsayda, werco kan̰ Andre iŋ Piyer. Iisa ɗiyiiji ɗo Pilip aman : « Aaɗnu ! »
43001045	Kar Pilip gay ɓaa tale gem rakki siŋji Natanayeel. Pilip ɗiyiiji ɗo Natanayeel aman : « Ni gasig gem kaak ŋu kaawtu biy ɗo Kitamner, ɗo gaanuun ka Muusa ho ɗo makaatamna ku nabiinnar oki. Ŋa Iisa roŋji ka Yuusup min geeger ka Nazareet. »
43001046	Kar Natanayeel gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Has min Nazareet kat amilgiy maan ka samaane ? » Pilip gay telkiiji aman : « Asu, ki ɓaa tale. »
43001047	Min Iisa taliig Natanayeel gaayji ko ote-ak, ŋa kaawtu ɗo biy kan̰ji aman : « Taloŋ ! Aŋ kat gem ka Israyeel kaak taɓ. Ŋaar-aŋ, yoo raadin rakki oki, amilaaɗo minniney. »
43001048	Natanayeel gay indiig aman : « Maman ki ibinginu ? » Iisa telkiiji aman : « Ɗo wiktin taat Pilip gasin̰ciŋ ɗo baat ta buguwar-ak di, nun talin̰ciŋ ko. »
43001049	Min pa-ak, Natanayeel kaawtu aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, nu iban kadar kiŋ kat Roŋ ka Buŋdi, Sultan ka Israyeel ! »
43001050	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Nu kaawaajiŋ ja a nu talin̰ciŋ ɗo baat ta buguwar-ata, ampaa ɗoo wal ki aamintu kadar nu Roŋ ka Buŋdi ? Hadi ki asa tale misa gamin kuuk ajbay pa-ak ŋuur-aŋku.
43001051	Cokiyoŋ, naako kaawe seene. Ku asa tale samaan yaa pile waakilak ho ɗubal ku Buŋdi yaa paayguwe ho ŋuu cokguwe, ŋuu birguwe min ɗo werir, nun Roŋ gemor. »
43002001	Min ŋaar-ak, menaw seer birtu. Kar gee gay gina iidin ta obindi ɗo geeger ka Kana, kiɗ ka Galile. Ɗo iidin taar-at, Mariyam atan̰ Iisa goya.
43002002	Kar Iisa iŋ maajirnay sa, ŋu n̰aamco, ŋu astu.
43002003	Kar ba aar, maam ku bin̰di kuuk gee siyo gaase. Hiyya, atan̰ Iisa ɗiyiiji ɗo roŋti aman : « Gee-aŋ, seen̰co arme. »
43002004	Iisa telkiitit aman : « Iya, nun gay yaa gine maa ? Nun wiktiner misa taat naa gaare zir. »
43002005	Min pa-ak, yaaco ɗiyiico ɗo gay riyor aman : « Ya taat ŋa kaawiikon di, ginonta. »
43002006	Kar ɗo wer-ak gay gin guwin bijigiƴ ku dambiydi. Guwin-ak, Yuudinna aciy ziŋkico ɗo aadinco a ŋuu goye cawar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. (Ay guw di ica jeliŋgin pooɗ wal beeƴ.)
43002007	Iisa ɗiyiico ɗo gay riyor-ak aman : « Miinoŋ guwin-aŋ iŋ amay ! » Kar ŋu miiniig pal-pal-pal.
43002008	Min guwin-ak miine, Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Diŋ gay itin̰oŋ min amay-aŋku, kuuji iye ɗo meeram. » Hiyya, ŋu itin̰tu, ŋu iyiiji.
43002009	Min ŋu iyiijigu, amay-ak raɓil ko maam ku bin̰di. Ŋuur kuuk itin̰ig amay-ak iban wer kaak ŋu asiyo. Kar meeram gay ibanno. Min ŋa aawiigu, ŋa koliig gem ka obe
43002010	ho ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Kun kawta, gee bera ja maam ku ƴuutu, kar ya gee aay koŋ gay, ŋu beriy kuuk ƴuutiŋkuwco sooɗa. Di kiŋ gay dummiyig kuuk ƴuutu yoo diŋka ! »
43002011	Maan kaak gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi-aka, ŋaar ko maan kaak Iisa gintu awallico ta gamnar. Ŋa ginig ɗo geeger ka Kana, kiɗ ka Galile. Ansii ko, Iisa gaartu darjiney ɗo geemir ho maajirnay aamintu loci.
43002012	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa iŋ yaaco ho iŋ siŋtay kuuk goy oki ɗo wer-aka yoo maajirnay, okin̰co, ŋu uctu ho ŋu birtu ɗo geeger ka Kapernayuum. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu goytu menaw sooɗa.
43002013	Menaw ku iidin ta Yuudinnar taat ŋu koliy Paak gaaye. Kar Iisa uctu, ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem.
43002014	Min ŋa ottu, ŋa un̰jitu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Ɗo ger-ak gin gee ku gidiya barkay, tamgi iŋ ammaamna. Atta-ak gin oki gee kuuk maka gurus. Ŋu ɗeerig gaminco ka taabulnal.
43002015	Min Iisa taltu pa-ak, ŋa soktu mernan ho ŋa siytu korɗiŋgo, kar ŋa atkiig okin̰co kara, yoo tamgico iŋ barkiyco. Gee ku maka gurus-ak, ŋa akiliig taabulnico ho ŋa dawiig gurusco.
43002016	Ŋa kaawiico ɗo taajirin ku ammaamnar-ak aman : « Imiloŋ gaminko-aŋ min anne ! Ger ka Tanni, dakoŋ ginin̰jiɗo ger ka suuginer ! »
43002017	Ɗo wer-ak, maajirnay ku Iisa moyiit kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, nu elgig gerin̰ dakina. Ya nu moyaw-ak, adir erwaan ar ako. »
43002018	Hiyya, agindaw ku Yuudinnar indiig Iisa aman : « Ni raka kiini gaare maan kaak ajbay, nii ibine kadar Buŋ ko tabirin̰ciŋ, ki giniig maanna-aŋka. »
43002019	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ɗimoŋ ger-aŋka. Ya ku ɗimig gay, ɗo menaw subba di, nun naa peyin̰ ɗo weriy. »
43002020	Ŋuur gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Ger-aŋ, ŋu pinig ɗo elgin orok pooɗ iŋ bijigiƴ. Kar kiŋ gay maman ɗo menaw subba di, ki kaawiy a kii pinin̰ji ! »
43002021	Sando, wiktin taat Iisa kaawiy ɗo bi ka gerdi-ak, ŋa kaawa ɗo bi ka ziy ka meen̰ji.
43002022	Ba aar, min Iisa nooytu min ɗo muuti, maajirnay moyiit kaawoy-ata. Paa ko, ŋu aamintu ɗo kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner ho ɗo taat Iisa kaawtu.
43002023	Ɗo wiktin taat Iisa iidiyiy iidin ta Paak ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem, ŋa gin gamin ku ajbay dakina. Min gee taliig gamin ku ajbay-ak, dakina minninco piltu biŋkico a ŋu aamin iŋ ŋaara.
43002024	Kar Iisa gay bal amniyin̰co, asaan okin̰co, ŋa ibingit ta aditco.
43002025	Ŋa rakaaɗo a gem yaaji ose ɗo biy ka gemor, asaan ŋa ibingit okintit taat goy ɗo adiy ka gemor.
43003001	Kar gin gem rakki siŋji Nikodeem. Ŋa min gee ku ŋu koliy Pariziyenna ho ŋa min agindaw ku Yuudinnar.
43003002	Ƴiriy rakki, ŋa dakiig gas Iisa iŋ aando, ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol Tacco, ni iban kadar Buŋ kat tabirin̰ciŋ, ki asiini ɓilde, asaan ginno gem kaak yaa gedire ginin̰ gamin kuuk ajbay ar kuuk ki gintu-aŋku ya Buŋ iŋ ŋaarro. »
43003003	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Cokay, naan̰ kaawe seene ! Ginno gem kaak yaa gedire talin Meennaw ta Buŋdi ya ŋu bal ween̰ wee ka marbinto. »
43003004	Nikodeem gay indiig aman : « Maman gem kaak tatik ko, ŋuu ween̰ pey marbinto ? Ampa-ak, ŋaa un̰je pey ɗo atti ka yaaco kat taa ween̰ji wal maman ? »
43003005	Iisa ɗiyiiji aman : « Cokay, naan̰ kaawe seene ! Ginno gem kaak yaa un̰je ɗo Meennaw ta Buŋdi ya ŋu bal ween̰ iŋ amay ho iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
43003006	Ŋuur kuuk ŋu weeyig ween di, ŋuur goy koogin ku geemir di. Kar ŋuur kuuk ŋu weeyig iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gay, ŋuur koogin ku Buŋdi.
43003007	Dak ajbiyenno ɗo kaawor taat aman : ‟ Illa ku asa ja wee wee ka marbinto. ”
43003008	Pakar ja ɗo usi. Ŋa abiriyo ho ŋa aaniyiy wer kaak ŋa rakiy di. Gee cokiya abirin̰ji kaak ŋa abiriyo, kar gay, gee ibanno wer kaak ŋa asiyo ho kaak ŋa ɓaayiyo. Hadi, gem kaak ŋu weeyig iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi sa, ŋaar paa di. »
43003009	Kar Nikodeem indiig aman : « Maman maanna-aŋ yaa kuuniye ? »
43003010	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ siŋjiŋ ale, ki tatkaw ka gaanuun ka gee ku Israyeel, kat ki ibingigɗo gamin-aŋku ?
