43016032	Hadi, wiktin asaw ho taar as ko, taat ku asiy totire, ay gem di yaa ice botiliy, kuun rasindu keedu. Kar nun gay keeduɗo, asaan Tanni goy iŋ nunu.
43016033	Gamin-aŋ, nu kaawkoŋ min diŋka, asaan kuu goye iŋ aapiye iŋ nunu. Ka seener, kuu taaɓiy ɗo duniiner. Kar gay, ɗuunoŋ masisko, asaan nun gedirtit ko ɗo duniiner-anta. »
43017001	Min Iisa kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa jaaliig kaay ho ŋa indiig Tacco Buŋ aman : « Baaba, wiktinti ase. Beror ko darjine ɗo nun kaak Roŋjiŋ a nun sa, naa gaarin darjinen̰.
43017002	Ki berduug gee okin̰co ɗo pisindu. Ansi-ak, naaco bere goye ka gaasɗo ɗo gee okin̰co kuuk ki beriidu-aŋku.
43017003	Goye ka gaasɗo-ak, illa ŋuun̰ ibine, kiŋ Buŋ keejiŋ di ka seener, ho ŋuu ibinin̰ pey ŋaar kaak ki tabirtu, nun ko Iisa Masi.
43017004	Nu gaarit darjinen̰ ɗo adiy ka kiɗar ho nu gaasit ko riy okintit taat ki beriidu a naa gine.
43017005	Diŋ gay, Baaba, berduut ko darjin uŋci loci. Darjin-at, nu ginit ko iŋ kiŋke min duniin bal kilgiye misa.
43017006	« Gee kuuk ki doɓtu min ɗo duniiner ho ki beriidu-ak, ŋuur ibingiciŋ, asaan nu gaarin̰ciŋ loco. Nu gaarin̰ciŋ a ŋuun̰ ibine. Okin̰co, ŋu kun̰jiŋ, ki berduugu ho ŋu karmiya kaawon̰.
43017007	Diŋ ŋuur iban kadar gamin okin̰co kuuk nu gintu asa min lociŋ,
43017008	asaan nu gaarcot kaawon̰ taat ki beriidu ho ŋu cokiyta. Ŋu iban kadar ka seener, nu asa min lociŋ ho ŋu aamin kadar ŋa kiŋ ko tabirintu.
43017009	« Nu indaacinno ɗo bi ka gee ku duniiner, kar gay, nu indaaciŋ ɗo bi ka ŋuur kuuk ki beriidu, asaan ŋu kun̰jiŋ.
43017010	Gee okin̰co kuuk kunto, ŋuur kun̰jiŋ, ho gee okin̰co kuuk kun̰jiŋ, ŋuur kunto. Ho iŋ gee ŋuur-aŋ ko, nu gaariy darjiner.
43017011	Diŋ gay, nun, naa rasin ko duniine ho naa coone ɗo werin̰. Ŋuur gay goy misa ɗo duniiner. Baaba, kiŋ kaak cawar aale, gooƴgu iŋ gudurre tan̰ji, gudurre taat ki beriidu. Gooƴgu a ŋuu kuuniye ar gem rakki, ar kiŋke iŋ nunu, gi rakki.
43017012	Wiktin taat nu goyiy iŋ ŋuura, nu gooƴig iŋ gudurren̰ taat ki beriidu. Nu gooƴiigu nam waanco sa bal rawte, illa ŋaar kaak yaa rawte a kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner yaa ase ɗo werti.
43017013	Diŋ gay, nun coona ko ɗo werin̰. Ya nu kaawa pa-ak wiktin taat nu goy misa ɗo duniin-an, nu kaaw a galal taat nu gintu yaa miinin̰ aditco tak.
43017014	Nu gaarcot kaawon̰, kar gee ku duniiner gay ƴilgu, asaan ŋu attanno iŋ ŋuura, ar nun oki attanno iŋ gee ku duniiner-aku.
43017015	Nu indaacinno a kii imilin̰ min ɗo duniiner, kar gay, nu indaaciŋ a kii gooƴin̰ min ɗo Seetanner.
43017016	Ŋuur gee ku duniinerro ar nunu gemtiɗo.
43017017	Ginu a ŋuu kuuniye kun̰jiŋ tak-tak iŋ botol ta seener. Seen gay, taar ko kaawon̰.
43017018	Nu tabiraag gee-ak ɗo adiy ka kiɗar, ar nun oki, ki tabirin ɗo adiy ka kiɗar.
43017019	Ɗo bi kan̰co, nu ras zir okin̰ji loci a ŋuur oki yaa kuuniye geen̰ji tak-tak.
43017020	« Kar gay, nu indaacinno ɗo bi maajirnar kuuk goy diŋka-aŋ di, nu indaaciŋ oki ɗo bi ka gee kuuk asa aamine iŋ nunu iŋ kaaw taat ŋuuco kaawe.
43017021	Nu indaaciŋ a ŋuur okin̰co yaa kuuniye rakki. Baaba, kiŋ goy iŋ nunu ar nun goy iŋ kiŋke, nu raka a ŋuur oki yaa n̰ume iŋ ginte a gee ku duniiner yaa ibine kadar kiŋ kat tabirintu.
43017022	Nu bercot darjin taat ki beriidu lotu a ŋuu kuuniye ar gem rakki, ar kiŋke iŋ nunu, gi rakki.
43017023	Nun goy iŋ ŋuura ho kiŋ goy iŋ nunu. Ansi-ak, ŋu gin botol taat ŋuu kuuniye ar gem rakki di, ho ampaa ko, gee ku duniiner yaa ibine kadar ŋa kiŋ ko kaak tabirintu ho ki elgiigu ar kaak ki elgiinu.
43017024	« Baaba, gee-aŋ, ki berduugu. Nu raka a ŋuu goye iŋ nunu ay wer kaak nu goyiyo. Ampaa ko, ŋuu talin darjiner. Ki berduut darjine-at, asaan ki elgin min duniin bal kilgiye misa.
43017025	Baaba, kiŋ ginaag ay maan iŋ botiliy. Gee ku duniiner, ŋuur balin̰ ibine. Kar nun gay ibinin̰ciŋ ho geendu-aŋ sa ibin kadar kiŋ ko kaak tabirintu.
43017026	Nu gaarin̰ciŋ loco ho naan̰ gaare pey a ele kaak ki elgiinu yaa goye loco oki. Ho nun meendu sa, naa goye iŋ ŋuura. »
43018001	Min Iisa gasiit kaawoy-ata, ŋa uctu iŋ maajirnay ho ŋu ɗeettu aar corkilol kaak ŋu koliy Sedron. Wer-ak gin jineene. Iisa iŋ maajirnay un̰jitu ɗo jineen-aka.
43018002	Wer-ak, Zuudas kaak asaaji isine ɗo Iisa sa ibingiga, asaan wer-ak, Iisa iŋ maajirnay jaawgiy iŋ menaw.
43018003	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, Zuudas uctu iŋ askirin ku Room ho iŋ askirin ku agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ ku Pariziyennar. Ŋa ogiriico ho ŋa iyiig ɗo jineen-aka. Askirna-ak sok garti, biruwna ho iŋ lampina.
43018004	Iisa gay, ŋaar iban ko maan kaak yaaji ase. Ampaa ko, ŋa asiico moota ho ŋa indiigu aman : « Ku bariya waa ga ? »
43018005	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Ni bariya Iisa kaak min Nazareet. » Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Ŋa nun ko aŋka. » Ɗo wer-ak, Zuudas kaak isinaaji ɗo Iisa-ak sa goya.
43018006	Ɗo wiktin taat Iisa ɗiytu aman : « Ŋa nun ko aŋka », ŋu dendirtu aaro ho ŋu sollitu keɗer.
43018007	Iisa indiig pey aman : « Ku bariya waa ga ? » Ŋuur gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Ni bariya Iisa kaak min Nazareet. »
43018008	Iisa telkiico aman : « Nu ɗiykon ɗoo a nun ko aŋka. Ya ŋa nun di kaak ku bariyiy-ak, rasoŋ maajirnar-aŋ yaa ɗeete. »
43018009	Ŋa kaawtu ansi-ak, asaan kaaw taat ŋa kaawtu awalle yaa ase ɗo werti aman : « Baaba, min gee kuuk ki beriidu-aŋ, nu bal rawte yoo waan minninco. »
43018010	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, Simon Piyer kaak gin seepin-ak ceepiiga ho ŋa asiɗiig gay riyor kaak gina riy ɗo mee satkiner ka tatko ho ŋa ɗukumiijit ɗeŋgey ta meeda. Gay riyor-ak, siŋji Malkuus.
43018011	Iisa gay ɗiyiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Un̰jig seepinen̰-aŋ ɗo caapoy. Ya lociŋ-ak, taaɓin taat Tanni kaawtu a naa taaɓiye-at, nu aawaatɗo walla ? »
43018012	Min ŋaar-ak, askirna iŋ tatkuwco, iŋ askirin ku agindaw ku Yuudinnar okin̰co, ŋu obiig Iisa ho ŋu ɗuuniiga.
43018013	Hiyya, ŋu iyiijig ja ɗo gem rakki, siŋji Han. Ŋaar gay, takan̰ daaciy ta Kayip. Ɗo elig taar-at, Kayip ko mee satkiner ka tatko.
43018014	Ŋaar ko kaak taaƴig agindaw ku Yuudinnar aman : « Guna ya gem rakki di mat ɗo bi ka gee okin̰co. »
43018015	Simon Piyer iŋ giji maajirin̰ce ka pey aaɗaag Iisa. Maajirin̰ce ka pey-ak gay, mee satkiner ka tatko ibingiga. Paa ko, ŋa un̰jitu iŋ Iisa ɗo ger ka mee satkiner ka tatko.
43018016	Kar Piyer gay pey kara ɗo bit ka botildi. Hiyya, maajirin̰ce kaak mee satkiner ka tatko ibingiy-ak amiltu kara. Ŋa kaawiitit ɗo daatik taat gooƴa botol a taa rasin̰ Piyer yaa un̰je oki.
43018017	Wiktin taat Piyer un̰jiyo, daatik taat gooƴa botol-at indiig aman : « Kiŋke oki min maajirnay ku gem-aŋ ɗoo ? » Piyer telkiitit aman : « Ha’a, nun maajirin̰ceyɗo. »
43018018	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, us diyaw. Paa ko, gay riyor iŋ askirin kuuk gooƴa wer-ak biƴtu ako ŋu ooriyo. Piyer sa peytu iŋ ŋuura, ŋa ooriyo.
43018019	Kar mee satkiner ka tatik indiig Iisa ɗo bi ka maajirnay ho ɗo bi ka ɓilde kaak ŋa ɓildiy gee.
43018020	Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Nun kaaw bal cigile ɗo uŋco ka gee okin̰co. Iŋ menaw, nu ɓildigiy gee ɗo geray ku salaaner ho ɗo ger ka Buŋdi. Nu bal kaawe maan tak-tak iŋ cigile.
43018021	Kar maa di ki indiin pey ? Ya ki rakaw, indig ja gee kuuk dorintu. Ŋuur iban taat nu kaawiico. »
43018022	Ɗo kaawoy taar-at, askirin̰ce rakki min kuuk peya ɗo wer-ak baasiig Iisa. Ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Ampaa kat ki telkiiji ɗo mee satkiner ka tatko walla ? »
43018023	Kar Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Ya nu kaaw jookumo, gaarduug ja nigindu. Kar ya kaaw taat nu kaawtu-an kat ɗo werti gay, maa di ki baasiinu ? »
43018024	Min ŋaar-ak, Han n̰aamiig Iisa ɗo Kayip, mee satkiner ka tatko. Wiktin taat ŋa n̰aamiijiga-ak, Iisa, ŋu bal ipirin̰ misa.
43018025	Wiktin taar-at, Piyer gay oora misa ako. Kar ŋu indiig pey aman : « Kiŋke oki min maajirnay ku gem-aŋ ɗoo ? » Kar Piyer gay tatirtu aman : « Ha’a, nun maajirin̰ceyɗo. »
43018026	Kar min gay riyor kuuk gina riy ɗo mee satkiner ka tatko-ak, goy gem rakki jaamay ka gem kaak Piyer ɗukumtu ɗeŋgey-aka. Gem-ak ɗiyiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Kiŋke-aŋ, nu balin̰ tale iŋ Iisa ɗo jineendi walla ? »
43018027	Piyer gay tatirtu pey. Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, kokir boogtu.
43018028	Kar iŋ kawtir kawtira, ŋu amiltu min ɗo ger ka Kayip ho ŋu iyiig Iisa ɗo ger ka Pilaat, tatkaw ka Room. Kar agindaw ku Yuudinnar-ak bal un̰je, asaan ŋu rakaaɗo nige ziŋkico uudin taat gaanuunco ɗiytu awalle min ŋuu tee tee ka Paakdi.
43018029	Ampaa ko, Pilaat amiliico, ŋa dakiig gas kara. Kar ŋa indiig aman : « Gem-aŋ, ku gasji maa kaawra ? »
43018030	Agindaw-ak telkiiji aman : « Ya gem-aŋ kat bal nige-ak, zer ni iyaajigɗo anne. »
43018031	Pilaat gay ɗiyiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, oboŋga ku maaniiko, ku ɓaayiy deen kaawoy uudin taat gaanuunko ɗiytu. » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Nin bal gine botol taat nii dee gemo. »
43018032	Iisa gay kaaw ja ko maman ŋa asiy mate. Ansii kat, uudin taat agindaw-ak kaawtu, kaaw-at astu ɗo werti.
43018033	Min ŋaar-ak, Pilaat un̰jitu pey ɗo geriy, ŋa koliig Iisa, kar ŋa indiig aman : « Has, kiŋke-aŋ ko sultan ka Yuudinnar walla ? »
43018034	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Kaawon̰-an, ki meen̰jin di pakire wala gee ku pey kat kaawjiŋ bir ? »
43018035	Pilaat gay kaawiiji aman : « Ya lociŋ-ak, nu Yuudin̰ce walla ? Ŋuur gee ku darren̰ iŋ agindaw ku gay satkiner kat iyin̰ciŋ lotu. Kaawor ja, ki nig maa ? »
43018036	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Jarɗor tanto, taar ɗo duniinerro anne. Zer ya jarɗor kat anne-ak, wiktin-an, geendu jilintu ko min ɗo pise ku agindaw ku Yuudinnar. Kar gay, jarɗor tanto, taar ɗo duniinerro anne. »
43018037	Kar Pilaat indiig aman : « Ya pa-ak, kiŋke-aŋ ko sultan ɗoo ? » Iisa gay telkiiji aman : « Kiŋ meen̰jiŋ kaawit ko. Nun, ŋu weentu ho nu as ɗo duniiner asaan naa gaare seene. Gee kuuk raka seene, ŋuur cokiya kaawor. »
43018038	Pilaat indiig Iisa aman : « Seen gay taar maa ? » Min Pilaat kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa dakiig gas pey Yuudinna-aku ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Gem-aŋ, nu balji gase kaaw taat yaa iye muutuy.
43018039	Kar gay, kuŋ gin aadin taat nu pikgiyko gem ka daŋaayner ɗo iidin ta Paakdi. Kar diŋ gay, ku raka naako pikin̰ sultan ka Yuudinnar walla ? »
43018040	Ŋuur gay kooliiji aman : « Ha’a, ŋaarro. Ni raka Barabaas ! » Sando, Barabaas-ak gay, ŋaar bandin̰ce.
43019001	Pilaat un̰jitu pey ɗo geriy. Ŋa ɗiyiico ɗo askirnar a ŋuu koocin̰ Iisa iŋ korɗiŋgo.
43019002	Askirna-ak siyiiji jakumne ta sultinniidi ta jamiidi. Iŋ ajimiye kaak ŋu ajimiyiiga-ak, ŋu isiijit ɗo kaay. Kar pey ŋu isiiji batik ta sultinniidi taat dindiko.
43019003	Ŋu ɓaawiiji moota, kar ŋu ooyiiji aman : « Gem kol sultan ka Yuudinnar, seek ! » Kar ŋu koociiga.
43019004	Pilaat amiltu pey kara. Ŋa ɗiyiico ɗo Yuudinnar aman : « Taloŋ ! Naakoŋ imilin̰ Iisa kara. Ansi-ak, kuu ibine kadar nu balji gase oorin taat yaa iye muutuy. »
43019005	Hiyya, Iisa amiltu kara iŋ jakumne ta jamiidi ɗo kaay ho iŋ batik ta dindik-at ɗo ziy. Pilaat ɗiyiico aman : « Aŋ gemko ! »
43019006	Min agindaw ku gay satkiner iŋ askirin kuuk gooƴa ger ka Buŋdi taliig Iisa-ak, ŋu teestu koole aman : « Ɗooɗig ka etor ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! » Pilaat gay kaawiico aman : « Icoŋ ku maaniiko dakoŋ ɗooɗ ka etor, asaan nun-aŋ balji gase oorin taat yaa iye muutuy. »
43019007	Gee-ak telkiiji aman : « Nin gin gaanuun kaak kaawa a ŋaa mate, asaan ŋa ɗiya a ŋa Roŋ ka Buŋdi. »
43019008	Min Pilaat dortu pa-ak, kolaw obiig pey dakin paka.
43019009	Ŋa un̰jitu pey ɗo geriy. Kar ŋa dakiig gas Iisa ho ŋa indiig aman : « Kiŋke asa min momo ? » Kar Iisa gay balji telke yoo maanna.
43019010	Min ŋaar-ak, Pilaat ɗiyiiji aman : « Lotu kat ki rakaaɗo kaawe ? Ki ibanno a nu gin botol taat naan̰ pike wal taat naan̰ ɗooɗe ka etor walla ? »
43019011	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Ya ki gin botol taat kiin ɗooɗin ka etor-ak, illa taat Buŋ beriijiŋ min kuwa. Iŋ taar-ak kat, ŋaar kaak berintu ɗo pisin̰jiŋ ic kaƴa pak tan̰jiŋ. »
43019012	Min ŋaar-ak, Pilaat bariya ko botol taat ŋaa pikin̰ Iisa di. Kar Yuudinna gay tees pey koole aman : « Ya ki pikig gem-aŋ, ki royayɗo ka sultan ka tatik ka Room ! Asaan gem kaak gina ziy sultan-ak, ŋaar adiney ka sultan ka tatik ka Room ! »
43019013	Min Pilaat dortu pa-ak, ŋaa imiliig Iisa kara. Ŋa goytu ɗo wer ka seriiner kaak ŋu pintu iŋ dambay. Wer ka seriiner-ak, Yuudinna kolaag iŋ kaawco a « Gabbata ».
43019014	Sando, ka kawtinti gay iidin ta Paakdi. Pat ot ƴiriyo. Ɗo wer-ak, Pilaat kaawiico aman : « Taloŋ, aŋ sultinko ! »
43019015	Ŋuur gay teestu pey koole aman : « Ibiniy weriy ! Ibiniy weriy ! Ɗooɗig ka etor ! » Pilaat indiig aman : « Ku raka naa ɗooɗin̰ sultinko ka etor walla ? » Agindaw ku gay satkiner telkiiji aman : « Ni bal gine sultan ka pey. Sultinni-ak, ŋaar ko sultan ka tatik ka Room-aŋ di. »
43019016	Hiyya, Pilaat beriicog Iisa, ŋu ɓaayiy ɗooɗin̰ ka etor. Kar askirna-ak obiiga ho ŋu ɗeettu iŋ ŋaara.
43019017	Wiktin taat Iisa amiliy min ɗo geegirdi-ak, meen̰ji di icig etoy kaak ŋu ɓaayiy ɗooɗin̰ji. Ŋa aaniytu wer kaak ŋu ɓaayiy ɗooɗin̰ji-aka. Wer-ak, ŋu kolaag a « Ɗawik ta kaar » ho iŋ kaaw ta Yuudinnar gay, ŋu kolaag a « Golgota ».
43019018	Min ŋu ottu ɗo wer-ak, askirna-ak ɗooɗiig Iisa ka etor. Ŋu ɗooɗtu pey gee seer ka atiydi, rakki ɗo meeday, rakki gay ɗo n̰ugilay.
43019019	Pilaat ɗiyiico ɗo geen̰ji a ŋuu siire maanna, ŋuu ɗooɗin̰ ka etoy ka Iisa. Maanna-ak, ŋu siirji aman : « Iisa kaak min Nazareet, sultan ka Yuudinnar. »
43019020	Yuudinna dakina garkiyiig maan kaak ŋu siirtu-aka, asaan wer kaak ŋu ɗooɗiig Iisa-ak mootan di iŋ geeger. Ho siire-ak sa, ŋu siirig iŋ kaaw ta Yuudinnar, iŋ ta Roominar ho iŋ ta Greknar.
43019021	Min agindaw ku gay satkiner ku Yuudinnar taliig maan kaak Pilaat siirtu-ak, ŋu ɓaawiiji. Ŋu ɗiyiiji aman : « Maa di ki siiriy aman : ‟ Sultan ka Yuudinnar ” ? Nin raka kii siire aman : ‟ Gem-aŋ ɗiya a ŋa sultan ka Yuudinnar. ” »
43019022	Pilaat gay telkiico aman : « Kaaw taat nu siirtu-at, nu siirta. »
43019023	Askirin gay, min ŋu ɗooɗiig Iisa ka etor, ŋu ɗeeɗiit kesuuney werin pooɗ, ay gem di ictu wer rakki. Kar ŋa gin pey batik yaarko taat bal orpe, ŋu azit werti rakki di min kuwa yoo baata. Taar sa ŋu iciita.
43019024	Ɗo bit kanti ko, askirin kaawtu benannico aman : « Dakinte eerintiɗo. Kan̰jinte kan̰jen di. Gem kaak ta galji di yaa icinti. » Ampaa ko, kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner astu ɗo werti aman : « Ŋu ɗeeɗit kesuuner ho ŋu kan̰je iŋ batkor ta yaarko. »
43019025	Moota iŋ et kaak ŋu ɗooɗiig Iisa-ak gay, daaɗ peya eɗe, ŋuur atan̰ Iisa, iŋ booti Mariyam, iŋ daaciy ta Kilopaas ho iŋ Mariyam taat min geeger ka Magdala.
43019026	Wiktin taat Iisa taliit yaaco ho ŋa taliig maajirin̰cey kaak ŋa elgiyo peya ɗo serpiti-ak, ŋa ɗiyiitit aman : « Iya, aŋ ko roŋke. »
43019027	Kar ŋa kaawiiji pey ɗo maajirin̰cey aman : « An ko yaako. » Min ŋaar-ak di, maajirin̰ce-ak iyiit atan̰ Iisa ɗo geriy.
43019028	Min ŋaar-ak, Iisa kaawtu aman : « Ibin diyaanu. » Ka seener, ŋa ibina ko kadar riyoy gaase, ŋa kaawtu pa-ak a kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner yaa ase ɗo werti.
43019029	Ɗo wer-ak gin bardil miin iŋ maam tooro ku bin̰di. Askirna-ak ictu bit ka jarɗor, ŋu ɗuuniit ɗo korɗiŋ ta et kaak ŋu koliy « Isoop ». Ŋu coopiig ɗo maamar, kar ŋu n̰aamiijig ɗo bi ka Iisa.
43019030	Min Iisa aawiiga, ŋa ɗiytu aman : « Hiyya, ta nece. » Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa oniig kaay ho ruwwiney amiltu.
43019031	Uudin taat ŋu siya ko ziŋkico ɗo ƴiriy ta sabitdi, agindaw ku Yuudinnar bal rake a momtin kuuk ŋu ɗooɗtu-ak yaa goye pey kuwaŋ di. Asaan ƴiriy ta sabit-at, taar yaarko. Hiyya, ŋu kaawiiji ɗo Pilaat a ŋaaco kaawe ɗo askirnar ŋuu ɓaa ƴiimin̰ asin̰co ku gee kuuk ŋu ɗooɗtu-aku.
43019032	Hiyya, askirna-ak ɓaawtu. Gee kuuk ŋu ɗooɗig iŋ Iisa-ak, ŋu ƴiimiicog asin̰co. Ay gem di, ŋu ƴiimig asin̰ji rakki rakki.
43019033	Wiktin taat ŋu otiiji ɗo Iisa gay, ŋu gasig ko ŋa mate. Min pa-ak, ŋu bal ko ƴiimin̰ asin̰ji.
43019034	Kar min askirna-ak, rakki ictu garta, ŋa waaciig Iisa ɗo serpey ho baar iŋ amay amiltu.
43019035	Gem kaak siirkoŋ gamin-aŋ talig iŋ odinay ho kaawoy-an ka seener. Ŋaar meen̰ji iban kadar kaawoy taat ŋa kaawiy-an ka seener ho ŋa kaawiy a kuŋko oki yaa aamine.
43019036	Kar awalle gay, ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : « Yoo kaasoy rakki sa, ŋu bal ƴiimin̰ji. » Maanna-aŋ kuuniytu asaan kaaw-an yaa ase ɗo werti.
43019037	Ɗo wer ka pey ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : « Ƴiriy rakki, odinco, ŋu asa aaniyin̰ ɗo ŋaar kaak ŋu waacig ɗo serpey. »
43019038	Min gamin-aŋ birtu, gin gem rakki min geeger ka Arimate kaak ŋu kolaag Yuusup. Ŋaar sa maajirin̰cey ka Iisa. Kar ŋa bal kaawe ɗo geemir, asaan ŋa gina kolaw ɗo agindaw ku Yuudinnar. Ŋa ɓaawiiji ɗo Pilaat ho ŋa dakiig inda a ŋaaji rase botol, ŋa ɓaayiy paayin̰ zi ka Iisa. Hiyya, Pilaat ooytu Yuusup ɓaa paayin̰ji, ŋa ɓaayiy tiisin̰ji.
43019039	Kar gin pey gem ka pey, ŋu kolaag Nikodeem. Ŋaar ko kaak awalle ɓaawji ɗak ko ɗo Iisa iŋ aando-aka. Ŋaar gay iytu itir kaak ŋa amsig buw ku atay kuuk ŋu koliy « miir » iŋ « alowes ». Itir ŋaar-ak, oomiŋkuwiy yaa nece iŋ jeliŋ ka amiydi.
43019040	Yuusup iŋ Nikodeem ictu jarɗo, ŋu kockiciitit itir uudin taat Yuudinna gingiy ya ŋu tiisa geen̰co, kar ŋu maliyiig zi ka Iisa iŋ kapanne.
43019041	Ɗo wer kaak ŋu ɗooɗiig Iisa-ak gay gin jineene rakki. Kar atta ɗo jineendi-ak gay gin magin taat ŋu baltit un̰je misa gemo.
43019042	Uudin taat ka kawtinti sabit ko, pey magin-at sa moota di-ak, hiyya, ŋu un̰jiig zi ka Iisa ɗo maginer-ata.
43020001	Ƴiriy ta dumaas, Mariyam taat min Magdala saktu, ta ɓaayiy ɗo maginer. Min ta ottu, ta tala kar dambi kaak ŋu ɗibiriit magin-ak, ŋu tuŋkilig serpiya.
43020002	Hiyya, ta yeeptu iŋ gaɗti, ta dakiig gas kun̰ Simon Piyer iŋ maajirin̰ kaak Iisa elgiyo ho ta kaawiico aman : « Ŋu imilig Rabbinte, kar ni ibanno wer kaak ŋu diyiiga. »
43020003	Min Piyer iŋ maajirin̰ce-ak doriit kaawti, ŋu uctu ho ŋu aaniytu ɗo maginer.
43020004	Ɗo ɓaan̰co-ak, ŋu gaɗa di. Kar gay, maajirin̰ce kaak rakki-ak gaɗa pakgig Piyer. Ampaa ko, ŋa ogiriiji ɗo maginer.
43020005	Kar ŋa ƴogiltu ɗo maginer. Ŋa taltu jarɗaɗ di goy keɗer, kar gay, ŋa bal un̰je.
43020006	Kar ba aar, Simon Piyer sa ottu. Min ŋa ote, ŋaar-ak un̰jitu kalak ɗo maginer. Ŋaar sa taliig jarɗaɗ kuuk goy keɗer-aku.
43020007	Ŋa taliit pey jariɗ taat ŋu maliyiig kaay ka Iisa. Jarɗo-at, ŋu bal diyin sawa iŋ jarɗaɗ ku awalle-aku. Kar gay, ŋu maliyit keetiti ho ŋu diyig keetiti.
43020008	Min ŋaar-ak, maajirin̰ kaak ogirji ɗo Piyer ɗo maginer-ak un̰jitu oki. Ŋa taltu iŋ odinay ho ŋa aamintu kadar Iisa nooye.
43020009	Ka seener gay, yoo ƴiriy taar-ata, maajirin bal ibinin kaaw taat ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner taat ɗiya a Iisa asa nooye min ɗatik ta gee kuuk mate.
43020010	Hiyya, maajirin kuuk seer-ak yeeptu ɗo geriyco.
43020011	Mariyam taat min Magdala-at gay yeeptu pey ɗo maginer. Ta peyiy ɗo bit ka maginer ho ta aliyo. Iŋ alinti, ta ƴogiltu atti ka maginer
43020012	ho ta taltu ɗubal ku Buŋdi seer kuuk is batik portik kar. Ŋu goy ɗo wer kaak ŋu diyiig zi ka Iisa, rakki iŋ kaay, rakki iŋ asin̰ji.
43020013	Ɗubal ku Buŋdi-ak indiit aman : « Kaŋ ala maa ga ? » Taar gay telkiico aman : « Ŋu imilig Rabbiner, kar nu ibanno wer kaak ŋu diyiiga. »
43020014	Min ta kaawtu pa-ak, ta kolsitu ho ta taliig Iisa peya ɗo wer-aka. Kar gay, ta bal ibinin̰ji.
43020015	Kar Iisa indiit aman : « Kaŋ ala maa ga ? Ka bariya waa ? » Mariyam gay ginig a ŋa gay gooƴe jineendi, ta ɗiyiiji aman : « Gem kol siŋji, ya ŋa kiŋ kat icig sa, gaaror weriy, nu ɓaayiy icin̰ji. »
43020016	Iisa koliit iŋ siŋti aman : « Mariyam ! » Ta kolsitu ho ta kaawiiji iŋ kaaw ta Yuudinnar aman : « Rabbuni ! » Ansi-ak aman : « Gem kol Tacco ! »
43020017	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋa ɗiyiitit aman : « Dakin obinduɗo, asaan nu bal coone misa ɗo Tanni. Kar gay, dakig gas siŋtar, ɗiyco a nun coonaaji ɗo Tanni kaak Takko oki. Nun coona ɗo wer ka Buŋdu kaak Buŋko oki. »
43020018	Hiyya, Mariyam taat min Magdala-at yeeptu, ta dakiig gas maajirnay ho ta miniig aman : « Nu talig Rabbine. » Kar ta osiicot kaaw taat ŋa kaawiititi.
43020019	Ɗo dumaas taar-at di, iŋ maako, maajirin n̰umtu ɗo ger rakki. Ger-ak, nam ŋu ɗibirig iŋ kerle min atta, asaan ŋu gina kolaw ɗo agindaw ku Yuudinnar. Ɗo wiktin taat ŋu goyiyo, Iisa astu, ŋa peytu ɗo ɗatikco ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Aapiy taa goye iŋ kuŋko ! »
43020020	Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa gaariico pisin̰ji iŋ serpey. Min maajirin taliig Rabbin-ak, aditco gintu portiko.
43020021	Iisa ɗiyiico pey aman : « Aapiy taa goye iŋ kuŋko ! Uudin taat Tanni tabirintu ɗo ɗatikko, nunu oki tabiraako ɗo adiy ka kiɗar, ku ɓaayiy gine riyor. »
43020022	Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa biƴiriico usu ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Ooyon Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
43020023	Nu ɗiyaako, ya ku saamiy zunuubinna ku gemor, Buŋ sa yaaji saamiye. Kar ya ku pooc saamiye zunuubinna ku gemor gay, Buŋ sa saamiyaajiɗo. »
43020024	Ƴiriy taat Iisa asiico ɗo maajirnay-ak, rakki minninco ginno. Ŋaar siŋji Tooma kaak ŋu koliy oki Didim.
43020025	Kar ba aar Tooma astu. Een̰ji kaawiiji aman : « Ni talig Rabbine ! » Kar Tooma gay telkiico aman : « Ya nun kon di bal tale delin ku pontinar kuuk ɗo pisin̰ji, ya nu bal n̰aame kormor ɗo delin ku pontinar ho ya nu bal n̰aame pisindu ɗo del taat ɗo serpey, nu aaminaaɗo bat. »
43020026	Astu suugin ta pey, ƴiriy ta dumaasdi, maajirnay ku Iisa n̰umtu pey ɗo ger-aka. Kar ƴiriy taar-at, Tooma goya. Ger-ak, ŋu ɗibirig pey iŋ kerle min atta. Kar Iisa asiico pey, ŋa peytu ɗatikco ho ŋa kaawiico aman : « Aapiy taa goye iŋ kuŋko ! »
43020027	Kar Iisa ɗiyiiji ɗo Tooma aman : « Kiŋ kaak meela-aŋka, talig pisindu ho n̰aam kormon̰ anne. N̰aamig pey pisin̰jiŋ ɗo del ta serper. Min ƴiriyta-aŋ, pey ko min meelo ho aaman ! »
43020028	Tooma telkiiji aman : « Kiŋke Rabbiner ho Buŋdu ! »
43020029	Iisa ɗiyiiji aman : « Ki aamintu asaan ki talintu. Kar gay, nu ɗiyaajiŋ, galal ɗo gee kuuk balin talindu ho aamine. »
43020030	Iisa gin pey gamin kuuk ajbay dakina kuuk maajirnay taltu iŋ odinco. Kar gay, waan bal siirin̰ atta ɗo Kitamne-anta.
43020031	Kar gay, gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu siirtu-aŋ, ŋu siirig a kuu aamine kadar Iisa, ŋaar Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu, ho ŋaar ko Roŋ ka Buŋdi. Ya ku aamin ɗo kaaw-anta, iŋ siŋ kun̰ji, kuu gase goye kaak taɓ.
43021001	Ba aar, Iisa bayniico pey ɗo maajirnay ɗo bi ka barre kaak ŋu koliy Tiberiyaad. Taloŋ maman ŋa bayniico.
43021002	Maajirnay ku Iisa peesira goy werco rakki. Ŋuur gay kun̰ Simon Piyer, iŋ Tooma kaak ŋu koliy Didim, iŋ Natanayeel kaak min Kana kiɗ ka Galile, iŋ koogin ku Zebede ho iŋ maajirin seer ku pey.
43021003	Simon Piyer ɗiyiico ɗo een̰ji aman : « Nu ɓaa cabe boosi. » Ŋu kaawiiji aman : « Gi ɓaa sawa. » Hiyya, ŋu daktu n̰ep markabco ho ŋu ɗeettu. Ŋu daktu tees cabe. Kar ɗo aando taar-at, ŋu bal gase yoo maanna.
43021004	Min wer wale, Iisa peyiico ɗo goŋgumor. Kar maajirnay gay bal ibinin̰ji.
43021005	Iisa indiig aman : « Gem kol kooginay, has ku bal ice yoo maanna ? » Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Hii ! Yoo maanna, ni bal ice. »
43021006	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, pikkiron ribinko iŋ pise ka meeda, ek di, kuu gase. » Hiyya, ŋu pikkiriit ribinco uudin taat ŋa kaawiico. Kar ta miintu nam ŋu gedarro ɗaan̰inti.
43021007	Maajirin̰ kaak Iisa elgiy-ak ɗiyiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Gem kaak kaawte-aŋ, ŋa Rabbine ! » Min Piyer dortu a ŋa Rabbin-ak, ŋa isiit batkoy taat ŋa cimtu wiktin taat ŋa ɓaay cabe ho ŋa galtu ɗo amiydi.
43021008	Maajirin ku pey-ak gay ɗaan̰iit ribinco iŋ boosti ho ŋu coktu ɗo goŋgumor iŋ markabco. Asaan goŋgum serekɗo, ŋaa nece ar kociŋgil miy seer di.
43021009	Min ŋu paaytu keɗer, ŋu taltu ako taat ŋu leetit boos kuwa ho ŋu taltu pey mappa.
43021010	Iisa ɗiyiico aman : « Iyondu min boosko kuuk ku soktu-aŋku. »
43021011	Hiyya, Simon Piyer coktu ka markabar, ŋa ɗaan̰iit ribin keɗer. Atta ta gin boos ku aginda miya iŋ orok beeƴ iŋ subba (153). Kar iŋ dakinaw ta boosir-aŋ sa, ribinco bal eere.
43021012	Iisa koliig aman : « Asoŋ, kuu tee. » Hiyya, ŋu astu. Kar waanco bal gece indin̰ aman : « Kiŋ waa ? » asaan ŋuur iban ko kadar ŋa Rabbine.
43021013	Iisa sin̰jitu moota, ŋa ictu mappa ho ŋa ɗeeɗiicoga. Kar ŋa beriico pey boosi.
43021014	Baynin̰ji ŋaar-ak, ka subbiŋkar ko ɗo maajirnay min ŋa nooytu.
43021015	Min ŋu teetu, Iisa indiig Simon Piyer aman : « Simon, roŋji ka Yaaya, has ki elgin pak een̰jiŋ walla ? » Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : « Hii, Rabbiner, ki iban kadar nu elgiciŋ. » Iisa kaawiiji pey aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, tal kaaco ka roŋ tamgir-aŋku. »
43021016	Kar pey Iisa indiig ɓaayiy ka seeriŋkar aman : « Simon, roŋji ka Yaaya, has ki elgiinu walla ? » Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : « Hii, Rabbiner, ki iban kadar nu elgiciŋ. » Iisa ɗiyiiji aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, tal kaaco ka roŋ tamgir-aŋku. »
43021017	Kar pey Iisa indiig ɓaayiy ka subbiŋkar aman : « Simon, roŋji ka Yaaya, has ki elgiinu walla ? » Wer-ak, Piyer adiy nigtu ɗo bi kaak Iisa indig dees subba aman : « Has ki elgiinu walla ? » Kar ŋa telkiiji ɗo Iisa aman : « Rabbiner, ki iban gamin okin̰co. Ki iban kadar nu elgiciŋ. » Iisa gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Di ŋaar-ak, tal kaaco ka roŋ tamgir-aŋku.
43021018	Cokay ! Naan̰ kaawe seene. Ɗo ɗubiluwin̰, kiŋ meen̰jiŋ ɗuuna karraabiney, ki ɓaayiy wer kaak ki rakiyo. Kar ya ki zaɓ gay, waan ka pey kat yaan̰ ɗuunin̰ji ho ŋaan̰ iye ɗo wer kaak ki rakiyɗo ɓaawe. »
43021019	Iisa kaawiy pa-ak, asaan ŋa raka gaare maman Piyer asiy mate ɗo oziliik ta Buŋdi. Hiyya, min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa ɗiyiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Aaɗnu ! »
43021020	Piyer kolsitu ho ŋa taliig maajirin̰ kaak Iisa elgiy-ak aaɗaag min aarco. Ŋaar ko kaak awalle onji ɗak ko ɗo Iisa ɗo wiktin ta teen̰co ho ŋa indiig aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, ŋa waa kaak yaan̰ isine ? »
43021021	Min Piyer taliig maajirin̰ce-ak, ŋa indiig Iisa aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney, di ŋaar gay, maa yaaji ase ɗo kaay ? »
43021022	Iisa telkiiji aman : « Ya nun kat raka a ŋaa goye paa nam naa yeepe ɗo duniiner gay, kiŋ maa isgiciŋ ? Kiŋ aaɗin di ! »
43021023	Ɗo wer-ak, kabarre totiriico ɗo ɗatik ta siŋtar a maajirin̰ce ŋaar-ak mataaɗo tak-tak. Sando, Iisa gay ɗiyiiji ɗo Piyer aman : « Ya nun kat raka a ŋaa goye paa nam naa yeepe ɗo duniiner gay, kiŋ maa isin̰ciŋ ? » Yampa, ŋa balji ɗiye a maajirin̰ce-ak mataaɗo.
43021024	Ŋa maajirin̰ kaak Iisa kaawiy biy-aŋ ko kaak kaawiig gamin-aŋku ho ŋa siiriig siire. Di nin gay iban kadar ŋa kaawa seene.
43021025	Iisa gin pey gamin dakina ku pey. Zer, ya ŋu siiraag gamin-aŋ okin̰co-ak, nu ibina kadar adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji gediraaɗo icin̰co.
44001001	Gem kol siŋji Teyopil, nu siir ko ɗo maktumner taat awalle gamin okin̰co kuuk Iisa Masi gintu ho kaawin okin̰co kuuk ŋa gaartu min Buŋ n̰aamiiga
44001002	nam ƴiriy taat Buŋ cooniig ka samaaner. Min ŋa bal coone misa, iŋ gudurre ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi kat ŋa doɓtu gee a ŋuu goye paliinna, kar ŋa gaariico maan kaak ŋuu gine.
44001003	Ka seener, min ŋa nooytu, ŋa bayinco loco. Ŋa goy iŋ ŋuura mena orok pooɗ ho ŋa gaariico gamin dakina kuuk gaara kadar ka seener, ŋa goy iŋ odinay. Ŋa kaawco ɗo bi ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi.
44001004	Ƴiriy rakki, wiktin taat ŋu rakiy tee, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Dakoŋ amilenno min Zeruzaleem, illa ku eren̰ ja maan kaak Takko Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaako bere. Maan ŋaar-ak, nu kaawkoŋga ko.
44001005	Ar kaak awalle Yaaya batiziyiig gee iŋ amay, diŋ gay, ɗak ko mena sooɗ di, Buŋ yaako batiziyiŋko iŋ Ruwwiney. »
44001006	Ƴiriy rakki, gee n̰umtu iŋ Iisa Masi ho ŋu indiig aman : « Rabbine, a ɗo wiktin anta-an ko, kii berin pey darjin pisin̰co ɗo gee ku Israyeel ga ? »
44001007	Iisa gay telkiico aman : « Ŋaar Tanni iŋ izinney kat ŋa diyiit wiktine. Kar kuŋ gay, ku bal gine botol taat kuu ibininti.
44001008	Kar gay, wiktin taat Ruwwin ta Buŋdi asko paaya, ku asiy gase gudurre taat ku asiy kaawe bi kanto ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem, ɗo kiɗ okin̰ji ka Zuude iŋ ka Samari, ho ɗo ay wer ka duniiner, nam kuu gaasin̰ wer okin̰ji. »
44001009	Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, Buŋ cooniig Iisa Masi min ɗo uŋco, kuwa ka samaaner. Wiktin taat ŋa cooniyo, uce asiig goota nam ŋu talgigɗo tak-tak.
44001010	Wiktin taat ŋu wakiliy kocile-ak, tala kar gee seer kesuunco portiko ɗo serpico.
44001011	Kar ŋu kaawiico aman : « Gee ku Galile, maa di ku peyiy kaƴ asiŋko ampa, ku kociliy samaane ? Ŋa Iisa kaak Buŋ coontu kuwa-ak di, yeepin̰ji sa asa gine ar kaak ku taliig ŋa coontu uŋko-aŋ di. »
44001012	Min gee ku seer-ak ɗeettu, maajirna paaytu min ka koot ka Olibiyennar, ŋu yeeptu Zeruzaleem. Zeruzaleem mootan di, yaa nece ar kilomeetir rakki.
44001013	Min ŋu ottu Zeruzaleem, ŋu un̰jitu geero ho ŋu coktu kuwa ka gusuurdi, wer kaak ŋu n̰umgiyo. Ɗo wer-ak, goy Piyer, Yaaya, Zaak iŋ Andre, Pilip iŋ Tooma, Bartelemi iŋ Matiye, Zaak roŋ ka Alpe, Simon kaak mala ɗo darrey, ho Zuud roŋ ka Zaak.
44001014	Ŋu n̰umgiy iŋ menaw ho ŋu indiy Buŋ iŋ gelbin rakki. Daaɗ daarin̰, iŋ Mariyam atan̰ Iisa, ho iŋ siŋtay ku Iisa, ŋuur sa goy iŋ ŋuura.
44001015	Ɗo mena ŋuur-ak, ƴiriy rakki, gee ku aamine n̰umtu maan ka miya iŋ orok seer (120) gemo. Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Piyer uctu ɗatikco ho ŋa kaawtu aman :
44001016	-
44001017	« Gem kol siŋtay, ku iban kadar Zuudas, ŋaar minninte ho riyoy sa ba serpite, kar gay, ŋaar di kaak ogirco ɗo ŋuur kuuk as obin̰ Iisa. Maanna-ak as ɗo weriy asaan Ruwwin ta Buŋdi kat kaawji ɗo Dawuud min awalle a ŋaa siirin ɗo Kitamner a taa kuuniye ampa.
44001018	Ŋu berji gurus ɗo Zuudas a ŋaaco gaarin̰ Iisa Masi. Iŋ gurus-ak, ŋa gidiytu morgo. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa zuɓkitu guɓ nam aadiy okin̰co sa booye.
44001019	Gee ku Zeruzaleem okin̰co doriig maan kaak asji ɗo kaay ka Zuudas. Ɗo saan taar-at ko, ŋu kolaag morgo-ak a ‟ Akeldamma. ” Pa-ak ɗiya aman : ‟ Morig ka baarir ” iŋ kaawco.
44001020	Cokiyon taat Sultan Dawuud siirtu ɗo maktumne ta Soom ɗo bi ka Zuudas aman : ‟ Geriy sa, ŋu poocin̰ji ho waan sa goyaajiɗo. ” Ŋa siir pey aman : ‟ Gem ka pey kat yaa icin riyoy. ”
44001021	Ɗo bi ka siirindi-aŋ ko, gii ice gem kaak yaa makin̰ Zuudas. Gem ŋaar-ak yaa gine min gee kuuk goy iŋ ginte ɗo wiktin taat Rabbin Iisa goyiy misa,
44001022	min wiktin taat Yaaya batiziyiiga nam ƴiriy taat Buŋ cooniig kuwa ka samaaner min ɗo ɗatikte. Illa gem-ak yaa kuuniye minninte ginte kuuk talig iŋ odinte nooye ka Rabbinte Iisa Masi. »
44001023	Min ŋu doriit kaaw ta Piyer-at, ŋu doɓtu gee seer : ka rakki, siŋji Yuusup Barsabaas ho gee gay kolaag Zustuus, ka seeriŋkar gay siŋji Matiyaas.
44001024	Min pa-ak, ŋu inditu Buŋ aman : « Rabbin ki ibingig gelbin ka gee okin̰co. Gaarni min gee ku seer-aŋ ka moon di ki doɓtu,
44001025	asaan gem-ak zer yaa goye paliine yaa makin̰ Zuudas. Yampa, Zuudas, ŋaar rasit ko riyoy ho ŋa ɗeet kar wer ka waaliyga. »
44001026	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, ŋu indiig Buŋ a ŋaaco doɓe ŋaar kaak ŋa rakiyo. Buŋ gay doɓiig Matiyaas. Hiyya, ŋa n̰umtu iŋ paliinna kuuk orok iŋ rakki.
44002001	Ƴiriy ta iidin ta Pantekoot astu, gee ŋuur-ak n̰umtu okin̰co ɗo wer rakki.
44002002	Koɗok di, ŋu dora kar hawin paaytu min kuwa ar us kaak abira gidi-gidi-gidi nam ŋa miniig wer ka ŋu goyiyo.
44002003	Ŋu tala kar maan amila ar lesas ku aki, lesas-ak totirtu ho ŋu paayiy ɗo ay kaa ka gemor.
44002004	Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gay miniigu ho ŋu teesit kat kaawe kaawin kuuk kun̰coɗo uudin taat ta gaariico a ŋuu kaawe.
44002005	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, ɗo Zeruzaleem, gin Yuudinna kuuk obit abaadinco bombo ho kuuk asa min darrinay okin̰co kuuk ɗo adiy ka kiɗar.
44002006	Min hawin-at kuuniytu, gee dakina dortu, ho ŋu astu talin̰ maanna-aka. Ŋu barjiltu asaan ŋu cokiya ŋuur kuuk kaawa kaawin kuuk kun̰coɗo ho ay gem di cokiya waan kaawa iŋ kaaw ta darrey.
44002007	Maanna-aŋ patiy kaƴco, taat ŋuu kaaweŋ ke ŋu ibanno. Ŋu indintu ziŋkico aman : « Okin̰co kuuk ku taliy-aŋ, ŋu min Galile di walla ?
44002008	Maman gee-aŋ di gediriy kaawe kaawin ku darrite ?
44002009	Minninte asa min ay darre : min Partees, min Medi, min Elaam, min Mezopotami, min Zuude, min Kapadoos, min Pont, ho min Aazi.
44002010	Goy kuuk as min Prizi, min Pampili, min Meser, min kiɗ ka Sireen ka Libi, min Room,
44002011	min Kreet ho min darre ta Sogindi. Minninte goy kuuk Yuudinna ho kuuk Yuudinnaɗo ku aaɗa abaadin ta Yuudinnar. Yampa, okinte, gii doraagu ŋu kaawa iŋ kaawin ku darriniyte ɗo bi ka gamin kuuk ajbay ku Buŋdi. »
44002012	Okin̰co, ŋu ajbiytu dakina, taat ŋu kaaweŋ ke ŋu ibanno. Ŋu inditu ziŋkico aman : « Taar-an gay baati maa kate ? »
44002013	Kar daarin̰ gay ajimiyaagu ho ŋu ɗiyiico aman : « Ŋu see aay di ! »
44002014	Min ŋu cokiytu kaaw taat gee kaawtu-ak, Piyer astu uŋco iŋ paliinna kuuk orok iŋ rakki, kar ŋa kaawiico raɗa ɗo geemir aman : « Gem kol siŋtay, kuŋ kuuk Yuudinna iŋ kuŋ okiŋko kuuk goy Zeruzaleem, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane ɗo taat naako kaawe ho girsonti ɗo taat kuuniyaw.
44002015	Ŋu kaawa a gee-aŋ see aaye. Kar sando, ka seenerro, taar kat daaɓinti pat parrik di !
44002016	Kar diŋ gay taat nabi Zowel kaawtu min awalle as kat ɗo werti.
44002017	Ŋa kaaw aman : ‟ An taat Buŋ kaawtu : Ɗo wiktin taat yaa ase, naako paayin Ruwwiner ay wer ɗo gee okin̰co. Kooginko ku miday iŋ ku daaɗi asiy kaawe ar nabiinna, ɗo ɗubilko ho ɗo gemsiko naaco bayne gamna ŋuu tale. Kar ɗo aginiykoŋ gay, naaco kaawe iŋ sooniika.
44002018	Ka seener, menaw ŋuur-ak, naa berin Ruwwiner ay wero ɗo gay riyor kuuk miday ho iŋ kuuk daaɗi. Paa kat, ŋu asiy gine nabiinnar.
44002019	Nu asiy gine gamin kuuk ajbay dakin ka samaaner ho keɗer oki. Gee asa tale baar, ako, iŋ uc ku mooydi.
44002020	Pat asa mate ho koy oki asa newse dindik ar baar, ja kat yaa ase ƴiriy ta Rabbiner. Ƴiriy taar-at yaarko ho gin darjine.
44002021	Wiktin taar-at, ay gem kaak inda Buŋ iŋ siŋ ku Rabbine yaa gase jile. ” »
44002022	Piyer ɗeeliit pey kaawoy aman : « Cokiyoŋ sellen̰, kuŋ gee ku Israyeel, ɗo taat naako kaawe. Ku iban tam kadar Buŋ gin gamin kuuk ajbay dakina ɗo ɗatikko. Ŋa ginig gamin-ak iŋ Iisa Masi kaak min geeger ka Nazareet asaan ŋaako gaare kadar ŋaar kat tabirga.
44002023	Gem-ak, Buŋ meen̰ji ko berkoŋ ɗo pisiŋko ar taat ŋa raktu. Ŋaar iban ko min awalle ho ŋa ictu niyine ɗo maan kaak ku asiiji gine ɗo kaay. Paa ko, ku beriig ɗo gee kuuk ibanno Buŋ a ŋuu ɗooɗin̰ ka etor kar ŋaa mate.
44002024	Kar Buŋ gay jilig min ɗo diiginey ho ŋa nooyig min ɗo muuti asaan muut ginno gudurre kaaci.
44002025	Ka seener gay, nabi Dawuud kaawko ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Nu talaag Rabbine uŋtu doo, ŋa goy ɗo serpar paa kat, nu galiyɗo.
44002026	Ɗo saan taar-at ko, adir gintu portiko ho kaawnar sa gintu gala, asaan nu iban kadar iŋ imaandu kat naa ɓaay jammiye ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
44002027	Asaan Rabbine, ki rasinno ba oole ho ki ooyaaɗo kadar nun gemon̰ yaa zooɗe keɗer.
44002028	Ki gaarduut botol taat bera goye ho kiidu miinin̰ adir iŋ galal ɗo wiktin taat naa goye iŋ kiŋke. ” »
44002029	Piyer ɗiytu pey aman : « Gem kol siŋtay, naako kaawe waraŋ, Migite Dawuud, ŋaar mate, ŋu diyiig ɗo girpi kaak yoo diŋ oki goy kar ɗo darrite.
44002030	Kar ŋaar gay nabiin̰ce ho ŋa iban kadar Buŋ togile a gem rakki min ɗo tambaay asa tee meennaw.
44002031	Sando, Dawuud ŋaar iban ko min awalle kadar Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu asa nooye. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋa ɗiytu aman : ‟ Buŋ bal rasin̰ji ɗo ɗatik ta gee kuuk mate ho ziy sa bal zooɗe ɗo maginer. ”
44002032	Ansii ko, nu kaawiiko aman : Buŋ nooyig Iisa Masi-aka, ho okintini, ni talig ŋa goy iŋ odinay.
44002033	Buŋ cooniiga, kar ŋa diyiig ɗo meeday, kar ŋa beriiji Ruwwiney taat ŋa kaawtu a ŋaaji bere. Maan kaak ŋa gastu min ɗo tacco, ŋa berintiŋ loni. Taar-an ko taat ku doriyo ho ku taliy diŋka.
44002034	Ya Dawuud meen̰ji sa, ŋaar bal coone kuwa. Kar gay, ŋa kaaw ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi aman : ‟ Rabbin kaawji ɗo Rabbiner aman : Asu goy ɗo meedar
44002035	nam wiktin taat naa asirin̰ adinen̰, ŋuu gine wer ka lee asin̰jiŋ. ”
44002036	Kar gay cokiyoŋ, kuŋ okiŋko gee ku Israyeel, ibinoŋ tam kadar ŋa Iisa Masi kaak ku ɗooɗtu ka etor-ak, ŋa ŋaar ko Buŋ diytu Rabbine ho Masi ! »
44002037	Min gee-ak doriit kaaw-at, ŋu barjiltu tak-tak, kar ŋu indiig Piyer iŋ een̰ji paliinna aman : « Gem kol siŋtay, ampa-ak gii gineŋ kat maman ? »
44002038	Piyer gay telkiico aman : « Ibinoŋ nigiŋko ho ay gemo, ŋu batiziyin̰ji iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi, kar Buŋ yaako saamiyin̰ zunuubinniko ho ŋaako bere Ruwwiney.
44002039	Asaan maan kaak ŋa kaawtu-ak, ŋaako berin̰ji yoo ɗo kooginko ho ɗo gee kuuk goy serek oki. Ka seener, ŋa berin̰ji ɗo gee okin̰co kuuk ŋaa kole. »
44002040	Piyer kaawco pey kaawin dakina a ŋuu ooyin̰co ho ŋaa iskin̰co. Ŋa ɗiyco pey aman : « Gee ku diŋka-aŋ, ŋuur samaanno. Pikoŋ botilco ! Ek di kuu gase jile. »
44002041	Gee kuuk ooy kaawin ku Piyer-ak, ŋu batiziyiigu. Ƴiriy taar-at, gee gaay nece alip subba n̰umtu iŋ gee kuuk aamin ɗo Iisa Masi.
44002042	Gee okin̰co kuuk aamine obit garaan-at bombo taat paliinna ɓildiigu a ŋuu goye ar siŋta kuuk tacco rakki. Ŋuu goye sawa : teen̰co, seen̰co sawa ho salaanco sa sawa.
44002043	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, paliinna gin gamin dakina kuuk ajbay iŋ gudurre ta Buŋdi ho gamin-aŋ un̰jiico kolaw ɗo geemir.
44002044	Gee kuuk aamin-ak, okin̰co kaawco rakki ho ŋu n̰umaag gaminco sawa.
44002045	Ŋu gidiyaag gaminco, ho gurusco-ak gay, ŋu ɗeeɗiig benannico, ay gem di ɗo wer kaak ŋaaji nece.
44002046	Kun kawta, ŋu n̰uma iŋ gelbin rakki ɗo hoosin ta ger ka Buŋdi. Ɗo geriyco, ŋu tiya sawa iŋ galal, bal ice ka ziŋkico.
44002047	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, ŋu oziliy Buŋ ho gee okin̰co elgiigu. Ansii ko, kun kawta, Rabbin jiliy gee ku pey asgiy n̰ume iŋ ŋuura.
44003001	Ƴiriy rakki, ɗo wiktin ta salaaner iŋ pat subba, Piyer iŋ Yaaya coona ɗo hoosin ta ger ka Buŋdi ka Yuudinnar.
44003002	Ŋa gin gem rakki ruŋgiye min ŋu weeyiiga. Kun kawta, ŋu iyiiga, ŋu diyiig ɗo botol ta ger ka Buŋdi taat ŋu koliy « Botol taat Samaane » a ŋaa oce min ɗo gee kuuk asa un̰je eɗe.
44003003	Wiktin taat gem-ak taliig kun̰ Piyer iŋ Yaaya asa un̰je eɗe-ak, ŋa indiigu aman : « Gem kol siŋtay, berondu ɗak ɗa. »
44003004	Min ŋu doriit kaaw-at, ŋu peytu ho ŋu taliig ƴalaaŋ. Kar Piyer ɗiyiiji aman : « Talni samaane. »
44003005	Ek di gem-ak taliig samaane. Ŋa hariya a wal ŋaa gaseŋ ko maan minninco.
44003006	Kar Piyer gay ɗiyiiji aman : « Wala nu gin gurus, wala nu gin daabne. Kar gay, maan kaak nu gintu di, naan̰ berin̰ji, iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi ka min Nazareet, nu kaawaajiŋ-aŋ : ucu ho jaawu ! »
44003007	Ɗo wer-ak, Piyer obiig pisin̰ji ka meeda, ŋa jaaliiga. Ta bite-aŋ di, asin̰ji ku gemor-ak paan̰tu tal
44003008	ho ŋa uctu parak, ŋa peytu tal, ho ŋa teesit jiwi. Ŋa un̰jitu iŋ paliinna ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋa jaawiyo, ŋa beriyo, ho ŋa oziliy Buŋ.
44003009	Gee okin̰co taliig ŋa jaawaw ho ŋa ozila Buŋ
44003010	ho ŋu ibiniig a ŋa gem kaak goygiy oce ɗo botol taat ŋu koliy a « Botol taat Samaane » ta ger ka Buŋdi. Okin̰co, ŋu ajbiytu tak-tak ɗo maan kaak kuuniyji ɗo gem-aka.
44003011	Piyer iŋ Yaaya un̰jitu ba tarmi ta ger ka Buŋdi taat ŋu koliy « Tarum ta Selemaan » ho gem kaak ŋu cooltu-ak ob baaco di. Gee dakina aaniyiigu iŋ gaɗco asaan ŋu ajbiy aale.
44003012	Min Piyer taliig ŋu asaaco-ak, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Gee ku Israyeel, maa di ku ajbiy pa ɗo gem kaak cool-aŋka ? Maa di ku taliini ampa ? Ku pakira a gem-ak, nin kat coolig iŋ gudurrini walla ? Wal a nin diŋ kat samaane ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ?
44003013	Ha’a, paaɗo ! Ŋa Buŋ ka Ibraayim, ka Isaaka, ho iŋ ka Yakuub, ŋaar di oki Buŋ ka aginiyte kaak berit darjiney ɗo gay riyoy Iisa. Kuŋ maaniikon di obiiga, ku iyiig ɗo uŋji ka Pilaat. Kar ɗo wiktin taat ŋa raka pikin̰ji, kuŋ gay pooce.
44003014	Ku indig ŋaako pike ŋaar kaak dee gemo ho kaak sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho bal nigeŋ gay, ku poocga.
44003015	Paa kat, ku deeyig ŋaar kaak bera goye. Kar Buŋ gay nooyig min ɗatik ta gee ku mate, nin gay saadinna.
44003016	Gem-aŋ coole iŋ gudurre ta siŋ ku Iisa. Nun gay aamin iŋ ŋaara ho paa kat, gem kaak ku taliyo ho ku ibiniy-aŋ cooltu-aŋka. Iŋ amaanne taat iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi kat, ŋa gastu gudurre tak-tak.
44003017	« Diŋ gay gem kol siŋtay, nu iban tam kuŋko ho iŋ aginduwko, pooce kaak ku poociig Iisa-ak asaan ku ibanno maanna.
44003018	Kar gay, ampa-ak, Buŋ necit kat taat ŋa kaawtu awalle iŋ biŋkico ku nabiinnar aman : ‟ Masi kaak naako tabire asa taaɓiye. ”
44003019	Diŋka-aŋ gay, ibinoŋ nigiŋko, rason botol ta samaanno ho aaɗoŋ Buŋ, kar ŋaako saamiyin̰ zunuubinniko.
44003020	Kar kat, Rabbin Buŋ yaako bere wiktin ta aapiyer, kar ŋaako n̰aamin̰ pey Masi kaak ŋa doɓtu loko min awalle, ŋaar ko Iisa.
44003021	Diŋka-aŋ, Iisa Masi yaa goyen̰ ja kuwa ka samaaner nam ƴiriy taat Buŋ asiy newsin̰ gamin okin̰co marbinto ar taat ŋa kaawtu min awalle iŋ biŋkico ku nabiinna kuuk ŋa doɓtu.
44003022	Ka seener, nabi Muusa gay kaaw ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Rabbin Buŋ yaako doɓe nabiin̰ce kaak ar nunu min ɗo siŋtiko. Cokiyon ay kaawoy-ata.
44003023	Ay gem kaak poociit kaawoy-at, ŋu imilin̰ kara min ɗo gee ku Buŋdi ho ŋuu deen̰ji. ”
44003024	Nabiinna okin̰co kuuk kaaw min wiktin ta Samiyeel kaawtu rakki rakki maan kaak yaa kuuniye ɗo menaw-aŋku.
44003025	Gem kol siŋtay, kaaw taat Buŋ kaawtu iŋ biŋkico ku nabiinnay, taar loko. Ampa-ak, ku un̰je ko ɗo jamaw taat Buŋ obtu iŋ aginiyko, wiktin taat ŋa kaawiiji ɗo Ibraayim aman : ‟ Min baa tan̰jin di, naa barkiyin̰ gee okin̰co kuuk goy ɗo duniiner. ”
44003026	Awalle, Buŋ n̰aamig ja gay tabiriikar Iisa Masi loko. Ŋa n̰aamiiga-ak a ŋaako barkiyiŋko ho ay gem di yaa rase goyin̰ji ka jookumo. »
44004001	Wiktin taat Piyer iŋ Yaaya kaawiy misa ɗo geemir di, agindaw ku Yuudinnar daarin̰ astu : gay satkiner, tatkaw ka askirnar kaak gooƴa ger ka Buŋdi, ho iŋ Sadusiyenna oki.
44004002	Min ŋu taliig di, ŋu dapin̰tu asaan Piyer iŋ Yaaya ɓilda gee a Buŋ nooyig Iisa min ɗo muuti. Ansii kat, gee oki asiy nooye.
44004003	Hiyya, ŋu obiigu ho ŋu un̰jiig daŋaayne. Ŋu waltu atta asaan pat ɗeete.
44004004	Kar gay, min gee kuuk cokiyit kaaw ta paliinnar ɗo ger ka Buŋdi-ak, dakina aamintu. Iŋ ŋuur kuuk awalle, okin̰co, ŋuu nece ar gee alip beeƴ (5000) pa.
44004005	Ka kawtinti, agindaw ku Yuudinnar, man̰jikina ho agindaw ku gaanuundi n̰umtu okin̰co ɗo geeger ka Zeruzaleem.
44004006	Ɗo wer-ak, gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Han, mee satkiner ka tatko, iŋ Kayip, Yaaya, Alekzandir, ho iŋ gee okin̰co ku adiy ka ger ka gay satkiner ka tatko-aka.
44004007	Kar Piyer iŋ Yaaya, ŋu imiliig min ɗo daŋaayner ho ŋu iyiig uŋco, ŋu indiigu aman : « Ku cooliig gem-aŋ iŋ gudurre ta waa ho iŋ siŋ ku waa ? »
44004008	Min ŋaar-ak di, Buŋ miiniig Piyer iŋ Ruwwiney kar ŋa kaawiico aman : « Kuŋ agindaw ku Yuudinnar ho iŋ ku darrer :
44004009	ƴiriyta ku indaani ɗo bi ka a ni ginji sellen̰ ɗo ruŋgiiner-aŋka ho ku raka ibine iŋ maman gem-aŋ cooltu.
44004010	Di ŋaar-ak, ya gem-aŋ, ku talaag ŋa pey uŋko cewey-aŋ, kuŋ ibanno yoo gee ku Israyeel okin̰co kadar gem-aŋ gas aapiye iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi kaak min Nazareet. Ta barkin tan̰ji kat coolig gem-aŋka. Ŋaar ko ku ɗooɗtu ka etor ho Buŋ gay nooyig min ɗo muuti.
44004011	Ɗo bi ka Iisa, ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner aman : ‟ Ŋa dambi kaak gay pinindi accitu. Ŋaar ko gin dambi kaak taɓ ka gerdi. ”
44004012	Ka seener, jile goy iŋ ŋaar di. Min ɗo duniiner okintiti, Buŋ bal diye siŋ ku pey ɗo geemir a ŋuu gase jile, illa siŋ kun̰ji di. »
44004013	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, agindaw ku abaadin ta Yuudinnar ajbiytu tak-tak, asaan ŋu talaag Yaaya iŋ Piyer bal garkiye, kar ŋu kaawaaco ɗo uŋco bal kolaw. Ŋu ibintu kadar ŋu gee kuuk aaɗiig Iisa.
44004014	Kar gay, min ŋu taliig gem kaak cool-ak goy uŋco, ŋu ibanno kaaw tak-tak taat ŋuuco telke.
44004015	Hiyya, ŋu kaawiico aman : « Amiloŋ kara min anne ! » Min ŋu amiltu, agindaw ku Yuudinnar teestu kaawe benannico ɗo bi kan̰co.
44004016	Ŋu kaawtu aman : « Di gee-aŋ gi ginin̰ maman ? Gee okin̰co kuuk goy Zeruzaleem gin kabarre kadar ŋuur ko ginig maan kaak ajbay-aŋka. Iŋ taar-an, gi gediraaɗo gii meele.
44004017	Kar gay, gi rakaaɗo kadar kabarre-an yaa totire ɗo geemir. Diŋka-aŋ giico toɗe, ŋu kaawenno bat iŋ siŋ ku Iisa ɗo waanna ho ya ŋu kaawa pey, ŋuu aawe raɗa. »
44004018	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋu koliig Piyer iŋ Yaaya ho ŋu ɗiyiico aman : « Yaman kawiyoŋ tak-tak-tak, dakoŋ kaawenno ho dakoŋ ɓildenno pey gee iŋ siŋ ku Iisa. »
44004019	Kar ŋuur gay telkiico aman : « Ya loko-ak, taat moo samaane, nii iceŋ kat taat moo, kaawin kuŋkoŋ wala kaaw ta Buŋdi ?
44004020	Nin gay bugumaaɗo. Ni kaawin taat ni taltu ho ni dortu min ɗo Iisa. »
44004021	Kar agindaw ku Yuudinnar teestu karmin̰co pey, kar ŋu rasiigu asaan ŋu balco gase oorne taat ŋuu obin̰co ho gee okin̰co ozilaag Buŋ ɗo maan kaak kuuniye.
44004022	Ŋu oziliiga-ak asaan gem kaak cool-ak ajbiyiig gee-aku, elginay yaa pake orok pooɗ.
44004023	Min agindaw ku Yuudinnar-ak pikiigu, Piyer iŋ Yaaya dakiig gas een̰co ho ŋu osiicog maan kaak agindaw ku gay satkiner ho agindaw ku Yuudinnar kaawiico.
44004024	Min ŋu doriit kaawco-at, okin̰co, ŋu teestu salkiye sawa iŋ gelbin rakki. Ɗo salaanco-at ŋu kaawa aman : « Rabbin Buŋ, ŋa kiŋke-aŋ ko kaak kilgiyig samaane iŋ kiɗa, barre ho iŋ gamin okin̰co kuuk goya.
44004025	Ŋa kiŋke-aŋ ko kaak berit Ruwwinen̰ ɗo migini Dawuud kaak gay riyon̰. Ruwwin-at ko n̰aamig ŋa kaawiy aman : Ŋa dambi kaak gay pinindi accitu, ‟ Maa di gee ku duniiner saariy motol ? Ŋu diya kaawco maala.
44004026	Sultinnay siy ziŋkico ɗo gartar. Ho agindaw n̰um a ŋuu poocin̰ Rabbine ho Sultan kaak ŋa doɓtu. ”
44004027	Hii, ka seener, Herood iŋ Pons Pilaat n̰umtu Zeruzaleem iŋ gee kuuk Yuudinna iŋ kuuk Yuudinnaɗo a ŋuu poocin̰ gay riyon̰ kaak ki doɓtu ho ki darjiytu.
44004028	Ampa-ak, ŋu ginit okintit taat ki kaawtu min awalle ho taat ki raktu iŋ gudurren̰.
44004029	Kar diŋ gay, Rabbine talu, ŋu saraaninta. Berni gudurren̰ taat ni gaarin kaawon̰ bal kolaw.
44004030	Gaar gudurren̰, kii coole gee ho iŋ siŋ ku Iisa, kii gine gamin kuuk gaara gudurren̰ ho kuuk ajbay, ŋaar kaak ki doɓtu ɗo riyon̰. »
44004031	Wiktin taat ŋu gaastu iŋ salaane, werco kaak ŋu goyiy-ak teestu azire. Okin̰co, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi miiniigu ho ŋu ɓaawtu gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi bal kolaw.
44004032	Gee kuuk aamine, okin̰co kaawco rakki ho gelbinco oki rakki. Paa ko, ŋu n̰umiig gaminco okin̰co sawa. Ginno gem kaak yaa kaawe a maanna-aŋ kanto.
44004033	Paliinna kaawtu ɗo bi ka Rabbin Iisa aman : « Ŋa nooye ho ni talig iŋ odinni. » Ŋu kaawtu iŋ gudurre okintiti ho iŋ gee ku aamin-ak, okin̰co, Buŋ barkiyiig dakina.
44004034	Ɗo ɗatikco, ginno gem kaak arumji maanna. Asaan ay gem kaak gin kiɗa ho gin ger-ak di gidiyiig gamnay ho ŋa iyiig gurusji.
44004035	Ŋu beriig ɗo pise ka paliinnar ho ŋuur gay, ɗeeɗiig gurus-ak ɗo ay gemo uudin taat yaaji nece.
44004036	Ɗo ɗatikco, gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Yuusup. Paliinna gay, kolaag pey a ŋa Barnabaas, siŋ-ak kaawa a « Gem kaak iska gee ». Ŋaar min baa tan̰ Lebi, kar ŋu weeyig ɗo kiɗ ka Sipre.
44004037	Gem ŋaar-ak gin kiɗa. Ŋa gidiyiiga, kar ŋa iyiig gurus-aka, ŋa beriig ɗo paliinnar.
44005001	Gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Ananiyaas iŋ daaciy Sapiira. Ŋu deetu kaawco a ŋu gidiyin̰ kiɗco.
44005002	Min ŋu gidiyga, ŋu kaawtu a ŋaa ɗukumin̰ gurus-ak daarin̰ ho kaak ɗak gay, ŋaa iyiin̰ ɗo paliinnar.
44005003	Min pak, Piyer kaawiiji aman : « Ananiyaas, maa di ki rasiig Seetanne un̰jitu ɗo gelbinen̰ ? Ki ɗukumiig gurus kaak ki gidiyiig kiɗan̰, kar ki raadiy ɗo Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
44005004	Min ki bal gidiyin̰ misa kiɗ-aŋ sa, ŋa kan̰ji wal maman ? Ho min ki gidiyiig ko sa, gurus sa kan̰ji wal maman ? Kar maan kaak n̰aamin̰ciŋ ki raadiy ampa-aŋ gay maa ? Iban kadar raadinji-aŋ, ki bal raade ɗo geemir, ki raad ɗo Buŋdi. »
44005005	Min Ananiyaas doriit kaaw-at, ŋa galtu ho ŋa mattu. Hiyya, ŋuur kuuk dorit kabarre-at, okin̰co, kolaw obiigu.
44005006	Wiktin taat ŋa mattu, ɗubal astu, ŋu maliyiig ziy iŋ kapanne, ŋu iyiig ɗo maginer ho ŋu tiisiiga.
44005007	Min ŋu tiisiga, yaa nece ar pat subba pa. Daaciy ta Ananiyaas un̰jitu ɗo wer kaak paliinna goyiyo. Ta bal gasin kabarre-ata.
44005008	Ɗo wer-ak, Piyer gaariitig gurus kaak mitti iyiico. Ho ŋa indiit aman : « Kiɗ kaak ku gidiytu-aŋ aŋ di gurusji walla ? » Ta taliig gurus-aka kar ta telkiiji aman : « Hii, ŋa ŋaar ko aŋ di »
44005009	Kar Piyer gay telkiitit aman : « Maman ku ictu niyin iŋ mitke a kuu gecin Ruwwin ta Buŋdi ? Di cokay, gee kuuk asa min tiisin̰ mitke as ko moota iŋ geero. Ŋuuke iciŋke kaŋke oki. »
44005010	Ar kaawte-an di, ta galtu ɗo uŋji, kar ta mattu. Ɗubal-ak astu ɗo wer-aka, ŋu un̰jitu, kar ŋu gasit ta mat ko. Hiyya, ŋu iciliita, ŋu iyiita ho ŋu tiisiit ɗo serpey ta mitti.
44005011	Hiyya, Egliz okin̰ji iŋ gee okin̰co kuuk dorit kabarre-at, kolaw un̰jiico dakina.
44005012	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, paliinna gintu gamin dakina kuuk ajbay, kuuk gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Gee kuuk aamine n̰umgiy okin̰co werco rakki ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, ɗo wer kaak ŋu koliy ba tarum ta Selemaan.
44005013	Kar gee kuuk kara gay gina kolaw taat ŋuu n̰ume iŋ ŋuura. Yampa, ŋuur sa kaawa samaane ɗo bi kan̰co.
44005014	Paa di oki, goy gee dakina, miday ho daaɗi, ŋu ɗuuntu masisco, ŋu aamintu ɗo Rabbine ho ŋu n̰umtu iŋ ŋuura.
44005015	Ɗo saan ta gamin kuuk ajbay kuuk paliinna giniyo, ŋu imilaag gee kuuk raɗaw ɗo botilniidi, ŋu leeyiig ɗo argigdi ho ɗo dariŋgilnal. Ŋu giniy ansi-ak a wal paa kat, ya Piyer biraw kar kelmoy yaa goote diŋ ga minninco rakki, ŋaa gasen diŋ ga aapiye.
44005016	Min darrinay ku moota iŋ Zeruzaleem sa, gee dakina astu. Ŋu iyiig geen̰co ku raɗaw ho iŋ kuuk aariɗ obgu. Gee-ak okin̰co, Buŋ coolgu.
44005017	Mee satkiner ka tatko ho iŋ ŋuur kuuk goy iŋ ŋaara kuuk min Sadusiyenna, ictu niyine a ŋuu obin̰ paliinna. Ŋu ictu niyin-ak asaan ŋu ginaaco hasuudinaw.
44005018	Min pa-ak, ŋu obiigu, kar ŋu un̰jiig daŋaayne, ɗo wer kaak ŋu obiy gee doo.
44005019	Kar gay, iŋ aando, Rabbin n̰aamtu ɗubiley piliig ɗibirin ku daŋaayner. Ŋa imiliig paliinna kara, kar ŋa ɗiyiico aman :
44005020	« Ɓaaŋ ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, anner kat, kuuco gaare ɗo geemir kaaw taat bera goye kaak marbinto. »
44005021	Min paliinna dortu pa-ak, iŋ kawtir kawtira, ŋu ɓaawtu ɗo ger ka Buŋdi ho ŋu teestu gaarin garaanco. Iŋ kawtir-at di, mee satkiner ka tatko iŋ ŋuur kuuk goy iŋ ŋaara uctu iŋ tan̰co. Ŋu n̰umiig aginay ku darrer ku Israyeel a ŋuu dee kaawco. Kar ŋu n̰aamtu askirna, ŋuu iyin̰ paliinna-ak min ɗo daŋaayner, ŋuu indin̰co.
44005022	Min ŋu ottu ɗo daŋaayner, ŋu bal gasin̰co. Ek di ŋu yeeptu ho ŋu osiico ɗo maan kaak kuuniye.
44005023	Ŋu kaawtu aman : « Ni ɓaaw ɗo daŋaayner ho ni gasig ɗibirniiti ɗibir gap-gap. Askirna gay goy eɗe ɗo werco. Kar gay, min ni piliig ɗibirna-ak, yoo waan sa ginno atta. »
44005024	Min tatkaw ka askirnar ka ger ka Buŋdi iŋ agindaw ku gay satkiner gasiit kabarre-at, ŋu ibanno taat ŋu kaawe oki. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu indiy kat ziŋkico ɗo maan kaak asco ɗo paliinnar.
44005025	Min pa-ak di, waan gay astu min ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Cokiyoŋ ! Yaman, gee kuuk ku obtu ɗo daŋaayner-aŋ, diŋ goy kur ɗo ger ka Buŋdi, ŋu garkiya gee. »
44005026	Koɗok di tatkaw ka askirnar amiltu iŋ geen̰ji a ŋuu obiin̰ paliinna, ŋuu iyiin̰co. Kar gay, ŋu obiig iŋ taat ool di, asaan ŋu gina kolaw pa gee yaa dawin̰co iŋ dambay.
44005027	Min ŋu ottu ɗo wer kaak agindaw ku Yuudinnar n̰umgiyo, ŋu iyiig paliinna uŋco, ho mee satkiner ka tatko teestu indin̰co
44005028	aman : « Has ni toɗkonno tak-tak a ku garkiyenno iŋ siŋ ku Iisa ? Di taloŋ ja maan kaak ku gintu-aŋka ! Ku kaawcot kaaw-an okintit ɗo gee ku Zeruzaleem okin̰co ho wal maanko ku raka a baar ku gemor-aŋ yaa gagire ɗo gaaƴiƴni kuni. »
44005029	Piyer iŋ een̰ji telkiico aman : « Ku iban kadar gii karmiyen̰ ja Buŋ, kar gii karmiye kat gee.
44005030	Kuŋko ko kuuk deeyig Iisa Masi, ku ɗooɗig ka etor. Kar gay, Buŋ ka aginiyte nooyig min ɗo muuti,
44005031	ŋa coonig kuwa ho ŋa diyig ɗo meeday. Ŋa diyig tatkaw ho Gay Jilindi a ŋaa pile botol ɗo gee ku Israyeel, ŋuu ibinin̰ nigin̰co, ŋuu rasin̰ goye kaak awalle ho Buŋ yaaco saamiyin̰ zunuubinnico.
44005032	Nin tal iŋ odinni ho Ruwwin ta Buŋdi oki saadine, taar ko taat Buŋ bertu ɗo gee kuuk karmiyaaga. »
44005033	Wiktin taat ŋu doriit kaaw-at, ŋu dapin̰tu aale nam ŋu gaay deen̰ paliinna.
44005034	Ɗo wer-ak, gin gem rakki min Pariziyenna, ŋu kolaag Gamaliyeel. Ŋaar gay tatkaw ka gaanuundi ho gee okin̰co karmiyaaga. Wiktin taat ŋu rakiy deen̰ paliinna, ŋa uctu ɗatikco ho ŋa kaawtu a ŋuu imilin̰ ja paliinna sooɗa.
44005035	Min ŋu imiliigu, ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Gem kol siŋtay gee ku Israyeel, girsonti ɗo taat kuuco gine ɗo gee-aŋku.
44005036	Pakiroŋ ɗo elgin kuuk bir moota-aŋku. Gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Tedaas. Ŋa gina ziy gem tatiko. Ŋa gas gee yaa gaaye miy pooɗ kuuk aaɗaaga. Kar ŋaar gay, ŋu deeyiiga ho geen̰ji sa totirtu. Hiyya, werco siimtu dil.
44005037	Min ŋaar-ak, amiltu pey gem ka pey ŋu kolaag Zuudas. Ŋa min geeger ka Galile. Wiktin taat agindaw ku Room osiy gee, gem-ak amiltu sawirnaw ho gee dakina aaɗiiga. Ŋaar oki ŋu deeyiiga ho geen̰ji sa totirtu.
44005038	Diŋ gay, nu kaawaako : Cimoŋ kaƴko min ɗo gee-aŋku ! Rasoŋ ŋuu ɗeete. Asaan ya pikirrico ho riyco kat asa min ɗo geemir, taar yaa peye keetit di.
44005039	Kar gay, ya riyco taat ŋu giniy-an kat asa min ɗo Buŋdi, ku gediraaɗo peyin̰ ampa, yampa, ku asa gine adiney ku Buŋdi ! » Hiyya, gay seriiner ooyiit kaaw ta Gamaliyeel.
44005040	Min ŋaar-ak, ŋu iyiig paliinna ho ŋu kaawiico ɗo askirna a ŋuu koocin̰co. Ŋu koociigu, kar ŋu kaawiico a ŋuu icenno pey bat bi ka Iisa. Hiyya, ŋu rasiigu, ŋu ɗeettu.
44005041	Paliinna rasiig gay seriiner iŋ gelbinco kaak portiko, asaan Buŋ taliig ŋu nec icin taaɓine taat ɗo bi ka siŋ ku Iisa.
44005042	Iŋ taaɓin taat ŋu awtu-anta oki, ɗo ger ka Buŋdi yoo ɗo geriydi sa, kun kawta, ŋu garkiya di gee. Ŋu gaartu Kabarre ta Gala a Iisa, ŋaar Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu.
44006001	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, maajirna ku Iisa Masi, illa gaaya gaayen di. Kar gay, Yuudinna kuuk aamine kuuk kaawa kaaw ta Grek sakkiytu ɗo een̰co kuuk kaawa Hebru. Ŋu kaawtu kadar kun kawta, ya ŋu ɗeeɗa gamin ku teendi, ŋu rawtaag murgilgilco.
44006002	Min paliinna kuuk orok iŋ seer doriit sakuunco-at, ŋu n̰umiig gee kuuk aamin ɗo Iisa, kar ŋu ɗiyiico aman : « Ta kuuniyaaninno nii rase gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi ho nii obeŋ ko ɗo ɗeeɗe ka gamin ku teendi di.
44006003	Ampa-ak, gem kol siŋtay, doɓoŋ minninko gee peesira, kuuk goyin̰co samaane, miin iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi, ho gin ilim dakina. Paa kat, niico rasin riy-an ɗo pisin̰co.
44006004	Nin-aŋ gay, nii bere ziŋkini okin̰co ɗo salaaner ho ɗo gaare ka Kaaw ta Buŋdi ɗo geemir. »
44006005	Gee okin̰co kuuk n̰um-ak ooyiit kaaw taat paliinna ɗiyiico a ŋuu gine. Ŋu doɓiig ja Etiyeen kaak obig imaanji bombo ho Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gaayaaga. Kar ŋu doɓtu pey Pilip, Prokoor, Nikanoor, Timon, Parmenaas, ho Nikola kaak min geeger ka Antiyoos. Ŋaar Yuudin̰ceɗo, kar min awalle, ŋa ictu ja niyine ɗo abaadin ta Yuudinnar, kar ba aar gay, ŋa aamintu ɗo Iisa Masi.
44006006	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, ŋu iyiig gee ku peesir-ak ɗo uŋco ka paliinnar a ŋuuco lee pise ɗo kaƴco ho ŋuuco inde barkin ta Buŋdi yaa gaayin̰co.
44006007	Paa kat, gee ku ibiniit kaaw ta Buŋdi gaayiy gaayen di, ho ɗo Zeruzaleem, gee ku aamin ɗo Iisa Masi oki wadirtu ho gay satkiner dakina n̰umtu iŋ ŋuura.
44006008	Buŋ barkiyiig Etiyeen dakina ho ŋa berji gudurre, ŋa giniy gamin kuuk ajbay iŋ kuuk gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi ɗo ɗatik ta geemir.
44006009	Kar gay, Yuudinna daarin̰ teestu meele iŋ ŋaara. Ŋuur-aŋ gay astu min werin seera. Daarin̰ astu min geeger ka Sireen iŋ ka Alekzandir, ŋu n̰umgiy ɗo ger ka salaaner kaak ŋu koliy « Wer ka ɓerrin kuuk ŋu piktu. » Kar daarin̰ gay asa min waay Silisi ho min Aazi.
44006010	Yuudinna ŋuur-ak gay, min ɗo meelco, ŋu balji gedire ɗo Etiyeen, asaan ŋa kaawa iŋ ibine kaak Ruwwin ta Buŋdi beriiji.
44006011	Hiyya, ŋu deewintu gee a ŋuu kaawe aman : « Ni dorig Etiyeen niga biy iŋ gaanuun ka Muusa ho iŋ Buŋ. »
44006012	Ŋu isiniig gee ku dakina, iŋ agindaw ku darrer, ho iŋ gee kuuk ɓilda gaanuun ka Muusa oki. Okin̰co, ŋu teesiig Etiyeen. Ŋu obiiga, kar ŋu iyiig ɗo uŋco ka aginay ku Yuudinnar.
44006013	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu iytu pey gee kuuk raada a ŋuu kaawe aman : « Gem-aŋ wakila di nige biy iŋ ger ka Buŋdi ka cawar ho iŋ gaanuun ka Muusa.
44006014	Ni dorig ŋa kaawa a gem kaak ŋu koliy Iisa kaak min Nazareet-ak ko yaa ɗimin̰ ger ka Buŋdi, ho ŋa ŋaar di pey kaak yaa makin̰ aadanna kuuk Muusa rasiite. »
44006015	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gee okin̰co kuuk goy ɗo wer-ak gooƴaag ko Etiyeen di, asaan wijeeney irn̰a ar ta ɗubil ka Buŋdi.
44007001	Kar mee satkiner ka tatko indiig Etiyeen aman : « Kaawin kuuk ŋu kaawiy ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ-aŋ ka seener walla ? »
44007002	Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : « Gem kol aginiyji ho gem kol siŋtay, cokiyoŋ, wiktin taat Ibraayim goyiy misa ɗo darre taat ŋu koliy Mezopotami ho min ŋa bal ɗeete misa goye ɗo geeger ka Haran, Buŋ ka darjiner bayniiji uŋci.
44007003	Kar ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : ‟ Amal rasig geen̰jiŋ ho iŋ darren̰, ho ɓaa ɗo kiɗ kaak naan̰ gaare. ”
44007004	Min ŋaar-ak, Ibraayim amiltu min ɗo darre ta Kalde ho ŋa ɗeettu goye Haran. Min tacco mattu, Buŋ kaawiiji a ŋa ɓaa goye ɗo darre taat ku goyiy diŋka.
44007005	Buŋ ɗiyiiji a ŋaaji berin darre-ata, ho tambaay sa yaa goye eɗe. Kar ɗo wiktin taar-at gay, Buŋ toɗji wero, yoo kaak ŋa diyin baay oki ginno. Ho ɗo wiktin taar-at, ŋa ginno misa yoo mico.
44007006	An ko kaaw ta Buŋ kaawiiji awalle ɗo Ibraayim aman : ‟ Tambaan̰ asa goye ɗo darre ta geemir. Ŋu asiy ginin̰ ɓerrina ho ŋu taaɓiyin̰co nam elgin miy pooɗ.
44007007	Kar gee kuuk obig geendu ɓerrina-ak gay, nu asaaco gaarinti. Min ŋaar-ak, kooginan̰-ak yaa amile min annere ho ŋuu asiin abdiyindu anne. ”
44007008	Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, Buŋ obtu jamaw iŋ Ibraayim kar ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : ‟ Ɗukume ka seln̰ol yaa gine dele ta jamuwte. ” Paa ko, min Ibraayim weeyig Isaaka, ƴiriy ta porpoɗiŋkar, ŋa ɗukumiiji seln̰o. Isaaka oki ɗukumji seln̰o ɗo Yakuub. Ho Yakuub gay, ɗukumco seln̰o ɗo kooginay ku orok iŋ seer, ŋuur ko kuuk aginiyte.
44007009	« Koogin ku Yakuub gay giniiji hasuudinaw ɗo siŋco Yuusup. Ŋu gidiyig ar ɓerre ɗo geemir. Kar ŋu iyiig kat Meser. Kar Buŋ gay goy iŋ ŋaara
44007010	ho ŋa jilig min ɗo taaɓin okintiti. Ŋa berji ibine dakina. Ŋa ginig gem sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Parawon, sultan ka darrer. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Parawon diyiig guberneer ka Meser okintiti, yoo geriy oki, ŋa rasjig ɗo pisin̰ji.
44007011	Goytu kee, mey astu wer okin̰ji ka Meser yoo ɗo kiɗ ka Kana, wer kaak Yakuub goyiyo. Gee taaɓiy dakina ho aginiyte sa, gaminco ku teendi arumco tak-tak.
44007012	Min Yakuub dortu kadar geme goy Meser, ŋa n̰aamiig aginiyte ɓaaco gidiye tee ho ŋu iyiico.
44007013	Min tee-ak gase, ka seeriŋkar, ŋa n̰aamiig a ŋuu ɓaaco gidiye pey. Wiktin ta ŋu ottu, Yuusup bariytu botol taat siŋtay ibiniiga. Paa kat, Parawon oki gintu kabarre kadar ŋu gee ku Yuusup.
44007014	Min ŋaar-ak, Yuusup n̰aamtu a ŋuu kolin̰ tacco Yakuub iŋ geen̰ji okin̰co. Okin̰co, ŋu nec gee orok peesira iŋ beeƴ (75).
44007015	Kar min Yakuub doriit kaaw-at, ŋa uctu ŋa ɗeettu Meser iŋ geen̰ji okin̰co. Goytu kee, ŋa mattu iŋ kooginay okin̰co kuuk aginiyte.
44007016	Ŋu iyiig momtinco Sisem, Kar ŋu tiisiig ɗo magin taat Ibraayim gidiytu awalle iŋ poddine min ɗo koogin ku Amoor kaak min Sisem.
44007017	« Goytu elgin kee, geente ku goy Meser weetu ko wee ho ŋu gintu dakina. Sando, wiktinti kat ase taat kaaw ta Buŋ kaawiiji ɗo Ibraayim astu ɗo werti.
44007018	Sultan ka pey gay coktu, ŋa teestu goye kaati ka Meser ho ŋaar gay ibingigɗo Yuusup.
44007019	Ŋa caaciyiig geente ho ŋa taaɓiyiig aginiyte aale. Ŋa asiraag a ŋuu orin̰ kooginco kuuk ŋu weetu daaɓinco a paa kat ŋuu mate.
44007020	Wiktin taar-at ko, ŋu weeyig Muusa. Ŋaar gay samaane ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Koyin subba aginiyji cigilig gerco.
44007021	Min cigilin̰ji gin ko raɗa, ŋu iciiga ŋu diyiig kara. Kar rom ta Parawon asig gasa ho ta iciiga. Ta iyiig gerti, ta maaɗiig ar roŋti ka meenti.
44007022	Paa ko, ŋu ɓildiig gamin dakina kuuk gee ku Meser ibingiyo. Iŋ taar-at ko, gee ibingig iŋ kaaw taat ŋa ibingiyo ho iŋ riy taat ŋa gingiyo.
44007023	« Min Muusa elginay nectu orok pooɗ, ŋa ictu niyine a ŋa ɓaa talin̰ siŋtay, gee ku Israyeel.
44007024	Kar min ŋa ottu ɗo wer ka siŋtay, ŋa tala kar gem rakki min Meser kooca rakki minninco. Ŋa ɓaawtu male ɗo siŋji nam ŋa deeyiiga.
44007025	Ya ɗo tan̰ji-at, ŋa pakira kadar siŋtay gee ku Israyeel yaa ibine a Buŋ yaa jilin̰co iŋ siŋ kun̰ji. Kar sando, taar gay paaɗo.
44007026	Ka kawtinti, Muusa gastu min siŋtay seer taasin̰aw. Ŋa rak leyin̰co ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : ‟ Gem kol siŋtay, ŋaar kuŋ siŋtaɗo ga ? Maa di ku taasin̰iyo ? ”
44007027	Kar gay, ŋaar kaak gedirji ɗo giji-ak akiliig Muusa ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : ‟ Waa diyin̰ciŋ tatkaw ho gay ɗukume seriini ?
44007028	Ki rakaan deendu ar duuɗi ki deeyiig gem kaak min Meser-aka walla ? ”
44007029	Min ŋa doriit kaaw-at, Muusa kolaw obiiga. Ŋa gaɗtu kaƴa min Meser ho ŋa birtu ɗo darre ta Madiyaan. Ŋa daktu goy ar awraatin̰ce ho ɗo darre-at, ŋa weetu koogin seera.
44007030	« Ŋa goytu elgin orok pooɗ ɗo darre-ata. Ƴiriy rakki, moota iŋ damba ta Sinayi, Buŋ bayniiji ɗo Muusa ar ɗubiley, ɗatik pompil kaak kobir ako.
44007031	Muusa talig kadar ak ergigɗo pompil-ak ho ŋa ajbiytu. Ŋa sin̰jitu moota a ŋaa pandiyin̰ji samaane. Min ŋa pandiyiiga, ŋa dortu gaaƴ ta Rabbine taat ɗiya aman :
44007032	‟ Ŋa nun-aŋ ko Buŋ ka aginiyjiŋ, Buŋ ka Ibraayim, ka Isaaka, ho iŋ ka Yakuub. ” Ɗo wer-ak, Muusa teestu azire, asaan kolaw obga. Ŋa gedarro pey tale tak-tak.
44007033	Min pa-ak, Rabbin kaawiiji pey aman : ‟ Sorig n̰ugiran̰ asaan wer kaak ki diyig asin̰jiŋ-aŋ, ŋaar cawar.
44007034	Ka seener, nu tal taaɓin ta geendu Meser. Nu dorig niizin̰co ho nu as jilin̰co. Diŋ gay ucu, nu n̰aamaaciŋ Meser. ” »
44007035	Kar Etiyeen kaawtu pey aman : « Ŋa Muusa kaak gee ku Israyeel pooctu-ak ɗoo di, ŋu ɗiyiiji aman : ‟ Waa diyin̰ciŋ tatkaw ho gay ɗukume seriini ? ” Sando, ŋa meen̰ji Buŋ kat n̰aamga a ŋaa goye tatkaw ho gay jilindi. Ŋa n̰aamig wiktin taat ŋa asiiji ar ɗubil ka Buŋdi ho ŋa bayniiji ɗo pompil-aka.
44007036	Muusa ko imilig gee kuuk Israyeel min Meser. Ŋa gintu gamin kuuk ajbay iŋ kuuk gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi, wiktin taat ŋu goyiy misa Meser, wiktin taat ŋu aaltu barre kaak dindiko ho ɗo elgin kuuk orok pooɗ ŋu goytu ɗo goosiner.
44007037	Ŋa Muusa di pey kaak ɗiyco ɗo gee ku Israyeel aman : ‟ Buŋ asaako bayne nabiin̰ce ar nunu min ɗo ɗatikko. ”
44007038	Min gee ku Israyeel n̰umtu ɗo goosiner, ŋa Muusa-ak di kaak goy ɗatikco iŋ ɗubil ka Buŋdi ho iŋ aginiyte, wiktin taat ɗubil-ak kaawiiji ka damba ta Sinayi. Paa kat, Buŋ beriiji kaawoy a ŋaate gaarinti, taar ko taat bera goye ka gaasɗo.
44007039	Kar gay, aginiyte ŋuur pooc karmiyin̰ji ho ŋu poocit kaawoy oki. Ŋuur gay diy kaƴco a illa ŋuu yeepe Meser di.
44007040	Wiktin taat Muusa bal paaye misa min ka dambar, ŋu kaawiiji ɗo Haruun aman : ‟ Siyte margi gii icin̰ji kar gii jaawe iŋ ŋaar uŋte. Asaan gi ibanno maan kaak asji ɗo maan Muusir kaak imilinte min Meser. ”
44007041	Hiyya, ɗo wiktin taar-at, ŋu siytu maan ar ijilin̰ce. Ŋu teestu abdiyin̰ji ho ŋu giniig ar margico. Kar ŋu gintu iidine ɗo maan kaak ŋu siytu iŋ pisin̰co-aka.
44007042	Kar Buŋ gay newsiico kopo. Ŋa rasiig ŋu abdiyiy gamin kuuk ceera kuwa ka samaaner ar taat ŋu siirtu ɗo maktumne ta nabiinnar aman : ‟ Koogin ku Israyeel, ɗo elgin kuuk ku gintu orok pooɗ ɗo goosiner, ku gin satkinkan iŋ malle ho gamin ku pey kat lotu walla ?
44007043	Ha’a paaɗo ! Ku icig zug ka margir kaak ŋu koliy Malook ho ku icig pey margi kaak ar kaalo kaak ŋu koliy Repaan. Gamin kuuk ku siytu iŋ pisiŋko-aŋ di, ku abdiyiig ar ŋu marginko. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, naako atkiŋko serek aar Babiloon. ”
44007044	« Wiktin taat aginiyte goyiy misa ɗo goosiner, ŋu gin kuraarin taat ŋu siytu ɗo Buŋdi. Muusa siyig ar taat Buŋ kaawiiji. Ŋa pinig sawa-sawa ar taat ŋa gaariiji. Iŋ ger-ak ko, gee ku Israyeel yaa ibinguwe a Buŋ goy iŋ ŋuura.
44007045	Goytu kee, gee-ak rasiit kuraarin-at ɗo kooginco. Kar ŋuur gay iciit kuraarin-at, ŋu ɗeettu iŋ taara ho ŋu iyiit wiktin ta ŋu un̰jiy ɗo darre taat Buŋ beriico. Iŋ tatkuwco Zoozuwe, ŋu nosiriico ɗo gee ku darre-ata. Ŋaar Buŋ kat atkiig gee-ak uŋco. Ampaa ko, kuraarin ta Buŋdi-at goytu nam wiktin ta sultan Dawuud.
44007046	Dawuud gay goy samaane ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ŋa indiig a ŋaaji bere botol taat ŋaaji pine wer kaak ŋaa goye. Ŋaar Buŋ ka aginiyji ku Yakuub.
44007047	Kar gay, ŋa roŋji Selemaan kat pinjig ger-aka.
44007048	Yampa, Buŋ ka kuwa goyaaɗo atta ɗo ger kaak gem di pintu, asaan ŋa tatik aale. Ar taat Buŋ kaawtu iŋ bi ka nabiin̰ce aman :
44007049	‟ Rabbin ɗiy aman : Samaane, ŋaar wer kaak nu goyiyo ho nu hokumiyo. Ho kiɗ gay, ŋaar wer kapak di nu leeyiy asindu ho nu jammiyiyo. Kuudu pine maa gerda ? Wer kaak nu ɓaay jammiye gay momo ?
44007050	Ŋa nun di kilgiyig gamin-aŋ okin̰co iŋ pisindu. ” »
44007051	Etiyeen ɗiyiico pey aman : « Kuŋ, kaƴko bombo ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ! Ɗeŋginko amil lawa. Ku meelgit Ruwwin ta Buŋdi ! Ku ginaag gamin sawa-sawa ar taat aginiyko giniyo.
44007052	Maa nabiin̰cir kaak aginiyko daktu taaɓayɗo ? Ŋu deeyig ŋuur kuuk kaaw ɗo bi ka gem kaak sellen̰ pakgig gee okin̰co. Ŋaar ko kaak diŋ kuŋ deetu kaawko nam ku deeyiiga.
44007053	Buŋ berko gaanuunji iŋ botol ta ɗubilji. Kar kuŋ gay pooc karmiyin̰ji. »
44007054	Min Etiyeen kaawtu pa-ak, gee ku seriiner dapin̰tu ar aditco yaa ɗoose nam ŋu uma korumco.
44007055	Ŋaar gay miin iŋ Ruwwin ta Buŋdi, ŋa kociltu kuwa. Ŋa taliit darjin ta Buŋdi ho Iisa Masi gay peya ɗo meeday.
44007056	Ŋa kaawiico ɗo gee-ak aman : « Taloŋ ja ! Nu tala samaan pile ho Roŋ gemor gay peya ɗo meeday ta Buŋdi. »
44007057	Gee kuuk dorit kaaw-at teestu koole raɗa ho ŋu tiriig ɗeŋginco iŋ pisin̰co paa ŋu cokiyin̰ji pey. Kar okin̰co, ŋu uciiji,
44007058	ŋu obiig cap, kar ŋu imiliig kara min ɗo geegirdi a ŋuu dawin̰ iŋ dambay. Min amil kara, ŋu cimiig batikco ho ŋu leeyiig ba serpe ta ɗubil rakki siŋji Sawuul ho ŋu teestu dawin̰ji.
44007059	Wiktin taat ŋu dawiiga-ak di, Etiyeen inditu Buŋ aman : « Gem kol Rabbiney Iisa, icit ruwwiner ! »
44007060	Hiyya, ŋa dersitu ho ŋa kooltu raɗa aman : « Rabbine, saamiyco ɗo gee-aŋku. » Min ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa mattu.
44008001	Ɗubil kaak ŋu koliy Sawuul-ak, kaawco rakki iŋ gee kuuk deeyig Etiyeen. Ƴiriy taar-at di, taaɓin taat raɗa asiiji ɗo Egliz ka Zeruzaleem. Paa kat, ŋu totirtu okin̰co ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude iŋ ka Samari, illa ɗak ko paliinna di Zeruzaleem.
44008002	Gee kuuk karmiyaag Buŋ tiisig Etiyeen ho ŋu alit muutuy dakina.
44008003	Kar Sawuul gay bariya botol taat ŋaa rawtin̰ Egliz ka Iisa tak-tak. Ŋa un̰ja gero iŋ gero, ŋa obiigu, miday iŋ daaɗi, ho ŋa un̰jiig daŋaayne.
44008004	Gee kuuk totir-ak teestu jaawe ɗo hellinniidi, ŋu gaariy Kabarre ta Gala.
44008005	Paa ko, Pilip uctu min Zeruzaleem, ŋa ɓaawtu ɗo geeger ka tatik ka Samari. Kar ŋa teestu kaawe a Iisa, ŋaar Masi kaak Buŋ doɓtu.
44008006	Gee okin̰co ictu niyine ŋu ɓaawtu cokiye samaane kaaw ta Pilip, asaan ŋu dor kadar ŋa gina gamin kuuk ajbay ho diŋ gay maaniico taliig iŋ odinco.
44008007	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu tala gee dakina kuuk gin aariɗna coolaw. Aariɗna-ak amiliy iŋ koolin̰co. Ŋu tala gee ku ruŋgiye iŋ mersin dakina kuuk coolaw oki.
44008008	Ansii ko, gee ku geegirdi-ak, galilco gintu dakina.
44008009	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gem rakki siŋji Simon, goy ko ɗo geeger-aka. Ŋa gina olgaw min daayum ho gee dakina ajbiyaaji. Ŋa tala ziy ar ŋaar di gemo.
44008010	Ho gee okin̰co kuuk aginda yoo ku n̰aaɗa karmiyaag dakina. Ŋu kaawa aman : « Gem-aŋ, ŋaar gudurre ta Buŋdi taat ŋu koliy gudurre ta yaarko. »
44008011	Ŋu cokiyaat kaawoy, asaan min daayum, ŋa ajbiyaag gee iŋ olguwiy.
44008012	Kar diŋ gay, Pilip iyiicot Kabarre ta Gala ta kaawa ɗo bi ka Meennaw ta Buŋdi ho ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi. Min ŋu dorit Kabarre-at, miday iŋ daaɗi aamintu, kar ŋu batiziyiigu.
44008013	Meen̰ji Simon oki aamintu ho ŋu batiziyiiga. Ŋa obtu baay ta Pilip ho ŋa ajbiytu wiktin taat ŋa taliig Pilip giniy gamin kuuk ajbay ho kuuk gaara gudurre ta Buŋdi.
44008014	Wiktin taat paliinna kuuk goy Zeruzaleem dortu a gee ku Samari ooyit kaaw ta Buŋdi, ŋu n̰aamiicog Piyer iŋ Yaaya.
44008015	Min ŋu ottu Samari, ŋu indiico Buŋ ɗo gee ku aamine a ŋaaco bere Ruwwiney.
44008016	Asaan Buŋ balco n̰aame misa Ruwwiney ɗatikco. Ŋu batiziyiig iŋ siŋ ku Rabbin Iisa Masi.
44008017	Hiyya, Piyer iŋ Yaaya leeco pise ɗo kaƴco, kar Buŋ beriico kat Ruwwiney.
44008018	Min Simon taltu kadar Buŋ paayco Ruwwiney ɗo gee-aŋku wiktin taat paliinna leeco pisin̰co ɗo kaƴco, ŋa imiltu gurus a ŋaa bere ɗo Piyer iŋ Yaaya
44008019	ho ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Nun sa, berindu gudurre-anta, naa lagguwe pisindu ɗo geemir ho ŋu gasguwe Ruwwin ta Buŋdi. »
44008020	Kar Piyer gay telkiiji aman : « Hey kiŋke-aŋka, wala gurusjiŋ, wala meen̰jiŋ, Buŋ yaako idiŋko jot, asaan kiŋ pakira kadar kii gidiye maan kaak Buŋ beriig maalan di !
44008021	Ɗo riy-an maan isgicinno. Ki ginno botol taat kii un̰je kaan̰ ɗo wer-aŋka, asaan gelbinen̰ samaanno ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
44008022	Taat ki inditu-an taar samaanno. Ibinig nigin̰ji ho indig Buŋ, wal ŋaan̰ saamiye diŋ ga ?
44008023	Nu tala kadar adin̰ teen̰ci ɗo gamin-aŋku ho ki ɗeet ɓerre ka zunuubinnar. »
44008024	Kar Simon telkiico aman : « Kuŋkoŋ sa salkiyondu, paa kat, kaaw taat ku kaawtu-an ginaaduɗo maanna. »
44008025	Min ŋaar-ak, Piyer iŋ Yaaya wakilit kaawe ɗo geemir ɗo maan kaak ŋu taltu min ɗo Iisa Masi ho ŋu gaariy kaaw ta Rabbiner. Kar ŋu yeeptu Zeruzaleem. Ɗo botildi, ŋu gaariit pey Kabarre-at ɗo hellinnan dakina ku Samari.
44008026	Pilip gay goy misa Samari. Kar ɗubil ka Buŋdi astu ɗiyiiji aman : « Ucu ! Aanay watiine. Ic botol taat ɗo goosiner taat amila min Zeruzaleem aaniy Gaza. »
44008027	Hiyya, koɗok di Pilip uctu ho ŋa ɗeettu. Wiktin taat ŋa ɓaay botildi, ŋa tala kar gem kon di uŋci. Gem-ak gay, tatko min Etiyopi. Ŋa gina riy ta taɓ iŋ Kandas sultin̰ca ta Etiyopi ho gaminti okin̰co ɗo pisin̰ji. Ŋa asa abdiye Buŋ Zeruzaleem
44008028	ho diŋ gay, ŋa n̰ep ka puusji ho ŋa yeepa ko ɗo geriy. Ɗo botildi, ŋa garkiya maktumne ta nabi Ezaayi.
44008029	Wiktin taat Pilip taliig gem-aka, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi kaawiiji aman : « Jorkig gem ka puusdi aŋkare. »
44008030	Hiyya, Pilip iciig gaɗi, ŋa jorkiiga. Min ŋa otiiji moota, ŋa cokiyaag gem-ak garkiyaw, kar ŋa indiig aman : « Has garkiyin̰ji-aŋ, ki iban baay walla ? »
44008031	Gem-ak telkiiji aman : « Maman naa ibine baay ka garkiyindu ya gem baldu gaare ? N̰epu, kiidu gaare baay. »
44008032	Wer kaak ŋa garkiyiy-ak kaawa aman : « Ŋa ar tamga kaak ŋu ɗaan̰aag ŋu ɓaa dapsiyin̰ji. Wal ar roŋ tamgi kaak allo ya ŋu ɗukumaag laway. Paa ko, biy sa ŋa bal pilin̰ji.
44008033	Ŋu eebiyga ho seen sa ŋu toɗjiita. Waa di pey asa kaawe bi ka kooginay ? Menuwiy kuuk ɗo duniiner sa, ŋu gaasgu. »
44008034	Gem-ak indiig Pilip aman : « Baan̰ ja kaawor, nabiin̰ce-aŋ kaawa ɗo bi ka waa ansi-aŋka ? Ŋa kaawa ɗo bi ka meen̰ji di, wal ɗo gem ka pey ? »
44008035	Hiyya, ɗo wer-ak, Pilip teestu gaare Kabarre ta Gala ta Iisa Masi min ɗo wer kaak ŋa garkiyiy-aka.
44008036	Ŋu toliytu kee nam ŋu ottu ɗo wer kaak gin amay. Gem-ak kaawiiji ɗo Pilip aman : « Talu, amay goy-aŋku. Maa yaadu toɗe pey batem, naa gine gem ka Iisa Masi ? »
44008037	[Pilip gay telkiiji aman : « Ya ki aamin ka seener ɗo gelbinen̰ iŋ Iisa Masi-ak, maan toɗaajinno, naan̰ batiziye. » Kar gem-ak telkiiji aman : « Hii, nu aamin kadar Iisa Masi, ŋaar Roŋ ka Buŋdi. »]
44008038	Kar gem-ak kaawtu a ŋuu peyin̰ puus. Ŋu paaytu, ŋu daktu paay ɗo amiydi, ho Pilip batiziyiiga.
44008039	Wiktin taat ŋu amiltu min ɗo amiydi, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi iciig Pilip ho gem-ak bal talin̰ pey tak-tak. Kar ŋaar gay icit botiliy, ŋa ɗeettu iŋ galal.
44008040	Pilip gay, tala kar, ŋa goy ko Azoot di. Min eɗe-ak, ŋa aaniytu Sezare, ho ɗo botildi, ay wer kaak ŋa ottu di, ŋa gaariy Kabarre ta Gala nam ŋa ottu Sezare.
44009001	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gem kaak siŋji Sawuul-ak taaɓiyaag gee kuuk aamin ɗo Rabbin Iisa ho ŋa bariya muutco. Ŋa dakiig gas mee satkiner ka tatko Zeruzaleem.
44009002	Ŋa daktu inda izinne a ŋuuji bere makaatamna a ŋaaco iyin̰ ɗo agindaw ku ger ka salaaner ka Damaas. Makaatamna-ak beraaji botol taat ŋaa obin̰ miɗay iŋ daaɗ ku iciit Botol ta Iisa, ŋaa iyin̰ Zeruzaleem.
44009003	Min ŋa gasiig makaatamna-aku, ŋa iciit botol ta Damaas iŋ een̰ji. Wiktin taat ŋu gaay ote ɗo geegirdi, tala kar portikaw wic min ka samaaner yoo ɗo kaay.
44009004	Ɗo wer-ak, tala kar Sawuul gal keɗer bup. Kar ŋa doriit gaaƴ ta gemor kolaag aman : « Sawuul, Sawuul, maa di ki taaɓiyiin ampa-aŋka ? »
44009005	Sawuul gay indiig aman : « Rabbine, kiŋ waa ? » Gaaƴ-at telkiiji aman : « Ŋaar nun Iisa Masi ko kaak ki taaɓiyiy-aŋka.
44009006	Ucu, un̰ju ɗo geegirdi. Anner kat, naan̰ gaare maan kaak kii gine. »
44009007	Kar een̰ji kuuk ŋu toliyiy sawa-ak, peytu ɗut. Ŋu bal gedire pile biŋkico asaan kellimco amile. Ŋu dora gaaƴa, kar ŋu tallo waanna.
44009008	Min ŋaar-ak, Sawuul uctu, ŋa piliig odinay, kar ŋa tallo. Min ɗo wer-ak, een̰ji obiig min ɗo pisin̰ji, ŋu ɗaan̰iig yoo Damaas.
44009009	Menuwiy subba, ŋa tallo tak-tak, wala ŋa tiyaw, wala ŋa siyaw.
44009010	Gin gem rakki pa goy Damaas, ŋu kolaag Ananiyaas. Ŋa maajirin̰cey ka Iisa Masi. Rabbin bayniiji ho ŋa koliig aman : « Ananiyaas ! » Ŋaar gay oyiiji aman : « Hoy Rabbine, nun ko aŋka ! »
44009011	Rabbin kat kaawaajiŋ aman : « Ucu, ɓaa diŋ di ɗo botol taat berel ŋu koliy ‟ Ɗalaŋ ”, ɗo geriy ka Zuudas ho indiig gem rakki siŋji Sawuul min Tars. Diŋ ŋa goy kar salkiyaw.
44009012	Iŋ salaaney-at kat, Buŋ gaariiji gem kaak ŋu koliy Ananiyaas, ŋaa un̰je gerci, ŋaaji lee pise ɗo kaay a odinay yaa pile. »
44009013	Ananiyaas gay telkiiji aman : « Nu dor gee dakina kaawa ɗo bi ka gem-aŋka. Ŋu osduug gamin kuuk samaanno ŋa giniy Zeruzaleem ɗo gee kuuk aamin iŋ siŋ kun̰jiŋ.
44009014	Ho ŋu kaawa pey kadar agindaw ku gay satkiner berji izinne a ŋaa obin̰ gee kuuk aamin okin̰co. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋa astu yoo anne. »
44009015	Kar Rabbin gay kaawiiji aman : « Uc ɓaa paa di, gasig gem-aka, asaan ŋa nun ko doɓga, ŋaadu ginin riyor. Ŋaa jaawe iŋ siŋ kunto ho ŋaan gaarindu ɗo gee kuuk Yuudinnaɗo iŋ sultinniico, yoo ɗo gee ku Israyeel oki.
44009016	Nun meendu yaaji gaare gamin kuuk yaa taaɓiyin̰ ɗo bi kanto. »
44009017	Hiyya, Ananiyaas uctu ho ŋa ɗeettu. Kar ŋa un̰jitu ɗo ger-aka, ŋa dakiig gas Sawuul. Kar ŋa leeyig pisin̰ji ɗo kaay ho ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Sawuul, gem kol siŋji, ŋaar Rabbin kat n̰aamintu. Ŋaar ko Iisa Masi kaak ki taltu bayinjiŋ ɗo botildi wiktin taat ki asiy anne. Ŋaar ko n̰aamintu loci, asaan odinan̰ yaa pile, ho Buŋ yaan̰ bere Ruwwiney. »
44009018	Ta bite-aŋ di, gamin ar aar ta gugurumdi sollitu min ɗo odinay ku Sawuul ho ŋa teestu pey tale. Hiyya, ŋa uctu ho Ananiyaas batiziyiiga, ŋaa gine gem ka Iisa Masi.
44009019	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋu iyiiji kat tee. Ŋa teetu ho ŋa gastu pey gudurre. Sawuul gin mena iŋ maajirna Damaas, kar ŋa bal taaye.
44009020	Min ŋa goy misa, ŋa teestu ko gaare kaaw ta Buŋdi ɗo ger ka salaaner ka Yuudinnar. Ŋa kaawiico aman : « Iisa Masi, ŋaar Roŋ ka Buŋdi. »
44009021	Gee kuuk cokiyaaga-ak, okin̰co ajbiytu. Kar ŋu teestu inde benannico aman : « Ŋaar-aŋ ɗoo ko gem kaak awalle taaɓiyaag gee kuuk aamin iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi Zeruzaleem-aka ? Asin̰ji-aŋ, ŋa da asɗo gay obe geemir ho ŋaa iyiin̰co ɗo uŋco ka agindaw ku gay satkiner walla ? »
44009022	Kar Sawuul gay, kun kawta wakila kaawe iŋ gelbin rakki ɗo Yuudinna kuuk goy Damaas. Ŋa kaawaaco waraŋ kadar Iisa, ŋaar ko Masi kaak Buŋ n̰aamtu ho Yuudinna-aŋ gay gedarro meelin̰ji.
44009023	Min ŋaar-ak, goytu kee, Yuudinna deetu kaawco a ŋuu deen̰ Sawuul.
44009024	Ŋu ɗuunji kur botilay ƴiriyo aando. Ampaa kat, ya ŋa ɗeeta min ɗo helliner, ŋuu obin̰ji ŋuu deen̰ji. Kar gem rakki gay dakiig mina aman : « Ŋu rakaan̰ dee. »
44009025	Paa kat, iŋ aando di, gee ku aaɗaag Sawuul iciiga, ŋu saliig ɗo barner ho ŋu aaliig aar durdurrer ka geegirdi.
44009026	Hiyya, Sawuul amiltu min Damaas, ŋa birtu Zeruzaleem. Min ŋa ottu, ŋa rak n̰ume iŋ maajirna. Kar ŋuur gay gina kolaw asaan ŋu aamniygigɗo misa kadar ŋa aaɗa Iisa iŋ gelbin rakki.
44009027	Kar Barnabaas gay ooyga ho ŋa iyiicog ɗo paliinnar. Ŋa osiico iŋ maman Sawuul taliig Rabbin bayniiji ɗo botol ta Damaas ho iŋ maman Rabbin kaawiiji. Kar ŋa osiico a maman ŋa gaartu kaaw bal kolaw iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi ɗo geeger ka Damaas.
44009028	Min ŋaar-ak, Sawuul n̰umtu iŋ ŋuura ho ŋu ɓaawiy asiyo Zeruzaleem sawa, ho Sawuul kaawiy kaaw ta Buŋdi bal kolaw iŋ siŋ ku Rabbine.
44009029	Ŋa kaawiy oki ɗo Yuudinna kuuk kaawa Grek ho ŋu meelgiyo. Kar ŋuur gay illa bariya botol taat ŋuu deen̰ji di.
44009030	Min gee kuuk aamin iŋ Iisa Masi doriit kaaw-at, ŋu ɓaawtu gasin̰ Sawuul, ŋu imilig kara min ɗo geegirdi ho ŋu toliytu yoo Sezare. Min eɗe-ak, ŋu n̰aamiiga, ŋa ɗeettu Tars.
44009031	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Egliz goy iŋ aapiye ɗo kiɗ ka Zuude yoo kiɗ ka Galile iŋ ka Samari. Gee ku Eglizdi-ak obtu tirit ɗo botol ta Buŋdi, ŋu karmiyaat kaawoy ho iŋ gudurre ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi, ŋu wadiriy iŋ uŋco.
44009032	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Piyer teestu jaawe kee ɗo atti ka darre okintiti. Kar ƴiriy rakki, ŋa dakiig gas gee ku Buŋdi kuuk goy Lidda.
44009033	Min Piyer ottu ɗo wer-ak, ŋa gastu gem rakki siŋji Eene. Ŋaar gay ruŋgiye. Elgin porpoɗ, ŋa weƴa ka daŋlil di.
44009034	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa kaawiiji aman : « Eene, Iisa Masi coolin̰ciŋ. Ucu ho maliyig gamnan̰. » Ek di ŋa uctu puruk kaƴ asin̰ji.
44009035	Hiyya, gee okin̰co ku Lidda iŋ gee kuuk goy ɗo kiɗ ka patal ka Saroon taliig gem ka cool-aka ho ŋu aamintu ɗo Rabbin Iisa.
44009036	Kar gin geem rakki ɗo geeger ka Jappa ŋu kolaat Tabiita taat aamin iŋ Iisa. (Siŋ kuuk Tabiita-ak, iŋ kaaw ta Grek kaawa a « Dorkaas ».) Geem-at kun kawta, ta gina samaane ɗo geemir ho gaminti oki, ta beraag ɗo pokirnar.
44009037	Min Piyer goy misa Lidda di, ta galtu raɗuwa kar ta mattu. Ŋu aciit momta-ata, kar ŋu dakiit ɗeer kuwa ka gusuurdi.
44009038	Min maajirna kuuk goy Jappa dortu kadar Piyer goy moota, Lidda di-ak, ŋu n̰aamtu gee seera. Ŋu dakiiji kaawa aman : « Gem kol siŋte, baan̰u ! Asnin̰ ja koɗok-koɗok. »
44009039	Hiyya, Piyer uctu pasuwat ho ŋa ɓaawtu iŋ ŋuura. Min ŋu ottu, ŋu iyiig wer kaak ŋu ɗeerit momta-ata. Murgilgal okin̰co asiig gas Piyer iŋ alin̰co ho ŋu teesiiji gaare kesuun taat Tabiita orpitu wiktin taat ta goyiy misa iŋ odinti.
44009040	Piyer kaawiico ɗo gee-ak a ŋuu amile kara, kar ŋa dersitu inde Buŋ. Min ŋa inditu Buŋ, ŋa newsiitit ɗo momta-ata ho ŋa koliit aman : « Tabiita, ucu ! » Hiyya, ta piliig odinti. Min ta taliig Piyer, ta uctu, ta goytu iŋ baati.
44009041	Ɗo wer-ak, Piyer obiig pisinti, ŋa copiliita, ta peytu. Kar ŋa koliig murgilgal-aku ho iŋ gee ku aamine, ŋa gaariicot ta nooye.
44009042	Gee okin̰co kuuk ɗo geeger ka Jappa doriit kabarre-ata ho gee dakina aamintu ɗo Rabbin Iisa.
44009043	Piyer taaytu eɗe ɗo ger ka Simon, gay amƴe zamimdi.
44010001	Gin gem rakki ŋu kolaag Korney, min geeger ka Sezare. Ŋa tatkaw ka askirnar miya. Askirin kuuk guul werco rakki-ak, ŋu kolaag askirin ku Itali.
44010002	Gem-ak sellen̰. Ŋa abdiya Buŋ iŋ geen̰ji ku geriy okin̰co. Ŋa oya ɗo pokirna kuuk Yuudinna ho salaan ta Buŋdi gay, ŋa warrayɗo.
44010003	Ƴiriy rakki, iŋ pat subba ta maako, ŋa taliig ɗubil ka Buŋdi bayniiji waraŋ ɗo geriy. Ɗubil-ak koliig aman : « Korney ! »
44010004	Wiktin taat Korney taliiga-ak, kolaw gay obiiga. Ŋa telkiiji aman : « Maa di gem kol Rabbiney ? » Ŋaar gay telkiiji aman : « Buŋ cokiyit salaanen̰ ho ŋa talig pisin̰ji kaak ki beriy ɗo pokirnar-aka. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋa pakirjiŋ kat lociŋ.
44010005	Kar diŋ di, n̰aam gee ɗo geeger ka Jappa, ŋu ɓaayiy kole gem rakki siŋji Simon ŋaa ase. Ŋaar di ŋu koliy pey Piyer.
44010006	Ŋaar martey ka gem rakki ŋu kolaag oki Simon, ŋaar kaak amƴa zamam. Geriy moota iŋ bi ka barrer. »
44010007	Wiktin taat ɗubil ka Buŋdi gaasit kaawoy, ŋa ɗeettu. Min pa-ak, Korney koliig gay riyoy seer iŋ askirin̰cey rakki kaak obit kaaw ta Buŋdi bombo.
44010008	Hiyya, Korney osiicog gamin okin̰co kuuk kuuniye, kar ŋa n̰aamiig Jappa.
44010009	Ka kawtinti iŋ ƴiriyo, wiktin taat gee ku Korney ɓaay misa ɗo botildi ho ŋu gaay ko ote Jappa, Piyer gay coktu ka gerdi a ŋaa salkiye.
44010010	Mey gay diyaaga ho ŋa rak tee. Wiktin taat ŋu giniiji misa tee-ak, ɗo salaaner, Buŋ gaariiji maanna.
44010011	Ŋa tala samaan pile ho maan ar zimilla paaya min kuwa. Zimilla-ak, ŋu obig biŋkico pooɗikco.
44010012	Kar ɗo ɗatik ta zimilla-ak gay, gin ay biyaw ta kumnar : kuuk asin̰co pooɗi, kuuk poypiyaw ho iŋ kuuk zewaw.
44010013	Ɗo wer-ak, Piyer dortu gaaƴ ɗiyaaji aman : « Piyer ucu, obu min kumin-aŋku, daa, kii tee ! »
44010014	Piyer gay telkiiji aman : « Ha’a, gem kol Rabbiney ! Ƴiriy rakki nu bal tee kumin kuuk ki toɗtu-aŋku kuuk niga gemo ɗo uŋjiŋ. »
44010015	Gaaƴ-at ɗeeliiji pey aman : « Maan kaak Buŋ diyig samaane, dak ɗiyenno a ŋa samaanno. »
44010016	Gaaƴ-at ɗeeltu paa di dees subba, kar ta coontu ka samaaner.
44010017	Ɗo wer-ak, Piyer ajbiytu maala ɗo maan kaak ŋa taltu, asaan ŋa bal ibine baay. Sando, ɗo wiktin taar-at, gee kuuk Korney n̰aamtu-ak inde ko wer kaak Simon gay amƴe zamimdi goyiyo, ho diŋ gay, ŋu ot ko ɗo bit ka botildi.
44010018	Min ŋu un̰jitu, ŋu koliig gem ka gerdi ho ŋu indiig aman : « Simon kaak ŋu koliy oki Piyer goy ɗo ger-aŋka walla ? »
44010019	Piyer gay goy misa, ŋa pakira ɗo maan kaak ŋa taltu, ho ɗo wiktin taar-at di, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi kaawiiji aman : « Piyer, yaman gee subba indaaciŋ kure.
44010020	Ucu, paayu, ɓaa iŋ ŋuura. Ɗak poocenno, asaan nun kat n̰aamgu. »
44010021	Hiyya, Piyer paaytu, ŋa dakiig ŋaam gee-aku, kar ŋa ɗiyiico aman : « Nun ko-aŋka kaak ku bariyiyo. Ku bariyin-an oy di ? »
44010022	Ŋuur gay telkiiji aman : « Nin-aŋ, Korney tatkaw ka askirnar-aŋ kat n̰aaminti. Ŋaar gem kaak goy iŋ botol ho ŋa abdiya Buŋ. Yuudinna okin̰co sa ozilaaga. Ho ɗubil ka Buŋdi gay kaawji a ŋaa n̰aame gee, ŋuun̰ kole, kiiji ɓaawe ɗo geriy, ŋaa cokiye kaawnan̰. »
