54006015	Baynin̰ji-ak yaa kuuniye ɗo wiktin taat meen̰ji Buŋ diytu. Ŋaar keeji di Sultan kaak taɓ, Galal tan̰ji gaasaaɗo tak-tak, Ŋa Sultan ka sultinniidi ho ŋa Rabbin ka rabbinniidi.
54006016	Ŋaar keeji di kaak matɗo. Ŋa goy ɗo portikaw taat waan sa ɓaatiɗo moota. Ginno waan kaak talga ho ginno waan kaak yaa gedire talin̰ji. Horoomine ho iŋ gudurre loci doo ! Aamin.
54006017	Ɗo ŋuur kuuk gay gamnar kuuk goy ɗo adiy ka kiɗar-aŋ, kaawco a ŋu jaalenno ziŋkico. Kaawco a ŋu diyenno kaƴco ɗo malle kaak yaa uce us maala. Kar gay, ŋuu diye gelbinco iŋ Buŋ. Ŋaar kat beraate ay maanna, ŋa beraate dakina, ampa kat gii aaciye.
54006018	Kaawco a ŋuu gine selliŋkaw, ŋuu kuuniye gay gamnar ɗo gamin kuuk samaane ŋu giniyo, ŋuu gine oyaw ho ŋuu ɗeeɗguwe gaminco iŋ gee ku pey.
54006019	Ya ŋu gina pa-ak, ŋuu n̰ume malle kaak samaane ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho kaak neginda ucaaɗo usu. Ansii kat, ŋuu gase goye kaak taɓ.
54006020	Gem kol roŋji Timote, obig gamin kuuk Buŋ beriijiŋ-aŋ samaane ɗo adin̰. Gooƴ zin̰ min meel taat bal baati ho taat arro iŋ imaan. Gooƴ oki zin̰ min meel taat gee talaat ar ŋa ibine kaak taɓ, kar sando ta raadine.
54006021	Gee daarin̰ icig ibine ŋaar-aka. Ampaa ko, ŋu jagtu serek min imaan. Buŋ yaako barkiyiŋko okiŋko. Nu ooyko dakina.
55001001	Ŋa nun Pool kat siiraat maktumne-anta. Nun paliine ka Iisa Masi iŋ niyin ta Buŋdi, naa gaare kaawoy taat ŋa kaawtu a ŋaa bere goye ka gaasɗo. Goye-ak, gee gasaag iŋ n̰ume kaak iŋ Iisa Masi.
55001002	Nu siiraat lociŋ ɗo kiŋ Timote. Kiŋ nu elgiciŋ ar roŋ ka meendu. Tatte Buŋ ho iŋ Rabbinte Iisa Masi yaan̰ barkiye, ŋuu tale aminduwin̰ ho ŋuun̰ iye aapiye.
55001003	Nu ozila Buŋ kaak nu abdiyiy iŋ gelbin kaak cawar ar kaak aginiydu gintu awalle. Wiktin taat nu inda Buŋ, nu ozilgiyga ɗo bi kan̰ji ho aando ƴiriyo, nu rawatɗo bin̰.
55001004	Nu moyig zulin̰ji kuuk wiktin taat gi totiriyo ho nu raka a illa gii ŋaame kat adir yaa miine iŋ galal.
55001005	Nun bal rawte maman ki aamintu ɗo Iisa Masi iŋ gelbin rakki. Imaanji-at ar ta yaako ta yaarko Loyiiz ho ta yaako Eenis gintu min awalle. Kar diŋ oki nu iban tam kadar imaan taar-at di goy ɗo gelbinen̰.
55001006	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, nu iskiiciŋ a kii obin̰ samaane bere ka Buŋdi kaak ŋa barkiyin̰ciŋ ɗo wiktin taat nu leetu pisindu ɗo kaan̰.
55001007	Asaan Buŋ balte bere ruwwin taat un̰ja kolaw, kar gay taat bera gudurre, ele ho iŋ gedire ɗo ziŋkar.
55001008	Pa-ak, dak ginenno sokan̰ ya ki kaawa ɗo geemir ɗo bi ka Rabbinte. Nun ŋu obintu daŋaayne ɗo bi ka Kabarre ta Gala. Ŋaar-ak, dakor ginenno oki sokan̰ tak-tak. Kar gay, ooyit taaɓine ɗo bi ka Kabarre ta Gala iŋ gudurre taat Buŋ beriijiŋ ar nun oki ooyiita.
55001009	Ŋaar Buŋ kat jilinte ho doɓinte a gii kuuniye geen̰ji. Ŋa balinte doɓe ɗo saan ta riy taat samaane gi gintu, kar gay, ŋa doɓinte iŋ niyin ta meen̰ji ho iŋ barkin tan̰ji. Ŋa berten barkin-an iŋ botol ta Iisa Masi min Buŋ bal kilgiyin misa duniine
55001010	ho ŋa gaarten kat diŋka iŋ ase ka Iisa Masi, Gay Jilinte. Ŋaar ko gedirtit ɗo muuti, ho iŋ gaare ka Kabarre ta Gala, ŋa bayinteg waraŋ goye ka gaasɗo.
55001011	Buŋ doɓintu paliine, ŋa berduut Kabarre ta Gala-at ɗo pisindu a naa gaarinti ho naa ɓilde gee iŋ taara.
55001012	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, nu taaɓiyiy ɗo daŋaayner-aŋka. Kar gay, nu ginno sokan̰, asaan nu ibingig waan kaak nu aamintu loci ho nu iban tam kadar ŋa gin gudurre taat ŋaa gooƴin̰ maan kaak ŋa beriidu nam ƴiriy taat ŋa asiy ɗukume seriin ɗo geemir.
55001013	Kaawin kuuk taɓ nu ɓildiciŋ-ak, obig ɗo adin̰ ho gaarig ɗo geemir. Goy bombo ɗo imaan ho ɗo ele kaak Buŋ beriy ɗo ŋuur kuuk n̰um iŋ Iisa Masi.
55001014	Buŋ berji amaanne taat taɓ. Dummiyit samaane iŋ gudurre ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi taat goy iŋ ginte.
55001015	Ki iban kadar gee kuuk aamine kuuk goy ɗo kiɗ ka Aazi, okin̰co rasintu. Minninco-ak goy oki Pigeel ho iŋ Hermozeen.
55001016	Kar Onesipoor gay, Rabbin yaa barkiyin̰ iŋ geen̰ji, asaan ŋaa iskintu dakina. Ŋa baldu gine sokan̰, nun kaak goy ɗo daŋaayner,
55001017	kar gay, min ŋa ottu ɗo geeger ka Room di, ŋa bariyin kee nam ŋa gasintu.
55001018	Nu inda Rabbin ŋaa tale aminduwiy ɗo ƴiriy taat ŋa asiy ɗukume seriine. Ka seener, kiŋ oki ibingit tam riyoy taat ŋa gintu lotu ɗo geeger ka Epeez.
55002001	Gem kol roŋji, iŋ barkin ta gi gastu min ɗo Iisa Masi-an, zeeɗu kii goye bombo.
55002002	Kaawin kuuk ki dortu amil min ɗo bir ɗo uŋco ka saadinna ku dakin-ak, gaarcog ɗo gee kuuk ŋu amniyaagu, kuuk nec ɓilde gee ku pey.
55002003	Icit taaɓin iŋ nunu ar ki askirin̰ kaak taɓ ka Iisa Masi.
55002004	Ya askirin̰ raka a tatkuwiy yaa ozilin̰ji-ak, ŋaa tale riyoy di ho isgigɗo iŋ riy ta gee kuuk askirnaɗo.
55002005	Kar ɗo gee kuuk kaasuma iŋ gaɗi, ŋaar kaak pakig een̰ji gasaatɗo haginey ya ŋa bal karmiyin̰ gaanuun ka gaɗir.
55002006	Gay gawnar kaak taaɓiya jelket-jelket ɗo morgoy, ya gamnay nee, illa meen̰ji ja aawaag awalle.
55002007	Gem kol roŋji, pakirit samaane kaaw taat nu kaawiijiŋ-anta ho Rabbin yaan̰ gaaye kii ibine baati okintiti.
55002008	Kii pakirguwe ɗo Iisa Masi. Uudin ta Kabarre ta Gala kaawtu, ŋaar min tamba ta sultan Dawuud ho Buŋ nooyig min ɗo muuti. Taar ko Kabarre taat nu gaariy-anta
55002009	ho ɗo bi kanti ko, nu taaɓiyiy nam ŋu ɗuuniig pisindu ar nu gem kaak jookumo. Kar kaaw ta Buŋdi gay, ŋu gediraaɗo ɗuuninti.
55002010	Ansii ko, nu iciit taaɓin-an okintit ɗo kaar ɗo bi ka ŋuur kuuk Buŋ doɓtu. Paa kat, ŋuur kuuk n̰um iŋ Iisa Masi, ŋuu gase jile ho iŋ darjin taat gaasɗo tak-tak.
55002011	Kaawin kuuk diŋ naan̰ kaawe-aŋ, ŋuur nec gee okin̰co yaa obin̰ bombo : « Ya gi mat iŋ Iisa Masi, gii goye oki iŋ ŋaara.
55002012	Ya gi ica subiraw ɗo taaɓiner, gii hokumiye iŋ ŋaara ɗo meennuwiy. Kar ya gi poocaag gay, ŋaar oki yaate poocinte.
55002013	Ya gi gina maan kaak iŋ botiliiɗo, ŋaar gay ginaag doo iŋ botiliy. Asaan ŋa tatarro ɗo maan kaak meen̰ji kaawtu. »
55002014	Kii moyguwin̰ gamin-aŋ ɗo gee kuuk aamine ho kiico kaawe waraŋ iŋ siŋ ku Buŋdi a ŋuu giɗenno ɗo bi ka baaco ta kaawnar di. Giɗaw, taar gaayɗo gem iŋ maanna, illa ta rawtaag ŋuur kuuk cokiyaata.
55002015	Zeeɗu, kii peye ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ar gem kaak tur Buŋ yaa ozile ho ar gay riyor kaak ginno sokan̰ ɗo riyoy ho kaak gaariit kaaw taat ka seener iŋ botilti.
55002016	Dak un̰jenno kaan̰ ɗo kaawin kuuk bal baaco ho kuuk kuunayɗo iŋ imaan. Asaan gee kuuk gina ampa-ak, ɗatikco yaa gine serek iŋ Buŋ gaay iŋ gaayo.
55002017	Gee ŋuur-ak, ɓildin̰co ar mut kaak gorn̰aw. Min gee-ak goy oki Himene ho iŋ Pileet.
55002018	Ŋuur rasit botol ta taɓ. Ŋu kaawa a Buŋ nooyig ko gee min ɗo muuti. Ansii ko, ŋu jagiig gee dakina min ɗo imaanco.
55002019	Kar gay, gee kuuk aamin ɗo Iisa Masi, ŋuur goy ar dulaayinna ku gerdi. Dulaayinna-ak, Buŋ kat pingu ho ŋu goyiy bombo. Dulaayinna-ak, ŋu siirco aman : « Rabbin Buŋ ibingig geen̰ji ku meen̰ji. » Ho pey aman : « Ŋaar kaak kaawa a ŋa gem ka Buŋdi-ak, ŋaa etire serek min ɗo gamin kuuk iŋ botilcoɗo. »
55002020	Ɗo ger ka gay gamnar, kii gase parkak dakina. Ɗo ƴiriy ta iidiner, ŋu imila parkak ku daabner iŋ ku poddiner. Kar ƴiriy ta maalaŋ gay, ŋu imila parkak kuuk ŋu waƴtu waƴe wala kuuk ŋu pintu pine.
55002021	Ansi-ak, gem kaak cal ziy min gamin kuuk jookum-aŋ, ŋaar ar parkak ku iidiner-aŋku. Ŋa gin ko cawar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ŋa nec ko ginin riy ta tatkuwiy ɗo botilti. Ho ŋa siy ko ziy ŋaa gine ay riy taat samaane.
55002022	Gem kol roŋji, dak un̰jenno zin̰ ɗo ɗubilaw. Kar gay, zeeɗu kii bariye botol ta selliŋkaw, ta imaan, ta elindi ho ta aapiyer iŋ gee kuuk inda Rabbin Buŋ iŋ gelbin kaak cawar.
55002023	Rasit oki meel taat maala, bal baati. Kiŋ iban tam kadar meel, taar iya giɗuwa.
55002024	Kar gay riyor ku Rabbin Buŋ gay, ŋuur giɗɗo iŋ gee. Illa gay, ŋuu ginguwe selliŋkaw ɗo gee okin̰co, ŋuu ibine ɓilde gee ho wiktin taat gee osaagu, ŋuu ice subiraw.
55002025	Ɗo gee kuuk ooyɗo kaawo, ŋuuco gaarin seene iŋ kaaw taat oola. Paa kat, wal Buŋ yaaco gaaren di botol taat ŋuu ibinin̰ nigin̰co, ŋuu jipte goyin̰co ho ŋuu ibinin seen ta Buŋdi.
55002026	Paa kat, kaƴco yaa ase, ŋuu amile min ɗo pise ka Seetanner kaak obiig awalle ŋu giniy maan kaak ŋa rakiyo.
55003001	Gem kol roŋji, iban tam kadar ɗo menaw ku ba aaro, wer yaa ase raɗa.
55003002	Ɗo wiktin taar-at, gee yaa tale adat ku maaniico di ho ŋu talenno gurus. Ŋuu kaawe ɗo uŋco ka geemir a ŋuur di gee, ŋuu jaale ziŋkico, ŋuu nige biŋkico iŋ Buŋ ho kaawco ɓaaɗo iŋ aginiyco. Ya waan beraaco maan sa, ŋu ozilaagɗo ho ŋu karmiyaagɗo gamin ku Buŋdi.
55003003	Ŋu tallo amindaw ta geemir, ŋu saamayɗo, ŋu os gee, ŋu gedarro ɗo ziŋkico ho ya ŋu tala gee taaɓiyaw, ŋuur gay galco. Gelbinco rakaaɗo tak-tak gamin ku samaane kuuk Buŋ rakiyo.
55003004	Ŋu isan ɗo geemir, ŋu gina gamin bal kaƴco. Ɗo goyin̰co a illa ŋuu jaalguwe ziŋkico kon di. Ŋu el galal ta duniiner pak Buŋ.
55003005	Ŋu gaar ziŋkico ar ŋu gin imaan, kar ɗo kaƴco gay, ŋu pakira kadar ta ar maan ka maala kaak ginno gudurre. Gee ŋuur-aŋ, pik botilco serek.
55003006	Min gee-aŋku, daarin̰co un̰jiy ko ɗo geray ku geemir, ŋuu caaciyaag daaɗ kuuk imaanco bal paaye caari a ŋuu ooye kaawco. Daaɗ-ak, zunuubinnico dakina. Ŋu aaɗa ay galal ta ziŋkico di.
55003007	Daaɗ-ak el cokiye ɓilde ka marbinto, kar gay, ŋu gedarro ibinin seen ta Buŋdi.
55003008	Ŋuur kuuk caaciyaag daaɗ-ak poocit seene uudin taat awalle Janees iŋ Jambirees poociig kaawin ku Muusa. Gee ŋuur-ak, pikirrico jookumo ho imaanco sa yaa uce us maalan di ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
55003009	Kar gee-ak gay, riyco ɓaaɗo iŋ uŋti asaan gee okin̰co yaa ibinin̰ kadar ŋu gee kuuk bal gine kaƴ, ar awalle ŋu ibiniig raade kan̰ Janees iŋ Jambirees.
55003010	Kar kiŋ gay, wiktin ta nu ɓildiy gee, ki cokiyintu. Ki tal maman nu goyiyo, gamin kuuk nu giniyo, imaandu, subirruwir, elindu, maman nu diyiy gelbiner ɗo riyor,
55003011	maman ŋu taaɓiyintu ho maman nu taaɓiyiyo. Ki ibingit taaɓin okintit taat asdu ɗo geeger ka Antiyoos, ka Ikoniyoom iŋ ka Listir. Maa taaɓinir taat nu bal aawinti ! Kar Rabbinte jilgiinu min ay taaɓine.
55003012	Ka seener, ŋuur kuuk n̰um iŋ Iisa Masi ho raka goye sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ŋuu taaɓiyin̰co okin̰co.
55003013	Kar gee kuuk jookumo ho caacay gee gay, jookumuwco-at yaa gaaye gaayen di. Ŋuur kuuk caaciya gee, goy oki kuuk yaa caaciyin̰co.
55003014	Kar kiŋ gay, ob tirit ɗo ɓilde kaak ki gastu ho kaak ki ooytu iŋ gelbin rakki. Ki ibingig ŋuur kuuk ɓildin̰ciŋ.
55003015	Min ki kapak di, ki ibingig ko makaatamna ku Buŋdi. Ŋuur kuuk beraaji ilim kii gase jile kaak asa min imaan taat ɗo Iisa Masi.
55003016	Ay maktumne ta Buŋdi, taar kaaw ta meen̰ji Buŋ. Kaaw-at, taar ta ɓilde seen ta Buŋdi, ta gaayaag gee yaa ibinin̰ nigin̰co, ŋuu yeepe ɗo botol taat samaane ho ŋuu goye goye kaak Buŋ rakiyo.
55003017	Ampaa kat, gay riyor ka Buŋdi yaa kuuniye gem kaak siy ko ziŋkay tak a ŋa nec gine ay riy taat samaane.
55004001	Ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho ɗo uŋji ka Iisa Masi, ŋaar ko yaa ase ɗukume seriin ɗo gee kuuk goya iŋ kuuk mate ho ŋaa tee Meennuwiy, cokay nu kaawaajiŋ waraŋ aman :
55004002	Ya gee raka cokiye kaawnan̰ wala ya ŋu rakaaɗo oki, wakal gaarit kaaw ta Buŋdi. Ɓildig gee ho iskig okin̰co. Ɗo ŋuur kuuk jaawa badam, kii gaarin̰ nigin̰co ho kiico leese. Okintit-an, ginit iŋ subirraw dakina.
55004003	Asaan wiktin yaa ase taat gee ooyaagɗo tak-tak ɓilde kaak taɓ-aŋka. Illa ŋuu ele galal ta ziŋkico ho ŋuu n̰ume gay ɓildindi dakina kuuk yaaco kaawe kaawin kuuk dora gala ɗo ɗeŋger di.
55004004	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋuu tirin̰ ɗeŋginco ɗo seen ta Buŋdi a ŋuu cokiye maliyin kuuk gee imiliy min ɗo kaƴco di.
55004005	Kar kiŋ gay, gedar ɗo zin̰ ɗo ay maanna, icit taaɓin ɗo kaan̰, ginit riy ta gaare Kabarre ta Gala, ho kuunay gay riyor ka Buŋdi kaak ginaat riyoy iŋ botilti.
55004006	Kar nun gay, wiktin taat naa rasin duniine gaay ko. Nu ber ko zir ar satkin ɗo Buŋdi.
55004007	Nu taasin̰ taasin̰ka taat taɓ, nu gaasig ko wer ka gaɗir ho nu ob baati ta imaan.
55004008	Min ƴiriyta, hagin taat ŋuu bere ɗo ŋuur kuuk nosire eraan kuwa ka samaaner. Hagin-at, ŋa kadumuul kaak Buŋ beriy ɗo ŋuur kuuk goy goye kaak iŋ botiliy, asaan Rabbin Iisa Masi, ŋaar gay ɗukume seriiner iŋ botilti. Ŋaar kat yaadu berinti ɗo ƴiriy taat ŋaa ɗukume seriin ɗo geemir. Ŋa beraaduutɗo lotu di, kar gay, ŋaa berin oki ɗo ŋuur okin̰co kuuk era asin̰ji iŋ gelbin rakki.
55004009	Zeeɗu, kii ase koɗok-koɗok kiin gasindu.
55004010	Nu rakiy kii ase-ak, asaan siŋte Demaas, ŋaar el galal ta duniiner kat paka ho ŋa rasintu, ŋa ɗeet ɗo geeger ka Tesalonik. Kresans gay ɗeet kar ɗo kiɗ ka Galaasi ho Tiit sa ɗeet ɗo kiɗ ka Dalmasi.
55004011	Anne-aŋ ɗak ko Luk di iŋ nunu. Ya ki asaw, iyig oki Maark, asaan ŋa nec gaayindu dakina ɗo riyor.
55004012	Kar Tisik gay, nu n̰aamig kar ɗo geeger ka Epeez.
55004013	Ya ki asaw, iyorduut batkor ta usi taat nu rastu wer kan̰ Karpuus ɗo geeger ka Trowaas. Iyig oki makaatamna. Dak rawtin̰coɗo kuuk ŋu siytu iŋ zamam-aku.
55004014	Alekzandir kaak garpo nigdu dakin aale. Rabbin yaaji yeepin uudin taat ŋa gintu.
55004015	Kiŋke oki goy goɗom min ŋaara, asaan ŋaar poocig tak-tak ɓildinte.
55004016	Ɗo wiktin taat awalle ŋu iyintu ɗo uŋco ka gay ɗukume seriiner nu osiy bir, ginno gem kaak gaayintu. Okin̰co, ŋu rasintu. Buŋ yaaco saamiye.
55004017	Iŋ taar-an oki, Rabbin goy iŋ nunu. Ŋa berdu gudurre nu gaariit Kabarre ta Gala ɗo geemir nam okin̰co kuuk Yuudinnaɗo sa cokiyta. Nun ar gem kaak Rabbin jilig min ɗo biy ka boorir.
55004018	Rabbin yaan jilindu min ɗo ay maan kaak jookumo ho ŋaan iyindu ɗo Meennuwiy kuwa ka samaaner. Locin di darjine elgin iŋ elgina ! Aamin.
55004019	Ooyco ɗo kun̰ Priska iŋ mitti Akilaas ho iŋ geen̰ji ku Onesipoor.
55004020	Erast, ŋaar ɗak ɗo geeger ka Korent ho Tropim gay, nu rasig ɗo geeger ka Mile asaan ŋa raɗaw.
55004021	Zeeɗu kii ase koɗok-koɗok min us daaɗo misa-aŋka. Kun̰ Ebuluus, Pudans, Linuus, Kilodiya ho iŋ siŋta okin̰co kuuk aamine ooyji dakina.
55004022	Rabbin, ŋaa goye iŋ kiŋke. Ŋaako barkiyiŋko okiŋko ! Nu ooyko dakina.
56001001	Nun Pool, ɓerre ka Buŋdi kat siirit maktumne-anta. Nun paliine ka Iisa Masi a naa iyin̰ ŋuur kuuk Buŋ doɓtu-ak a ŋuu obin imaanco bombo ho ŋuu ibinin̰ samaane ɓilde kaak Iisa ɓildiigu.
56001002	Hiyya, ŋuu diye ɗo kaƴco kadar ŋu asa goye iŋ ŋaar tak-tak. Asaan awalle, min Buŋ kilgiyiit duniine, ŋa kaawco ko ɗo geen̰ji a ŋu asa gase goye ka gaasɗo. Hadi ginte iban kadar Buŋ, ŋaar raadɗo tak-tak.
56001003	Buŋ doɓtu wiktine a ŋaa gaarin kaawoy ɗo geemir iŋ riyor taat nu giniyo. Ta taar-an ko riy ta jile geemir taat Buŋ kaawiidu a naa gine ho ŋa beriiduut ɗo pisindu.
56001004	Kiŋ Tiit, nu icin̰ciŋ ar ki roŋdu ka meendu, asaan seerte gi aamin ɗo Iisa Masi. Nu indaajiŋ Tatte Buŋ iŋ Gay Jilinte Iisa Masi, ŋuun̰ barkiye iŋ ŋuun̰ iye aapiye ɗo gelbinen̰.
56001005	Wiktin taat nu uctu min kiɗ ka Kreet, nu indin̰ciŋ a kii ɗake, kii gaasin riy taat ɗak annere. Riy taat nu rakiy ki gine gay, kii lee agindaw ku Eglizdi ɗo ay geeger ka Kreet. Wiktin taat nu goy iŋ kiŋke nu taaƴin̰ciŋ aman :
56001006	Tatkaw ka Eglizdi, ŋaa goye goɗom. Ŋaa obe daatik rakki di. Kooginay sa yaa aamine iŋ Iisa Masi. Ŋuur sa yaa goye goɗom ho ŋuu karmiyin̰ aginiyco.
56001007	Buŋ, ŋaar berjit riyoy ɗo tatkaw ka Eglizdi. Ɗo taar-an ko, ay tatkaw ka Eglizdi yaa gine gem sellen̰. Ŋaa ginenno gem kaak a tan̰ji di yaa tee ho ŋaa dapin̰enno mun̰jam. Ŋaa sakriyenno ho ŋa koocenno een̰ji. Ŋa ginenno gem kaak diya gelbiney ɗo maan ka gemor.
56001008	Illa tatkaw-ak yaa gine gem kaak oba gee gerci ho ŋaa gine gem kaak el gine riy taat sellen̰. Ŋaa ginenno gem ka hallel. Ŋa eerro gee. Ŋaa nigenno ho ŋa gedirji ɗo ziy.
56001009	Amaanney ta taɓ taat gee gaariiji yaa goye bombo. Ansi-ak, ŋaa gedire gaaye een̰ji iŋ ɓilde ka seene ho ŋaaco gedire ɗo gee kuuk meelaw.
56001010	Nu ɗiyiiji ansi-ak, asaan gee dakina goy ku pooca ice kaaw ta agindaw ku Eglizdi. Ka seener gay, gee ŋuur-ak goy ɗatik ta ŋuur kuuk ɗiya aman : « Gee kuuk amine, okin̰co yaa ɗukumen̰ ja seln̰o. » Gee ŋuur-ak ɓilda een̰co iŋ kaawin kuuk ɗo botilcoɗo a ŋuu jagin̰ min botol ta taɓ.
56001011	Kar kiŋ Tiit gay, toɗco ŋuu ɓildenno gee. Asaan ya ŋu ɓilda gee iŋ kaawin kuuk ɗo botilcoɗo-ak, ŋu niga geray ku geemir. Ŋu ɓildiy gee pa-ak, asaan ŋu rakiy gase minninco gurus.
56001012	Taaye, gin nabiin̰ce rakki min gee ku Kreet kaak kaaw aman : « Gee ku Kreet, ŋuur el raade, ŋu ar kumin ku yeero kuuk motilay, ŋu zegilay ho teen̰co gay teenno. »
56001013	Kaaw ta nabiin̰cer-an ɗo botilti. Hadi ya kaawoy-at kat goy di ɗo botilti gay, kiŋ, zeeɗu, leesco dakina asaan ŋuu aamine ɗo kaawte.
56001014	Pey ŋu cokiyenno kaawin ku Yuudinna imiltu min ɗo kaƴco ho ŋu aaɗiyɗo pey aadanna ku gee kuuk poocit kaaw ta seener.
56001015	Ɗo gee kuuk bal nige ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ginno maan kaak yaa nigin̰co min kara. Kar ɗo gee kuuk nigaw ho amnayɗo ɗo Iisa gay, min gamin kuuk ŋu giniyo, ginno maan kaak sellen̰. Kun kawta, ŋu pakira ko ɗo gamin ku jookum di ho ŋu eergigɗo gamin kuuk sellen̰ iŋ gamin kuuk jookumo.
56001016	Gee kuuk amil min ɗo botildi-ak, ŋuur ɗiya a ŋu ibingig Buŋ, kar goyin̰co gay gaarro kadar ŋu ibingig Buŋ ka seener. Gee ƴilaagu, ŋu karmayɗo Buŋ ho ŋu gedarro gine maan rakki kaak sellen̰ oki.
56002001	Kar kiŋ Tiit gay, gaarco ɗo geemir ɓilde kaak taɓ.
56002002	Kaawco ɗo jaminnar a ŋuu gedire ɗo ziŋkico, ŋuu goye goɗom ho ŋuu goye goye kaak gee yaa karmiyin̰co. Ŋuu obin pey imaanco bombo, ŋuu elguwe ziŋkico ho ŋuu icguwe subirraw.
56002003	Iŋ taar-an ko, kiico ɗiye ɗo ajusinna a ŋuu goye goye kaak Buŋ rakiyo ɗo gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu giniyo. Ɗiyco a ŋuu osenno een̰co ho ŋuu peye min see kaak aale. Ɗiyco a ŋuu taaƴe een̰co iŋ taaƴe kaak samaane.
56002004	Iŋ taar-an kat, ŋuu gaare ɗo een̰co daaɗ ku cewey maman ŋuu goye. Ŋuuco gaare maman ŋuu elin̰ midiyco iŋ kooginco,
56002005	maman ŋuu goye goɗom ho ŋuu taleŋ ko midiyco di. Maman ŋuu obe geriyco, ŋuu gine cawar ho ŋuu karmiye midiyco. Paa kat, waan nigiyɗo biy iŋ kaaw ta Buŋdi.
56002006	Ɗo ɗubal iŋ gemsa oki, kondirco ɗo leesindi a ŋuu goye goye kaak Buŋ rakiyo
56002007	ɗo gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋu giniyo. Kiŋ Tiit sa gin taat sellen̰ asaan ɗubal iŋ gemsa-aŋ yaa ice botilin̰. Ya ki ɓilda gee sa, ɓildig iŋ ɓilde kaak iŋ botiliy, paa kat, ŋuun̰ karmiye.
56002008	Illa kaawon̰ yaa ase ɗo werti di. Waan gediraaɗo yaan̰ meele. Ansi-ak, sokan̰ yaa deen̰ adinte ŋu gediriyɗo gase maan kaak jookumo min lote.
56002009	Ɗo ɓerrinar, ɗiyco a ŋuu ginin riyco taat geen̰co ɗiyiico a ŋuu gine. Ansi-ak, yaaco aawe gala. Ŋuu meelin̰coɗo geen̰co.
56002010	Ŋuu kokinin̰coɗo. Illa ŋuu gine taat geen̰co yaa ozilin̰co. Ampa-ak, iŋ goyin̰co, gee yaa karmiyin kaaw ta Buŋdi, Gay Jilinte.
56002011	Asaan Buŋ, ŋaar gaarit barkiney taat ŋaa jilin̰ gee okin̰co.
56002012	Taar ko gaaraate maman gii jipte goyinte, gii poocin̰ gamin kuuk goy ɗo duniiner. Ansii kat, gii ibine ɗo goyinte ho gii goye goye kaak Buŋ rakiyo ho sellen̰ ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
56002013	Iŋ taar-an ko, gii diye ɗo gelbinte ɗo ƴiriy ta taɓ taat gi eriyo. Ƴiriy taar-at kat, Iisa Masi kaak Buŋte ho Gay Jilinte yaa yeepe iŋ darjiney.
56002014	Ɗo bi kanteŋ ko, Iisa Masi rastu ziy, ŋu deeyiiga asaan ŋaate jilinte min ɗo gamin kuuk samaanno ho ŋaate acin̰ zunuubinnite. Ansi-ak, gii gine geen̰ji, gii zeeɗe gine taat samaane.
56002015	An ko kaaw taat kiico kaawe iŋ zeeɗe. Kiico leese ho kii gaayin̰co. Dak rasenno gee yaan̰ gine ar maan ka maala.
56003001	Kiŋ Tiit, ɗeelcot kaaw ɗo gee ku Buŋdi a ŋuu karmiyin̰ agindaw ku darrer yoo gaanuunco. Ɗeelco a ŋuu gine taat sellen̰ ɗo een̰co.
56003002	Ɗiyco a ŋuu diyenno kaaw ɗo een̰co, illa ŋuu gine sellen̰ benannico. Ŋuu goye dalullay iŋ gee okin̰co.
56003003	Asaan awalle ginte oki gee kuuk oliyay, gi newsiji kop ɗo Buŋdi, gi jag min botol taat samaane. Gi gin ɓerrin ku gamin okin̰co ar ele ka maanni ho gamin kuuk bera galal. Gi el nigen di. Gi hasuudinay. Gi gina taat gi rakiy di. Gi ello ziŋkite.
56003004	Kar gay, Buŋ kaak jilinte gaarte selliŋkuwiy iŋ elin̰ji lote okinte.
56003005	Ŋa jilinte min ɗo zunuubinnar asaan ŋa tal aminduwte. Ŋa balte jilinte asaan gi gin taat iŋ botilti. Buŋ jilinte iŋ Ruwwiney taat ŋa beriite. Ta acteŋ zunuubinnite. Gi gintu gee kuuk marbinto ho gi ictu goye kaak marbinto.
56003006	Buŋ miinteŋ gelbinte iŋ Ruwwin ta Iisa Masi kaak Gay Jilinte beriite.
56003007	Ansi-ak, Buŋ iŋ elin̰ji, ŋa gininte gi goyiy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji asaan gii gine kooginay kuuk yaa gase goye ka gaasɗo kaak gi eriyo.
56003008	Ka seener, kaaw-an ɗo botilti. Ansii ko, nu rakiy a kiiti wakile ɗo kaaw-anta. Asaan ŋuur kuuk aamin ɗo Buŋdi yaa zeeɗe gine sellen̰. Kaaw taar-an yaa gaayin̰ gee okin̰co.
56003009	Kar gay, kaway min gamin ku tambaar, kaway min gee kuuk el giɗuwa ho kuuk el meelo ɗo bi ka gaanuundi. Asaan gamin ar ŋuur-aŋ bal gine paydinco. Ŋu gaayɗo gee.
56003010	Ya goy gem kaak el eere gee, karumga, kar kiiji ɗeele pey. Ya ŋa icɗo gay, kiiji newse kopo.
56003011	Kiŋ iban kadar gem kaak gina ansi-ak, ŋaar jag min ɗo botol taat samaane. Ya ŋa ɓaa ansi di-ak, ŋa tara ziy ka meen̰ji.
56003012	Nu rakaan̰ n̰aame gem rakki kaak ɓaan̰ make : Artemaas wala Tisik. Ya ŋa ote, uc parak ki asiin gasindu koɗok ɗo geeger ka Nikopoliis asaan nun ic niyine, nu raka gaasin ribba eɗe.
56003013	Baan̰u, gaayig Zenaas gay ɗukume seriiner, iŋ Apoloos. Obco wero ɗo martuwco. Nu rakaaɗo maan yaaco arme.
56003014	Ɗo siŋtite sa, illa ŋuu ibine kadar ŋuu gaaye gee kuuk ya gamin armaaco. Ansii kat, goye ka gee ku Buŋdi uciyɗo maala.
56003015	Siŋta okin̰co kuuk goy anne iŋ nunu ooyjiŋ dakina. Kiŋ sa, ni ɗiyaajiŋ : ooyco ɗo siŋtite kuuk elgiite kuuk goy annere. Okiŋko, Buŋ yaako barkiyiŋko. Nu ooyko dakina.
57001001	Maktumne-an, nun Pool iŋ siŋte Timote kat siirta. Nun, ŋu obintu daŋaayne asaan nu kaawa ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi. Ni siirit loci, kiŋ Pilemon. Ki roy ka bini ho ki gaayaani ɗo riy ta Iisa Masi. Ni ooyjiŋ dakina.
57001002	Ooyti ɗo boote Apiya. Ooyiy oki ɗo siŋte Arsip, ŋaar kaak zeeɗa iŋ nini ɗo totire ka Kabarre ta Gala. Ɗo Egliz kaak n̰uma ɗo gerin̰ oki, ooyco dakina.
57001003	Tatte Buŋ ho Rabbinte Iisa Masi yaako barkiyiŋko ho yaako iye aapiye.
57001004	Kun kawta, ya nu inda Buŋ, nu rawatɗo bin̰. Nu dela barkin ɗo Buŋdi ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ,
57001005	asaan gee kaawa ɗo bi ka imaan taat ki gintu ɗo Rabbinte Iisa Masi ho ɗo ele kaak ki elgig gee ku Buŋdi.
57001006	Nu inda Buŋ a imaan taat n̰uminte yaa sin̰je iŋ uŋti. Ansii kat, kii ibinin̰ ay maan kaak gi gintu iŋ goye kaak gi goyiy iŋ Iisa Masi.
57001007	Gem kol siŋji, iŋ ele kaak ki elgiy gee, adir miin iŋ galal ho ki ɗeŋrin dakina. Ka seener, ki ɗeŋrig gelbin ka gee ku Buŋdi.
57001008	-
57001009	Ka seener, nu gin botol naan̰ kaawe ɗo maan kaak kii gine. Kar gay, nu rakaaɗo gine pa. Ansi-ak, nu indaaciŋ ɗo saan ta elindi di. Nun Pool, ki iban kadar nu zaɓ ko ho ŋu obintu daŋaayne ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi.
57001010	Kar diŋ gay, nu indaaciŋ ɗo bi ka Onezim kaak ar roŋ ka adir ɗo daŋaayner-aŋka.
57001011	Awalle, ŋa baljiŋ gine riy samaane, kar diŋ gay, ŋa obte wer seerte.
57001012	Ŋaar-ak, nu n̰aamaajiŋga, ŋaar kaak nu elgig min ɗo adir.
57001013	Ka seener, nun goy ɗo daŋaayner ɗo bi ka Kabarre ta Gala. Nu raka ŋaa goye iŋ nunu a ŋaan gaayindu ɗo wiktin taat ki ginno.
57001014	Kar gay, nu gediraaɗo gine maan bal kaawon̰, asaan nun asiraacinno, illa iŋ niyin ta meen̰jiŋ.
57001015	Tuuliy Buŋ imilig Onezim min ɗo pisin̰jiŋ ɗo wiktin sooɗ di, kar diŋ gay, ŋaa yeepeŋ ko, ŋaa goye tak-tak.
57001016	Dak talin̰jiɗo pey ar ɓerre. Ŋaar pakgig ko ɓerre serek, ŋaar siŋjiŋ ɗo Iisa Masi. Nu elgig dakina, kar kiŋ gay yaa elin̰ pey paka. Kii elin̰ji-ak asaan ŋa gem ar kiŋke ho asaan ŋa siŋji oki ɗo Iisa Masi.
57001017	Hadi, ya kiŋ kat icintu ar royan̰, ya Onezim-ak ote, obig ar ŋa nun di.
57001018	Ya ŋa nigjiŋ wala ya ki aaɗaag ɗaana, diyduut ɗo kaar.
57001019	Nun Pool ko siirjiŋ kaawin-aŋku iŋ pise ka meendu. Naan̰ kappiye ay maan kaak ki giniiji ɗo kaay ka Onezim. Kar gay, kiŋke sa, ki iban kadar nu aaɗaaciŋ ɗaana. Nu gaayin̰ciŋ ki aamintu ɗo Iisa Masi, taar-at ko ɗaanan̰.
57001020	Gem kol siŋji, iŋ ele kaak ki elgig Rabbinte, nu raka ki ginin riy taat nu rakiy-anta. Ampa-ak, ɗeŋrig gelbiner iŋ siŋ ku Iisa Masi.
57001021	Iŋ siire kaak nu siiriijiŋ-aŋ, nu iban kadar kii gininti ho kii gine pak taar-anta oki.
57001022	Kar nu inda pey maan ka pey : kiidu bariye zuga, asaan nu iban kadar Buŋ yaa cokiyin̰ indiŋko. Ŋaan imilin min ɗo daŋaayner ho naako ɓaawe.
57001023	Epapraas sa, ŋu obig daŋaayne anne iŋ nunu, asaan ŋa gaara kaaw ta Iisa Masi. Ŋa ooyjiŋ dakina.
57001024	Eendu kuuk ni giniy riy ta Buŋdi, kun̰ Maark, Aristaark, Demaas iŋ Luk sa ooyjiŋ dakina.
57001025	Rabbinte Iisa Masi yaako barkiyiŋko okiŋko. Nu ooyko dakina.
58001001	Awalle, iŋ biŋka ku nabiinnar, Buŋ deesco kaawe ɗo aginiyte iŋ botilay dakina.
58001002	Diŋ gay, ɗo wiktin ta ba aaro, ŋa kaawte lote iŋ biy ka Roŋji. Iŋ ŋaar ko, Buŋ kilgiyiit duniine iŋ gamin okin̰co kuuk goy kuwa ho keɗer, ho ŋa rasiijig okin̰co-aŋ ɗo pisin̰ji.
58001003	Iŋ Roŋ ŋaar-ak ko, gee taliy portikaw ta darjin ta Buŋdi, ho iŋ ŋaar ko, gee yaa ibinin̰ Buŋ, ŋaar maman, asaan Roŋ-ak ara ko ŋaar di tak. Gamin okin̰co kuuk kuwa ho keɗer-ak goy iŋ gudurre ta kaawoy. Min ŋa piltu botol a gee yaa gine cawar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ŋa daktu goy ka samaaner ɗo meeday ta ŋaar kaak gin gudurre pakgig gamin okin̰co.
58001004	Ampaa ko, Buŋ gaartu kadar Roŋ-ak pakgig ɗubal ku Buŋdi serek. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋa diyiiji oki siŋ kuuk pakgig kun̰co.
58001005	Ka seener, ƴiriy rakki, Buŋ bal kaawe ɗo rakki min ɗubilji aman : « Kiŋke-aŋ ko Roŋdu, min ƴiriyta-aŋ, ŋuu ibine kadar nun ko takko. » Ho ŋa bal kaawe tak-tak ɗo bi ka rakki minninco aman : « Nun, naa gine Tacco kan̰ji ho ŋaar gay yaa gine Roŋdu kanto. »
58001006	Kar gay, Roŋ ka Buŋdi, ŋaar di kaaco ka gamin okin̰co. Wiktin taat Buŋ rakiy n̰aamin̰ Roŋji ɗo duniiner, ŋa kaawtu aman : « Ɗubal ku Buŋdi okin̰co yaa abdiyin̰ji. »
58001007	Ɗo bi ka ɗubilji-ak, Buŋ kaawtu aman : « Ɗubal kunto, ŋuur ar usu ho gay riyor kunto, ŋuur ar lesas ku aki. »
58001008	Kar ɗo Roŋji gay, ŋa kaawji aman : « Kiŋ kaak Buŋ, ki goy doo ka sees ka sultan. Ki hokumiyaag gee iŋ botol.
58001009	Ki el gamin kuuk iŋ botilco ho kuuk jookum gay, ki ƴilaagu. Ampaa ko, kiŋ kaak Buŋ, Takko Buŋ doɓin̰ciŋ a ki pakgig een̰ji ho iŋ sewe kaak ŋa etiliijiŋ ɗo kaan̰-ak, adin̰ gintu portiko. »
58001010	Buŋ kaawtu pey aman : « Rabbine, ɗo teesindi, ŋa kiŋken di kilgiyig kiɗa ho samaan sa, ŋa kiŋken di siyig iŋ pisin̰jiŋ.
58001011	Gamin okin̰co kuuk ki kilgiytu-aŋ yaa bire, kar kiŋ gay goy doo. Gamin kuuk ki kilgiytu-ak yaa zooɗe ar kesuun zooɗiyo.
58001012	Ar batik taat ŋu maliyiita, kii maliyin̰ gamin-aku. Ŋu asiy makin̰co ar kaak gee makiy kesuune. Kar kiŋ gay makaaɗo, ki goy uudinen̰ di ho menuwin̰ gaasaaɗo tak-tak. »
58001013	Ƴiriy rakki, Buŋ bal kaawe ɗo rakki min ɗubilji aman : « As goy ɗo meedar nam wiktin taat naaco gedire ɗo adinen̰, ŋuu gine wer ka lee asin̰jiŋ. »
58001014	Ka seener, ɗubal ku Buŋdi okin̰co, ŋuur ruwwinnay kuuk gina riy ɗo Buŋdi. Buŋ n̰aamiig a ŋuu gaayin̰ gee kuuk yaa gase jile.
58002001	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak, zeeɗinte gii obe tirit ɗo kaaw taat gi dortu a gi jagaaɗo min botol taat samaane.
58002002	Ka seener, kaaw taat ɗubal ku Buŋdi iyiico ɗo aginiyte, taar ic kat riyti. Ŋaar kaak bal karmiyin kaaw-ata ho ŋa aalta, ŋa gasit tan̰ji uudin ta nigin̰ji.
58002003	Ya ŋuur kuuk awalle bal karmiyin kaawo gasit tan̰co, maman gii imile kaƴte ya gi ginig bees jile kaak taɓ-aŋka. Jile ŋaar-ak, Rabbin meen̰ji ko gaarig awalle. Kar ŋuur kuuk cokiyig iŋ ɗeŋginco gay ɗiyte kadar kaaw-at ka seener.
58002004	Buŋ meen̰ji gaay pey ɗo kaawco iŋ gamin kuuk ŋa gintu ɗo ɗatikte : ay gamin kuuk ajbay, kuuk gaara gudurrey ho iŋ bere ka Ruwwiner kaak Buŋ ɗeeɗiico ar kaak ŋa rakiyo.
58002005	Ka seener, ɗo bi ka duniin taat yaa ase taat gi kaawiy biti-an, Buŋ balco berin ɗo pise ka ɗubilji.
58002006	Kar gay, ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : « Gem gay, ŋaar waa kina, ki pakiriy kaaci ? Roŋ gemor gay, ŋaar waa kina, ki taliy kaaci ?
58002007	Ɗo wiktin sooɗ, ki ginig kapak nam ɗubal ku Buŋdi din sa pakgiga. Ki berji darjine ho horoomin ar sultan
58002008	ho gamin okin̰co, ki berjig ɗo pisin̰ji. » Ya Buŋ berig gamin okin̰co ɗo pisin̰ji, ŋaar-ak gaara kadar ginno yoo maanna kaak ŋa balji berin̰ ɗo pisin̰ji. Kar diŋ gay, gi tallo misa kadar gamin okin̰co-aŋ goy ɗo pisin̰ji.
58002009	Kar gay, maan kaak gii gedire ibine-ak, ŋaar ko aŋka : ɗo wiktin sooɗ, Iisa, Buŋ ginig kapak nam ɗubal ku Buŋdi din sa pakgiga. Kar diŋ gay, ŋu berji darjine ho horoomin ar sultan, asaan ŋa seet taaɓin ta muuti. Ansi-ak, iŋ barkin ta Buŋdi, ŋa icit muut ɗo kaay ɗo saan ta gee okin̰co.
58002010	Buŋ kilgiyig gamin okin̰co ho iŋ ŋaar ko, ŋu goyiyo. Buŋ raka iye gee dakina ɗo darjiney ar kooginay iŋ botol ta Iisa Masi. Ampaa ko, Buŋ gintu a Iisa, ŋaar kaak yaa pile botol ta jile geemir, ŋaa biren̰ ja min ɗo taaɓiner, kar kat, ŋaa nece tak ar kaak Buŋ rakiyo.
58002011	Iisa ko pil botol a gee yaa gine cawar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ampa-ak, Iisa ho iŋ ŋuur kuuk cawar-aku, okin̰co, ŋuu gine ar gee kuuk tacco rakki. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ŋa kolaagu a siŋtar ho sokan̰ daggigɗo.
58002012	Paa ko, ŋa kaawtu ɗo Buŋdi aman : « Naa kaawe ɗo siŋtar ɗo bi kan̰jiŋ. Ɗo wer kaak gee n̰um dakina, naa ozilin̰ siŋjiŋ. »
58002013	Ŋa kaawtu pey aman : « Nun, naa diye amaanner okintiti ɗo Buŋdi. » Pey aman : « Nun ko aŋka iŋ gee kuuk Buŋ beriidu ar kooginar. »
58002014	Uudin taat koogin-aŋ okin̰co, baarco ho ziŋkico, ŋuur ku geemir di, Iisa oki ic zi ar kan̰co ho goyin̰ji sa ar ka geemir. Awalle, ŋaar kaak gin gudurre ta muuti, ŋaar Seetanne. Kar Iisa gay, iŋ muutuy, ŋa imiliit gudurre ta Seetanner tak-tak
58002015	ho ŋuur kuuk ɗo goyin̰co okin̰ji, ŋu ar ɓerrina asaan ŋu gina kolaw ɗo muut-at, ŋa imiliit koluwco.
58002016	Asaan ka seener, asin̰ji kaak ɗo duniiner, ŋa bal ase a ŋaa gaaye ɗubal ku Buŋdi. Kar gay, ŋa as gaaye tamba ta Ibraayim.
58002017	Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ɗo ay maanna, illa ŋaa are siŋtay. Ansii ko, ŋaa kuuniye mee satkiner ka tatko kaak tala amindaw ta geemir ho kaak gina riy ta Buŋdi iŋ botilti. Ansi-ak, ŋaa imilin̰ zunuubinna ku geemir a ŋaa amrin̰ iŋ Buŋ.
58002018	Uudin taat Iisa meen̰ji seet taaɓine ta gecindi, ŋa nec mogin̰ ŋuur kuuk goy ɗo gecindi.
58003001	Gem kol siŋtay, ɗo saan taar-an, diyon pikirriko ɗo Iisa Masi. Ka seener, ku kuuniy gee ku Buŋdi ho ŋa koliŋko a ku ɓaayiy goye ka samaaner. Diŋ gay, pakiroŋ ɗo Iisa Masi, ŋaar gay tabiriikar ka Buŋdi ho ŋaar ko mee satkiner ka tatko ɗo imaan taat gi gaariyo.
58003002	Awalle, uudin taat Muusa ginit riy taat gaara kadar Buŋ nec amniyin̰ji ɗo geriy okin̰ji, Iisa oki gaar kadar Buŋ kaak diyig ɗo riyor-ak nec amniyin̰ji.
58003003	Ka seener, ar kaak ŋu jaaliig siŋ ku gem kaak pina gero pak ger meen̰ji, Iisa oki, ŋuu jaalin̰ siŋji kuwa pak Muusa.
58003004	Geray okin̰co gin gay pinin̰co. Kar ŋaar kaak pinig gamin okin̰co gay, ŋa meen̰ji Buŋ.
58003005	Muusa gay, ka seener, ŋaar nec a Buŋ yaa amniyin̰ji ar gay riyoy ɗo ger ka Buŋdi okin̰ji. Riyoy-at ta gaare ɗo geemir kaaw taat Buŋ asiy kaawe neginda.
58003006	Kar Iisa Masi gay, ŋaar nec a Buŋ yaa amniyin̰ji ar Roŋ kaak goy ɗo kaay ka ger ka Buŋdi. Kar geriy-ak gay, ŋaar ginte, ya gi zeeɗa obe tirit ɗo imaante ho ɗo maan kaak gi eriyo. Maan kaak gi eriy-ak ɗeŋraate gi kaawiy bal kolaw ɗo uŋco ka geemir.
58003007	Ɗo saan taar-an, uudin taat Ruwwin ta Buŋdi kaawiy aman : « Ƴiriyta, ya ku cokiyaat gaaƴ ta Buŋdi,
58003008	dakoŋ tirin̰coɗo ɗeŋginko ar kaak aginiyko gintu ɗo wiktin taat ŋu poociiga ho ŋu geciig ɗo goosiner.
58003009	Ka seener, Buŋ kaaw a ɗo menaw-ak, aginiyko talig gamin okin̰co kuuk nu gintu ɗo elgin kuuk orok pooɗ. Kar iŋ taar-at oki, ŋu poocintu ho ŋu gecintu.
58003010	Ampaa ko, adir nigtu iŋ gee-aku ho nu kaawtu aman : ‟ Gee-aŋ, pikirrico jaga jagen di. Ŋu bal ibinin̰ maan kaak nu eriy minninco. ”
58003011	Ansii ko, iŋ adir ka nige-ak, nu togiltu aman : ‟ Ŋu un̰jaaɗo tak-tak ɗo wer ka jamiyner kaak nu siyiico ! ” »
58003012	Gem kol siŋtay, goyoŋ goɗom, paa waan minninko adiy yaa gine pondiko nam ŋa aaminiyɗo ho ŋaaji newse kop ɗo Buŋ kaak goy mento.
58003013	Kar gay, kun kawta, iskiguwoŋ ziŋkiko. Ansii kat, yoo waan minninko, rasiyɗo ziŋkay a zunuubinna yaa caaciyin̰ji ho kaay yaa gine bombo. Ginguwoŋ pa ɗo wiktin taat kaaw taat a « Ƴiriyta » goy tiya misa.
58003014	Ka seener, ya gi oba tirit yoo gaasuwa ɗo imaan taat gi gastu, ŋaar-ak, gi geen̰ji ku Iisa Masi ko.
58003015	Ansii ko, ŋu siirtu ɗo Kitamner aman : « Ƴiriyta, ya ku cokiyaat gaaƴ ta Buŋdi, dakoŋ tirin̰coɗo ɗeŋginko ar kaak aginiyko pooctu kaawoy. »
58003016	Ŋaar-ak, ŋuur kuuk cokiyit gaaƴ-ata ho poocit kaawoy, ŋu kun̰ waa ? Ŋu gee okin̰co kuuk Muusa imiltu min darre ta Meser.
58003017	Ɗo elgin kuuk orok pooɗ, Buŋ, adiy nigtu-ak iŋ kun̰ waa ? Adiy nig iŋ ŋuur okin̰co kuuk gin zunuubinna ho mat ɗo goosiner.
58003018	Ɗo wiktin taat Buŋ togiltu aman : « Ŋu un̰jaaɗo tak-tak ɗo wer ka jamiyner-ak », ŋa togil ɗo kun̰ waa ? Ŋa togil ɗo ŋuur okin̰co kuuk poocit kaawoy.
58003019	Ansii ko, gi ibintu kadar gee-ak bal un̰je ɗo wer ka jamiyner-aka, asaan ŋu pooc aamniye ɗo Buŋdi.
58004001	Buŋ kaaw a ŋaa pile botol ɗo geemir ŋuu un̰je ɗo jamiyner-ata. Ho kaawoy-at, taar tiya yoo ƴiriyta. Ampa-ak, zeeɗinte a minninko, yoo waanna goyaaɗo kaak yaa pakire a ŋa as ba aaro ho ŋa gediraaɗo un̰je ɗo wer-aka.
58004002	Asaan gi dorit kabarre ta samaane taat kaawa ɗo bi ka jamiyner-at ar kaak awalle ŋuur oki doriit ɗo goosiner. Kar locoŋ gay, kabarre-at uc usu asaan ŋu bal ooyin iŋ imaan.
58004003	Kar ginte kuuk aamin gay, gii un̰je ɗo jamiyner-ata. Ɗo bi ka jamiyner-at, Buŋ kaaw aman : « Iŋ adir ka nige-ak, nu togiltu aman : ‟ Ŋu un̰jaaɗo tak-tak ɗo wer ka jamiyner kaak nu siyiico ! ” » Kar sando, min Buŋ gaasiit riyoy ta kiliiginer, wer ka jamiyner-ak, ŋaar goy ko.
58004004	Ka seener, ɗo bi ka ƴiriy ta peesiriŋkar, wer rakki ɗo Kitamner ŋu kaaw aman : « Buŋ gaasit riyoy okintit iŋ mena bijigiƴ. Ɗo ƴiriy ta peesiriŋkar gay, ŋa jammiytu. »
58004005	Pey ɗo wer kaak gi garkiyiy diŋka-aŋka, Buŋ kaaw aman : « Ŋu un̰jaaɗo tak-tak ɗo wer ka jamiyner kaak nu siyiico. »
58004006	Ŋuur kuuk awalle dorit kabarre taat samaan-at baltu un̰je ɗo wer jamiyner-ak, asaan ŋu pooc karmiyin̰ Buŋ. Kar gay, goy gee kuuk yaa gedire un̰je ɗo wer-aka.
58004007	Ansii ko, Buŋ diytu pey wiktin taat gee yaa un̰je ɗo wer-aka ho ŋu koliit a « Ƴiriyta ». Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, ɗo Kitamner, Buŋ kaawtu iŋ biy ka Dawuud aman : « Ƴiriyta, ya ku cokiyaat gaaƴ ta Buŋdi, dakoŋ tirin̰coɗo ɗeŋginko. »
58004008	Zer, ya ka seener, Zoozuwe iyiig aginiyte bal kaawo ɗo wer ka jamiyner-ak, min taar-an, Buŋ kaawaaɗo pey ɗo bi ka ƴiriy ta pey.
58004009	Ampaa ko, ar kaak Buŋ jammiytu min ɗo riyoy ta kiliiginer iŋ ƴiriy ta peesiriŋkar, botol ta jamiyner ar taar-an goya ɗo gee ku Buŋdi oki.
58004010	Ka seener, gem kaak un̰je ɗo wer ka jamiyner kaak Buŋ siytu-ak, ŋaa jammiye min ɗo riyoy ar Buŋ jammiytu min tan̰ji.
58004011	Ansi-ak, zeeɗinte gii un̰je ɗo wer ka jamiyner-aka. Gininte iŋ ay botol pa waan minninte yaa aaɗe ta aginiyte kuuk tar ziŋkico ɗo wiktin taat ŋu pooctu karmiyin̰ Buŋ.
58004012	Ka seener, kaaw ta Buŋdi, taar ar maan kaak goy mento ho ta gina riyti iŋ gudurre. Ta ar seepin kaak biŋkay paaɗ pakgig paaɗe ka ay seepine. Ta un̰ja ɗo gemor nam ta ɗeeɗiig gelbine iŋ ruwwine ho ta kiliig ŋaamiik ta kaasir iŋ loolo. Pikirre iŋ kaawin kuuk goy ɗo adiy ka gemor oki, ta bayniigu ya ŋu samaane wala ŋu samaanno.
58004013	Min gamin okin̰co kuuk Buŋ kilgiytu, ginno kaak cigil ɗo uŋji. Kar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi, ŋaar kaak gii ose biŋkiteŋ gay, gamin okin̰co-aŋ, ŋa ibingig rakki rakki ho ŋa talaagu waraŋ.
58004014	Min gi gin ko mee satkiner ka tatik pakgig gay satkiner okin̰co, ŋaar-ak obinte bombo ɗo imaante taat gi gaariyo. Mee satkiner-ak coon ka samaaner. Ŋaar ko Iisa, Roŋ ka Buŋdi.
58004015	Ka seener, gi gin mee satkiner ka tatko kaak nec adiy yaa raɗin̰ji ɗo wiktin taat gudurrite sooɗa. Asaan iŋ gece kaak ŋu geciiga, ŋa aawit taaɓin okintit taat gi aawiyo, kar gay, ŋa bal gine zunuubinna kat bat.
58004016	Ŋaar-ak, sin̰jinte moota bal kolaw ɗo wer kaak Buŋ hokumiyiy iŋ barkiney. Eɗeŋ ko, Buŋ yaa tale aminduwte ho ŋaate bere barkiney-ata. Ampaa kat, ŋaate jorkinte ɗo wiktin taat ya duniin gasinte.
58005001	Ka seener, ay mee satkiner ka tatko, ŋu doɓig min ɗatik ta geemir a ŋaa gine riy ta Buŋdi ɗo bi kan̰co. Riy-at, ŋaa iye gamin ku berindi ɗo Buŋdi ho ŋaaji gine satkine ɗo bi ka zunuubinna ku geemir.
58005002	Gay satkiner-ak nec tale amindaw ta ŋuur kuuk ibanno maanna ho jagaw, asaan ŋaar meen̰ji oki aawaat gudurrey sooɗa ɗo gamin dakina.
58005003	Ɗo saan ta gudurrey taat sooɗ-ata, illa ŋaa ginen̰ ja satkin ɗo zunuubinna ku meen̰ji, kar kat ɗo ku geemir.
58005004	Waan gediraaɗo darjiye ziy a ŋa mee satkiner ka tatko. Illa Buŋ kat kola gemo a ŋaa gine riy-ata ar awalle, ŋa koliig Haruun.
58005005	Iisa Masi oki, ŋa meen̰jiɗo kat darjiy ziy a ŋa mee satkiner ka tatko. Kar gay, ŋa Buŋ kat darjiyga, wiktin taat ŋa ɗiyiiji aman : « Kiŋke-aŋ ko Roŋdu, min ƴiriyta-aŋ, ŋuu ibine kadar nun ko takko. »
58005006	Ɗo wer ka pey, ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : « Kiŋ gay satkiner kaak goy doo ar Melkisedek. »
58005007	Wiktin taat Iisa goytu ɗo duniiner, ŋa inditu Buŋ ho ŋa loklikiiji iŋ koriya ho iŋ zulan̰ oki. Ŋa indiig ŋaar kaak nec jilin̰ min ɗo muuti ho ɗo bi ka karaamin taat ŋa karmiyiig Buŋ, Buŋ cokiyiig alin̰ji.
58005008	Ŋa Roŋ ka Buŋdi. Kar iŋ taar-ata oki, ŋa ɓilde karaamin iŋ botol ta taaɓiner.
58005009	Iŋ goyin̰ji, wiktin taat ŋa nectu ko tak ar kaak Buŋ rakiyo, ŋa piltu botol a gee okin̰co kuuk icit kaawoy yaa gase jile kaak goy doo.
58005010	Buŋ diyig mee satkiner ka tatko ar kaak ŋa diyig Melkisedek-aka.
58005011	Ɗo bi ŋaar-aŋ, ni gin kaawin dakina kuuk niiko kaawe. Kar gay, gaarin̰co yaa gine raɗa, asaan diŋ, kaƴko icɗo koɗok.
58005012	Wiktin-an nec ko zer kuu garkiye gee. Kar sando, illa ŋuuko garkiyiŋko pey iŋ gamin ku melen̰ ɗo bi ka kaaw ta Buŋdi. Kuŋko-aŋ ar koogin kuuk siya misa buwa, yampa, ande, ku gediraaɗo teen̰ji.
58005013	Ŋaar kaak siya buwa-ak, ŋaar ar mic kaak ibanno misa maan kaak samaane iŋ kaak samaanno.
58005014	Kar ande gay, ŋaar ɗo gee kuuk aginda kuuk usin ko eerin̰ gamin kuuk samaane iŋ kuuk samaanno, asaan taar ko taat ŋu gingiy ɗo goyin̰co.
58006001	Ŋaar-ak, rasinteŋ gamin kuuk melen̰ ɗo bi ka Iisa Masi ho newsinte ɗo gamin kuuk kuuniy ɗo gee kuuk aginda. Gi yeepaaɗo pey ɗo kuuk melen̰-aku. Gamin-ak, ŋuur ko aŋku : ibine ho rase ka nigindi kaak iya gee ɗo muuti, ice ka imaan taat ɗo Buŋdi,
58006002	ɓilde ɗo bi ka batemdi, iŋ lee ka pisindi, nooye ka gee kuuk mate ho seriin taat Buŋ asiy ɗukume ɗo geemir.
58006003	Sin̰jinte iŋ uŋte ! Ŋaar-aŋ ko maan kaak gii gine ya Buŋ pilte botol.
58006004	Pakiroŋ ɗo ŋuur kuuk yeep ɗo goyin̰co kaak awalle. Awalle, Buŋ pilig odinco iŋ portikuwiy, ŋu aawit selliŋkaw taat asa min kuwa ho ŋu gas Ruwwin ta Buŋdi.
58006005	Ŋu elit kaaw ta Buŋdi iŋ galilti ho ŋu aawit gudurre ta goye ka marbinto kaak iŋ imaan.
58006006	Kar iŋ taar-an oki, ŋu yeep ɗo goyin̰co kaak awalle. Gee-ak, gi gediraaɗo pey iyin̰co ka seeriŋkar a ŋuu jipte goyin̰co. Ya ampa-ak, ar ŋuur maaniico ɗooɗaag pey Roŋ ka Buŋdi ka etor ho ŋu iyaaji sokan̰ ɗo uŋco ka geemir.
58006007	Ka seener, morig kaak aay amay ho niyaaco gamin samaane ɗo ŋuur kuuk gawnaaga-ak, Buŋ barkiyga.
58006008	Kar gay, morig kaak amil pompal kuuk gin jamay wala rapiŋga-ak, ŋa ginno paydiney. Ɗakji sooɗ di, ŋuu muwin̰ji ho ŋuuji diye ako a ŋuu idin̰ tak-tak.
58006009	Gem kol siŋtay, ya ni kaawa ampa oki, ni iban tak kadar botol taat ku ictu-an samaane. Taar ko taat iya gee ɗo jilindi.
58006010	Ka seener, Buŋ, ŋaar ginno gamin kuuk bal botol. Ŋa rawtaatɗo riyko ho ele kaak ku gaartu iŋ siŋji ho ku gaariy yoo diŋka ɗo geen̰ji.
58006011	Kar maan kaak ni rakiy minninkoŋ gay, illa kuu zeeɗe kuu obin imaanko yoo ɗo gaasuwar. Ampaa kat, maan kaak ku eriy iŋ imaanko yaa ase tak ɗo weriy.
58006012	Yampa, dakoŋ ginenno zegilay. Kar gay, icon botol ta ŋuur kuuk aamine ho ica subirraw. Gee-ak gasaag maan kaak Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaco bere.
58006013	Ku iban kadar wiktin taat Buŋ kaawiiji ɗo Ibraayim a ŋaaji bere maanna, ŋa togiltu iŋ siŋ ku meen̰ji. Ŋa togiltu iŋ siŋji-ak asaan ginno waan kaak tatik pakgiga.
58006014	Ŋa togiltu aman : « Ka seener, naan̰ barkiye dakina ho naa wadirin̰ kooginan̰. »
58006015	Min Buŋ togiltu pa-ak, Ibraayim subirtu kee nam ŋa gasiig maan kaak Buŋ kaawiiji.
58006016	Ka seener, ya gee togilaw-ak, ŋu togila iŋ maan kaak tatik pakgigu. Ya ŋu togila ampa-ak, kaaw matiyo, ginno pey yeepe ka aaro.
58006017	Ampaa ko, wiktin taat Buŋ kaawtu ɗo Ibraayim-ak, ŋa raka gaare waraŋ ɗo ŋuur kuuk yaa gasin̰ maan kaak ŋa kaawtu kadar ŋa welkaatɗo kaawoy. Ansii ko, ŋa gaayiitit ɗo kaawoy iŋ togiliika.
58006018	Ka seener, maan kaak Buŋ kaawtu ho iŋ togiliikay, seerco makaaɗo tak-tak, asaan ŋa gediraaɗo raade. Ampa-ak, ɗo ginte kuuk rasig gamin okin̰co a gii obe tirit ɗo maan kaak Buŋ kaawtu ho gi eriyo, kaaw-an yaate iskinte dakina.
58006019	Ɗo ginte gay, maan kaak gi eriy-ak gaayaate gi goyiy bombo ar dambi kaak awkiɗo tak-tak. Iŋ maan kaak gi eriy-ak, gi nec aaɗe min ɗo maan kaak ar zimilla ho gii un̰je ɗo wer kaak Buŋ goyiyo, atta ɗo wer kaak cawar aale.
58006020	Ɗo wer kaak cawar aale-ak ko, Iisa ogiriite, ŋa un̰jitu ɗo bi kante. Ampaa ko, Iisa, Buŋ diyig mee satkiner ka tatko kaak goy doo, ar kaak awalle, ŋa diyig Melkisedek-aka.
58007001	Awalle, Melkisedek-ak, ŋaar sultan ka Saleem ho ŋa gay satkiner ka Buŋ ka kuwa. Ƴiriy rakki, wiktin taat Ibraayim nosiriico ɗo sultinnay daarin̰ ho ŋa yeepiy min ɗo gartar, Melkisedek ŋaamiiga ho ŋa barkiyiiga.
58007002	Ɗo wer-ak, min gamin okin̰co kuuk Ibraayim gaamtu min ɗo gartar-ak, ŋa beriiji zakaane ɗo Melkisedek. Min gamin kuuk orok, ŋa beriiji rakki rakki. Melkisedek, ŋaar sultan ka Saleem. Siŋ kuuk Melkisedek-ak kaawa a « sultan kaak hokumiya iŋ botol, » ho kuuk a sultan ka Saleem-ak gay kaawa a « sultan ka aapiyer ».
58007003	Melkisedek-ak, ɗo Kitamner, ŋu bal kaawe a ŋa gin tacco wal yaaco wal aginiyji ku aginda. Ŋu bal kaawe ɗo bi ka ween̰ji wala ɗo bi ka muutuy. Ŋa ar Roŋ ka Buŋdi, ŋa gay satkiner kaak goy doo.
58007004	Taloŋ ja, tatkaw ta Melkisedek ! Ŋa gem tatik nam tatte Ibraayim din sa berji zakaaney min gamnay kuuk ŋa gaamtu min ɗo gartar.
58007005	Ka seener, koogin ku Lebi, ŋuur kuuk gina riy ta gay satkiner, iŋ gaanuun ka Buŋdi, ŋu gin botol ta ice zakaaner min ɗo siŋtico, gee ku Israyeel. Kar sando, ŋuur oki min tamba ta Ibraayim.
58007006	Melkisedek, ŋaar min caar ka Lebiɗo. Kar gay, iŋ taar-at oki, Ibraayim berji zakaane. Kar pey min kaatiya, Melkisedek barkiyiig Ibraayim kaak Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaji bere maanna-aka.
58007007	Kar sando, gee iban tak kadar waan kaak barkiya gem-ak, ŋaar pakgig kaak ŋa barkiyiyo.
58007008	Koogin ku Lebi kuuk ica zakaane min ɗo siŋtico-aku, ŋuur oki mata ar geen di. Kar Melkisedek kaak Ibraayim berji zakaaney-ak gay, ŋaar goy iŋ odinay ar kaak Kitamne kaawiyo.
58007009	Kooginay ku Lebi kuuk ica zakaan-aku, wiktin taat Ibraayim beriit zakaaney ɗo Melkisedek, ta ar tacco Lebi oki berit ko tan̰ji iŋ pise ka Ibraayim.
58007010	Ibraayim-ak, ŋaar min aginiyji ku aginda ku Lebi ho Lebi gay goy misa ɗo maasoy wiktin taat Melkisedek ŋaamiiga.
58007011	Wiktin taat Buŋ beriico gaanuun ɗo gee ku Israyeel, ŋu koogin ku Lebi kat asa gine riy ta gay satkiner. Kar ya botol kat goya taat koogin ku Lebi-ak yaa necin tak riy taat Buŋ rakiyo, maa di Buŋ n̰aamiy gay satkiner ka pey ? Gay satkiner ka pey-ak, ŋaar aaɗɗo botol ta Haruun ar koogin ku Lebi, kar gay, ŋa aaɗa botol ta Melkisedek.
58007012	Kar ya ŋu makaag gay satkiner iŋ kaak aaɗa botol ta pey-ak, gaanuun oki, illa ŋuu makin̰ji.
58007013	Ya ni kaawa ampa-ak, ni kaawa ɗo bi ka Rabbinte. Kar ŋaar gay min caar ka Lebiɗo, ŋa min caar ka pey. Caar ŋaar-ak, ƴiriy rakki, waanco bal gine riy ta gay satkiner.
58007014	Gee okin̰co iban kadar Rabbinte, ŋaar min caar ka Zuuda. Ɗo bi ka caar ŋaar-ak, ƴiriy rakki, Muusa bal kaawe a ŋu gina riy ta gay satkiner.
58007015	Ŋaar-aŋ maan kaak gi talaag waraŋ : gay satkiner kaak pey ŋu kaawiy-ak, ŋaar ar Melkisedek.
58007016	Ya ŋu diyiig gay satkiner, ŋu bal diyin̰ ɗo saan ta gaanuun kaak kaawa ɗo bi ka tambaaco. Kar gay, ŋu diyig gay satkiner, illa iŋ gudurre ta goye kaak idaaɗo tak-tak.
58007017	Ka seener, ŋu siir ɗo Kitamner aman : « Kiŋ gay satkiner kaak goy doo ar Melkisedek. »
58007018	Ampa-ak, gaanuun kaak awalle, ŋu deeyiiga asaan ŋa ginno gudurre ho ŋa bal necin riyoy.
58007019	Ka seener, gaanuun ka Muusa bal nece iye gee a ŋuu nece tak ar taat Buŋ rakiyo. Kar diŋ gay, ŋu gaarte maan ka erindi kaak samaan pak ka awalle ho maanna-ak gaayaate gi sin̰jiy moota iŋ Buŋ.
58007020	Pakiroŋ oki ɗo togiliik ta Buŋdi-ata. Gay satkiner ku awalle, ŋuur gin gay satkiner bal togiliik ar taar-anta.
58007021	Kar Iisa gay, ŋu diyiig gay satkiner iŋ togiliika wiktin taat Buŋ meen̰ji togiliiji aman : « Nun Rabbin kat togile ho nu yeepaaɗo pey aaro : kiŋ gay satkiner kaak goy doo. »
58007022	Paa ko, iŋ Iisa, gi iban tak kadar jamaw taat samaan pak ta awalle yaa ase ɗo werti.
58007023	Min kaatiya, gin maan ka pey : ɗo jamaw taat awalle-at, gee dakina gin riy ta gay satkiner ho ay gem di rasiy ɗo giji, asaan muut rasgigɗo ŋuu ginin riyco doo.
58007024	Kar Iisa gay, ɗo bi ka goyin̰ji ka gaasɗo, ŋaar gay satkiner kaak goy doo.
58007025	Paa ko, ŋuur kuuk asa ɗo Buŋdi iŋ siŋ kun̰ji, ŋaa gedire jilin̰ tak-tak. Ta kuuniytu ampa-ak, asaan doo, ŋa goy mento a ŋaa inde Buŋ ɗo saan tan̰co.
58007026	Iisa kon di mee satkiner ka tatik kaak kuuniyte. Ŋaar goy cawar, bal oorne ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ŋa bal gine zunuubinna. Ŋa goy serek min gay zunuubinnar ho Buŋ coonig kuwa ka samaaner ɗo wer kaak ŋa goyiyo.
58007027	Iisa, ŋaar arro agindaw ku gay satkiner ku pey. Agindaw ku gay satkiner ŋuur-ak, kun kawta, illa ŋu gina ja satkinkan ɗo zunuubinna ku maaniico, kar kat, ŋu giniy ɗo ku geemir. Kar Iisa gay, wiktin taat ŋa bertu ziy satkine ɗo bi kante, ŋa ginit mena rakki di gaasiititi.
58007028	Ɗo gaanuun ka Muusa, ŋuur kuuk ŋu leeyig meennay ku satkiner ku aginda-ak, ŋuur gee kuuk ginno gudurre. Min gaanuun ka Muusa-ak, ta togiliik ta Buŋdi kat as ba aaro. Iŋ togiliik-at, ŋaar kaak ŋa diytu doo mee satkiner ka tatko-ak, ŋaar Roŋji. Buŋ ginig ŋa necit tak riy taat Buŋ rakiyo. Ŋa necit mena rakki di gaasiititi.
58008001	Cokiyoŋ, an baat ta kaawor : gi gin mee satkiner ka tatko ar kaak gi kaawtu ɗak ko biy. Ŋa daktu goy ka samaaner ɗo meeday ta ŋaar kaak gin gudurre pakgig gamin okin̰co.
58008002	Ɗo wiktin ta Muusa, ŋu siy kuraarin ta Buŋdi. Kar diŋ gay, mee satkiner ka tatko-ak gina riyoy ɗo kuraarin ta taɓ. Kuraarin taar-at, Rabbin meen̰ji kat siyta, yampa, ŋu geenno.
58008003	Ay mee satkiner ka tatko, ŋu diyig a ŋaa iye gamin ku berindi ɗo Buŋdi ho ŋaaji gine satkine. Ampa-ak, kante oki, illa ŋaa gine maan ka berindi.
58008004	Kar ya mee satkinte ka tatiko-ak kat goy ɗo kiɗar, ŋa ginaaɗo tak-tak riy ta gay satkiner, asaan kuuk gina riy ta satkiner ar taat gaanuun kaawtu-ak, ŋuur goy ko.
58008005	Ar gem taliy kelmoy ɗo sawwapa, riy ta gay satkiner-ak sa, taar ar kelim ta riy ta taɓ ŋu giniy ɗo wer kaak Buŋ goyiyo. Ŋaar-aŋ ar maan kaak kuuniyji ɗo Muusa ɗo wiktin taat ŋa siyiy kuraarin ɗo Buŋdi. Ɗo wiktin taar-at, Buŋ kaawji aman : « Ya ki siya kuraarne, zeeɗu kii siyin ar taat nu bayniiji ka dambar-aka. »
58008006	Diŋ gay, riy taat Buŋ gaariiji ɗo Iisa Masi-at, taar pakgit taat awalle serek. Kar jamaw taat ŋu diyig Iisa Masi ɗatik ta geemir iŋ Buŋ gay, taar oki pakgit taat awalle serek. Asaan iŋ jamaw-at, maan kaak Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaa gine pakgig ŋaar kaak ŋa kaawtu awalle ɗo gaanuundi.
58008007	Ka seener, ya jamaw ta awalle-at kat necit ko riyti, maman Buŋ yaa obe jamaw ta pey ?
58008008	Kar sando, Buŋ leesco ɗo geen̰ji aman : « Nun Rabbin kat kaawaw : ɗo menaw kuuk yaa ase-aku, naa obe jamaw ta marbinto iŋ gee ku Israyeel ho iŋ ku Zuuda.
58008009	Jamaw taar-at arro taat nu obtu iŋ aginiyco wiktin taat nu imiliig min darre ta Meser ho nu ogiriico. Uudin taat ŋu bal karmiyin jamaw-ata, nun Rabbin kat kaawaw, nun oki newsico kopo.
58008010	Nu kaawa pey aman : ɗo jamaw taat naa obe iŋ gee ku Israyeel-an, ya menaw ŋuur-ak bire, naa un̰jin̰ gaanuundu ɗo kaƴco ho naa diyin̰ ɗo gelbinco. Naa gine Buŋco ho ŋuur gay yaa gine geendu.
58008011	Yoo waan minninco ucaaɗo inde giji wal siŋji a ŋaaji gaare botol taat ŋaan ibinindu. Asaan okin̰co, ŋuun ibinindu, min kuuk aginda yoo kuuk n̰aaɗa.
58008012	Naaco saamiyin̰ nigin̰co okin̰ji ho zunuubinnico gay, nu icaaɗo pey bico tak-tak. »
58008013	Ya Buŋ kolaat jamaw-at a ta marbinto, ŋaar-ak, ar ŋa ginit taat awalle-at maan kaak taay ko. Kar sando, maan kaak taaye ho zaɓ-ak, ŋaar baay gaay ko bire.
58009001	Ɗo jamaw ta awalle-at, Buŋ ber gaanuun kaak gaara maman gee yaa abdiyin̰ji ho goy pey wer ka abaadiner kaak ŋu siytu.
58009002	-
58009003	Ɗo wer ka abaadiner-ak, ta kuraarin taat ɗukum ɗeelna seera iŋ zimilla. Ɗo ɗeel taat bitta taat ŋu koliy « wer kaak cawar », ŋu diy maan ka hadinner biŋkay peesira kuuk gin gindiski ho oba ako. Ta gin oki taabul kaak ŋu liyiy mappa kaak ŋu beriy satkin ɗo Buŋdi. Ɗo ɗeel ta atta taat ŋu koliy « wer kaak cawar aale »,
58009004	ta gin taabul ka daabner kaak ŋu onniy dokkanne. Ta gin oki sandumne taat gaara jamaw taat Buŋ obtu iŋ geen̰ji. Sandumne-at, ŋu siyiit iŋ atay ho aarti gay daabne. Ɗo atti ka sandumne-at, ŋu diy parik ka daabner kaak gin tee kaak ŋu koliy « maan » ho iŋ kuŋgin ka Haruun kaak imil booyaw. Ŋu lee pey tarin̰cilna kuuk Buŋ siirtu gaanuunji ka jamaw ho ŋa beriijiig ɗo Muusa.
58009005	Ɗo kaati ka sandumner, gin gamin seer kuuk ŋu siytu iŋ daabne. Gamin-ak, ar ɗubal ku Buŋdi kuuk ŋu kolaag « seruubinna » ho ŋu gaara kadar Buŋ goy ɗo wer-aka. Kelim ta gezgirco gootaag kaati ka sandumne-ata. Kar diŋ gay, wiktin ginno taat naako osin̰ kaawin-aŋ rakki rakki.
58009006	Gamin okin̰co-aŋ, ŋu leeyig iŋ botilco ɗo kuraarin taat ŋu siytu ɗo Buŋdi ho kun kawta, gay satkiner un̰jigiy ɗo wer ka bitta-aka a ŋuu gine riyco.
58009007	Ɗo ɗeel ta atta gay, illa mee satkiner kaak tatik di un̰ja keeji, mena rakki di ɗo elgol. Wiktin taat ŋa un̰ja ɗo wer-ak, illa ŋa iya baar kuuk ŋu gintu satkin ɗo Buŋdi. Baar-ak, ŋa beriig ɗo Buŋdi ɗo nige ka meen̰ji ho iŋ nige ka geemir kaak bal niyinco.
58009008	Iŋ maanna-aŋ, Ruwwin ta Buŋdi gaariite kadar wiktin taat kuraarin taat ŋu siytu awalle goy misa, waan ginno botol taat ŋaa un̰je ɗo wer kaak cawar aale kuwa ka samaaner.
58009009	Gamin-aŋ gaara maan kaak kuuniya diŋka : gee kuuk abdiyaag Buŋ, ŋuur bera bere ho gina satkinkan ɗo Buŋdi. Kar gaminco-ak necaaɗo ginin pikirrico tak ar taat Buŋ rakiyo.
58009010	Gamin-ak, ŋuur ko kaawin kuuk ɗo bi ka teendi ho ka seendi, iŋ ay ace kaak ŋu aciyo. Kaawin-aŋ, ŋuur ɗo bi ka gamin kuuk gee talaagu di. Aadanna-ak, ŋuu goye kee nam wiktin taat Buŋ asiy makin̰ iŋ kuuk marbinto.
58009011	Kar Iisa Masi gay bayin ar mee satkiner ka tatko a ŋaate bere gamin kuuk samaane kuuk goy ko. Ŋa un̰je ɗo kuraarin taat pakgit serek taar taat ŋu siytu keɗer ho taat nec tak ar taat Buŋ rakiyo pakgita oki. Kuraarin taat ŋa un̰jitu-at, ŋu geenno kat siyta ho min gamin kuuk Buŋ kilgiytu ɗo duniiner-an, taar ginno.
58009012	Masi un̰je mena rakki di ɗo wer kaak cawar aale-aka. Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa bal iye baar ku awgir wala ku ajjalinnar a ŋaa bere ɗo Buŋdi. Kar gay, ŋa ber baar ku meen̰ji kuuk min̰ ɗo saan tante. Taar-an nec ko yaate jilinte tak-tak.
58009013	Ɗo aadin ta Yuudinnar, ŋu erga baar ku awgir iŋ ku barkiydi ɗo geemir a ziŋkico yaa gine cawar. Ampaa di, berka oki, ŋu eriita ho butti gay, ŋu kokiriy ɗo geemir. Ya gamin-aŋ kat nec ginin̰ zi ka gemor cawar oki,
58009014	baar ku Iisa Masi gay pakgig serek ! Iisa Masi, iŋ gudurre ta Ruwwin ta Buŋdi taat goy doo, ŋa bertu ziy ɗo Buŋdi ar satkin taat nec tak ar taat Buŋ rakiyo. Ampaa ko, iŋ baariy, pikirrite yaa gine cawar min gamin kuuk iya gee ɗo muuti. Ansii kat, gii nece gine riy ɗo Buŋ kaak goy mento.
58009015	Iisa Masi, ɗo jamaw ta marbinto-at, ŋaar ko goy ɗatik ta geemir iŋ Buŋ. Ŋa goy ɗatikco a ŋuur kuuk Buŋ koltu-ak yaa gase haginco min gamin kuuk Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaco bere ɗo geen̰ji. Gamin-ak, ŋuur goy doo. Gee-ak gin botol taat ŋuu gasin haginco-at ɗo saan ta muut ta Iisa. Asaan iŋ muutuy-at ko, ŋa jiliig gee min ɗo nigin̰co kaak ŋu nigtu ɗo jamaw ta awalle.
58009016	Ya waan kat siirig malley okin̰ji ɗo katkitdi, wiktin taat ŋu raka ɗeeɗin̰ ɗo kooginay-ak, illa ŋuu ibine ja kadar ŋa mat ka seener.
58009017	Ka seener, maan kaak ŋu siirtu ɗo katkitdi-ak, ŋu ɗeeɗaagɗo ya meen̰ji goy misa iŋ odinay, illa ya ŋa mat ja.
58009018	Ansii ko, jamaw ta awalle ictu riyti-ak, illa iŋ baar kuuk ŋu ergiy-aku.
58009019	Ka seener, wiktin taat awalle Muusa uctu ɗo uŋco ka geemir, ŋa garkiycog ja ay maan kaak Buŋ rakiy ŋuu gine. Min ŋa garkiycoga, ŋa ictu baar ku ajjalinnar iŋ ku awgir, amay, law ku dindiko ho leeg ta pompil kaak ŋu koliig Isoop. Kar ŋa ergiico baar ɗo gee okin̰co ho ŋa ergiitit oki ɗo maktumne taat ŋa siirig gaanuun-aka.
58009020	Wiktin taat ŋa ergiico, ŋa kaawiy aman : « Ŋuur-aŋ baar kuuk gaara jamaw taat Buŋ obtu iŋ kuŋko a kuu karmiyinti. »
58009021	Min Muusa ergitu baar ɗo geemir ho ɗo maktumner-at, ŋa ergitu pey ɗo kuraarin taat ŋu siytu ɗo Buŋdi ho ɗo gamin ku abaadiner okin̰co.
58009022	Ka seener, gaanuun kaawa a anuwco ta gamnar giniy cawar-ak, illa iŋ baar ja. Ansi-ak, bal min̰e ka baarir, yoo waan gasaaɗo saamiye ka zunuubinnay.
58009023	Gamin kuuk goy ɗo kuraarin taat ŋu siytu ɗo Buŋdi kuuniytu cawar-ak, illa iŋ satkine. Kar gay, ar taat gi kaawtu ko, gamin-ak, ŋuur ar kellam ku gamin kuuk goy kuwa-aku. Ya gamin kuuk keɗer kat kuuniy cawar-ak illa iŋ satkin ja, maaniico gamin kuuk kuwaŋ gay yaa kuuniye cawar-ak, illa iŋ satkin taat samaan pak satkinkan kuuk ŋu giniy keɗer-aku.
58009024	Ka seener, Masi bal un̰je ɗo kuraarin taat geen di siytu, taat ar kelim ta wer kaak kuwa-aka. Kar gay, ŋa un̰je ɗo taar ta taɓ kuwa-ata ho diŋ ŋa goyiy ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ɗo bi kante.
58009025	Awalle, ay elgo, mee satkiner ka tatko un̰jigiy ɗo wer kaak cawar aale iŋ baar ku mallel. Kar Masi gay, tan̰ji paaɗo. Ŋa bal un̰je ka samaaner dees dakina a ŋaa bere ziy satkine.
58009026	Yampa, ta-aŋ ŋa taaɓiy taaɓin ta muuti dees dakina min kilgiye ka duniiner. Ya taɓ gay, ɗo wiktin ta ba aaro, ŋa bayin mena rakki di a ŋaa sooyin̰ zunuubinna ku geemir iŋ satkiney.
58009027	Buŋ gintu a gee okin̰co yaa mate mena rakki di, kar kat, ŋaaco ɗukume seriine.
58009028	Ampaa ko, Iisa Masi oki bertu ziy satkine mena rakki di a ŋaa sooyin̰ zunuubinna ku gee dakina. Wiktin taat ŋaa bayne ka seeriŋkar, ŋa asaaɗo pey sooyin̰ zunuubinna ku geemir, ŋaa ase a ŋaa jilin̰ ŋuur kuuk eraaga.
58010001	Ka seener, gaanuun ka Muusa, ŋaar ar kelimco di ta gamin kuuk yaa ase neginda. Kar gay, ŋa arro sawa-sawa iŋ gamin okin̰co kuuk goy kuwa-aku. Ampa-ak, ya gee gina satkinkan ŋuur-ak di elgin iŋ elgina, ŋuur kuuk bariya botol a ŋuu sin̰je moota iŋ Buŋ-ak, gaanuun necaaɗo tuk, ŋaa ginin̰co ŋuu nece tak ar taat Buŋ rakiyo.
58010002	Yampa, ya satkinkan-ak nec ko ŋuu kuuniye cawar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi-ak, ŋuu ibinin cawirkuwco ho ŋuu rasin̰ satkinkan-aku.
58010003	Ka seener gay, satkinkan-ak, illa ŋu iyaag gee ay elgo, ŋu moyig zunuubinnico.
58010004	Asaan baar ku awgir iŋ ku barkiydi, ŋuur bal gine gudurre tak-tak taat ŋuu ace zunuubinna.
58010005	Ɗo saan taar-an ko, wiktin taat Iisa Masi rakiy ase ɗo duniiner, ŋa kaawiiji ɗo Buŋdi aman : « Ki bal rake a ŋuun̰ gine satkine wala ŋuun̰ iye bere, kar gay, ki pinig zir.
58010006	Ki aacayɗo iŋ satkin ta mallel taat ŋu eriyjiŋ wala iŋ satkinkan kuuk ŋu gintu ɗo bi ka zunuubinnico.
58010007	Hiyya, nu kaawtu aman : ‟ Buŋdu ! Nun ko-aŋka. Nu as gine maan kaak ki rakiyo. Hii, nu as ar kaak ŋu siirtu ɗo bir ɗo Kitamner. ” »
58010008	Ɗo wer-ak, ŋa teestu ja kaawe aman : « Ki bal rake a ŋuun̰ gine satkinkan, ŋuun̰ iye bere, ŋuun̰ ere malle, ŋuun̰ bere satkine ɗo bi ka zunuubinnar. Kiŋ gay bal aaciye iŋ gamin-aŋku. » Kar sando, gaanuun ka Muusa kaaw a ŋuu ginin̰ gamin-aŋ okin̰co.
58010009	Kar ba aaro, Masi kaawtu pey aman : « Buŋdu ! Nun ko aŋka. Nu as gine maan kaak ki rakiyo. » Wiktin taat ŋa kaawtu pa-ak, ŋa as deen̰ satkinkan kuuk awalle ho ŋaa makin̰ iŋ tan̰ji.
58010010	Ansii ko, iŋ niyin taat Buŋ ictu, Iisa Masi bertu ziy satkine mena rakki di gaasiititi a ŋaa acin̰ zunuubinnite, gii gine cawar ɗo uŋji.
58010011	Kun kawta, gay satkiner ku Yuudinnar okin̰co gingiy riyco iŋ ka peyin̰co. Ŋu gingiy satkinkan ŋuur-ak di doo. Kar satkinkan-ak gay gedarro tak-tak imilin̰ zunuubinna ku geemir.
58010012	Kar Iisa Masi gay, satkiney tan̰ji, taar mena rakki di gaasiititi ho ta goy doo. Min ŋa berig ziy satkin ɗo zunuubinna ku geemir, ŋa daktu diy baay ka samaaner ɗo meeday ta Buŋdi.
58010013	Diŋ ŋa ƴoka a Buŋ yaaco nosire ɗo adiney, ŋuu gine wer ka lee asin̰ji.
58010014	Ampaa ko, iŋ satkiney taat mena rakki di-at, ŋa gintu a ŋuur kuuk ŋa ginaag cawar-ak yaa nece tak ɗo werco doo.
58010015	Taar-an ko taat Ruwwin ta Buŋdi oki kaawiite. Ta teestu ja kaawe aman :
58010016	« Rabbin Buŋ kaaw aman : ‟ Ya menaw ŋuur-ak bire, naa obe jamaw iŋ ŋuura. Ɗo jamaw-at, naa un̰jin̰ gaanuundu ɗo kaƴco ho naa diyin̰ ɗo gelbinco. ”
58010017	Ŋa gaaytu pey aman : ‟ Naaco saamiyin̰ nigin̰co okin̰ji ho zunuubinnico gay, nu icaaɗo pey bico tak-tak. ” »
58010018	Ka seener, ya zunuubinnico kat ŋu saamiycogu, satkinkan bal gine pey galilco.
58010019	Ampa-ak, gem kol siŋtay, iŋ baar ku Iisa kuuk ŋa bertu satkin-ak, gi gin botol taat gii un̰je ɗo wer kaak cawar aale-aka.
58010020	Iŋ ziy ka meen̰ji, ŋa pilte botol taat gii aaɗe min ɗo maan kaak ar zimilla kuuk gootig wer kaak cawar aale-aka. Botol taat ŋa piltu-at, taar marbinto ho ta bera goye kaak taɓ.
58010021	Ansi-ak, gi gin mee satkiner ka tatko kaak tala ɗo kaay ka ger ka Buŋdi kaak kuwa ka samaaner.
58010022	Ampa-ak, sin̰jinte moota ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi iŋ gelbin rakki bal kolaw ɗo saan ta imaante. Sin̰jinte iŋ gelbin kaak ac min pikirre taat jookumo ho iŋ ziŋka kuuk ac iŋ amay kuuk cawar.
58010023	Obinte tirit ɗo maan kaak gi eriy iŋ imaante ho gi gaariy-aka, asaan Buŋ necaat tak taat ŋa kaawtu.
58010024	Bariyinte botol taat gii iskiguwe ziŋkite a gii elguwe benannite ho gii ginguwe gamin kuuk samaane.
58010025	N̰uminte kaak gi n̰umgiy-aŋ, dakinte rasin̰jiɗo ar gee daarin̰ rasiyo. Kar gay, iskinte ziŋkite ɗo imaan ho gininte gaay iŋ gaayo, asaan ku iban ko kadar ƴiriy ta Rabbiner, taar gaay ko.
58010026	Ya waan ibingit seen ta Buŋdi kat ŋa wakila gine zunuubinna iŋ niyiney, ginno pey satkin ta saamiye zunuubinnar.
58010027	Waanna-ak, taat ɗakji-at, illa ŋaa ere iŋ kolaw ƴiriy taat Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriine. Ƴiriy taar-at, ak taat girzan̰-at yaa idin̰ jot, ŋuur kuuk newsiji kop ɗo Buŋdi.
58010028	Ŋaar kaak n̰epiɗig gaanuun kaak Muusa siirtu, ŋuu deen̰ji bal kaawo ya saadinna seer wal subba goya.
58010029	Kar ɗo taŋkoŋ gay, ŋaar kaak ƴilaag Roŋ ka Buŋdi, kaak talaag baar ku Iisa ar ŋu maan kaak maala ho kaak ginaat bees Ruwwin ta Buŋdi taat bera barkine, ku pakarro kadar tan̰ji-at yaa gine raɗ paka wal maman ? Baar ku Iisa, ŋu ŋuur ɗoo di baar ku jamaw ta marbinto kuuk ginig gee cawar-aku ?
58010030	Ka seener, gi ibingig ŋaar kaak kaaw aman : « Ŋa nun meendu kat yaa yeepin taat ŋu nigtu. Ŋa nun meendu kat yaa kappiyin kaaco ɗo taat ŋu gintu. » Kar ŋa ɗiytu pey aman : « Rabbin Buŋ yaa ɗukume seriin ɗo geen̰ji. »
58010031	Raɗji aale ɗo ŋaar kaak gal ɗo pise ka Buŋ kaak goy mento !
58010032	Kar gay pakiroŋ ɗo goyiŋko kaak awalle wiktin taat Buŋ piliig kaƴko. Ɗo menaw ŋuur-ak, gee taaɓiyiŋko dakina ho iŋ taaɓin taat ginko dakin-at oki, kuŋ gay subire.
58010033	Werin daarin̰, ŋu wariŋko ho ŋu taaɓiyiŋko ɗo uŋco ka geemir. Kar werin daarin̰ gay, ku galiy uciy iŋ ŋuur kuuk ŋu taaɓiyaag pa.
58010034	Ka seener gay, taaɓin ta ŋuur kuuk ŋu taaɓiyaag ɗo daŋaayner, ku aawaat ɗo ziŋkiko ho wiktin taat ŋu sokiig gaminko, ku rascog iŋ aditko kuuk portiko. Aditko portik-ak asaan ku ibin kadar ku gin gamin kuuk samaan paka ho kuuk yaa taaye doo.
58010035	Ampa-ak, maan kaak ku eriy iŋ imaan-ak, dakoŋ rasin̰jiɗo. Asaan iŋ ŋaar ko, kuu gasin haginko dakina.
58010036	Ya ku raka necin taat Buŋ rakiyo ho kuu gasin̰ maan kaak ŋa kaawtu a ŋaako bere-ak, illa kuu ice subirraw ho kuu goye bombo.
58010037	Kitamne kaaw aman : « Pey ɗak mena sooɗ di, sooɗ tak-tak, ek di, ŋaar kaak yaa ase-ak, yaa ase. Ŋa taayaaɗo.
58010038	Gem kaak jaawa uŋtu iŋ botol yaa goye ɗo saan ta imaanji. Kar ŋaar kaak yeepa aar gay, adir ginaaɗo gal iŋ ŋaara. »
58010039	Ɗo tanteŋ gay, gi attanno iŋ gee kuuk yeepa aaro ho ɓaayiy tare ziŋkico-aku. Kar gay, gi atta iŋ ŋuur kuuk diya gelbinco iŋ Buŋ a ŋuu gase jile.
58011001	Iŋ botol ta imaan, gi gin ko maan kaak gi eriyo ho gi ibinig ko tak maan kaak gee talgigɗo.
58011002	Ɗo bi ka imaanco ta gee ku awalle ko, Buŋ gaartu kadar adiy portik iŋ ŋuura.
58011003	Iŋ imaan ko, gi ibintu waraŋ kadar Buŋ kilgiyig gamin okin̰co kuuk goy kuwa ho keɗer iŋ kaawoy. Ampaa ko, gi ibintu kadar gamin okin̰co kuuk gee talaagu asa min ŋuur kuuk gee talgigɗo.
58011004	Iŋ imaan, Abeel bertu satkin ɗo Buŋdi taat pakgit ta Kayen. Ɗo saan ta imaanji-at ko, Buŋ meen̰ji ooyit satkiney ho ŋa taliig a ŋa goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji. Abeel, ŋaar mate. Kar ɗo bi ka imaanji taat ŋa gintu-at, ŋa kaawaate yoo diŋka.
58011005	Iŋ imaan, wiktin taat Henok goyiy iŋ odinay, Buŋ cooniig kuwa iŋ ŋaara. Ampaa ko, ŋa pakiig min ɗo muuti. Yoo waan sa bal gasin̰ji, asaan ŋa diyiig ɗo serpey. Ka seener, min Buŋ bal coonin̰ misa, Kitamne kaaw a Buŋ, adiy portik iŋ ŋaara.
58011006	Yampa, Buŋ, adiy ginaaɗo portik iŋ gem kaak ginno imaan. Ka seener gay, ŋaar kaak raka sin̰je moota iŋ Buŋ, illa ŋaa ooye kadar Buŋ goya ho kadar ŋaaco gaarin selliŋkuwiy ɗo ŋuur kuuk bariyaaga.
58011007	Iŋ imaan, Nowe iciig taaƴe ka Buŋdi ɗo maan kaak yaa ase neginda ho kaak gee talgigɗo misa. Ampaa ko, ŋa siytu markab tatko a ŋaa jilin̰ geen̰ji ku geriy. Iŋ maan kaak ŋa gintu, ŋa gaartu kadar gee ku duniiner, ŋuur jookumo. Ho iŋ botol ta imaanji, Buŋ taliig a ŋa gem kaak goy iŋ botol ɗo uŋji.
58011008	Iŋ imaan, Ibraayim iciit kaaw ta Buŋdi wiktin taat ŋa koliiga. Ŋa uctu min darrey ho ŋa ɗeettu ɗo darre taat Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaji bere. Kar ɗo ɗeetin̰ji, ŋa ibanno wer kaak ŋa ɓaayiyo.
58011009	Iŋ imaan, Ibraayim daktu goy ar awraatin̰ce ɗo darre taat Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaji bere. Ŋa daktu goy ɗo kuraarner. Isaaka iŋ Yakuub oki atta iŋ Ibraayim ɗo maan kaak Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaji bere-aka ho ŋuur sa goy iŋ kuraarnay di ar Ibraayim.
58011010	Kar Ibraayim gay era geeger kaak Buŋ meen̰ji pakirtu ɗo pinin̰ji ho ŋa meen̰ji Buŋ kat kaak yaa pinin̰ji. Geeger-ak bombo ho eezaaɗo tak-tak.
58011011	Iŋ imaan, Zaara daaciy ta Ibraayim, ya ta mogina ho ta zaɓe oki, ta weetu ho ta gintu atan̰ geemir. Ta weetu-ak, asaan ta amniy tak-tak iŋ ŋaar kaak kaawit kaaw-ata.
58011012	Ansii ko, min gem rakki kaak zab ko tak-tak amiltu tamba dakina ar kaalna wal ar ƴir kaak ɗo bi ka barrer ho gem gedarro osinji.
58011013	Gee-ak okin̰co obit imaan bombo yoo muutco. Kar gay, gamin kuuk Buŋ kaawiico-ak, ŋu bal talin̰ ŋu as ɗo werco. Kar gay, ta ar ŋu talig ko gamin-ak min serek ho ginco gala. Paa ko, ŋu ibintu kadar ŋu goy ar awraatinna ho marti ɗo duniiner.
58011014	Kar ya ŋu kaawa pa-ak gaara waraŋ kadar ŋu bariya darre ta maaniico.
58011015	Darre taat ŋu bariyiy-at, ta darre taat ŋu rastuɗo-ata. Yampa, ta-aŋ ŋu yeepe.
58011016	Kar gay, darre taat ŋu bariyiy-at, ta darre ta taɓ taat goy ka samaaner. Ɗo bi ŋaar-ak ko, Buŋ ginno sokan̰ taat ŋu kolin̰ a ŋa « Buŋco ».
58011017	Iŋ imaan, Ibraayim berig roŋji satkin ɗo Buŋdi wiktin taat Buŋ rakiy tale baay. Iŋ maan kaak awalle Buŋ kaawiiji a ŋaaji gine oki, Ibraayim ooytu berin̰ roŋji kaak daŋgiro.
58011018	Ka seener gay, min awalle, Buŋ kaawji aman : « Iŋ roŋji Isaaka kat, baan̰ yaa miine iŋ koogina ar kaak nu kaawiijiŋ. »
58011019	Kar Ibraayim gay pakirtu kadar Buŋ gin gudurre taat ŋaa nooye gem min ɗo muuti. Ɗo saan taar-an ko, Buŋ beriijiig roŋji ar ŋa yeepjig min ɗo muuti.
58011020	Iŋ imaan, Isaaka barkiyiig Yakuub iŋ Ezaayu ɗo bi ka maan kaak yaa ase neginda.
58011021	Iŋ imaan, Yakuub, ɗo wiktin taat menuwiy gaay gaase, ŋa barkiyiig kooginay ku Yuusup rakki rakki. Min ŋa barkiygu, ŋa ɗeŋirtu iŋ doŋkiloy ho ŋa ontu abdiye Buŋ.
58011022	Iŋ imaan, Yuusup, ɗo wiktin ta ŋa rakiy mate, ŋa kaawtu a gee ku Israyeel asa amile min darre ta Meser. Kar ŋa bertu izinne ɗo maan kaak ŋuu gine iŋ kaasiy.
58011023	Iŋ imaan, min Muusa ŋu weeyiiga, aginiyji cigiliig nam koyin subba. Ŋu gintu pa-ak, asaan ŋu tal samaanuwiy ho ŋu bal gine kolaw ɗo taat sultan kaawtu.
58011024	Iŋ imaan, min Muusa gin ko tatiko, ŋa rakaaɗo a ŋuu kolin̰ pey a ŋa roŋti ka romoy ta Sultan ka Meser.
58011025	Ŋa icit taaɓin iŋ gee ku Buŋdi. Ŋa tal kadar taaɓin-at guna min galal ta duniiner taat ɗo menuwir di ho taat iyaag gee ɗo zunuubinnar.
58011026	Kar ɗo ta Muusa gay, ŋa icit taaɓine ar taat Iisa Masi asiy aawe ho ŋa talaat ar maan kaak pakgig malle ka Meser serek. Asaan ka seener, ŋa tala maan kaak Buŋ asiiji bere neginda.
58011027	Iŋ imaan, Muusa amiltu min Meser ho ŋa baltu gine kolaw ɗo dapin̰ko ta sultan. Ŋa peytu bombo ar gem kaak talaag Buŋ kaak gee talgigɗo.
58011028	Iŋ imaanji, Muusa iidiytu iidin ta Paakdi ho ŋa kaawiico ɗo gee ku Israyeel a ŋuu ooye baar ɗo botilay ku geriyco. Ampaa kat, ɗubil ka Buŋdi gay dee geemir baltu deen̰ awaw ku miday ku gee ku Israyeel.
58011029	Iŋ imaan, gee ku Israyeel aaliig barre ka Dindiko bal boose ka asin̰co. Kar min gee ku Meser raka aaleŋ gay, amay teeyig okin̰co.
58011030	Iŋ imaan, durdurre ka geeger ka Zeriiko eeztu. Gee ku Israyeel jarbig geeger-ak mena bijigiƴ, kar ƴiriy ta peesiriŋkar gay, wiktin taat ŋu jarbiy-ak, durdurre-ak eeztu dizic.
58011031	Iŋ imaan, azbin̰ca rakki siŋti Raab baltu mate iŋ ŋuur kuuk newsiji kop ɗo Buŋdi, asaan ta obig samaane ŋuur kuuk gee ku Israyeel n̰aamtu a ŋuu tale baat ta darrico.
58011032	Naa kaawe pey maa ? Wiktin ginno taat naako ose rakki rakki ɗo bi ka Zedeyon, Baraak, Somsom, Zepte, Dawuud, Samiyeel ho nabiinna daarin̰ oki.
58011033	Ŋuur oki, iŋ imaan taat ŋu gintu, ŋu ictu darrinay, ŋu hokumiyiy iŋ botol, ŋu gasit taat Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaco bere ho ŋu sokumiig biŋkico ku boornar.
58011034	Ŋu deet ak ta oba bilim-bilim, ŋu waal min asiɗe ka seepiner, ya gudurrico arme oki, ŋu gas gudurre min ɗo Buŋdi, ŋu gintu gee kuuk siŋco alaw ɗo gartar nam ŋu atik askirna dakina ku darrinay ku pey.
58011035	Iŋ imaan, daaɗ gasiig pey geen̰co kuuk mate ɗo wiktin taat ŋu nooytu. Kar daarin̰ gay, ŋu gaarcot ko gaare nam ŋu mattu. Ya waan raka jilin̰co oki, ŋu poocaw, asaan ŋu raka gase maan kaak taɓ paka. Maanna-ak, ŋaar ko nooye kaak Buŋ asiy nooyin̰co.
58011036	Pey daarin̰, ŋu ajimiyig ko ajimiye ho ŋu koocig iŋ korɗiŋgo, kar daarin̰, ŋu ɗuunig iŋ jinzirre ho ŋu un̰jiig daŋaayne.
58011037	Pey daarin̰, ŋu zeerig iŋ dambay nam ŋu deeyiigu, daarin̰, ŋu gerkiɗig gerkiɗe nam ŋu ɗukumiig seera, ho daarin̰ gay, ŋu deeyig iŋ seepine. Pey daarin̰ bal gine geray, ŋu jaawa anne anne, kesuun teeco saaro nam ŋu ɗuuna zamam ku awgir di. Gee-ak pokirna tak-tak, ŋu taaɓiyaagu ho ŋu gaaraacot ko gaare.
58011038	Gee ŋuur-ak, selliŋkuwco dakina nam duniin sa bal nece ooyin̰co ! Ŋu jaawa anne-anne ɗo kalaaner, ka dambiniidi, ɗo girpiniydi ho ɗo biddindi.
58011039	Gee-ak, okin̰co, iŋ imaanco taat ajbiyig Buŋ-ak oki, ŋu bal gasin̰ maan kaak ŋa kaawtu a ŋaaco bere.
58011040	Ka seener, Buŋ siyaate maan kaak samaan aale pakgig gamin okin̰co. Ŋa raka a gee-ak yaa nece tak ar kaak ŋa rakiyo. Kar gay, ŋu gediraaɗo nece tak bal ginte.
58012001	Taloŋ ja imaan ta gee kuuk gi kaawtu ɗak ko bico-aŋku ! Ŋuur ar saadinna kuuk leyinte ɗatko. Saadinnuwco-at, ŋu gaaraat iŋ goyin̰co kaak samaane ɗo botol ta imaandi. Ɗo saan taar-an gay, rasoŋ gamin okin̰co kuuk toɗaate sin̰je ɗo goyinte kaak ɗo botol ta Buŋdi. Rasoŋ oki zunuubinna kuuk ɗaan̰aate melen̰ paa di ho zeeɗinte ɗo gaɗ kuuk Buŋ kaawiite.
58012002	Pakirinte doo ɗo Iisa, ŋaar kaak durcit baat ta barar ta imaante ho kaak yaa gininti taa nece ɗo werti. Ka seener, galal taat ŋaa aawe ɗo gaasindi-at, ŋa ibinit min awalle. Gee talaat muut ta ka etor ar maan ka sokan̰. Kar Iisa gay isgigɗo tuk. Ampaa ko, ŋa ooyiit muut-ata. Kar diŋ gay, ŋa diy baay ɗo meeday ta Buŋdi, wer kaak Buŋ hokumiyo.
58012003	Taloŋ ja maman Iisa ictu subirraw wiktin taat gay zunuubinnar taaɓiyiiga. Ampa-ak, zeeɗoŋ ku rasiyɗo taaɓin yaa patiye kaƴko nam imaanko yaa oole.
58012004	Asaan ɗo taasin̰kiko taat ku taasin̰iy iŋ zunuubinna, ku bal taasin̰e misa yoo ɗo muuti.
58012005	Ku rawtig ko taaƴe kaak Buŋ taaƴiŋko ar ŋa taaƴa kooginay-aka walla ? Ŋa taaƴiŋko aman : « Gem kol roŋji, ya Rabbin diyaaciŋ ɗo botildi, dak talin̰jiɗo taaƴin̰ji-ak ar maan ka maala. Ya ŋa leesaajiŋ oki, ziŋkan̰ yaa oolenno.
58012006	Asaan ŋaar kaak Rabbin diyiy ɗo botildi-ak, ŋaar ko kaak ŋa elgiyo ho ŋaar kaak ŋa taaɓiyiy-ak, ŋaar ko kaak ŋa taliy ar roŋji. »
58012007	Icoŋ subirraw ɗo taaɓinko, asaan iŋ taar ko, Buŋ diyiiko ɗo botildi ar kooginay. Yampa, ŋa maa micir kaak tacco diygigɗo ɗo botildi ?
58012008	Ya Buŋ diygikonno ɗo botildi ar kaak gee okin̰co gingiy ɗo kooginco, ŋaar-ak gaara kadar ku kooginayɗo, ku buumina.
58012009	Okinte, gi gin aginiyte kuuk weente. Ŋu diyaate ɗo botildi ho gi karmiyaagu. Ya ŋuur din sa gi karmiyaagu, Tatte Buŋ ka kuwaŋ gay, illa gii karmiyin̰ji pak ŋuura. Paa kat, gii gase goye kaak taɓ.
58012010	Aginiyte diyaate ɗo botildi ɗo menuwir di ar taat ŋu rakiyo. Kar Buŋ gay diyaate ɗo botildi a ŋaate gaayinte gii kuuniye cawar ar ŋaara.
58012011	Ka seener, ya ŋu diyaate ɗo botildi, ɗo wiktin taar-at awgitenno gala, illa ta raɗa adi. Kar ba aar gay, ŋuur kuuk ŋu diyig ɗo botildi-ak gasiig maan kaak aaɗaag diye kaak ɗo botildi-aka. Maanna-ak, ŋaar ko weƴe ka gelbiner ɗo bi ka goye kaak iŋ botol ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
58012012	Ɗo saan taar-an ko, gem kol siŋtay, paan̰oŋ kociŋgiliŋko kuuk oolaako ho ɗeŋroŋ gipiyko kuuk aziraw-aku.
58012013	Jaawoŋ ɗo botilay kuuk ɗalaŋ a ŋaar kaak oƴgaw, asin̰ji boɗin̰iyɗo, illa gay, ŋaa gase aapiy ta ziy.
58012014	Zeeɗoŋ kuu goye ɗo aapiyer iŋ gee okin̰co ho goyoŋ goye kaak cawar ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Ŋaar kaak goyɗo ampa-ak talaagɗo Rabbin Buŋ tak-tak.
58012015	Yaman, ginoŋ yoo waan minninko yaa newsenno kop ɗo barkin ta Buŋdi. Zeeɗoŋ a maan yaa amilenno min ɗo gelbinko ar et kaak caariy diya gee. Ya maan kaak samaanno-aŋ amil minninko, ŋaa barjile gee nam anuwko, ŋaako nigiŋko.
58012016	Ginoŋ a waan minninko goyiyɗo kaak yaa ɓaaƴe mun̰jam ho kaak yaa kan̰je iŋ gamin ku Buŋdi. Dakoŋ ginenno ar Ezaayu kaak berit aawnuwiy ɗo siŋji ɗo bi ka teendi di.
58012017	Ku iban kadar ba aaro, ŋa bariytu botol taat tacco yaaji yeepin barkin taat ŋu beriy ɗo aawo-ata, kar tacco gay pooce. Iŋ alin̰ji, ŋa loklikiiji ɗo tacco a wal ŋaaji gedire diŋ ga, kar gay, ŋa bal gedire newsin̰ gelbin ka tacco.
58012018	Kar kuŋ gay, wiktin taat ku sin̰jitu moota iŋ Buŋ, ta arro wiktin taat gee ku Israyeel sin̰jitu ɗo damba Sinayi taat nec ŋuu wakinti. Ɗo wiktin taat ku sin̰jitu-ak, ginno ak taat oba jilik-jilik, ginno uc pondiko, ginno gondikaw taat dulum ho ginno kurumbiin gidi-gidi-gidi.
58012019	Ku bal dore ale ka perner wala gaaƴ ta Buŋdi. Kar gee ku Israyeel gay, min ŋu doriit gaaƴay, kolaw obiigu ho ŋu marmiltu a ŋaaco kaawenno pey maan kaawra.
58012020	Ŋu marmiltu ampa-ak, asaan kaaw taat ŋu dortu-at patiy kaƴco. Kaaw-at aman : « Ya waan kaak wakit damba-an, ŋuu zeerin̰ iŋ dambay, ŋuu deen̰ji ya ŋa malle oki. »
58012021	Gamin okin̰co kuuk Buŋ gaariico-ak isco kolaw aale nam meen̰ji Muusa oki kaawtu aman : « Kolaw un̰jidu nam nu aziraw. »
58012022	Kar kuŋ gay sin̰je moota iŋ damba taat ŋu koliy Siyon ho iŋ geeger ka Buŋ kaak goy mento. Geeger-ak, ta Zeruzaleem taat goy kuwa ka samaaner ɗo wer kaak ɗubal ku Buŋdi n̰um dil-dil iŋ galal.
58012023	Ku sin̰je moota ɗo wer kaak gee dakina kuuk aamine n̰umtu, ŋuur kuuk ŋu siirig ko siŋco ɗo maktumne taat goy kuwa. Gee kuuk aamin-ak, ay gem di ar aaw ka Buŋdi. Ku sin̰je moota iŋ Buŋ, ŋaar kaak gay ɗukume seriiner ɗo gee okin̰co, ho moota pey iŋ gee kuuk goy goye kaak iŋ botiliy ho mat taaye. Gee-ak, diŋ ŋu ginig nam ŋu neciit tak taat Buŋ rakiyo.
58012024	Ku sin̰je moota iŋ Iisa. Ɗo jamaw ta marbinto, ŋaar ko goy ɗatik ta geemir iŋ Buŋ. Ku sin̰je moota iŋ baariy kuuk min̰ ka etor. Baariy-ak pakgig ku Abeel serek.
58012025	Yaman, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane kuu cokiyin̰ ŋaar kaak kaawaako ! Ka seener, gee ku Israyeel poocig ŋaar kaak minaagu keɗer ho ŋu bal pake min ɗo seriiner. Kar ginteŋ gay, ya gi newsaaji kop ɗo ŋaar kaak kaawaate min kuwa ka samaaner, tante-at yaa gine maman ?
58012026	Ŋaar kaak gaaƴay azirig kiɗ awalle-ak, diŋ gay, ŋa kaawaate pey aman : « Ɗo menaw kuuk yaa ase, nu aziraagɗo kiɗ keeji di, kar gay, naa azirin̰ pey kiɗa iŋ samaane oki. »
58012027	Kaaw taat a « naa azire pey-at » gay gaara waraŋ kadar gamin kuuk Buŋ kilgiytu ho kuuk yaa azire yaa sawle, illa ŋuur kuuk yaa ɗak-ak, kuuk azarro.
58012028	Meennaw taat Buŋ yaate bere-an, waan gediraaɗo azirinti. Ɗo saan taar-an ko, delinte barkin ɗo Buŋdi ho abdiyinteŋga iŋ kolaw ho iŋ horoomine ar taat ŋa rakiyo.
58012029	Yampa, ya gi ginno ampa-ak, Buŋte, ŋaar nec yaate idinte ar ak taat tiyaw.
58013001	Elguwoŋ ziŋkiko ar siŋta kuuk tacco rakki.
58013002	Dakoŋ rawtenno obe ka martir. Ka seener, iŋ obe ka martir-ak, gee daarin̰ ob ɗubal ku Buŋdi ho ŋu ibingigɗo.
58013003	Pakiroŋ ɗo gee kuuk ŋu obtu daŋaayne ho ginoŋ ar kuŋko oki, ŋu obiŋko iŋ ŋuura. Pakiroŋ ɗo gee kuuk ŋu taaɓiyaagu, ho kuŋ oki, ginoŋ ar ŋu taaɓiyaako.
58013004	Gee okin̰co, illa ŋuu bere horoomin ɗo obindi. Ɗo ŋuur kuuk ob gay, nu kaawaaco, illa ŋuu karmiyin̰ obin̰co, ŋuu kokinenno kara. Yampa, Buŋ asaaco ɗukume seriin ɗo gee okin̰co kuuk ɓaaƴa mun̰jam ho ɗo ŋuur kuuk kokina daaɗi wal miday kara.
58013005	Ɗo goyiŋko, dakoŋ elenno gurus aale. Hamdiyoŋ iŋ maan kaak ku gintu di. Asaan Buŋ meen̰ji kaaw aman : « Nu rasaacinno keejiŋ ho nu newsaajinno kop tak-tak. »
58013006	Ɗo saan taar-an ko, nii kaawe bal kolaw aman : « Rabbin Buŋ ko kaak gaayaanu. Nu ginaaɗo kolaw tak-tak. Gem iŋ odinay seer ar kunto di, ŋaan ginin maman ? »
58013007	Pakron̰co ɗo aginduwko kuuk gaarkon kaaw ta Buŋdi. Taloŋ ja maman ŋu goytu nam ŋu mattu ho icon imaan tan̰co.
58013008	Iisa Masi makaaɗo tak-tak, wala diŋka, wala wiktin taat bire, wala taat yaa ase neginda.
58013009	Yaman, dakoŋ rasenno ziŋkiko ŋuuko jagiŋko iŋ ay ɓilde kaak arro iŋ imaanko. Ka seener gay, maan kaak samaan-ak, illa gelbinte yaa ɗeŋre iŋ barkin ta Buŋdi. Yampa, ŋu ɗeŋraaɗo iŋ gaanuun kaak kaawa ɗo bi ka teendi. Gaanuun ar ŋaar-aŋ bal gaayin̰co iŋ maanna ŋuur kuuk aaɗaaga.
58013010	Ka seener, gi gin wer ka satkiner. Kar gay, maan kaak ŋu bertu satkin ɗo wer-ak, gay satkiner ku Yuudinnar ginno botol taat ŋuu teen̰ji.
58013011	Ya taɓ gay, baar ku mallel kuuk ŋu bertu satkin ɗo bi ka zunuubinnico-ak, mee satkiner kaak tatik iyiig ɗo wer kaak cawar. Kar kumco gay, ŋu eriig kara ɗo kalaaner.
58013012	Ampaa ko, Iisa oki mattu kara min geeger ka Zeruzaleem a gee yaa kuuniye cawar iŋ baar ku meen̰ji.
58013013	Ansi-ak, ginte oki amilinte kara ɗo wer kaak ŋa goyiyo ho ooyinteŋ ƴile kaak gee yaate ƴilinte ar ŋaara.
58013014	Asaan diŋ gi ginno wer ka goyindi kaak yaa taaye doo. Kar gay, gi bariya ka neginda.
58013015	Iŋ Iisa Masi ko, gi abdiyiy Buŋ ho gi oziliy siŋji. Ampa-ak, gi bera doo satkin ta oziliikar ɗo Buŋdi.
58013016	Dakoŋ rawtenno gine ka selliŋkaw ho iŋ gaay ta ziŋkiko. Asaan satkinkan ŋuur-aŋ kat aawaaji gala ɗo Buŋdi.
58013017	Karmiyoŋ aginduwko ho onoŋ uŋco. Ka seener, ŋuur di tala kaako doo ho neginda Buŋ asa indin̰co. Ginoŋ a ŋuu gaasin riyco iŋ galal bal niize. Yampa, ya ŋu niizaw-ak, kuu uce maala.
58013018	Gem kol siŋtay, indiguwonni Buŋ. Ni iban ɗo kaƴni kadar gelbinni cawar, asaan ɗo goyinni, ni ic niyin taat nii ginguwe taat samaane ay wiktine.
58013019	Maan kaak paka nu rakiy minninko-ak, illa kuudu inde Buŋ a ŋaadu pile botol naako yeepe koɗok.
58013020	Buŋ kaak iya aapiye nooyig Rabbinte Iisa min ɗo muuti ho ŋa gintu gay gooƴindi kaak tatiko. Iŋ baariy kuuk min̰e, ŋa ɗuuniit jamaw taat Buŋ obtu iŋ gee ho ta ɗukumaaɗo tak-tak.
58013021	Buŋ yaako bere gudurre kuu gine ay riy taat kuuniy iŋ niyiney. Iŋ botol ta Iisa Masi, ŋaate gaayinte gii necin̰ ay maan kaak ŋa rakiyo. Locin di darjine elgin iŋ elgina ! Aamin.
58013022	Gem kol siŋtay, kaawin kuuk nu n̰aamiiko a naako iskiŋko-aŋ, oboŋ samaane ɗo aditko iŋ subirraw. Asaan maktumner-an, taar kaawinti sooɗ di.
58013023	Nu minaako kadar siŋte Timote, ŋu imilig min daŋaayne. Ya ŋa as koɗok-ak, niiko ɓaawe seertini.
58013024	Ooyon̰co dakina ɗo aginduwko okin̰co ho ɗo gee ku Buŋdi okin̰co. Ŋuur kuuk goy Itali oki ooyko dakina.
58013025	Barkin ta Buŋdi yaa goye iŋ kuŋko okiŋko ! Nu ooyko dakina.
59001001	Ŋa nun Zaak, gay riyor ka Buŋdi ho ka Rabbin Iisa Masi kat siiraat maktumne-anta. Nu ooyaako dakina, kuŋ gee ku Buŋdi kuuk totir ɗo adiy ka kiɗar okin̰ji.
59001002	Gem kol siŋtay, ɗo ay taaɓine, aaciyoŋ dakina.
59001003	Asaan ku iban kadar ya ku kondira iŋ imaan ɗo ay taaɓiner, kuu kuuniye gee kuuk gin subirraw.
59001004	Kar zeeɗoŋ kuu ice subirraw gaay iŋ gaayo nam kuu nece tak ar taat Buŋ rakiyo, bal oorne, ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi ho imaanko sa, maan armaatiɗo pey.
59001005	Ya minninko, gin gem kaak ilimji arme, illa ŋaa inde Buŋ ho Buŋ yaaji berinti. Asaan iŋ selliŋkuwiy, Buŋ gina oyaw ɗo gee okin̰co bal kaawo.
59001006	Kar gay, illa gem-ak yaa inde iŋ imaan, bal ose ka adir. Asaan gem kaak adiy osaw-ak, ŋaar ar amay ku barrer kuuk us yaŋgaag meeda n̰ugila.
59001007	Gem ta ŋaar-ak, ŋa diyenno kaay a Rabbin Buŋ yaaji bere maanna.
59001008	Asaan adiy seer ho ɗo ay maan kaak ŋa rakiy gine, ŋa obgijiɗo tirit.
59001009	Siŋ kaak pokirin̰ce, illa ŋaa aaciye asaan Buŋ jaalig siŋji kuwa
59001010	ho ŋaar kaak gay gamnar oki, illa ŋaa aaciye asaan Buŋ cillig siŋji. Ar booyaw kuuk solla ɗo kalaaner, gay gamnar sa taayaaɗo.
59001011	Tapar kuuk booye-ak, ya pat coke, ta giniy toŋgo ho tapar-ak aaƴiyo. Ya ŋu aaƴe, booyaw-ak solliyo ho samaanuwco rawtiyo. Paa ko, gay gamnar-ak asiy mate wiktin taat ŋa gina riyoy di.
59001012	Galal ɗo ŋaar kaak obit imaanji bombo ɗo taaɓiner. Asaan wiktin taat taaɓin-at gaase, ŋaa gase hagin taat ŋuu bere ɗo ŋuur kuuk nosire. Hagin-at, taar goye ka gaasɗo kaak Buŋ kaawtu a ŋaaco bere ɗo ŋuur kuuk elgiga.
59001013	Ya gelbin ka gemor n̰aamaag ɗo zunuubinnar, ŋa ɗiyenno aman : « Buŋ kat n̰aamintu ɗo zunuubinnar. » Asaan Buŋ gediraaɗo n̰aame gemo ŋaa gine maan kaak samaanno ho ŋaar meen̰ji sa, waan gediraaɗo n̰aamin̰ji.
59001014	Kar gem kaak raka gine zunuubinna gay, taar niyin ta meen̰ji di n̰aamig ŋa giniy taat samaanno ho ŋa galiy ɗo zunuubinnar.
59001015	Niyin taat samaanno taat goy ɗo gelbiner, taar ar daatik taat iciy adi ho ta wiyo. Ampaa di oki, niyin-at wiyiy zunuubinna. Kar wiktin taat zunuubinna-ak nec ɗo werco, ŋu iy muutu.
59001016	Gem kol siŋtay, dakoŋ rasenno ziŋkiko ŋuuko caaciyiŋko.
59001017	Ay bere kaak samaane ho ay maan kaak nec tak ar kaak Buŋ rakiyo, Buŋ kat beraateŋgu. Gamin-aŋ asa min Buŋ kaak kilgiyig pato, koye iŋ kaalna. Ƴiriyo maka iŋ aando, kar Buŋ gay makɗo ho ŋa rasitenno ɗo gondikor ar kaak pat gingiyo.
59001018	Iŋ niyin ta meen̰ji ho iŋ kaawoy taat ka seener, Buŋ beriite goye ka marbinto, paa kat, gii gine awallico min gamin okin̰co kuuk ŋa kilgiytu.
59001019	Gem kol siŋtay, moyoŋ ɗo kaaw taat naako kaawe-anta : ya waan kaawaako, laaŋ ɗeŋginko samaane kuu cokiye kaawoy, ho ya ku raka kaawe, pakiroŋ ja kaƴco ho dakoŋ dapin̰guwenno koɗok.
59001020	Asaan gem kaak dapin̰e, ŋaar ginno maan kaak iŋ botiliy ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi.
59001021	Ɗo bi ŋaar-aŋ, rasoŋ gamin okin̰co kuuk jookumo ho iŋ kuuk nigaako ɗo uŋji ka Buŋdi. Kar iŋ dalullaw, obon kaaw taat Buŋ diytu ɗo gelbinko, asaan ta nec yaako jiliŋko.
59001022	Ya ku cokiya kaaw ta Buŋdi, dakoŋ cokiyenno maalan di, kar gay ginoŋ ar taat ta kaawtu. Yampa, ku tara ziŋkiko ku maaniikon di.
59001023	Asaan ŋaar kaak cokiyaat kaaw ta Buŋdi ho ginno ar kaak ta kaawtu-ak, ŋaar ar gem kaak tala wijeeney ta meen̰ji ɗo sawwapa.
59001024	Min ŋa talta, ŋa ɗeetiyo ho koɗok di ŋa rawtiita.
59001025	Kar gay, gem kaak bariya baay ta gaanuun ka Buŋdi kaak imilaag zunuubinnite kuuk ginaate ɓerrina, ŋa rasaagɗo tak-tak. Ŋa rawtaagɗo koɗok maan kaak ŋa cokiytu ho ŋa gina ar taat gaanuun-ak kaawtu. Gem ŋaar-ak, Buŋ yaa barkiyin̰ji ɗo ay maan maan kaak giniyo.
59001026	Ya waan pakira a ŋa gay abaadiner, ho biy gay, ŋa gedirgijiɗo, ŋa tara ziy ka meen̰ji ho abaadiney sa uc usu.
59001027	Abaadin taat taɓ ho taat bal oorin ɗo uŋji ka Tatte Buŋ, taar ko tale ɗo kaaco ka gollina iŋ murgilgal kuuk goy ɗo taaɓiner, ho taar ko ta gooƴe ziŋkar min gamin okin̰co kuuk nigaate ɗo duniiner-anta.
59002001	Gem kol siŋtay, dakoŋ eerguwin̰coɗo gee, asaan ta bal kuuniye iŋ imaanko taat iŋ Rabbinte Iisa Masi, ŋaar gay darjiner.
